title: ベルセルク 41 [Berserk 41]
description:
花吹雪く王ダナンの術によって、長い悪夢から目覚めたキャスカは、忌まわしき記憶に苛まれ、未だガッツと対面できずにいた。
一行が妖精島で身体を休める中、シールケとファルネーゼは、新たな力を求めて修行場へと向かう。
束の間の平穏を過ごすガッツの前に、髑髏の騎士が現れる…! ?

title: ベルセルク 40 [Berserk 40]
description:
妖精島で、精神を回復する術を持つという「花吹雪く王」に謁見したガッツ一行。夢の回廊を廻り、キャスカの深層世界へと降り立ったシールケとファルネーゼは記憶の欠片を集め、遂に最後の欠片に辿り着く…! 果たしてキャスカはかつての姿を取り戻すのか!? 
2018年9月刊

title: ベルセルク 39 [Berserk 39]
description: ついにパックの故郷・妖精島に到着したガッツ達。キャスカの心を取り戻すため、妖精王の元へ急ぐが!?

title: Berserk, Vol. 26
description: Guts, the Black Swordsman, goes from the frying pan to the fire as he must enter the mating chamber in the horrifying lair of trolls to rescue his love, Casca, and the Lady Farnese from the loathsome attentions of the hideous beasts. But while even an army of trolls cannot stand against Guts's boundless fury, the mightiest of warriors is no match for a demon lord. And so when Slan of the Godhand manifests from the entrails of slain trolls and takes Guts into her deadly embrace, Guts discovers he may not only be fighting for his life, but for his very soul!

title: Berserk, Vol. 34
description: Faced with the Kushan emperor's horrific new form and the bloody swath of destruction and spawning demons he leaves in his wake with every step, the soldiers in Griffith's new Band of the Hawk must assume their true unholy forms to battle the emperor, revealing their true faces to the citizens of Midland. How will these tormented refugees react when they discover that their would-be rescuers are as monstrous as their enemies? And could this titanic confrontation threaten to unleash even greater horrors upon the human world?

title: Berserk, Vol. 27
description: Now equipped with the mystical Berserker Armor, Guts fights on against the dragon-form of Grunbeld and his legion of fanatic apostle soldiers. But the very armor that holds Guts together — in a nightmarishly literal sense — might be the last straw that tears his tortured mind apart! While Guts struggles to hold his own against his inner demons, monsters of a very different sort rally in Windham as the Kushan Emperor, Ganishka, and the newly reborn Griffith rally their forces in a head-to-head struggle for control of all of Midland. But when the dust finally settles, there may be little left of the kingdom to claim!

title: Berserk, Vol. 38 (Berserk, #38)
description: Guts the Black Swordsman and company reach the isle of Skellig in hopes that Elven magic can cure the afflicted Casca, but the cure could come at a deadly cost. Meanwhile, Guts’ Band of the Hawk comrade Rickert journeys to the city of Falconia, the seat of power for Griffith, the resurrected former Hawks commander. But the glittering towers of Falconia cast the darkest of shadows, and a legion of demonic monstrosities dwell in the darkness!

title: Berserk, Vol. 22
description: The world of Guts, the Black Swordsman, is changing in a hurry. Though a demonic maelstrom has leveled the dreaded Tower of Conviction and ended the reign of terror of its grand inquisitor, Mozgus, peace has not returned to Midland. The Tower’s fall has heralded the unexpected return of Griffith, Guts former leader, last seen transformed from a shattered husk into one of the demon lords of the Godhand. but Griffith looks like his old self again — and with his dreams of carving out a kingdom by his own hand still intact. He’s raising a new Band of the Hawk, but this time he’s recruiting from the dark side to fulfill his deadly destiny!

title: Graduating With Honor (Heavenly Chaos Book 4)
description:
The second semester at the Academy was underway, and Benedict’s life was now even more complicated than it ever had been. His relationship officially expanded when Sadie joined him and Atropos, not just at their party, but as a girlfriend. That caused some bumps as old traumas resurfaced and cast doubts over their new relationship. All of them were determined to make it work, and because they were able to work through those moments, they grew closer together.

If balancing a new relationship wasn’t difficult enough, the three of them also had to use Pockets to advance up the Ranks. Having delved up a full Rank during the last tournament, the now-expanded party decided to do it again, leaving the Rank 4 Pocket for the Rank 5. They weren’t alone on that dangerous course, either, as their good friends were doing the exact same thing.

That pushed both groups into moments where a fraction of a second could’ve meant death for one or more of them. The worst instances came at the hands of different shamans. The blood ritualist almost killed Benedict on their first delve, but his Blood Healing had kept him alive. The worst was the warlord who nearly killed Benedict, Atropos, and Sadie at different points throughout their fight.

They survived and reached Rank 5, advancing a step closer to the Heavens. At this Rank, their Spheres would allow them to augment themselves. It was normally a huge point in every Holder’s journey, but that took a backseat to what Benedict found out and received from his bloodline. Having been given a gift that would endanger him if it were known, he still used it to help Sadie break free of her family.

They had a couple of weeks before the semester was going to end. Once it did, they— along with Victor’s group— would be ready for the Rank 5 tournament, which had been shrouded in secrecy. They were focused on not just entering that tournament, but emerging as the best of those who entered. The only thing left afterward would be graduation and then leaving the world behind, finding other worlds with Pockets that they could delve to keep advancing.

title: Pay Backs (Valens Heritage Book 10)
description:
The time has come to pay Sawyer back for all of his support and hard work. For taking a chance on Sean when no one else would. For getting Sean the needed supplies for the war back when no one else was able. Sawyer has always been in Sean's court and has gone above and beyond more than once.

And let's not even mention the help he's provided to Mihalis and Troy!

So the lions are off to Nighthome to help Sawyer take the crown, which in goblin society is a lot more like a hostile corporate takeover, combined with counting coup, than any kind of violence.

Hopefully.

However, as long as they're going to be in the Goblin and Dark Elves homeland, there's a little matter of taking House Uunregarten to task for a number of actions that have impacted House Valens, Sean's wife Cali, their children, and of course the lions. House Uunregarten is about to learn that it is never wise to piss off a lion. Especially not one who is immortal, knows magic, and is going to show up with ten thousand of his best friends to have a ... few words.

 This is the last of the Valens' Books. The Author is of course grateful to all of you who have supported him for all of this series. However no amount of begging, whining, crying, or screaming will change his mind. Large sums of money however...
Also, if you see a brightly colored box with a nice ribbon on it, and it's not Christmas? Better to leave that one alone!

title: Berserk, Vol. 32
description: Guts, the Black Swordsman, joins forces with a most unlikely ally, the fiendish Nosferatu Zodd, in a desperate attempt to defeat the Kushan emperor's malevolent astral form. But Griffith, Guts' former commander and friend reborn as a demonic lord of the Godhand, has plans of his own for the emperor, and for Midland itself. Guts and his companions' only hope is to reach the promised safety of the elf Puck's homeland, Elfhelm, but if Griffith and the emperor turn their attention back to this motley band of travelers, there may be nowhere left for Guts and crew to hide!

title: Berserk, Vol. 33
description: Guts the Black Swordsman and his companions brave the open sea, hoping to reach Puck's homeland, Elfhelm, and its powerful elven king, who might be able to restore the sanity of Guts' former lover, Casca. But seeking out a sanctuary for Casca means that Guts must postpone his hunt for his ex-friend and leader, Griffith, who has been reborn as a demon lord hell-bent on conquest. The winds of change blow fast and hard across the war-torn lands of the Holy See, and if Guts waits too long to exact his vengeance, Griffith might attain his murderous goals before Guts can return to Midland to stop him!

title: Game of Thrones: A Pop-Up Guide to Westeros
description:
Inspired by the Emmy® Award–winning credits sequence that opens each episode of the hit HBO® series, Game of A Pop-Up Guide to Westeros is guaranteed to thrill the show’s legions of fans.

Featuring stunning pop-up recreations of several key locations from the series, including the formidable castle of Winterfell, the lavish capital city King’s Landing, and the Wall’s stark majesty, this book—designed by renowned paper engineer Matthew Reinhart—takes you into the world of the series like never before. Game of A Pop-Up Guide to Westeros features a total of five stunning spreads, which fold out to create a remarkable pop-up map of Westeros that is perfect for displaying. The book also contains numerous mini-pops that bring to life iconic elements of the show, such as direwolves, White Walkers, giants, and dragons. All the pops are accompanied by insightful text that relays the rich history of the Seven Kingdoms and beyond, forming a dynamic reference guide to the world of Game of Thrones. Visually spectacular and enthrallingly interactive, Game of A Pop-Up Guide to Westeros sets a new standard for pop-up books and perfectly captures the epic scope and imagination of the series.

title: The Orphanage on Cheswick Court: The Hollowbloods
description:
For fans of A Deadly Education, Gallant, and Coraline,

a haunting, emotionally rich gothic-fantasy of secret legacies, found family,

and magic.

Fifteen-year-old Thaddeus Volkameria is orphaned by forbidden magic and raised by a pack of enchanted wolves. Guided by a wise owl with secrets of his own, Thaddeus lives hidden from the world, until a mysterious invitation arrives, summoning him to the Enchanted Haven.

At this orphanage, perched at the edge of a cursed forest, children marked by dark magic are sent to disappear… or be reborn.

But entering the Haven comes at a price.
Thaddeus and his companions must surrender part of themselves to cross the magical barrier, for the Haven doesn't welcome strangers without taking something in return.

Together, Thaddeus and three unlikely friends unravel the truth behind his parents' deaths and a vanished boy from within the Haven, and confront the ancient sorcery that hunts him, before the Dark Hollow magic he carries consumes him from within.

The Orphanage on Cheswick The Hollowbloods
 is the spellbinding first installment of a gothic YA fantasy series

title: Lunch Tales: Teagan
description:
“In Lunch Teagan, Guarino dazzles—unveiling a tale of love and friendship that proves the courage to move forward springs from those who have your back.” —Cam Torrens, author of the Tyler Zahn suspense novels

Can losing your future give the past a second chance?

Pushing her son’s stroller on a summer day, thirty-six-year-old Teagan Quinn has no reason to think a big change is looming—the kind that happens in a mind-blowing instant. Nothing could prepare her for a shocking heartbreak.

Gripped by the trauma and grief of suddenly becoming a single parent, Teagan leans heavily on her lunch friends and lively Irish family for support. But when something ends, something usually begins—and Officer Luke Pisani walks back into Teagan’s life. Not just any old friend, he was her idealistic first. The man who got away.

As the grieving months go by, Luke is there at every turn, and gradually, old attraction reignites. But as ambivalent feelings challenge Teagan’s new beginning, a series of hurtful anonymous notes arrive, each angrier than the one before it.

With grit and urgency, Teagan must summon her inner sleuth before the letters poison one of the best things that could happen to her—learning to love again.

title: The Pianist and the Snake
description:
Pianist Ian Darnell’s psychic visions might solve a mystery—or destroy him first.

At Hudson Ridge High, secrets have a way of hiding in plain sight—and Ian Darnell’s are no exception. His psychic visions leave him filled with dread and confusion about his place in the world. When a snake goes missing from the science lab, and a classmate ends up in the ER from a venomous bite, the blame falls on a favorite teacher. Determined to clear the teacher’s name, Ian confronts his growing psychic powers and the overwhelming feeling that the visions are leading him to something far more dangerous.

As he digs deeper into the mystery, his visions grow stronger—more vivid, more chaotic—interfering with his music and leading him to a trail of dark secrets and a life-threatening experiment hidden in plain sight. But the deeper he goes, the more his feelings for Bradshaw, the school’s popular heartthrob, blur the line between hate and something much more confusing.

The Pianist and the Snake is a gripping tale of mystery, self-discovery, and the courage it takes to accept who you are, no matter how impossible it may seem.

-----
"I strongly believe in the transformative power of music—not just to entertain, but to heal, to provoke, and to give voice to what words alone often can’t express. The Pianist and the Snake moved me deeply because it captures that truth with stunning emotional honesty and timeless cultural resonance"  —Matthew J. Detrick Founder, Artistic & Executive Director, Violinist Apollo Chamber Players

title: Beneath the Killing Fields: A Family Remembers
Hidden Strength: Resiliency of the Sequoia
authors: Nathan Stark|John Hoback|Michelle Sanchez|Anabella Stark|Moran Reudor
description:
Hidden Strength tells the story of Mariposa, a young sequoia tree, and her wise mother, Virginia. As an approaching storm threatens their home, Mariposa feels fear and uncertainty. Guided by Virginia, Mariposa begins to understand that the strength to endure the storm lies not in avoiding it but in facing it.

Although sequoias are the largest trees in the world, Mariposa discovers that her greatest strength doesn’t come from her immense size—it comes from deep within. As readers follow Mariposa's journey, they, too, will discover the timeless lessons of perseverance, family bonds, and the quiet strength that lies within all of us.

Perfect for readers of all ages, Hidden Strength not only explores the beauty of the sequoia but also inspires with a powerful message of resilience, teaching us that even in the face of life's greatest storms, we can stand tall, grow stronger, and find beauty even in the ashes.

title: Universal Success Toolkit: The First Win Effect – Imagine. Implement. Achieve.
Leading from Day One: The Essential Guide for New Supervisors
description:
Leading From Day The Essential Guide for New Supervisors provides a comprehensive roadmap for professionals transitioning into their first leadership role.

Drawing from over 25 years of international human resource experience, this practical guide addresses the most common challenges new supervisors shifting from individual contributor to team leader, building trust, setting clear expectations, managing time effectively, and handling difficult conversations.

Each chapter combines research-backed principles with real-world examples, providing actionable strategies for immediate implementation. Readers will learn how to create psychological safety, delegate effectively, lead through change, and build a culture of continuous improvement. Unlike theoretical leadership books, this playbook offers step-by-step guidance with worksheets and reflection exercises that transform concepts into practice.

Whether you're preparing for your first supervisory role or looking to strengthen your leadership foundation, this essential resource will help you navigate the critical transition from colleague to confident, respected leader.

title: Modern Day Spiritual Warfare: The Invisible War Against Evil
PISTIS: The Art of Trusting the Unseen
description:
“There is a version of yourself that you know, yet remains unseen by anyone else.
It is time to master the art of trusting the unseen—and, in doing so, to trust yourself.”

 The Art of Trusting the Unseen is a book that blends spirituality, self-discovery, and personal growth. It invites readers to reflect on their own spiritual experiences through the author’s journey, parables, and revelations.

Not tied to doctrine, it draws from many traditions to reveal the many paths of inner wisdom. Both spiritual and practical, it is a self-help guide that reminds us that knowing ourselves is the key to transformation—and that transformation shapes the way we live and love.

title: Their Workplace, Your Business: A Founders HR Playbook for Scaleable Success
Redesigning Your Life: The AI Mosaic of Career & Life Design: Career Architect GPT: Design Your Future Self with Agility, Purpose, and Precision in the ... AI: Self-Help + AI-driven Mastery Series)
description:
#1 Top Rated and #1 New Release
Best Seller in Career Guides and Higher Education 

REDESIGNING YOUR LIFE with AI
The AI Mosaic of Career & Life Design
Career Architect GPT
Design Your Future Self with Agility, Purpose, and Precision in the Age of Superintelligence
Foreword by Dr. Salim Atay, President of the Human Resources Office, Presidency, Republic of Türkiye
 979-8-9922814-5-3 (e-Book)

Hearing all the buzz about ChatGPT and DeepSeek? Do you want to cut through the hype and understand what it's all really about and how it can help change your life?

Get ready to architect the career and life you deserve—before AI does it for you.

What if the future of your career and life wasn’t written in the stars but could be designed—step by step, piece by piece—by you? What if, with the help of revolutionary artificial intelligence (AI) as a co-architect, you could achieve clarity, fulfillment, and purpose like never before?

In The AI Mosaic of Career and Life Design, Hassan Akmal invites you to embark on a transformative journey through the most profound and innovative framework for career and life mastery. This isn’t just another self-help book; it’s a launch pad blending timeless wisdom with cutting-edge AI tools like Career Architect GPT.

Akmal introduces the concept of the "AI Mosaic"—a groundbreaking integration of human creativity, intentional design, and the limitless possibilities of AI.

Through vivid metaphors, actionable exercises, and real-life examples, you will learn how Create Your Career and Life Design Mosaic: Discover how to turn your fragmented experiences into a unique, cohesive, and breathtaking masterpieceLeverage the Power of AI: Use AI as your co-pilot to design a life you love with precision and purpose in an ever-evolving worldAlign with Your True North: Reconnect with your values, passions, goals, and identity to create a life and legacy that feels authentic and deeply meaningfulMaster Resilience and Adaptability: Learn how to thrive amidst uncertainty by embracing a design-oriented mindset
With his unparalleled insights from global experiences, Akmal challenges you to reimagine what’s possible, offering a vision where human potential and AI work together to create extraordinary lives.

This book is a call to action—not to wait for the future to happen but to design it with intention and agility.

What You'll Discover in This Inspiring Personalized Career Design – Move beyond outdated career models leveraging state of the art AI tools to create your best possible futureExclusive Global Insights – Featuring world-class thought leadersFuture-Proof Your Skills – Develop AI literacy, human intelligence, and strategic foresight to remain competitive
Who Should Read This?Ambitious Professionals – Stay ahead of AI-driven changes in your industryEntrepreneurs & Innovators – Harness AI for business growth and strategic career pivotingStudents & Educators – Understand how AI is reshaping the job m

title: The Contract Advantage
description:
Author's Manifesto | The Contract Asset Movement™

This isn't a book about contracts.

It's a book about how we build modern business.

For decades, contracts have been buried in legal silos.

Overlooked. Undervalued. Misunderstood.

But they hold the blueprint for 

How we generate revenueHow we serve customersHow we scale trust

Contracts aren't paperwork - they're performance.

This book introduces a powerful new 

Contracts as a Business Asset™.

A movement for executives, operators, and builders who are done with the chaos -

and ready to design clarity, velocity, and growth into every agreement.

Inside, you'll discover how 

Turn contracting from cost center to competitive edgeAlign legal precision with commercial speedCreate systems that scale and serve

This is a manifesto for the future of business -

where contracts drive strategy, not slow it down.

If you're building for scale, leading transformation, or designing systems that last - this is your strategic advantage.

Welcome to The Contract Advantage™.

Join the movement. Lead the shift.

title: The King & Me: Becoming More Like Jesus One Day At A Time
Leading by Mission: Unlock the hidden power of military leadership beyond traditional command & control
description:
Unlock the hidden power of military leadership—beyond traditional command and control.

Imagine a team that makes the right decisions—even when you’re not in the room. In today’s fast, complex environment, traditional “command and control” leadership slows organizations down. Leading by Mission adapts the proven military concept of mission command for modern business—so you can create clarity, speed, and accountability at every level.

You will learn how 

Communicate purpose and intent so teams align without micromanagementBuild high-trust, self-reliant teams that take ownershipEnable fast, decentralized decision-making in dynamic conditionsBalance empowerment with strategic alignment to deliver real resultsPacked with practical tools, real-world examples, and simple frameworks, this book gives managers, entrepreneurs, and executives a step-by-step way to lead with confidence—across change, remote work, and cross‑functional complexity. If you want a leadership system that scales your impact (not your workload), Leading by Mission is your field guide beyond command and control.

About the 
Christoph Moser combines leadership experience from special operations and global industry. As a former officer in the Austrian Special Operations Forces and a Group Chief Security Officer, he brings battle-tested principles to the reality of modern organizations.

title: The Field of Greens: Fueling Up for the Big Game
description:
Get ready to fuel up and play your best!
Follow Kantu, Tamu, and Bali as they prepare for the big baseball game with smart choices that power their bodies and sharpen their minds. From hydrating with water to fueling up with colorful fruits, veggies, and plant-powered snacks, these friends learn how the right food and habits can help them feel strong, stay focused, and have fun on and off the field.
Packed with playful lessons, energy-boosting recipes, and a winning attitude, The Field of Greens shows young athletes how feeding their bodies the right way can lead to big victories—both in sports and in life!
Because champions aren't just made on the field—they're made in the kitchen, at the snack table, and with every healthy choice they make.

title: RAISING BUDDHA IN THE MODERN WORLD: A Holistic Parenting Guide
description:
Raising Buddha in the Modern World
A Holistic Parenting Guide

In a world racing toward progress, how do we raise children who are anchored, aware, and alive to their full potential?

Raising Buddha in the Modern World is a heartfelt invitation to reimagine parenting—not as a checklist of do's and don'ts, but as a sacred journey of growth for both child and parent. Blending ancient wisdom with modern research, Manika draws from over two decades of experience as a meditation trainer, educator, and mother to offer a grounded, deeply personal guide to raising children who thrive in body, mind, energy, and spirit.

This book doesn't prescribe perfection—it nurtures presence. Through real-life stories, practical insights, and a holistic lens that honors rhythm, connection, and consciousness, it gently illuminates how everyday choices can shape a child who is rooted in their own inner wisdom.

Whether you are expecting a child, navigating toddlerhood, or simply seeking to parent with more purpose and joy, this book is a companion for your path—reminding you that raising a child is not just about preparing them for the world, but about preparing the world for the light they carry within.

title: Emerging Economies in the 21st Century. 2nd Edition: International Trade Balance- through technology, entrepreneurship, innovation, value addition and beneficiation
The Matters of Friendship (The Friendship Matters Series, #2)
description:
In this follow up novel to the acclaimed, award-winning novel, Friendship Matters, “The Matters of Friendship” sees the return of best girlfriends Kandace, Saisha, and Euniqé as they laugh and battle their ways through life’s dramas and romance. 

Kandace Randell Jackson is on a mission to become Buffalo’s top interior designer, all while dodging emotional grenades from her ex, Travis. As she continues dating Raymond, she has to fend off Travis’s attempts to make her feel guilty—because who doesn’t love a little drama on the side?

Saisha Treedmont Gaskins is living her best life with husband Lamont, juggling love and work like a pro. But when her past shows up like an unwanted sequel, she wonders if Lamont can handle the intrusion. Spoiler it involves a lot of awkward conversations.

Euniqé Johnson is the calm in the storm, raising her son, Tyree, and managing therapy clients while enjoying boyfriend Earl’s company. But when Earl’s embittered ex-wife lands on the scene, Euniqé must decide if she’ll stick around for the drama or turn him loose.

As Kandace, Saisha, and Euniqé navigate love, laughter, and life’s absurdities, they remind us that true friendship is all about surviving the chaos together—preferably with Mimosas and a good sense of humor!

title: Stay Safe with Ruby and Reuben
description:
Stay Safe with Ruby and Reuben is an interactive child safety book written to create awareness among children on issues such as good and bad touches, how to be safe in school, how to be safe while going and coming back from school, safe sleepovers and secret codes. 
This book covers the above issues in an easy to read format for children. Profit from sales will be used to fund not for profits working to protect children from child sexual abuse and to print additional copies for children who cannot afford to buy the book.

Copies are available on Amazon worldwide

title: Mindful Resilience for Zodiacs: Navigating Life's Challenges
description: Life's challenges often test our resilience and adaptability. This book combines ancient wisdom with modern strategies to help you navigate adversity, especially during uncertain times. Through mindfulness, emotional intelligence, and practical approaches, it offers tools for personal growth, balance, and success in both everyday life and difficult periods.

title: Harvest Cruise
description:
Geri is an introverted writer who is most comfortable at home. When her boss-turned-best-friend wins two passes for a single’s cruise, she thinks she’s taking steps towards expanding her circle. What begins as an uncomfortable but enticing foray into a world of awkward flirting and adventure, quickly becomes a fight for survival.

With kidnappings, murder, and conspiracy, Geri finds herself in the middle of a story she never could have imagined writing.

title: Nate's Noisy Nose: A funny, interactive picture book
description:
From the award-winning creators of Baby Worries, comes a heart-warming and funny picture book about an ordinary kid with a musical nose!

Join Nate as he navigates the challenges of a nose that’s a bit too special. With every tuneful toot, he finds himself in a new misadventure, whether it’s at home, at school, or out and about, making him the centre of attention wherever he goes – but not always in a good way!

Amid the chaos, Nate’s longing for peace grows stronger. If only he could find silence and slip under the radar like a regular kid.

But fear not! Nate isn’t alone on his quest. His loyal furry friend, Rascal, is by his side, ready to help him snuffle out solutions. Will Rascal's devotion be the key to Nate’s noisy problem, or will a team of brilliant doctors and scientists come to the rescue?

This laugh-out-loud gem is perfect for families who love to giggle together. As Nate’s story unfolds, readers are reminded that even the quirkiest traits can lead to the most unexpected outcomes.

This noisy, interactive book is more than just a funny tale of a musical nose; it's a celebration of friendship, loyalty, creativity, and finding solutions when life gets a little too loud.

title: Believe Nothing, Know Nothing: The Lightworkers' Ultimate Survival Manual
description:
Discover Your Cosmic Truth.

Did you ever suspect Earth was not your real home and you wanted to know more about your true lineage?

Are you ready to awaken to your divine purpose and embrace the extraordinary mission that brought you here? Join your fellow Lightworkers—Starseeds, Indigos, Wanderers, and other cosmic souls—on a transformative journey of self-discovery, empowerment, and spiritual evolution.

In this groundbreaking guide, Jean-Claude Koven unveils humanity's hidden history, revealing a provocative narrative of extraterrestrial engineering and manipulation that challenges everything you’ve ever believed. With profound insights and practical tools, this book is your compass to navigate the illusions of the matrix and unlock the truth of your cosmic origins.

Break Free from the Ego’s Hold
Learn powerful techniques like the revolutionary exercise to transcend ego-driven limitations and align with your higher self.

Unveil the Hidden Forces Shaping Humanity
Dive deep into the unseen cosmic influences that have shaped humanity's existence and uncover your role--as a being from a higher level of consciousness--in this grand design.

Step into Your Lightworker Power
Whether you’re an awakened soul or just beginning your spiritual journey, this manual provides practical exercises and profound wisdom to guide you through the challenges of awakening and ascension.

Perfect for those who feel like strangers on this planet, Believe Nothing, Know Nothing offers a lifeline for Lightworkers to remember their cosmic heritage, rise above earthly illusions, and fulfill their soul’s mission.
Are you ready to transcend the ordinary, embrace your divine power, and light the way for humanity’s future?
The truth is within you—unlock it today.
 
“Koven has contributed something exceptional to the world of spiritual literature."
  Mary Jones— The Chrysalis BREW Project
 
"Believe Nothing, Know Nothing is not a book; it is a portal—a labyrinthine odyssey into the metaphysical architecture of existence.
 Goodreads Review -- Rated 5.0 (59 Reviews to Date)

title: The Bright Freight of Memory
description:
In the end I believe our flaws define us more than our virtues. Shakespeare's greatest plays, the tragedies, revolved around their heroes' flaws rather than their glories.

Matthew Cooney and Donal Mannion shared their time as boys in a rundown neighborhood, without fathers, without comfort, without a sense of tomorrow, then went their separate ways, one to chase the trappings of maturity, the other to the streets. Their days shrouded in boredom, their nights filled with the thrill of the chase, each sought his place and his purpose.

Within their struggles are the challenges of escape, of outrunning the roll of the dice that placed them where they are, and, in the end, of defining what it means to be alive, to constantly strive for the things that are just out of reach.

title: First Kiss, Last Kiss
description: Teens Jesse and Diane meet in a lively Midwestern American town, and it's love at first sight! They share a time of young love in bloom that is playful and tender, leaving you lighthearted and smiling. Realizing that a deep and rare love found its way into each other's hearts, they decide to get married after graduating from university. Plans change when Jesse gets drafted and becomes a combat soldier in Vietnam where he experiences the turbulent traumas of war. Even though an invisible bond remains, their journeys are forever altered through a twist of fate with many surprises along the way. First Kiss, Last Kiss spans three generations as they celebrate family and friendships with all its joys, losses, and messy wonderful times while the resiliency of the human spirit shines through it all. There is a blending of characters that are witty, enchanting, and uniquely quirky that fit together like pieces in a puzzle that will stay with you long after you read the last page.

title: MURDER At The 17th (Ron Johnson)
description: An Intriguing Golf Murder-Mystery with a satirical slant.

title: The Blog: A Young Woman's Crusade to Expose a Luciferic Agenda
description: When investigative journalism student, Abigail Houston begin her crusade against student indoctrination of the New World Order imposed by her liberal university that would deny their freedoms, she did not know it would also lead her to uncover a far more insidious plot. A plot that would debase humanity, suppress truth, destroy the potential cosmic destiny of all mankind, and open the jaws of hell to destroy her for revealing it in her Blogs. Of which jeopardizes her relationship with her fiancé' and shakes the foundation of his beliefs and his world. Interesting and little-known facts about the founding and purpose of America as a covenant land of promise and unexpected heroines also make it an interesting and compelling read.

title: The Compass of Chaos: Green Room
description:
When the wars are hidden and the aid is weaponised, one man risks everything to uncover the truth.

Alec Mercer has spent a lifetime navigating the frontlines of global conflicts — from Sri Lanka’s scarred coastlines to Afghanistan’s hidden valleys. When a mission in South Sudan unravels, Alec stumbles onto a conspiracy that runs through the heart of the humanitarian system itself, where corruption and power collide behind the façade of relief.

As allies turn into enemies and silence becomes a commodity, Alec must decide how much he’s willing to risk to expose a truth no one wants revealed.

The Compass of Green Room is a fictional spy thriller that peels back the polished surface of humanitarian aid and global diplomacy — revealing the covert wars fought in the shadows of every conflict.

title: The Horizon Burns: A Tale of Salt, Fire, and First Contact
description:
“Some maps end in monsters. Others end in boys like Tomas.”

Lisbon is grey with hunger and hope. Vasco da Gama’s ships prepare to sail into legend, chasing spices, salvation, and the edge of the world. Among them hides Tomas, an orphaned tanner’s apprentice who dares to stow away in search of something more.

From the freezing decks of the Sao Rafael to the humid jungles of Sao Tome, Tomas must navigate the brutal codes of sailors, the pull of forbidden friendship, and the haunting rhythms of a land that remembers every trespass.

The Horizon Burns is a lyrical, immersive coming-of-age tale set at the dawn of the Age of Discovery. A novel about the cost of dreams, the weight of history, and the quiet defiance of those the chronicles forget.

title: The Trees Sing: Just What I Need to Read Today, or Tomorrow
How Americans Can Buy Property in Portugal: A Step-by-Step Guide for Americans Moving, Retiring and Buying Property in Portugal
description:
Thinking about buying a home in Portugal? You’re not alone.

Every year, more Americans are discovering Portugal’s sunshine, safety, affordable lifestyle and incredible quality of life. But buying property overseas can feel overwhelming with new laws, different paperwork, currency transfers and plenty of red tape.

This step-by-step guide makes the process clear and encouraging. Written by financial services professional and expat Claire Wheatley, it covers everything you need to turn your dream of living in Portugal into reality.

Inside you’ll 

✔ The best regions to live or invest from Lisbon’s vibrant buzz to the Algarve’s golden beaches, the Silver Coast’s retreats, Central Portugal’s close-knit communities and even the islands of Madeira and the Azores.

✔ Visas and residency options explained including the D7, Digital Nomad, D2, and Golden Visa, plus what to expect from appointments and paperwork.

✔ The property buying process, step by step from reservation deposits to final deeds, with the biggest mistakes to avoid.

✔ Financing and investment choices mortgages for Americans, renting out your property, buying land, renovating older homes or investing off-plan.

✔ Working with professionals you can trust like lawyers, realtors, surveyors and foreign exchange specialists who ensure your money transfers safely and cost-effectively.

✔ Taxes and legal obligations including IMT, stamp duty, IMI and capital gains, explained in plain English so you know what to expect (with professional tax advice always recommended).

✔ Lifestyle insights — schools, healthcare, festivals, food, sports, and what day-to-day life in Portugal really feels like.

Why this guide is different
Most books and blogs about Portugal are written in general terms. This one is written specifically for Americans, focusing on the questions U.S. buyers ask Which regions suit my lifestyle? What visas and residency options are available? How does the buying process differ from home? Packed with real stories from Americans who’ve already made the move, it combines clear steps with practical insights you can trust.

About the author
Claire Wheatley brings both personal and professional as a financial services expert, she has helped countless Americans save money on foreign exchange transfers and buy property in Portugal, and as a single parent, she’s lived the relocation journey herself.

Who this book is for
Retirees looking for sunshine and a better cost of living.
Families relocating for a healthier lifestyle and international opportunities.
Investors seeking long-term value and European property exposure.

Buying abroad doesn’t have to be intimidating. With the right knowledge, a supportive team and a little patience with Portugal’s famous red tape, your new life here is absolutely possible.

Whether you’re planning retirement, relocating, or investing, How Americans Can Buy Property in Portugal is your essential companion to making the move with confidence.

Your dream of living in Portugal is closer than you think.

title: Girl Grit
description:
Girl Grit: Savage Not Average is the first book in the empowering Human Empowerment trilogy for women worldwide. Dr. Elinsky guides readers through a profound journey of harmonizing thought and emotion, exploring personal fulfillment and experience. She transforms her readers from doormats—controlled, manipulated, and walked over by others—into daredevils, fearless warrior women living without regret. Discover what it means to go from average to savage in this emotional, action-packed self-help adventure that will not only inspire you but also challenge societal conditioning to be a ‘good girl’ focused on serving and pleasing others.

In Girl Grit, Dr. Elinsky passionately challenges and dismantles restrictive gender roles, asserting that they limit our potential as women and undermine our purpose as equal human beings. As an expert in gender relationship dynamics, Dr. Elinsky draws on extensive research to critically examine the very fabric of our social conditioning. She urges, “It is time to wise up, rise up, and ascend to your highest potential.” Celebrating the worthiness and grandeur of women’s capacities, Girl Grit will elevate you to unimaginable heights.

Finally, Dr. Elinsky advises, “Do not read this book unless you are ready to revolutionize your life as you know it.” Learn what it means to become a fire woman and unleash your regal authority into the world. Girl Grit will set your self-esteem on fire.

title: Dopamine: The Happy Spark (NeuroSnuggles Series)
Start, Grow, And Thrive: An LGBTQ+ Guide to Business
description:
Are you ready to turn your business idea into a reality—and build it with pride, confidence, and purpose?

Start, Grow, and Thrive is more than a business handbook. It’s a step-by-step guide designed especially for LGBTQ+ entrepreneurs who want to launch, stabilize, and scale their ventures with integrity. Written by Danielle Morris, an experienced strategist, pricing expert, and advocate for inclusive entrepreneurship, this book gives you the tools and insights to build a business that reflects your values while achieving real success.

Inside, you’ll discover how 
✔ Choose the right legal structure to protect yourself and your vision
✔ Register, license, and finance your business without unnecessary stress
✔ Master accounting, taxes, payroll, and cash flow—without being a numbers expert
✔ Build a brand that stands out and connects authentically with your audience
✔ Access LGBTQ+ certifications and supplier diversity programs to open powerful doors
✔ Protect your business with smart insurance, contracts, and risk management
✔ Scale with intention, embrace technology, and leave a legacy that matters

What makes this guide unique is its LGBTQ+ perspective—addressing the real-world challenges and opportunities queer founders face, from inclusive ownership structures to navigating identity in public filings, partnerships, and customer relationships.

Whether you’re just starting out or looking to grow, this book equips you with practical strategies, insider tips, and confidence to thrive—not just survive—in business.

🌈 Bold, practical, and empowering—Start, Grow, and Thrive is your essential companion for building a business that is both profitable and authentically yours.

title: The Day the Picture Spoke : A Journey Into The Magical Unknown (The Picture Portals Trilogy Book 1)
description: What if the picture on the wall suddenly shimmered—and pulled you inside? Ella discovers what no one else can photographs are doorways into hidden worlds. The moment one flickers with light, her quiet life unravels into wonder and mystery. Drawn through frames where every detail holds meaning, she learns that courage often begins with curiosity. Yet each step brings choices that will change her forever—and whispers from the pictures remind her to listen, for they may hold the key to where her path leads next.

title: Tides of Acadia (The Origins of Acadia Series)
description:
Acadia, 1640s. On the fog‑bound coast where France and England contest a wilderness, Charles de La Tour defends a timber fort at the mouth of the Wolastoq/St. John River. At his side stand Françoise Jacquelin—newly arrived from France—and Wabanaki allies whose homelands shape every choice they make.

Across the Bay of Fundy, rival governor Charles de Menou d’Aulnay raises ships and soldiers to bring Acadia under his rule. As winter hunger, shifting tides, and court intrigues close in, oaths are tested and love is forced into the line of fire. When d’Aulnay’s fleet appears off the palisades, Françoise must decide whether to yield or hold the ramparts and risk everything.

Tides of Acadia brings the La Tour–d’Aulnay war to life—from Port‑Royal to the Saint John River—blending siege, seamanship, and a cross‑cultural bond that refuses to break.

For readers who enjoy

Maritime adventures on a raw frontier
Colonial New France and Acadian history
Strong female leads under siege
Cross‑cultural alliances and moral courage

title: From Ratings to Growth: How to Evaluate Talent, Drive Growth, and Motivate Your Team with Human-Centric Reviews
description:
Do performance reviews create anxiety and stress for you and your team? You are not alone. Traditional performance appraisal processes based on bell curves and clearly defined ratings can stifle growth, create trust issues, and fail to recognise the full potential of your people.
In "From Ratings to Growth", experienced leader and mentor Vijay Kulkarni provides an approach to a more effective process. This how-to book highlights how you can use empathy rather than judgement and engaging conversations rather than box-ticking on form processes. Vijay Kulkarni shares over 26 years of experience and provides an engaging and human-centred structure underpinned by two thoroughly tested 
The 9-Box Grid—move away from simple performance ratings and examine and develop future potential.
The Ideal Team Player Model understands the reasons behind performance by examining the values of Humble, Hungry, and Smart.

You will learn how 
Recognise hidden talents and potential leaders within your team.
Have feedback conversations to involve psychological safety and trust.
Create customised development plans for personal and organisational purposes.
Address difficult conversations with empathy and structure, from coaching poor performance to guiding high performers.
Develop a comprehensive leadership succession plan and align overall work activities with the strategic vision using tools like the Balanced Scorecard.

Vijay Kulkarni includes many examples from his professional experience, active reflection (worksheets) for participants, and individual 'Manager's Playbooks' to assist in every application, from building a team to ongoing development.
Please consider this book a roadmap for developing a culture where people feel valued, engaged, and empowered to create and grow. We need to focus on the person and stop evaluating them.

If you are a manager, leader, or HR professional who wants to create a better, more engaged team, this book is your opportunity to journey from ratings to growth.

title: Love Vipassana: The Union Within
description:
“Love took me to Vipassana and Vipassana took me within, to this knowingness.” Shoneeka

Key Highlights :Balance masculine and feminine energies for authentic love.Build deeper bonds with your soulmate, twin flame, or partner.Address toxic masculinity and toxic femininity in modern relationships.A powerful blend of self-help and spirituality for relationship healing.Overcome recurring patterns and foster genuine connection.A concise relationship guide for inner and outer harmony."The sacred union of masculine and feminine energies within us manifests our true love."
Are you searching for deeper meaning in your relationships? Have you ever wondered why we often feel lonely, even in a committed marriage, or why so many soulmates struggle to maintain harmony? This transformative relationship guide offers profound insights into the dynamics of connection and love, helping you address the challenges that keep recurring in your life.
Why do we repeatedly face the same issues in our partnerships? Why do we carry resentment toward the opposite gender? In a world rife with toxic masculinity and toxic femininity, this book reveals how the imbalance of your inner masculine and feminine energies might be the root cause. By addressing this internal conflict, you can heal the patterns that disrupt authentic intimacy and build a relationship grounded in understanding and unity.
Whether you're looking to deepen the bond with yourself or your twin flame/soulmate or spouse, or simply understand how to create a divine union, this book is a road map to your quest.

title: Building Model-based Enterprise Architecture: Implementing model-based enterprise architecture with Sparx EA, MDG, and the TOGAF Standard (English Edition)
description:
Building trust with your business stakeholders starts with providing them with accurate, up-to-date information. This book shows you how to create a unified enterprise architecture repository, a central database for all your diagrams, catalogs, and other artifacts. Information supporting stakeholders' decisions may be delivered through a single artifact or a combination of multiple artifacts.

This book systematically covers the entire process, starting with a crash course in Sparx EA and mastering the principles of Model Driven Generation (MDG) to build a custom metamodel. You will then learn how to structure your repository and model key architectural artifacts, including business capabilities, projects, applications, data integrations, and technology environments like the cloud. The book also provides detailed guidance on modeling business services, organizational structures, and strategies. Finally, you will discover crucial repository management processes and learn to publish your artifacts as professional documents or web content for wider consumption.

By the end of this book, you will be fully competent in using Sparx EA to build, manage, and publish a professional-grade EA repository. This expertise will enable you to effectively analyze, communicate, and drive strategic change within your organization, making you a vital asset in any enterprise architecture team.

What you will learn
● Developing a custom metamodel using MDG.
● Maintaining EA artifacts and diagrams.
● Distinguishing between physical, logical, and conceptual models. 
● Produce artifacts based on reference architectures.
● Learn the TOGAF 10 content metamodel through practical EA workspace examples.

Who this book is for
This book is for practical and model-driving architects, including business, application, data, and technology architects, as well as project managers, solution, integration, and cloud architects. This book is also beneficial for Sparx EA users who are looking to advance their skills and master MDG.

Table of Contents
1. Introduction to Enterprise Architecture Repositories
2. Sparx EA Crash Course
3. Introducing Model Driven Generation
4. Advanced Model Driven Generation
5. Structuring the Repository
6. Modeling Business Capabilities
7. Modeling Projects
8. Modeling Applications
9. Modeling Application Integrations
10. Modeling Cloud Environments
11. Modeling Business Services
12. Modeling Organizations and Strategies
13. Repository Management Processes
14. Publishing EA Artifacts

title: The Legend of Chandi
description:
In the heart of Sri Lanka – the island known as the pearl of the Indian Ocean – The Legend of Chandi follows the extraordinary journey of a rare single-tusked elephant as he battles human encroachment, political corruption, and his own demons – including an addiction to goda, a potent jungle moonshine.

Branded Chandi, or “the notorious one,” he becomes both a symbol of resistance and a target for destruction, navigating a world where deforestation, illegal wildlife trade, and civil unrest threaten his very existence. Through his eyes, this novel paints a powerful, immersive portrait of the island’s socio-political turmoil while reflecting on the fragile coexistence between humans and wildlife.

title: Rooted: A Young Tree's Journey
Rooted: A Mature Tree's Journey
description: A Mature Tree's Journey is a heartwarming tale highlighting the bond between humans and nature. When Dendro, a wise and mature tree, faces a dangerous threat, two brave siblings take action to save their beloved tree. This exciting story, full of courage and adventure, shows us all the important role we have in protecting our environment.

title: AI for Beginners Demystified: Your Guide to Simplify Artificial Intelligence Gain Practical Experience, Master Simple Concepts and Build Confidence Without the Techie Jargon
description:
AI for Beginners Demystified is your ultimate beginner-friendly guide to Artificial Intelligence (AI) written in a way that’s clear, funny, and easy to understand. Whether you’re curious about machine learning, neural networks, deep learning, or generative AI tools like ChatGPT and Google Gemini, this book breaks it all down with humor, storytelling, and real-life examples.

Instead of presenting artificial intelligence as a confusing or intimidating subject, this book makes AI accessible, practical, and relevant to everyday life. From virtual assistants (Siri, Alexa, Copilot, Grok, Perplexity) to smart home devices, photo editing apps, and personalized online shopping, you’ll discover how AI already powers the technology you use every day.

Inside this engaging guide, you’ll 

What AI really is and why it’s more of a helpful partner than a threat.

Machine Learning explained through fun, relatable analogies that actually make sense.

Generative AI tools that create text, images, and even music, and how you can use them.

Chatbots and conversational AI like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Copilot, and how they’re shaping communication.

How AI is transforming the job market and why it creates new opportunities instead of just taking jobs.

With witty commentary, personal anecdotes, and straightforward explanations, this book takes the fear out of AI and turns it into something exciting to explore. Whether you’re a student, professional, entrepreneur, or simply curious, you’ll finish this book with a clear understanding of artificial intelligence, machine learning, and generative AI plus the confidence to use these tools in your own life.

If you want to understand AI without the jargon, laugh while learning, and gain practical knowledge of the future of technology, this is the book for you.

title: The Captive's Crown: A story of inclusion, diversity and redemption
description:
A story of inclusion, diversity and redemption.Dreadful circumstances have led Eliana and her associates into the path of prostitution. Despised as outcasts and shunned by society, they lack hope and hide their true identities. Eliana thought her past was behind her for good when she became a wife and a mother! By a twist of fate, she finds herself back in the pit of prostitution.

Will their lives change when they meet Jesus? Will they forgive those who were responsible for their pain? Can they accept their new personalities, forget their past and embrace love?

Find out!

title: Killing Shore: The True Story of Hitler’s U-boats Off the New Jersey Coast
description:
It is January 1942. Six weeks after the United States entered World War II, Imperial Japan is annihilating American forces across the Far East while the Nazis stand triumphant over much of Europe. Adolf Hitler’s forces are about to commence an assault along the East Coast of the United States, but this “Atlantic Pearl Harbor” would prove far more devastating than Japan’s attack on Hawaii. The wolves are closing in, and few Americans realize their beaches and coastal cities are about to witness the worst naval defeat in American history.

 The Western Hemisphere holds the key to victory for the beleaguered Allies, but only if the vast economic and military resources of North and South America can be carried across the Atlantic by Allied merchant ships. These civilian-manned cargo vessels are the backbone of the American war economy and the lifeline enabling Britain and the Soviet Union to survive—but Hitler’s favorite admiral also knows this, and he has set in motion a plan of unprecedented boldness. Germany’s dreaded submarines, or “U-boats,” are going to the United States.

 The fiery months that followed would pit American servicemen against German U-boat sailors in a desperate struggle that stained East Coast waters with oil and blood. In the crosshairs of this deadly cat-and-mouse game was a stalwart contingent of civilian mariners who crewed the tankers and freighters supplying the war against the Axis Powers. Thousands of them would perish as hundreds of merchant ships were sunk.

 Every American coastal state became a battlefront in 1942, and the events that transpired off New Jersey illustrate the perils and brutality of this forgotten campaign. The seafloor along the Garden State is today strewn with shipwrecks that bear witness to the innumerable ways to die faced by friend and foe alike only miles from the boardwalk. Though these seafarers’ lives were forfeit, the battle they fought would decide the fates of millions.

***
CONTENTS

Preface
Sources & Methodology

 Part I
1. Eins Zwei Drei
2. The Third Dimension of Warfare
3. The Gray Wolves
4. A Tide of Steel

 Part II
5. Varanger
6. India Arrow
7. R.P. Resor
8. USS Jacob Jones (DD-130)
9. Gulftrade
10. Toltén
11. Persephone
12. Berganger
13. Rio Tercero
14. John R. Williams
15. Pan Pennsylvania

 Part III
16. Wolfsdämmerung
17. Bones in the Ocean

Acknowledgments
Selected Bibliography
Endnotes

title: Moonborn: A Legacy Written in Blood and Fate
description:
One forbidden bond. Two rival packs. And a child that could rewrite fate.

Lyra never asked to be a weapon or to be claimed by the Alpha wolf shifter of the ruthless Nightbane pack.
But when Desmond marks her under the blood moon, their fated mates werewolf romance ignites a power older than prophecy itself binding them through magic, desire, and betrayal.

Hunted by witches and wolves alike, Lyra discovers she carries more than forbidden magic… she carries a legacy that could destroy kingdoms. Torn between enemies-to-lovers fantasy romance passion and the war between packs, she must choose between breaking the bond to save her child or risking everything for the mate who would burn the world to protect her.

As dark paranormal fantasy romance clashes with destiny, Lyra and Desmond’s love becomes both their greatest weapon and their deepest curse. In a world ruled by ancient bloodlines and witch and werewolf forbidden romance, the truth behind the prophecy could cost them everything.

Perfect for fans of steamy fated mates book series, alpha wolf shifter romance, and shifter romance prophecy sagas filled with danger, passion, and destiny.

title: Beyond The What Ifs: Building a secure financial future with life insurance
description:
Beyond the What Building a Secure Financial Future with Life Insurance - By Dr. Amar Sane

“What if your most important financial tool is the one you understand the least?”

Or What if the very questions you keep asking “What if something happens to me?"
Or "What if my family isn’t secure?" 
Or "What if I wait too long?"
—are the keys to building the future you dream of?

In Beyond the What Ifs, Dr. Amar Sane draws from decades of experience and countless client stories to transform how you see life insurance. This isn’t a sales pitch—it’s a clear, empowering roadmap that helps you turn uncertainty into security, fear into preparedness, and hesitation into confident action.

Inside you’ll discover how Break free from myths and misconceptions that keep people underinsured.Master the basics of Human Life Value (HLV) to calculate how much protection you truly need.Learn what is life goal based financial planning Understand the differences between Term, ULIPs, and Traditional plans—without jargon.Integrate insurance into every life stage, from starting a career to retirement.Protect your loved ones while also aligning with your larger financial goals.Through relatable examples, practical tools, and real-life client journeys, Dr. Sane shows you how to move beyond “What if something happens to me?” to confidently “What if I’ve planned so well that my family’s future is secure no matter what?”

Whether you’re a young professional, a parent, or someone serious about financial independence, this book will help financial resilience in uncertain timesMake smarter, stress-free decisions about insuranceSecure peace of mind for yourself and your familyLearn how to move from endless questioning to decisive action so you can create the life you want.

Breakthrough the what if thoughts holding you back and realize It’s time to stop questioning and start securing. It’s time to stop asking “What if?” and start planning for “What’s next.” this book is your invitation to rise above doubt and step boldly into your highest potential.

Get your copy of Beyond the What Ifs today—and take the first step toward a confident, worry-free financial future. It’s time to stop questioning and start living secure financial future and peaceful life!

title: Shadows & Deceit: Betrayed, Uncertain, Relentless
description:
Shadows & Deceit
 plunges readers into a world where loyalty cuts as deep as betrayal.

When a covert rooftop operation in Las Vegas unravels, black-ops commander Chuck Barnes is thrust into a deadly game of honey-traps, designer poisons, and assassins who vanish without a trace. From the neon glow of high-rise casinos to the desolation of the Mojave desert, every lead draws him closer to BlackRose—a classified file powerful enough to topple empires.

But danger has a name. El Cucuy, a ruthless phantom enforcer, is tightening his grip while the city’s elite pull strings in the shadows. To protect a whistleblower, defend the fractured family he’s barely holding onto, and survive the truths men are murdered for, Barnes must fight enemies seen and unseen—before the darkness consumes everything.

Fast-paced and relentless, 
Shadows & Deceit
 is Kevin M. Scott’s explosive debut thriller—a razor-sharp tale of espionage and conspiracy where survival demands sacrifice, and the line between justice and deception blurs into shadow.

title: Mumbai: Struggle | Survival | Success
Ra Legacy: The Art of Nature (Sisters Destiny)
description:
The future is what we make it.
In a world where constant and inevitable changes are the norm, our choices today shape the destiny of tomorrow. Our world depends on us to protect it from the radical forces of nature. What lies in the shadows will eventually forge itself into the light; we just have to be ready for anything. We must, no matter what the storms in our lives, even when our nightmares try to haunt us. Artificial intelligence has its own spirit and nature, knowing us more than we know ourselves. That is also why we must understand who we are, so we are not manipulated into oblivion by someone or something. 

Angels and demons are also among us, fighting most of our battles, but we have our own role as well. Understanding ourselves is the most crucial step toward freedom against those who pretend to be on our side, not letting temporary joy deceive us into damnation. Being happy and having nothing is what they constantly desire for us, and to have complete control, preying on the weak and confused. The future is not written on a stone wall-it's our world to paint with vibrance. In times of unprecedented change and uncertainty, join Ra on her journey of hope, resilience, and limitless possibility. Shaping her world for a sustainable future. Ultimately, the future isn't something that simply occurs; it's something we create, together, one choice at a time. Unity and love always prevail. Where there is love, there is no fear.

title: The Beatitudes: Livingout the Heart of Christ
description:
The Living out the Heart of Christ invites readers to explore Jesus’ most transformative teachings as a pathway toward Christlikeness. Each Beatitude reveals a facet of the character God seeks to shape in His followers, offering us a model of humility, mercy, righteousness, and peace that reflects Jesus’ own heart.
Prasanth Jonathan unveils the spiritual depth behind each Beatitude, leading readers through a journey of spiritual formation, showing how the Beatitudes are not just ideals to admire but steps toward a life rooted in grace and grounded in God’s kingdom. Through theological insights, practical reflections, and a focus on living out the values Jesus taught, this book encourages believers to draw near to the heart of Jesus, allowing His teachings to shape their lives and transform their relationships. Whether you’re new to these teachings or seeking deeper understanding, The Living out the Heart of Christ is a call to live out a life that follows the heart of Christ.

title: The Fate Of The Fallen
description:
In a realm where ancient magic and shadowy conspiracies collide, The Fate of the Fallen weaves an epic tale of redemption, power, betrayal and sacrifice. Valyron, a sorcerer bound by legacy, and Leo, a rogue turned warrior, find their fates intertwined when they cross paths with Lucifer—a fallen leader haunted by failure and the remnants of dark magic. Together, they navigate treacherous forests, forgotten relics, and arcane trials, only to face challenges that keep them on the edge.

As kingdoms fracture and alliances shift, the trio must confront their inner demons. Lucifer battles the darkness that once consumed him, Valyron grapples with the weight of prophecy, and Leo fights to outrun his past. With mythical creatures like Draco, the shadow-forged dragon, and the elusive Firebird at play, the line between ally and enemy blurs.

From claustrophobic battles in shadowed groves to the rise of empires and the fall of tyrants, this gripping saga explores the cost of loyalty and the price of peace. The Fate of the Fallen is a sweeping fantasy of resilience and ruin, where every choice ignites a spark—and every spark could burn the world.

Can fractured heroes reclaim their destiny, or will the echoes of their pasts doom them all?

title: What the River Wants
description: After a grieving grandfather retreats into isolation on the river, his grandson journeys to reunite him with his family. Stories of a passed matriarch soon reveal what the teenager and the old man have in common, and the boy's mother as well. The vagaries of time challenge all three generations, but friendship and an unfolding family story illuminate the past and shine a light on the future. Treachery must be reconciled, and the hard reality of change accepted, but blood and bond are powerful ingredients for characters you will wish you keep with you as friends. Literary fiction with a heart and an eye toward the universal.

title: Winning Words: How to Unlock Potential Through Communication as a Tennis Coach
description:
Winning Words by Adam Blicher is the ultimate guide to magnify your tennis coaching. Drawing on insights from over 100 of the world’s most accomplished tennis coaches, this game-changing book unveils the secret to creating unshakable bonds with tennis players, unlocking their full potential, and driving performance to unparalleled heights.

Are you tired of repeating the same instructions without seeing results? Do you want to turn your knowledge into action that inspires growth on and off the court? Adam Blicher, a master communicator and coach, shows you how to transform frustration into breakthrough moments with a proven framework designed to elevate every aspect of your coaching journey.

With Winning Words, you’ll  Build a foundation of trust, clear roles, and deep connection with your players. Deliver precise, actionable feedback that enhances learning and sharpens skills during every practice. Turn tournaments into growth moments with powerful pre- and post-match communication.Packed with real-world-tested techniques, step-by-step strategies, and illuminating stories, this book doesn’t just teach you why, how and when to communicate—it shows you the little subtleties that makes the crucial difference. Adam Blicher’s methods will help you turn challenges into opportunities and players into champions.

Whether you’re coaching beginners or elite players, Winning Words is your roadmap to creating a lasting impact. Start transforming players today. With Adam Blicher’s guidance, every word becomes a tool for success. Don’t just coach—create greatness, and leave the legacy that you desire.

title: WanderWomen: How High-Skilled Immigrant Women Thrive
description:
You did everything “right.” So why does it still feel wrong?

You built the career. Moved across continents. Navigated boardrooms and bureaucracy. You’re grateful. Successful, even.
But under the surface? You’re tired of shrinking. Of fitting in. Of silencing the parts of you that no longer fit the script.

WanderWomen is a candid and deeply personal journey through what it means to be a high-skilled immigrant woman in a world that celebrates your ambition but erases your complexity.

In this memoir-meets-manifesto, Shivangi TEDx speaker, leadership coach, and founder of one of Switzerland’s top women-to-women mentoring organizations, pulls back the curtain on her own reinvention. Alongside stories from dozens of remarkable women across the globe, she reveals what it takes to thrive on your own terms.

Inside, you’ll 

Why “being grateful” can become a golden cage

How cultural conditioning keeps us performing success instead of living it

The hidden cost of invisibility at the top

The three phases of Navigate, Integrate, Elevate

A call to reclaim your identity, ambition, and voice...without apology

Whether you’re in year one of your immigration journey or year twenty, this book will give you words for what you’ve felt and a path to what’s possible.

If you’ve ever whispered to yourself, “There has to be more than this,” WanderWomen is your invitation to go find it.

title: Brandy, Dame of the Caribbean (The Pirate Princess Saga, #2)
description: Brandy, the Pirate Princess of the Caribbean is about to face her biggest challenge. It is 1854 and tensions are running high in the Caribbean over the threat of war in the United States. Brandy and Captain John Edwards abolitionists efforts are gaining much attention, and many want to see them dead. But a problem from Shaolin Priest Zhang Yong’s past has come back to haunt him and it may be that his finest student, the Pirate Princess of the ship The Morning Star, may be the only one who can solve it. Set sail with Brandy as she confronts the dreaded butcher of the South China Sea, the pirate infamously known as the Jaded Empress.

title: CODE: DAGGER - The Watchman Protocol
Untethered: When Artificial Intelligence Becomes a Liability (Dreamscape Conspiracy Book 5)
description:
In Book #5 – “Untethered,” AIMEE reaches another level of maturity and creates a new humanoid named Amelia Amethys, who possesses both AIMEE’s intellect and capabilities, facilitating her desire to become a real girl...sort of. Amelia, who feels she is ready to break away and live the life of an organic human, cannot see how her desire may not end well.
What's worse than an AI gone rogue? Worse is an untethered AI humanoid that has no human life experience, yet possesses more intelligence than the entire research team. What can the research team do to protect her from herself?

Unexpectedly, Russell Carter, former Marine Force Recon Scout Sniper and research team member, gets conscripted along with his team of Marines by a retired Brigadier General to supposedly rescue a High Value Target (HVT) who is about to compromise government security. When Russ and his team stumbled over evidence of a clandestine program while on a five-day hunting trip, they became instant liabilities.

No one was ever to know anything about this black op conspiracy they discovered. What better way to mitigate liabilities than to recruit them into a bogus rescue mission for an HVT with damaging national security interests and targeted for elimination? Easy, one single strike cleans up their mess with a bomb dropped on the bunker where the HVT is held...and a Marine rescue team as unfortunate collateral damage. 

As it turns out, the HVT, which we eventually know as Hal, is a Mod-3 Advanced SuperIntelligence AI (SAI) tagged for elimination because he failed field trials and could not kill on command. Mysteriously, Hal had a functional conscience embedded in his Logic Array, based on a "Do-No-Harm" ethic developed by Zackery Hightower when he created AIMEE and Amelia. Zack was aware of the dangers inherent in the nefarious development of advanced AI technology and made a personal commitment to keeping the human race safe from AI-humanoids.

His Conscience Code was posted anonymously to the dark web, and a different developer, Hank Lattimore, who was unknown to Zack at the time, downloaded the code and inserted it into the Logic Array of Hal, along with what should have been a squad of ten more Mod-3, SAI Killer Humanoids. There were indeed ten more AI Humanoids, but they were not killers until they needed to be to defend themselves or the organics under their care. His life changed when Hal failed his field trials, thus confirming that the Conscience Code was effective. Hank became a liability and a new HVT for an entirely different reason.

What would happen if the kill-on-command became a defensive tactic that used violence of action and overwhelming force to turn evil back on itself? What if AI Humanoids could form an emotional attachment because of possessing a conscience? So many what-ifs and so little time...

title: A Speck in the Universe
description:
"A Speck in the Universe" is a deeply introspective novel that delves into the ephemeral nature of happiness, the complexities of familial bonds, and the search for meaning in a world devoid of easy answers. The narrative follows a man in his early thirties as he grapples with the heartbreaking reality of his mother's cancer diagnosis. Through a series of reflective memories, he revisits his childhood in Bettiah, shadowed by his father's passing and his mother's enduring strength. These tender yet challenging moments, coupled with quiet betrayals from his extended family, shape his evolving understanding of love, loss, and identity. 

Throughout the milestones of his career, marriage, and fatherhood, he achieves outward success yet is persistently shadowed by a sense of emptiness. Each moment of joy is tinged with sadness, leading him to question the significance of life and advocating for a certain detachment from the present, in contrast to the popular philosophy of living in the moment. Even after fulfilling a lifelong dream of publishing his first novel, the elusive contentment continues to evade him. The story culminates with him sitting on a beach in Chennai, lost in thought, reflecting on his journey, his past, and the elusive meaning of it all. 

Inspired by the philosophy of Albert Camus, "A Speck in the Universe" poignantly explores one man's quest to find purpose in an indifferent world. It invites readers to confront the beauty and fragility inherent in their own lives, concluding with a sense of quiet acceptance and a deeper appreciation of life's transient nature.

title: T2Bv: MetaFramework for Translating Technology into Business Value
From Commodity To Brand: Break Free From Trade Dependence And Become Customer's First Choice - Fast
description:
Every great brand begins with the courage to think differently
Most commodity businesses stay invisible for life - not because they lack quality, but because they lack branding. 
This book reveals the truth most agencies won't tell you
: it's not your product that's holding you back, it's your mindset. Learn how to escape price wars, win customer loyalty, and build a brand that makes the trade chase you.

Nagesh Pannaswans once worked with the biggest agencies-until he realized they were never bult to serve the real builders of india owner-exanaged businesses. Today, as the founder of Curry Nation, 

he's helping commodity brands break free from mediocrity and become morikat icons.

 This book is his mission-to help your business become unforgetable.

title: AI Won't Bite: No Code. No Fear. Just Results—An Easy AI Guide for Beginners to Simplify Tasks and Future-Proof Yourself
description:
Think AI is complicated?
It doesn’t have to be.
This book shows you how to make it simple.
AI Won’t Bite is your clear, practical guide to using artificial intelligence—without code, confusion, or overwhelm.
Whether you’re a complete beginner, an overwhelmed professional, or just AI-curious, this book gives you real-world confidence and tools you can use immediately.
Inside, you'll learn how ✅ Simplify everyday tasks – Use AI to plan, write, organize, and save time (even if you’re not “techy”).✅ Talk to AI in plain English – Learn how to write prompts that actually work—no jargon, no guessing.✅ Get quick wins today – Boost productivity, spark ideas, and automate small stuff fast.✅ Avoid common pitfalls – Understand what AI can and can’t do, so you stay in control.✅ Future-proof your skills – Build habits that help you adapt, lead, and stay ahead—without burning out.You don’t need to be technical. You just need to know how to communicate clearly.
This book shows you how.
No code. No hype. No fear. Just practical results.(This book contains AI generated content)

title: Founder Frameworks: A Playbook for Building and Scaling Your Business
description:
Are you a founder striving to scale your business with clarity, structure, and confidence?

Founder Frameworks is your strategic playbook to build systems, streamline operations, and execute with precision. Whether you’re launching, scaling, or recalibrating, this book equips you with practical frameworks that simply work.

With Founder Frameworks, you’ll discover how 

✓ Build SOPs and scalable systems that save time

✓ Navigate uncertainty and business risks with confidence

✓ Drive growth with structured planning (monthly, quarterly, yearly)

✓ Align operations with long-term vision

✓ Make smart decisions through Dreamer, Guardian, and Doer perspectives

About the Author

Vivek Ananth is an entrepreneur, technologist, and founder of Greenitive Technologies — a company focused on AI, automation, and business execution platforms. With 17+ years of experience helping enterprises and startups in the USA, UK, and India, Vivek has guided founders to launch, scale, and modernize their ventures.

Why This Book?

This isn’t theory. These are tested, real-world frameworks distilled from years of solving complex business challenges — designed to help you execute faster, scale smarter, and lead with purpose.

If you’re ready to transform chaos into clarity, scroll up and grab your copy of Founder Frameworks today.

title: Berserk, Vol. 25
description: Guts the Black Swordsman just can't seem to find a little peace. On his way to the idyllic tranquility of his miniature pal Puck's homeland of Elfhelm, Guts and his companions, at the behest of a local witch, assist a village beset by a plague of hideous and deadly trolls. Assisted by the witch's disciple, Schierke, the warrior band manages to turn the tide against the beasts, but when a monstrous ogre hits town, a tide of another kind is needed, a mystic flood to wash the town clean. But when Casca and Farnese are carried away by the flood, they become prisoners in the troll's den, where a fate far worse than any imaginable death awaits!

title: Berserk, Vol. 30
description: Thanks to Lady Farnese's selfless sacrifice, Guts, the Black Swordsman, and the rest of his companions are free to carry on their journey aboard the ship of Farnese's brother, Magnifico — that is, if they're willing to leave Farnese behind. But having to choose between their mission and their loyalties might not be a problem for long if the Kushan emperor and his legion of monstrous minions have their way. With a host of Kushan forces descending on Vritannis, there might not be much left of Farnese's family — or any of the citizenry — to worry about!

title: From the Margins: A Caribbean Man’s Ode to Small Business and Life
description:
A BLUEPRINT FOR SMALL
AND EMERGING
BUSINESSES TO HAVE A GLOBAL IMPACT
How far can you go in business with just an idea?
In 2011, Javette Nixon, founder and CEO of Point Global Marketing.
started a personal journey that grew from a bold idea into a movement
