Leigh McCallister has come home to the Rockies to set up her new veterinary practice, but now someone from her past is threatening her and that danger is growing. Will returning be the worst—and most final—decision of her life?

Her family’s ranch, in the shadows of the Wyoming Rockies, is a part of Leigh McCallister’s blood, but not everyone in Wolf Creek welcomes her with open arms. Her mother made a lot of enemies over the years with her shrewd and manipulative business dealings. Some of the locals are already blackballing Leigh’s fledgling clinic. And now that Cole Daniels is back in town, the rumors are starting to fly.

Single dad Cole has come back to Wolf Creek with one goal--he wants to clear the name of his wrongly-convicted father. Guilty, until proven innocent. That was the McAllister family motto, wasn't it? Cole will never forget it—no matter how interested he’d once been in pretty, kind Leigh McAllister. Thanks to her father's lies, Cole's dad had been sent to prison and then died there. And Leigh had testified against him, too.

Leigh and Cole might have gone steady in high school, but there’s no love lost between them now.
But someone is growing edgy, now that they are both back in town, and the threats are growing.

Can they set aside the past and work together before someone dies?

Another suspense-filled inspirational romance by USA Today Bestselling author, Roxanne Rustand.

DOWNLOAD TODAY, and stay up all night!

title: The Hexhibitionist (Supernatural Speakeasy, #11)
description:
Ofelia Archer’s life is looking up. Her father is in the hospital getting the help he needs, her mother is seemingly distracted with some new walking group, and her brother is finally opening his own bar. Things couldn’t be better … until a body is found.
Shawn Dawson was just out to have a good time. He drank late into the night and somehow ended up dead in an alley. It wasn’t a normal death either. He was drained of everything fluid he possessed, which points to something paranormal.
There’s a succubus on the loose in the French Quarter, and even though she’s newly turned, she has ties to the area. When Ofelia interrupts her feeding schedule, she becomes the creature’s enemy … and the new target is Zach Sully, Ofelia’s fiancé.
Ofelia would do anything to protect the man who stole her heart, but her options seem limited. That means a fight … and it’s going to have to be between the women alone, because the succubus has a special power over the men.
Ofelia might have sympathy for the succubus’s plight, but that won’t stop her from doing what she has to do to protect those she loves.
It’s a fight to the finish, and only one woman will come out victorious.

title: Coming Home (Easton Island Family Saga Series, #3)
description:
Easton Island is the continuing saga of one woman’s journey from incredible loss to finding a past she knew nothing about, including a family who both embraces and fears her and a charming island that draws her in. This inspirational series is for lovers of family sagas, mystery, and a touch of romance.

Morgan Easton has tied up all the loose ends in Fort Myers and is eager to make the big move to Easton Island…all loose ends except for the fact that her soon-to-be-ex-husband and his attorney are requesting additional time.

Although wary of their intentions, Morgan reluctantly agrees to the extension and is determined to clear the air. She arrives at Jason’s downtown apartment and discovers he’s living in a rough area of town. When he doesn’t answer the door, Morgan is convinced he’s avoiding her.

With the unresolved issue hanging over her head, Morgan sticks with her plan, and she and her best friend Quinn head north, ready to start the next chapter in their lives.

Within hours of arriving, Morgan learns Jason has not only followed her, but he’s also been watching her every move.
With the help of an Easton Estate staff member and friend, she discovers Jason is involved in highly illegal activities that could take her down with him.

Will Morgan finally find her happily ever after on Easton Island, or will she forever regret coming home?

Find out when you grab your copy of Easton Island - Coming Home today !

title: Sanibel Moonlight (Shellseeker Beach, #7)
description:
Nearly a year has passed since Eliza arrived for a “few days” on Shellseeker Beach. She has overcome grief, forged lifelong relationships, and finally found a place where her heart can sing.

Most of all, she’s found a second chance at romance…but must face one last and unexpected challenge or this new love will slip through her fingers like moonlight on the water.

title: Sanibel Tides (Shellseeker Beach, #5)
description:
In order to secure a high-profile feature story for Shellseeker Cottages, the family must come together like never before. But as they do, some of the strongest relationships face daunting challenges, and more than one heart may be left broken on the beach.

Olivia and Deeley’s lives are suddenly thrust into a new kind of chaos, and the solution threatens to end their brand new romance. Camille is struggling with feelings she’s never had before, both thrilling and terrifying, while others are being pulled away from the oasis on the beach.

Like the tides that bring a bounty of shells every morning and night, change is the only constant…and love is the foundation that holds this found family firmly on the sands of the place they call home.

Come to Shellseeker Beach and fall in love with a cast of unforgettable characters who face life's challenges with humor, heart, and hope. For lovers of riveting and inspirational sagas about sisters, secrets, romance, mothers and daughters…and the moments that make life worth living.

title: A Wedding in the Keys (Coconut Key, #6)
description:
Will there be blue skies and happy lives for the wedding day…or is change in the forecast again?

The bonds of love that have formed and grown over the past year in Coconut Key reach a culmination of white lace and champagne…for some. For others, things may not turn out as they expected.

New arrivals on the island turn plans and lives upside down, testing the strength of relationships. Everyone has to make major decisions about life, work, and love. The future may look different for Beck, Savannah, Peyton, and Jessie…but whatever it is, with family and friends, it will be warm, happy, and dappled in sunshine.

title: Locke Legacy (Easton Island Family Saga Series Book 7)
description: Morgan Easton receives devastating news that threatens to kill her plans to turn her family’s lakefront estate, Locke Pointe into a bed-and-breakfast. She soon realizes that’s the least of her worries after she learns her maniacal ex-husband may soon be released from jail, pending his trial.Easton Island is the continuing saga of one woman’s journey from incredible loss to finding a past she knew nothing about, including a family who both embraces and fears her and a charming island that draws her in.This inspirational women’s fiction series is for lovers of family sagas, friendship fiction, mysteries, and clean romance.-----------------------Morgan Easton is eager to start the next phase of her new life on Easton Island, which includes turning Locke Pointe, her family’s elegant estate located on the shores of Lake Huron, into a bed-and-breakfast. It’s the seemingly perfect solution to the property, which has been vacant for many years.Months after she files the paperwork to move forward with the project, Morgan receives devastating news which threatens to kill her plans. She soon realizes that’s the least of her worries, after she learns her maniacal ex-husband may soon be released from jail, pending his upcoming trial.Will Morgan cower and run for cover, or will she keep her promise to make Easton Island her home and do whatever it takes to keep her friends and family safe, even if it means facing her worst nightmare?Find out when you grab your copy of Easton Island - Locke Legacy today!

title: A Return to the Keys (Coconut Key, #5)
description:
A lost love comes home in search of answers…and love.
An unimaginable change is in the air when a long lost love reappears on the sands of Coconut Key to complicate lives and open old wounds. With shocking news that changes history and the family dynamic, the new arrival brings hope, love, and the answers some have been searching for years to find. 

As Jessie builds a brand new life and business, and Beck nears the opening of the Coquina House B&B, everyone is tested and forced to lean on each other for love and laughter. And when a budding friendship blossoms into something more, lives are once again changed by love…old and new, lost and found.

title: Sanibel Sunsets (Shellseeker Beach, #6)
description:
When Eliza’s son arrives in Shellseeker Beach, he’s struggling. Dane deeply disapproves of his mother’s relationship with a new man, causing friction in Eliza’s happy life. In addition, he must navigate a whole new life and find a way to channel his emotions in to music. Support comes from the most unexpected corner, surprising everyone…including Dane.

Olivia and Deeley’s newfound joy might be coming to an end when they face a startling threat to their makeshift family. The solution to their problem might not be what they imagined, but it could mean a joyous sunset at the end of the day…if everyone once again unites to overcome adversity.

title: The Inn on Amelia Island (Seven Sisters Book 7)
description:
The uplifting and unforgettable conclusion to the Seven Sisters series!

After coming together following their father’s stroke, the Wingate women have found second-chance romance, faced trials and tribulations, and built wonderful lives on Amelia Island. Their father is fully recovered and healthy, their businesses are flourishing, and the whole family is bursting with love and laughter. 

But as they fill Wingate House with wedding plans and celebrations, not everything is smooth sailing down the Amelia River. One final crisis threatens this unshakeable family, and it will test everyone and everything they hold dear. 

Before the sun sets on their saga, the sisters must join forces and hearts one last time to earn a truly heartwarming happily ever after.

title: A Promise in the Keys (Coconut Key, #7)
description:
There’s a little island magic in the air…and the promise of something brand new.

With her daughters more settled than ever, it’s time for Beck to live her life in Coconut Key to the fullest. Coquina House Bed & Breakfast is open and running, and with every new challenge, Beck and her mother discover they were born for the life of hospitality. So it’s not her new business that keeps Beck awake at night now…but the temptation of starting a new, uncharted course for her heart. Will those waters be warm and welcoming, or does she risk drowning once again?

As she adjusts to her new life, Jessie discovers that being a parent isn’t as easy as she’d hoped, and Kenny faces new challenges as he and Heather tentatively explore the possibility of blending their hearts and families. All over Coconut Key, lessons are learned and love is earned. And no matter what happens, there will be laughter, love, sunshine, and mimosas on the beach.

The Coconut Key Series celebrates older heroines, second chance romance, entangled families, and lifelong friendships. With a cast of unforgettable characters and stories that touch every woman’s heart, be sure to read them all!

title: Sanibel Sisters (Shellseeker Beach #4)
description:
As the found family in Shellseeker Beach prepares for the high tourist season, excitement is in the air as the new Sanibel Sisters boutique opens. Eliza navigates the possibility of a second chance romance, but an unexpected fear is slowing thgings down. Her daughter has decided she is all in with a man she once thought was all wrong, but efforts to help him out of a bind threaten to backfire. And when Katie finally opens her heart to the first true love of her life, her stepsister’s arrival suddenly changes everything.

Come to Shellseeker Beach and fall in love with a cast of unforgettable characters who face life's challenges with humor, heart, and hope. These books are for lovers of riveting and inspirational sagas about sisters, secrets, romance, mothers, and daughters…and the moments that make life worth living.

title: Once and for All (Easton Island Family Saga Series Book 8)
description: As Morgan Easton prepares for the arrival of her first Locke Pointe guests, an unexpected letter arrives that threatens to turn her world upside down. Despite her fears and apprehension, she knows that she must deal with her past, once and for all. Her life could very well depend on it.Easton Island is the continuing saga of one woman’s journey from incredible loss to finding a past she knew nothing about, including a family who both embraces and fears her and a charming island that draws her in.-----------------------Morgan Easton pours her heart and soul into Locke Pointe, creating a warm and wonderful bed-and-breakfast for islanders and guests to enjoy and create memories to last a lifetime.Her days are filled with preparing for the arrival of her first guests until an unexpected letter arrives, one that once again threatens to turn Morgan’s world upside down.Despite her fears and apprehension, she knows that she must deal with her past, once and for all. Her life could very well depend on it.With her grandmother, Elizabeth, and brother Brett by her side, she discovers there is nothing more important and precious than loved ones and family.Find out what happens when you grab your copy of Easton Island - Once And For All today!

title: Nothing but Clear Skies (Easton Island Family Saga Series Book 6)
description:
Easton Island is the continuing saga of one woman’s journey from incredible loss to finding a past she knew nothing about, including a family who both embraces and fears her and a charming island that draws her in.

This inspirational women’s fiction series is for lovers of family sagas, friendship fiction, mysteries, and clean romance.

-----------------------

Morgan Easton finally receives the last gift from her mother just days before Christmas. While exploring Locke Pointe, she discovers her grandparents' home holds not only secrets to her family’s past, but may also be the key to finding the priceless “Shifting Sands Medallion,” rumored to be hidden somewhere on the island.

After she finds a mysterious slip of paper with numbers written on it tucked behind her mother’s painting, Morgan is convinced it’s a clue her mother left for her years ago in order to help her in the present day.

It’s a bittersweet moment as she reflects on memories of her mother and Morgan's desire to be accepted as an Easton Islander, despite someone who seems determined to drive her away.

As more clues are unraveled, Morgan believes she has solved half the mystery, but soon realizes she’ll need help.

Will she be able to solve the mystery or will the shifting sands of time run out?

Find out when you grab your copy of Easton Island - Nothing But Clear Skies!

title: A Most Unusual Guest (Easton Island Family Saga Series Book 9)
description:
Morgan Easton anxiously welcomes world-renowned Biblical archaeologist, Randi Colbane, who is visiting Easton Island to help her authenticate the potentially priceless Shifting Sands Medallion.

She soon realizes not only is she hosting a most unusual guest, but the archaeologist’s visit could easily become the beginning of an exciting yet terrifying journey for Morgan and the rest of the Easton Islanders.

Easton Island is the continuing saga of one woman’s journey from incredible loss to finding a past she knew nothing about, including a family who both embraces and fears her and a charming island that draws her in. 

This inspirational women’s fiction series is for lovers of family sagas, friendship, mysteries, and clean romance.

-----------------------

Morgan Easton is eagerly awaiting the arrival of world-renowned Biblical archaeologist, Randi Colbane, who is visiting Easton Island to help authenticate the potentially priceless Shifting Sands Medallion.

Things get off to a rocky–and terrifying–start before her plane even lands. The shaky arrival sets the stage for some exciting days.

Her grandmother’s friend, Gerard Ainsworth, arrives at the same time and has been keeping a secret. He’s not the only one. The Easton Estate staff drops hints that Morgan’s grandmother is facing some concerning health issues. When pressed, the senior Easton refuses to elaborate, causing Morgan even more concern.

Hosting a most unusual guest while trying to keep Colbane’s identity secret, Morgan scrambles to cover her bases.
Is the medallion a priceless artifact or merely a memento that her grandparents owned? The archaeologist’s visit could easily become the beginning of an exciting yet terrifying journey for Morgan and the rest of the Easton Islanders.

Find out what happens when you grab your copy of Easton Island - A Most Unusual Guest today!

title: A Reunion in the Keys (Coconut Key, #2)
description:
Can a forty-year old decision be made all over again today?
While renovating her childhood home into a B&B and navigating the waters of a second-chance romance, Beck Foster is suddenly forced to face the past and open her arms to strangers she never dreamed she’d meet. 

With the help of her daughters Savannah and Peyton, Beck resolves to undo the past and expand her family forever…but that decision isn't always easy. As Savannah faces the challenges of having a baby on her own, and Peyton takes her budding romance to the next step, the Foster woman all learn that life in the Keys might be warm and breezy, but it’s still complicated.

With four generations of strong women and a few equally amazing men, the characters in Coconut Key comes together once again with a sense of solidarity that gets them through the toughest times. Will that be enough when the storms of life throw them into whitewater and threaten an unimaginable loss?

title: A Season in the Keys (Coconut Key, #3)
description:
The winds of change are blowing over Coconut Key…and nothing will ever be the same.
When tourist season ends, the next one begins…and hurricane season is never easy in the Keys. Especially when the winds have blown in a man who threatens everything Beck has built over the last few months in Coconut Key.

The newest arrival might be the contractor Beck’s been longing to find…but he’s also a man from her past. With his attention on her as much as the B&B renovation, this new twist is equal parts thrilling and terrifying. Beck’s son, Kenny, is working through own personal trials, and daughter Savannah inches toward a tenuous relationship with her soon-to-be-born baby’s father.

But all eyes turn to the skies as a major hurricane bears down on Coconut Key, bringing everyone together for one heart-stopping night of trauma, drama, and close calls. And if they survive what Mother Nature throws at them, what will be left of the life they’ve all been building on the beach?

title: Sanibel Mornings (Shellseeker Beach #3)
description:
With the ownership of the property settled, Eliza knows that she’s found the place where she belongs. But she can’t take a chance on something completely new until she finally lets go of the grief that has gripped her heart, and saying that last goodbye is one of the hardest things she’s ever had to do.

Her sister, Claire, is tackling her own emotional challenges. While her lifelong fantasy for a reunion has finally happened, it comes with a cost. She must face the choices of her past, and fight for a love she never thought she could have…and still could lose at any minute.

Although summer storms threaten to bring clouds and rain to Shellseeker Beach, the bonds of friendship and sisterhood are never washed away. Together, this found family is determined to make sure that every morning, the skies are clear and the possibilities are endless.

Come to Shellseeker Beach and fall in love with a cast of unforgettable characters who face life's challenges with humor, heart, and hope. For lovers of riveting and inspirational sagas about sisters, secrets, romance, mothers and daughters…and the moments that make life worth living.

title: Her Fearless Warrior (Omega Sky #4)
description:
Finding Them? Simple.
Getting Them Out Alive? Now That Will Take a Minute.

Lincoln Hart’s Navy SEAL team is sent to Syria to rescue a team of Americans who have been captured. When he realizes their interpreter, Leila Cloud is one of the people who has been kidnapped, all bets are off. He’s been dreaming about her for months.

With their protective detail dead, Leila was determined to keep her small group unhurt and alive. Can she do this without making herself a target of their brutal captors?

Linc knows that finding the group of American’s will be the simple part of the mission. Getting them out alive will be next to impossible.

title: Cocoa Beach Bride (Sweeney House, #7)
description:
As the dramatic Sweeney family saga comes to a close, the thrill of new romances, second chances, and exciting reunions fills the salty air of Cocoa Beach.

With Sam’s baby on the way, Dottie pours her heart and soul into putting the final touches on Sweeney House so Sam’s wedding can launch the new inn. But her world is tilted when the last thing she ever anticipated comes knocking on her door. Is it possible that widowed Dottie could love again?

Taylor grapples with a major change in her father’s life, and her paralyzing inability to forgive him for the past. Until she does, she can’t fully give her heart away…but can she let go of resentment and rebuild that broken relationship?

And while Julie meets her first big hurdle as mayor, she gets some help from an unexpected source…the chief of police who happens to be a frenemy from days gone by. All the while, a mysterious new arrival with a dark past raises questions for all of them…and threatens to ruin the Sweeney’s most important celebration.

Will the family finally finish the year-long transformation of the inn…and their hearts, or will a shocking turn of events send everything tumbling down?

The Sweeney House Series

The Sweeney House is a landmark inn on the shores of Cocoa Beach, built and owned by the same family for decades. After the unexpected passing of their beloved patriarch, Jay, this family must come together like never before. They may have lost their leader, but the Sweeneys are made of strong stuff. Together on the island paradise where they grew up, this family meets every challenge with hope, humor, and heart, bathed in sunshine and the unconditional love they learned from their father.

Cocoa Beach Cottage – book 1
Cocoa Beach Boardwalk – book 2
Cocoa Beach Reunion – book 3
Cocoa Beach Sunrise – book 4
Cocoa Beach Bakery – book 5
Cocoa Beach Cabana – book 6
Cocoa Beach Bride – book 7

title: Locke Meadow (Easton Island Family Saga Series Book 4)
description:
Easton Island - Locke Meadow

Easton Island is the continuing saga of one woman’s journey from incredible loss to finding a past she knew nothing about, including a family who both embraces and fears her and a charming island that draws her in.

This inspirational series is for lovers of family sagas, mystery, and a touch of romance.

Morgan Easton’s journey continues as one chapter of her life ends and a new one begins. Morgan has settled into Easton Island life, and is getting up to speed with the family business alongside her half-brother, Brett. Meanwhile, her best friend Quinn is helping breathe new life into Easton Harbor Art Gallery.

While going through some of her mother’s artwork, she discovers a small portrait of her father and tries to return it to her grandmother. Morgan is surprised by her grandmother’s reaction, but when she finds out why, it’s Morgan who is shocked.

Working hard to fit in, Morgan is making new friends and finding her way. But not all the islanders are welcoming her with open arms and view her with suspicion and mistrust.

Will Morgan be able to win over the islanders and prove she’s there to help, or will recent revelations from her family’s past threaten her future on the island?

Find out when you grab your copy of Easton Island - Locke Meadow today!

title: The Christmas Gift (Easton Island Family Saga Series Book 5)
description:
Easton Island - The Christmas Gift

Easton Island is the continuing saga of one woman’s journey from incredible loss to finding a past she knew nothing about, including a family who both embraces and fears her and a charming island that draws her in.

This inspirational series is for lovers of family sagas, mystery, and a touch of romance.

-----------------------

Morgan Easton’s year has been a whirlwind of heartache and heartbreak after the death of her mother and her husband abandoning her. It’s also been filled with moments of joy finding family and making new friends on Easton Island.

The Christmas holiday season has arrived and Morgan’s grandmother Elizabeth has decided to host the “event of the season” at Easton Estate, to announce her grandchildren as successors and heirs to the Easton Family Dynasty.

Morgan learns what the final gift her mother bequeathed to her is and discovers the will might not be as cut and dried as she thought. While touring the property, she finds someone has ransacked the place looking for something, but what?

She slowly uncovers more family secrets, including what may have caused the destruction of Locke Meadow, her grandparents’ former home.

As Morgan desperately tries to fit the pieces of the family puzzle together, she wonders if there’s anyone she can trust.

Will the Christmas gift be the end of her life on Easton Island?

title: Of Moms & Monsters (Return to Magic, #4)
description:
Maddie Graves-Winters is looking forward to a week of relaxation with her best friends. She had no idea a camping trip would be so stressful, however. She might have been picturing s’mores and ghost stories around the campfire, but the world has other plans.
Having her best friends Ivy Morgan-Harker, Harper Harlow-Monroe, and Rowan Gray-Davenport—as well as their husbands and children—around for a full week is her idea of bliss. There’s just one little problem.
Maddie doesn’t consider herself a suspicious person by nature, but when one of the college-aged girls at a nearby campsite goes missing—and nobody seems to care—she’s intrigued. Then, when a mother at a different campsite also appears to have disappeared in the middle of the night, she’s officially on the case.
Maddie and her friends can’t seem to help themselves from investigating. Their husbands are another story. They’re convinced the women are making things up in their heads.
Who will turn out to be right? And if it’s the women, what happens when they draw a potential killer’s attention to their campsite?
The group is strongest when they’re together. But this trip might be the death of one of them.

title: Perilous Potions (Luna Thorn, #2)
description:
Luna Thorn sprang into being in the middle of the night in a downtown Detroit park years ago. She had no memory of her past and no idea what the future would hold for her. The only thing she possessed was magic…and the determination to win at all costs.
She’s finally about to get the answers she’s been looking for .
There are zombies popping up on Detroit’s mean inner city streets. They’re not normal zombies, however. They move fast and don’t go down under the usual methods. They have a mission, though, and the only thing that stops them is death.
Luna knows someone is controlling them, but who? She’s determined to find answers on her own, but the people who know her best and love her most refuse to let her fight this battle without backup.
Luna has been a loner for as long as she can remember, but her blood is running hot these days after joining with a phoenix, and news that she’s a traveler—a being that can jump through time—has her second-guessing every decision she’s ever made.
Detroit is about to be rocked by death and destruction. The question is, will Luna be the saint protecting it or the sinner bringing it down?
Things are about to change for everybody, and it’s impossible to know who will rise from the ashes.
The fight between good and evil, the past and the present, is on, and Luna will be right in the middle of it for better or worse.
The world is about to burn.

title: Some Cowboys are Infuriating (Keagans of Copper Creek #3)
description:
Curvy Ella thought she had left behind the painful memories of high school, but when she’s forced to work with Lucas, old wounds reopen. Now it’s up to Lucas to figure out why she hates him so much.

In the small town of Copper Creek, Lucas Keagan is known as a cowboy and a ladies' man, with a reputation for never settling down. But life takes an unexpected turn when he's roped into helping remodel the old barn for the town's event center.

Ella left town years ago, partially due to bullying over her curvy figure, and became an architect. Her father asked her to come back to help rebuild the barn. Now that she realizes who she’ll be working with, she can't wait to finish the project and leave Copper Creek behind again. She despises Lucas for his past behavior and hopes he won't accept the project.

As the two opposites work side by side, they begin to discover a connection they never saw coming. Will Lucas realize he’s capable of being more than the town heartbreaker? And will Ella be able to forgive him for his association with her past tormentor?

Join Lucas and Ella in this heartwarming enemies to lovers romance, where they come together to rewrite their love story in the heart of Copper Creek.

title: Silent Sins (Redemption Creek Romantic Suspense Book 4)
description:
Rescuing his black-sheep younger brother from yet another mess is nothing new for former SEAL and current Redemption Creek operative Mason Ortiz. Being forced to team up with a brilliant––and seriously controlling––FBI agent absolutely is, though. Mason will do anything to get his brother out of danger, but Special Agent Avery Ellis is only going to compromise this mission, in every way possible.
Between his wayward younger brother and the headstrong agent, he’ll have his hands full just keeping them all alive, don’t even add taking down the smugglers pouring black market pharmaceuticals into the country.
Just when Mason thinks his brother and Avery are safe, the game changes. A new enemy emerge, an entity powerful enough to make them all disappear, Mason’s Redemption Creek team included.

Redemption Where ranches run forever, granite peaks touch the sky, and wounded hearts seek home. Betrayed by their superiors, the former soldiers of Black-out Squadron are determined to carve out new lives. Their plan? Seek justice for folks who can’t fight their own battles.

Start this clean, wholesome Christian Romantic Suspense today!

title: Some Cowgirls are Worth Protecting (Keagans of Copper Creek Book 6)
description:
Hello readers!

The next Keagans of Copper Creek story is about Hudson Keagan falling in love with one of the newcomers to town. If you’ve already read Keagans of Copper Creek Book Five, you likely have an idea who it is. 

Stayed tuned… it won’t be long before the rest of the description is ready. But I can tell you, this story is going to be good!

Though I’m not quite finished editing it yet, I’m really pleased with the way it’s turned out.

title: The Jerry McNeal Series, a Paranormal Snapshot Collection Volume 5: (Books 13-15) Spirit of Deadwood, Star Treatment, Merry Me (The Jerry McNeal Series Clean & Cozy Collection)
description:
The Jerry McNeal Series, a Paranormal Snapshot Collection Volume 5

Marine Veteran Jerry McNeal was born with a psychic ability that allows him to know when something will happen before it happens. Jerry can also see and speak with spirits, making for some “lively” conversations.

Join Jerry McNeal and his ghostly K-9 partner as they put their gifts to good use.

Books in this three-book 

Spirit of Deadwood 

For fans of The Jerry McNeal Series comes a full-length, standalone Jerry McNeal novel, with Jerry, Gunter and a cast of lively spirits who are sure to entertain.

In a story within a story, disabled Marine veteran Tyler Jones, aka Jonesy, unknowingly rents an apartment in the same historic town. Hiding in the shadow of his former self, Jonesy soon finds himself pushed out of his comfort zone by Grandma Lilly, the lively spirit of a former Deadwood madam determined to help the man realize his worth and help him heal the heart of Juanita Stim, the widowed mother who rents him a room in her house overlooking the legendary city.

A fun-filled ghostly adventure with a hint of romance, Spirit of Deadwood is for those who dare to believe in the unbelievable.

Star Treatment

This 14th installment of the Jerry McNeal Series has Jerry and Gunter heading to Texas.

Along the way, Jerry finds himself dealing with unexpected visitors who challenge his patience and further test his psychic abilities.
Among the visitors is the ghostly spirit of Texas Ranger, Clive Tisdale, who is not a fan of dogs, refuses to tell Jerry why he is there, and if his presence has anything to do with Texas Ranger Raymond Hale.

Raymond Hale oversaw mob informant Antonio Maioriello until both men went missing years earlier and were presumed dead until recent weeks when Maioriello’s image started showing up in tourist photos taken outside the Alamo.

At first, this was presumed to be a camera malfunction, as no one recalled him being present at the time the photos were taken.

Then Maioriello showed up in a photo with the niece of Bruno Deluca – the man Maioriello informed on before being placed in the witness relocation program, and Deluca used his influence to demand answers.

Now, not only must Jerry locate the spirit who is causing the chaos, he must convince Bruno Deluca that Maioriello is truly dead.

Will Jerry and Gunter get to the Alamo in time to defend it from another invasion?

Will Tisdale change his stance about dogs?

Find out in Star Treatment – book 14 of The Jerry McNeal Series.

Merry Me 

Feeling guilty at not having made his engagement to April official over the Christmas holidays, Jerry seeks to join her and Max for their annual after-Christmas getaway to Frankenmuth, Michigan.

Not only is he looking forward to visiting the quaint Bavarian town, but since the town is known to visitors as a Christmas town, he sees this as a way to recreate the holiday spirit and finally make a commitment to both April and her daughter.

What Jerry doesn’t expect is to be drawn into a bidding war at a local estate sale or play referee to two spirits who discover he can see them and demand he help settle their differences.

Just when Jerry thinks he has things under control, the Ghost of Christmas Past makes his presence known in the merry little town, causing things to feel a tad less jolly.

title: Back To Our Beginning (Protectors of Jasper Creek #4)
description:
She’s my past, my present, and my only future.

Grady “Beau” Beaumont
As a Marine Raider, I’ve faced enemies in every corner of the world. I’ve walked through fire, faced down death, and left pieces of myself behind on every battlefield. But the one place I never wanted to return to was Jasper Creek, Tennessee. Too many memories. Too much pain. Too much loss. Yet, when I hear that trouble has found its way back to the town I once called home, I can’t stay away. Not when the people I care about might be in danger. Not when it means seeing Maddie Avery again—the girl who was my best friend, my anchor, the only person who ever made me feel like I belonged.

Maddie Avery
Beau Beaumont was my partner in everything that mattered—my partner in crime, my confidant, my forever friend. But when he left Jasper Creek fourteen years ago, I lost more than my best friend. I lost the person who understood me better than anyone else. Life moved on, and I’ve built a good one here with my family. But deep down, there’s always been a part of me that wished for more. Wished for him. Now Beau’s back, and with him comes a rush of endless possibilities—a love that feels woven into my soul, untouched by time, and stronger than I ever dared to believe.

title: Hidden Hero (Baytown Heroes, #11)
description:
True heroes aren’t just the ones who run into danger but also those who stand strong in the face of it.

On Virginia’s quiet Eastern Shore, two unsung heroes find themselves drawn together by duty and a growing connection neither expected.

Detective Jeremy Pickett thrives on the rush of high-stakes investigations, his charm as disarming as his determination. But when he meets Dr. Cora Wadsworth, the reserved and brilliant Medical Examiner who’s immune to his easy charisma, Jeremy finds himself unexpectedly intrigued.

Cora, an introvert by nature, traded the chaos of big-city life for the solace of the shore, intent on leaving her past behind. Yet, as she works alongside Jeremy to unravel a mysterious death, her guarded exterior begins to crack, revealing the courage and compassion that make her a hero in her own right.

When an unassuming autopsy uncovers a deadly secret, Cora becomes the target of someone desperate to hide the truth. When Cora faces a dangerous situation, Jeremy confronts the depths of his feelings. Racing against time, he must save the woman who’s become far more than a colleague—and protect the love he never saw coming.

A Baytown Boys sub-series.
The Virginia Marine Police and the North Heron Sheriff’s Department - Keeping the county and waterways of the Eastern Shore of Virginia safe, follow along as they find love. Small town romantic suspense.

title: Running to You (The Wright Heroes of Maine #1)
description:
Sam never understood why Eliza left him five years ago, ghosting him without explanation. He’s avoided romance ever since, focusing on building his business. Money might not keep him warm at night, but it can sure buy a lot of blankets. 

Then Eliza shows up on his doorstep and throws herself into his arms. She can’t explain her bruises or the head injury that’s left her with no memories of the past five years, including their breakup. No matter how good it feels to hold her, though, there’s no way he’s getting sucked into romance again. 

He’ll deliver Eliza to her mother, and that will be that. But instead of finding her mom, they’re met by two attackers and barely escape alive. Despite the danger to his life and his heart, he can’t leave Eliza to fend for herself. 

Together, they embark on a journey to reconstruct her past while evading the men chasing her. As Sam and Eliza close in on the truth, their romance reignites, but her secret threatens to destroy them both. 

Prepare to be enthralled by this gripping story of amnesia, a second chance at love, and a secret baby. Running to You is an edge-of-your-seat Christian romantic suspense set in Maine that will keep you reading all night long.

title: Soldier's Fake Fiancée (Trinity Falls Sweet Romance #3)
description:
This military mechanic can fix anything, except his own broken heart…

Beau Wilson’s past is littered with mistakes. But he has two things going for him—the know-how that only an Army-trained mechanic can boast, and his fierce, funny, four-year-old daughter Zandy. Between his two good things, this single dad figures he has the skills and the motivation to make it in his dream job at a repair shop, and give little Zandy the life she deserves.

So, when his mom tells him she’s retiring and leaving him the Christmas tree farm that’s been in the Wilson family for generations, he can see his dreams falling apart before his eyes.

Quinn Allen loves helping living things grow. She’s been saving forever, but she’ll probably never have enough to buy a farm of her own, so running the Wilson Tree Farm is the next best thing. But now the owner’s son is home and the handsome single dad doesn’t even seem to appreciate the incredible gift he’s about to get.

When the two realize that they might both be able to follow their dreams—but only if everyone thinks they’re getting married—it feels like they just might have the perfect solution to all their problems. 

A fake engagement seems so simple—at first.

But what happens if one of them doesn’t have a gift for lying?

And what if Beau realizes Quinn might just be the third good thing in his life?

As unwanted feelings start to crop up on the farm, the whole plan is thrown into chaos. It just might take a Christmas miracle (and the wisdom of a four-year-old) to bring this pretend family a very real happily-ever-after.

Trinity Falls Sweet Romance is all about finding family – one clean & wholesome romance at a time. The Trinity Falls Sweet Home for Christmas series celebrates a group of men coming home to a small Pennsylvania town at Christmastime, and finding love and meaning in the season.

title: Mallory's Secret: Sweet Western Historical Romance (Brides of Cedar Falls Book 10)
description:
She steps off the train with secrets that could destroy their mail-order marriage.

Mallory Price never imagined she would be widowed so young, much less carrying her late husband’s child…among other baggage. Alone and newly impoverished, she answers a mail-order bride advertisement and heads west, praying her new husband won’t turn her away when he finds out the truth about her.

Retired bounty hunter Duke Stratton knows a thing or two about liars. He used to track them for a living. So, when Mallory steps off the train looking every inch a high-society lady, he suspects she hasn’t told him the full story. Every instinct in him shouts she’s too good to be true, but he finds himself falling for her anyway.

Saddle up for a page-turning tale of danger, devotion, and a man who won’t let anything — or anyone — harm the bride he just finished vowing to honor and cherish.

Originally part of the Widows, Brides, and Secret Babies Series, Mallory’s Secret has been fully revised and expanded to be part of the Brides of Cedar Falls Series — uplifting romance full of faith, hope, love, and cowboys!

title: Tactical Force (Triumph Over Adversity #6)
description:
Some wounds never heal. 

As a former Navy SEAL, Walker Montgomery faces danger without flinching. But not even a combat zone halfway around the world was far enough to escape the trauma of his teen years. His younger sister was murdered and the killer never caught. Since returning home, he’s been quietly working the case, unable to move on with his life until justice is served. 

She’s a survivor. 

Hayley Barlow has her own tragic childhood. Abducted and held captive, she barely escaped the clutches of the same killer that murdered Walker’s sister. The invisible scars on her heart and the brand on her shoulder are souvenirs she can’t get rid of. When Hayley receives a taunting phone call from her attacker, she turns to Walker for help. 

A race to stop a killer. 

Walker is committed to safeguarding Hayley, but their closeness fractures the walls surrounding his heart. As the killer draws them into a deadly game of cat-and-mouse, nothing is as it seems. Walker is used to taking the fight to the enemy, but this time, with Hayley’s life on the line, it may cost him more than he’s willing to lose.

title: Sunrise Surf: A Sweet Beach Romance (Love on the Beach Book 3)
description:
When a police officer posing as a surfer and a doctor wading through the uncharted waters of parenting a teen join forces to dismantle a drug operation, anything is possible.Oregon State Police Officer Logan Wright swaps his badge for a board, posing undercover as a homeless surfer to infiltrate a deadly drug ring. Set against the breathtaking backdrop of Seaside's rugged coastline, he struggles with his dual life, especially after meeting a beautiful doctor who turns his head and touches his heart. Troubled by the fine line between duty and authenticity, Logan fears sharing the truth of his identity will drive her away.

Laken Hayes is a devoted doctor, fiercely protective of her teenage nephew, and determined to keep her hectic life in balance. But when a free-spirited surfer enters her world, nothing will ever be the same. Unexpectedly drawn to the charismatic man, Laken finds joy in his upbeat outlook on life while inadvertently becoming entangled in the web of Logan’s mission.

As their connection deepens and mysteries unravel, Logan faces a heart-wrenching will he continue the deception to protect his cover or reveal his true self to the woman who has captured his heart?

Join Logan and Laken as they navigate a tide of secrets, false identities, and a wave of fast-moving danger in Sunrise Surf, a wholesome small-town romance that proves love may be the ultimate risk worth taking.

title: Rory (Hope City, #7)
description:
Rory McBride was a protector, but went his own way...
his brothers were detectives but he found his calling as a paramedic.
Saving lives was second nature to him...
Now if he could only save the one woman who held his interest.

Sandy Carmichael hid her secrets behind a brilliant smile and flirting...
But never let anyone close. Especially not the handsome rescuer who filled her dreams.

When secrets are exposed and danger lurks... sparks fly.

One city... Countless stories.
Scenes and Language are similar to what you would find in an R-rated movie. 18+ readers.

title: Christmas of Joy (River Falls #2.5)
description:
A former crush, a Christmas wedding, and a second chance at a first kiss…

Madison has spent her entire life in her big sister’s shadow. So she’s not exactly thrilled when her sister assigns—not asks—her to be the maid of honor in her Christmas wedding. Especially when she learns that the best man is the groom’s brother…also known as Madison’s former crush. The boy who kissed her and then made it clear he would never see her as more than a silly schoolgirl.

Luke never planned to return to River Falls. After over a decade away, he has to keep one thing in mind: Madison Monroe is dangerous. Not because she’d ever harm anyone. But because he enjoys spending time with her way too much. And she made it clear after they kissed years ago that he would never be her type.

But between planning a party for their siblings, working together at a fundraiser, and taking an impromptu sledding run, neither can deny that their old crush has regained a foothold—and is on the verge of developing into much more. Should they stamp it out again…or trust that God could use it to bring them a Christmas—and a lifetime—of joy?

title: Hostile Intent (Black Tower Security #2)
description:
He hired her to find out who is spilling corporate secrets.
She’s determined to find out his.

When Black Tower Security sends Joey Rodriguez undercover at Zia Pharmaceuticals, she has her own motives for agreeing to the assignment – namely, to prove to her boss that Cole Kensington isn’t what he seems.

Cole has always had one goal—a cure for Alzheimer’s. Now that he and his company are close, he’s got a big problem. Corporate espionage in the pharmaceutical industry is par for the course, but this time he called for help. The undercover hacker they sent gets under his skin, but she is supposed to be the best—and he needs the best. Cole won’t let a spy in his ranks jeopardize something this important.

Helping a billionaire wasn’t what Joey signed up for. But as she starts to untangle the web of secrets and spies inside Zia, she finds herself in the crosshairs—and trusting the very man she hoped to expose.

title: Jaylen (The Halversons, #2)
description:
Jaylen Halverson was just nine years old when his life changed forever. His mother, knowing she was going to be leaving them, made arrangements for Jay and his sister to be adopted by a wonderful family. Throughout her illness, she extracted promises from Jay that have dictated many of his decisions and choices throughout his life. Holding tightly to those promises and wanting to make his mom and adopted family proud, Jay has kept certain things hidden because they were in direct opposition to what his mom wanted for him. A desire for a safer life has brought Michelle Barnes to Serenity Point. She’d become a doctor to serve the low-income community she’d grown up in. However, when her older brother brings danger to their family’s doorstep, it becomes necessary to escape the city she’d planned to devote her life to. With her mother and niece--now her adopted daughter--in tow, Misha tries to embrace a new life as a doctor in the Halversons’ family clinic in a community far from the type she’d been part of in Atlanta. The Halversons welcome Misha and her family to Serenity Point, happy to have her filling an important role in their clinic. After a long-term relationship left him broken, Jay isn't sure he'll ever be able to have the type of relationship his parents have. However, Misha's arrival in his life brings Jay renewed hope and a desire to try again.

In Jay, Misha finds a man to admire. One committed to his family—both blood and adopted. A man who brings a smile to her face and makes her wonder if perhaps the dream of a family she’d set aside could be realized with him.

Like magnets, they are drawn to each other. But will unexpected events in their lives be the flipside of the magnets, pushing them apart and breaking both their hearts? Or will they be able to trust that God has a plan for everything? Including their love for each other? Jaylen is book 2 of the Christian romance series focused on the lives of The Halversons . If you enjoy heartwarming Christian fiction with a focus on love, faith, and family, be sure to check out these other series and books by Kimberly Rae Other Christian romance books by Kimberly Rae

title: The Secret's in the Sauce (Two Broomsticks Gas & Grill Witch, #7)
description:
Stormy Morgan’s life took a rocky turn, but things are looking up. Sure, she’s a new witch living in her childhood hometown but she’s looking forward to the future. That includes her boyfriend Hunter Ryan moving in with her so they can save up to buy Stormy’s dream house in the spring. Things are going as planned … until a scream interrupts moving day.

It’s chaos on the street, and all that Stormy and Hunter can ascertain is that Edmund, the neighborhood Lothario, is dead, and four of the many women he was screwing around with are standing over his body.

All claim ignorance regarding what happened, but there’s an air of unease rippling through the group and it makes Stormy jittery. Things only go from bad to worse when the dead man’s soul decides he wants a new body … and Hunter’s will do.
If that wasn’t bad enough, there’s a new man in town … and he has Stormy and her magic in his sights. He also seems to be communicating with her cat after dark. That’s not suspicious at all, right?

Stormy might be new to magic but she’s relentless when it comes to protecting the people she loves most. She’ll do whatever it takes to make sure Hunter is safe, and as for that cat? The truth is about to come out.

So, sit back, because it’s going to be a bumpy ride.

title: As the Cookie Crumbles (Two Broomsticks Gas & Grill Witch, #8)
description:
Christmas is right around the corner, and Stormy Morgan is ready to celebrate for the first time in years. She’s been dreaming of one thing…Shadow Hills’ infamous Christmas festival.

There’s just one little problem.

When helping her new friend Easton pick out clothes in the thrift store, Stormy discovers the owner is missing. What’s worse, it looks as if there was a struggle in the back room. What happened to the married mother of one?

Stormy gets her boyfriend Hunter Ryan involved and they start searching. The only thing they can ascertain with any certainty is that there’s a hint of magic pulsing around the town, and maybe it has something to do with the disappearance.
Stormy has her hands full with gnome shifters and her old high school nemesis, so a missing person’s case isn’t something she’s looking forward to. She has no choice but to dig, though. Her conscious won’t allow the alternative.

Stormy might be new at the magic contest, but she understands winning. When another person disappears, she realizes she’s playing the wrong game.
In a world where fire rules, cold is about to claim them all. Can Stormy win? She’s about to find out. Come along for the ride.

title: Lake Shore Splendor  (Redemption Shores #3)
description: Fall brings splendor to Luna, Montana. And some challenges too. Bennett is moving closer still--right into the heart of Luna--and he's bringing two teenagers with him. Hazel is determined to prove that she loves him, even though she's still not willing to get married. Hunter is building his lodge, and with his sister on board, it will be amazing. But somehow he's got to figure out how to win Janie back, before she falls in love with the new Park Ranger who just moved to town.Come back to the majestic beauty of Elk Canyon Lake, a remote and breathtaking wonder hidden in the stunning Montana Mountains. There you'll find unexpected romance, the redemption of broken pasts, and hope dawning anew.REDEMPTION Lake Shore Wandering2. Lake Shore Return3. Lake Shore Splendor4. Lake Shore Awakening (coming March 2024)

title: The Female Warrior & The Charming Gentleman: Inspiring Romance Suspense (Coleville Ranch Romances Book 7)
description:
A handsome, flirtatious billionaire pursued by the most dangerous criminal of the century. A hilarious female warrior who will protect him, knock him on his backside, and maybe let her guard down and love him. 

Autumn Cardon, the top female operative for Aiden Porter, appears carefree and sweet. In reality, she’s hardened and feisty. Though many men have tried to bust through her walls, she teases, flirts, and keeps them at a distance. When she’s assigned to protect the pretty-boy billionaire Jarom Love from the nefarious Benjamin Oliver, she plans to sass him and keep him safe. She does not plan on her celebrity crush being thoughtful, funny, caring, and brave. She tries to ignore Jarom’s magnetism but he slowly melts the iron around her heart.

Jarom Love, the famous, classy, and charming billionaire flirt of the century, is tired of hiding from Benjamin Oliver. When the mesmerizing Autumn Cardon rescues him from a bomb threat and whisks him away to Coleville, Montana for higher security and protection, he is blown away. Autumn is his perfect match, he can feel it. Gone are the days when he has a different woman on his arm every night. His heart belongs completely to her. How can he break down her thick walls and convince her that they are meant to be?

Autumn and Jarom fall in love under the enchantment of the beautiful Coleville Ranch, but what will happen when outside forces attack. Can Jarom convince Autumn that she is the one for him? Will Autumn find the courage to let Jarom into her heart?

Don’t miss USA Today Bestselling Christian Romance Suspense Author Cami Checketts' latest sweet adventure romance series, Coleville Ranch Romances (Witness Protection Romances).

1 – The Recluse & The Fugitive
2 – The Soldier & The Actress

4 – The Pilot & The Athlete

6 - The Roper & The Author
7 - The Female Warrior & The Charming Gentleman

10 - The Doctor & The Caregiver

Fans of Jessie Gussman, Christy Barritt, Dee Henderson, Robin Patchen, and Lisa Phillips will love Cami Checketts’ clean romantic suspense with a side of comedy.

Matchmaking the Duchess and the Commander
Matchmaking the Entertainer and the Firefighter
Matchmaking the Model and the Beast
Matchmaking the Spy and the Heiress
Matchmaking the Bodyguard and the Philanthropist
Summit Valley Christmas Romance
His Pe

title: Blaze (Cross Creek Wyoming Ranch Romances #4)
description:
★★★★★From kindle all-star and USA Today author, Taylor Hart! The Cross Creek Family Romances! ★★★Taylor Hart always does a great job of writing clean, faith-filled romances. All the stories in this book are excellent, and I highly recommend them!★★★Kindle Customer

What do you do – when you find a dead man's phone? Not just a dead man's phone, but a phone filled with messages from the woman who still loves him? And when you try to give it back ... she yells at you!

Blaze Cross doesn't want drama. He doesn't do drama. In fact, he normally doesn't even do people. He's a small town veterinarian, who specializes in horses. When he goes to Kentucky to meet with a horse dealer who might know something about the Conquistador Gold, he picks up a stray phone on the ground. One he means to get back to the owner, until he's searched by drug dogs at the airport. Later, when the phone keeps going off, he finds himself reading messages. Messages he shouldn't be reading, but can't stop.

Eden Cappa doesn't want to be stuck in grief. It's been almost a year since her husband passed and between her time in a hospital to get help and the time she spends defending herself to her family that she REALLY is okay, all she wants to do is get away from it all. But she never expected to lose the phone. The only thing that's kept her connected to the man she loved. The only thing thing that allows her to still hear his voice.

When Blaze and Eden find themselves thrown together to help out a giant Husky dog, something starts to happen between them. Something that this horse vet never anticipated; he starts to fall in love.

Will discovering the secret Blaze has kept from her take away all chances of them being together?
Will Eden's history with the Conquistador Gold be the next clue in the puzzle ... or will they team up and find it together?

As the Cross siblings get tested, they find they have to do the one thing their father always wanted them to do; trust each other and protect the land that is their legacy.

title: The Contractor & The Entrepreneur  (Coleville Ranch Romances #9)
description:
A rugged general contractor. An ambitious developer trying to prove herself. Will they let down their walls and join forces, or stubbornly resist each other?

Sloan Jensen, a fiercely independent land developer, is fighting to prove herself to her father and all of the general contractors in her new Montana development. When she arrives on site and face plants in the mud, she’s humiliated. Rhett Coleville, a gorgeous and enticing contractor, rescues her from the mud, from her demonic cousins trying to intimidate her, and stands by her side when it seems everyone else wants her gone. Sloan yearns to lean on the handsome cowboy's benevolence, but experience reminds her to never trust a man.

Rhett Coleville, a talented and driven contractor, is stunned to discover that the mud-covered, beautiful woman who just marched onto his worksite is the developer behind his new and very difficult construction project. Despite the unending barrage of obstacles, Sloan pushes through, and Rhett finds himself increasingly impressed with--and attracted to--this skilled and stubbornly independent woman. He tries to help and fight for Sloan, but she’s too brave and proud to let down her guard around him.

Can Rhett break through Sloan's self-protecting walls and convince her that two is better than one? Can Sloan allow herself to love and rely on the perfect man for her?

Don’t miss USA Today Bestselling and Kindle All-Star Christian Romance Suspense Author Cami Checketts' latest sweet adventure romance series, Coleville Ranch Romances (Witness Protection Romances).

1 - The Recluse & The Fugitive
2 - The Bodyguard & The Billionaire
3 - The Soldier & The Actress
4 - The Pilot & The Athlete

9 - The Contractor & The Entrepreneur
10 - The Doctor & The Caregiver

Fans of Jessie Gussman, Christy Barritt, Valerie M. Bodden, and Susan May Warren will love Cami Checketts’ clean romantic suspense with a side of comedy.  

A Chance for Charity
Impossible Treasure
Impossible Escape
Impossible Sail
Impossible Climb
Impossible Crusade
Impossible Thrills
Impossible Chase
Impossible Rapids

Christmas in Augustine
The Royal Captain and the Designer
The Wounded Guard and the Royal Stylist
The Impulsive Princess and the Soldier

Sweet Royal Romance Suspense
The General Prince and the Nerd
The Brave Prince and the Teacher
The Doctor Prince and the Outsider
The Ninja Prince and the Investigator
The Charming Prince and the Single Mum
The Crown Prince and the Traitor
The Police Chief and the Musician
The Royal Major and the Executive
The Grieving King and the Emissary

Billionaire Protection Romances
Matchmaking the Singer and the Warrior
Matchmaking the Duchess and the Commander
Matchmaking the Entertainer and the Firefighter
Matchmaking the Model and the Beast
Matchmaking the Spy and the Heiress
Matchmaking the Bodyguard and the Philanthropist
Summit Valley Christmas Romance
His Perfect Match for Christmas
His Ski Resort Overrun for Christmas
His Cabin Invaded for Christmas
His Unexpected Wedding for Christmas

title: Fighting for Her Heart (Love on Sanctuary Shores Book 2)
description:
He broke her heart once, and she won’t let him destroy the island she loves.
If only her heart would get the memo that he’s the bad guy.

Derrick Webster has fond memories of Sanctuary Island, but the small community is going to be left behind if someone doesn’t help them make a name for themselves as a tourist destination.

And he’s the man for the job.

The picturesque summer hideaway is the perfect place for his capstone real estate development. It’ll be the crown jewel of Webster Hotels, if he can convince the short-sighted townsfolk that he’s here to help—a task made all the harder by his devious and beautiful ex, rallying them against his plans.

Chloe Bennett moved to the island at the lowest point in her life, finding the refuge it promised as her heart began to heal. She won’t let anyone ruin the magical, small-town community she adores so much. Not even the pushy, egotistical, business-savvy man who broke her heart and sent her into the arms of Jesus and the people of Sanctuary Shores.

She’ll do anything to send Derrick packing and protect the community from his greedy desire to commercialize their island. And she definitely won’t fall in love with him. Again.

Welcome to the shores of Sanctuary Island, where six bestselling authors of Christian romance bring you stories of love and redemption. From tender romance to enduring faith, each standalone novel in this series promises unforgettable characters and heartwarming small town charm.

title: Sisco (Lighthouse Security Investigations Montana Book 2)
description:
Former SEAL and new LSI-MT Keeper, Sisco Aguilar, never expected his day at the hospital to turn into a nightmare.

All he wanted was to finish his paramedic recertification and head home. But instead, he found himself thrust into a life-or-death hostage situation, protecting a terrified little girl and her stunning, single mother.

Lenore Keller’s day was meant to be filled with hope.

With her daughter Evie in remission, she just wanted to get through the hospital tests and receive more good news. The last thing she expected was to be trapped in a deadly standoff, with a man who looked like he could take on the world—and who was now her daughter’s only protector.

As the tension escalates, Sisco realizes that meeting Lenore was more than just a twist of fate. Her strength and devotion pulled him in, and her daughter’s innocent bravery tugs at his heart. In this moment of crisis, Sisco is determined to prove he’s not just a hero for the day, but the man they can rely on forever.

With the full might of Lighthouse Security Investigations Montana behind him, Sisco vows to protect Lenore and Evie with everything he has—because this is the family he never knew he needed, and he’s not about to let them slip away.

Lighthouse Security Investigations 
The security and investigation company is filled with handpicked men and women from the SEALs, Rangers, Special Forces, Deltas, and Air Force Special Ops. All trained in CIA Special Operations, the Keepers were the best of the best and ready to take on any mission.
Lighthouse Security Investigations
Lighthouse Security Investigations West Coast
Lighthouse Security Investigations Montana

title: Caring for the Cowboy's Baby
description:
A cowboy, his nanny, and the secret that changes everything. 

There are three things Dawson Worthy knows for 

1. No one can find out who he really is.

2. The baby on his doorstep isn’t his.

3. Falling for the nanny is a really bad idea.

Dawson traded in his silver spoon for a pair of spurs and never looked back, blending in to Redemption Ridge as just another ranch hand. But when a baby shows up on his doorstep, it throws his world into a tailspin. Thankfully, Liberty Bennet works at the ranch too - and happens to be a baby whisperer.

Hiring her as his nanny was a brilliant idea, until all the half-truths become harder to maintain and their arrangement starts to feel less like a temporary gig and more like a real family.

When his family gets involved, Liberty is confronted with the painful truth of their differences. How can she trust her heart to a man who didn’t trust her with his true self?

Return to Redemption, Colorado and enjoy the faith, friendships, and forever-afters in this Christian Christmas Romance.

Healing the Cowboy is book 10 in the Christmas in Redemption Ridge series, but each of the books can be read on their own.

title: The Crowing of Hell (Hellfire MC Book 10)
description:
He was the one who almost sacrificed everything to save the prospect who was his club’s future. He came out of it scarred and wounded but determined to continue. Hellfire supported him, and helped him along, but couldn’t protect him from the cruelty of the world. Trapped by a woman who only sees dollar signs, his baby mama tells him quite clearly… she doesn’t want a cripple as her baby dad. Just hand over his wallet and fade into the background. She underestimated Hellfire and him.
Unaware she was in peril until it hit her head on, a woman who has already shown her worth is in trouble. But she’s not ready to acknowledge she’s in danger. However, after he pulls her from a near-fatal accident, he’s decided he is responsible for her. She thinks he and two MCs are overreacting. He thinks she’s not paying enough attention.
Then, a series of events force her to face the truth. Someone wants her dead. But the incidents happening seem to follow two different paths. Are there two people after her or one? Nobody seems to have the answer. She’s got the respect of both clubs for her previous sacrifice, and now they’re determined to protect her.
A man fighting for his unborn child and who doesn’t want a woman, especially one who would only ever see his disabilities, finds himself falling hard. She doesn’t want a man; she works too hard and won’t give her career up. But this man’s soul reaches out to her and captures her loyalty and love. Can two lost souls find each other in amongst the chaos that’s not just caused by those chasing her? Rage has the Hellions, Hellfire has the Holy Terrors… who will be standing at the end of the day?

title: Sarah: Sweet Historical Romance (Pendleton Promises #3)
description:
She desires his heart.He longs for her love.Can they find common ground when he returns forever altered by the war.In a world turned upside down by World War I, all Sarah Richards desires is to love Brett Rawlings and build a future together. After graduating high school a year early, she’s ready to dive into her dreams of college and a home filled with laughter and love. But one impulsive decision threatens all her aspirations—as well as her relationship with Brett.

As the war rages on and men head off to fight, sixteen-year-old Brett reluctantly follows his twin brother, Ben, sneaking off to France to join the American Expeditionary Forces. As the months pass, Ben thrives amidst the chaos of battle, while Brett finds himself haunted by the girl he left behind and the uncertainty of his own heart. When Ben reveals a life-altering secret, the bond between the brothers is shattered, forcing Brett to grapple with betrayal as he faces the brutal realities of war.

Brett returns home a changed man, burdened with memories too heavy to bear, yet yearning to mend the fractures of the past. Will Sarah still be waiting for him, or have time and truth forged an unbridgeable chasm between them?

Find out in this heartfelt historical romance that weaves a tale of hope, grace, forgiveness, and sweet, enduring love.

title: Intrigued by Danger (The Danger Family, #3)
description: Declan Danger has always gone along to get along, keeping his twenty-year relationship afloat. But his world flips upside down when his girlfriend insists on opening their relationship. In the midst of spiraling, he encounters the alluring Mistress Elle.

title: Feelings For You (Crenshaw Kings Book 6)
description:
Yolani Ian has always been one of God's favorites when it came to her professional endeavors, but the same cannot be said when it comes to love. It seems like every man she runs across is either threatened by her success, jealous of it, or cannot deal with such a hectic schedule, but whatever their reasoning, they all seem to resort to the same being unfaithful. Coupled with the fact that she is battling an undiagnosed and debilitating condition that most men find burdensome, the songstress begins to believe that true love just isn't in the cards for her. Having had enough of being mistreated, Yolani vows to focus on her career and her career only until a man can prove that not only can he understand her real life, but that he is mature enough not to fall for any woman with a pretty face and an abundance of assets to match. So when she meets a well-known playboy, famous for his one-night stands, and baby mama drama, Yolani finds it comical and slightly infuriating that he is hell-bent on making her his. What she soon realizes though, is that everything isn't always what it appears to be, including him, but with an overbearing family, fanbase, and jealous contemporaries, Yolani will learn just how difficult obtaining real love is.

Cemone Compton, the cocky, aggressive, and promiscuous NBA player for the Los Angeles Bulldogs is living life to the fullest. Or at least he was until his bed-hopping ways left him with two baby mamas and a set of ghetto twins to match. And his violent behavior, on and off the court, garnered him and his team much negative publicity. Always one to have and get whatever he wants, when he sets his eyes on the most beautiful and talented woman he is sure he's ever seen, he decides to simply make her his. However, what the handsome ball player doesn't realize is that this woman is far different from what he is used to. Unable to dangle his fame, money, cockiness, and playboy persona in her face to make her fall for him, Cemone is nonplussed, becoming obsessed with convincing the woman he truly believes is for him, to take him seriously. Her being a difficult woman to break down accompanied by his uncontrollable temper and conniving baby mamas, has Cemone at a loss.

But one thing this talented shooting guard hates more than anything is losing, especially when it's the woman of his dreams, so he sets out to do whatever and whenever just to have her, allowing nothing to stand in his way.

Find out in this story filled with healing love, shocking reveals, betrayal, and jealousy, just what a man in a deep, all-consuming love will do.

*This is a standalone novel*

title: Lucid Dreams
description:
After a horrific incident, Nite and his twin Dai are left to fend for themselves. Living recklessly in the fast lane, the twins flirt with danger not caring about the aftermath of their actions. Partying, popping pills, and getting money are just a few ways they cope with their untreated childhood trauma. Without the guidance of strong male figure and the love of a nurturing mother, they can come off as rude and callous.

For Hunter, life has never been easy. From birth, she was dealt a hand deemed unfair. With an alcoholic father and deadbeat baby daddy, Hunter is suffocating and no one seems to care. After literally being knocked off her feet by Nite, Hunter is immediately turned off by his rude demeanor, but she can’t seem to shake him.

The lines between reality and dreams are blurred when the past and future collide. Loyalty is tested, greed is at an all-time high and several lives are left hanging in the balance. Nite and Dai learn that no matter how hard they try, they can never outrun their past.

title: On Us 3
description: While Lake, Avery, Ivy, and Vant deal with the makes and breaks of their relationships, they also juggle the other Porters on their journeys. Each person is fighting to overcome, find their places with one another, and the new hurdles in their lives. Finding and believing in the trust and love they so desperately seek in one another. Everything gets put on the line in this final installment. Fight or flight has kicked in, and each Porter, along with the women they have chosen to love, will need to make a decision and commit. Can love conquer all, or will it not be enough?

title: On Us 2
description: Every flaw and true feelings are brought to the forefront. Bonds are built and broken. Relationships are tested and resolutions may become slim but the love continues to be real.

title: Saved By A Mafia Boss
description:
Kyla Warren never expected life to hand her anything—especially not an entanglement with a ruthless mafia boss. She learned early on that if she wanted something, she had to get it for herself. But when the man she trusted the most pushes her aside like yesterday’s news, she’s left standing in the wreckage, trying to piece herself back together. Before she can even catch her breath, she’s pulled into a world she never wanted to be a part of—a high-stakes game of power, deception, and dangerous attraction. And the only way out? Making a deal with Romare "Ruger" Croix, an alpha male with a deadly reputation in the streets.

Ruger is the kind of man Kyla swore she’d never entertain—arrogant, dangerous, and the walking definition of power. Too many women fall at his feet, but Kyla? She’s built different. She’s got her own mind, her own rules, and she refuses to be just another woman lost in his shadow. Their connection is fire and friction, a battle of wills where neither is willing to fold. But the more she fights him, the more undeniable their pull becomes.

In Ruger’s world, loyalty is everything, and power comes at a price. Kyla quickly realizes she’s in deeper than she ever imagined, and walking away might not be an option. When a choice presents itself—one that could change both of their lives forever—they’re forced to ask Is this just survival? Or is it something real?

Because love isn’t just a risk. It’s a war. And Kyla and Ruger are about to find out if they’re willing to fight for it.
If you love alpha male energy, enemies-to-lovers heat, urban romance, and high-stakes mafia drama, this one’s for you.

title: O and Em : A BBW Hood Billionaire Romance (The Virgin BBW Surrogate Book 6)
description:
Some families are built with love. Others are forged in fire.

Emmy’s finally in her soft season. With Ocean in her arms and twins on the way, she’s holding tight to the peace she never thought she’d get. But nothing stays safe for long—not when O’s past is still clawing at their doorstep.

And not when The Shadow is still watching.

While Emmy focuses on family, O’ is in full protection mode—digging deep to unmask the mysterious man haunting their lives. The Shadow moves like smoke… always one step ahead, always too close for comfort. But as O' gets closer to the truth, what he finds could shatter more than just the lies—it could fracture the very roots of his legacy.

Tan is facing a truth of her own, one she hasn’t even told Messiah. But Messiah? He’s spiraling—torn between his missing sister, a complicated love life, and the secrets Senior refuses to give up.

Because Senior is back. And his return... Ain’t no resurrection without consequences.

As the past collides with the present, long-buried truths begin to surface, threatening to destroy everything the Colemans built. And through it all,

The Shadow still watches... Patient. Powerful, and ready to strike.

title: Taken By A Seven Figure Rich Hitta’ 3
description:
Money changes lives. Power changes people. And love? It changes everything.

With Desmond finally out of her way, Ryce can finally sit back, exhale, and enjoy the luxury of being loved by a man like Sahil. A 7-figure hitta, a provider, a protector. But peace don’t come easy when your man’s enemies are still lurking.

Sahil knows the streets don’t forget. Loose ends. Unfinished business. Old foes who refuse to stay buried. He’s seen what happens when a man gets too comfortable, and he refuses to let history repeat itself. Before he can secure forever with Ryce, he has to handle what’s still in his way.

Meanwhile, Reagan and Sergio are stuck at a crossroad. The truth about Domino’s death changed everything, and the love they once knew is no longer the same. Reagan is trying to move forward, and Jeremiah seems like the perfect escape. But Sergio? His heart ain’t letting go that easy.

And then there’s Liliana. A woman who knows what she wants and refuses to lose. She’s determined to keep her place by Sergio’s side, and she’ll do whatever it takes to make sure Reagan stays in the past.

But the problem with love triangles in the streets?
Ain’t nobody playing fair.

Will Sergio walk down the aisle with Liliana? Or will love pull him back to Reagan before it’s too late?

Betrayal. Obsession. Power. Love.
In this explosive finale, loyalty will be tested, love will be questioned, and only the strongest will survive.

If you love bossed-up men, dangerous romance, and heroines who refuse to break, Taken By A 7 Figure Rich Hitta 3 will pull you into a world of passion, power plays, and unexpected twists.

Because in love and war, only one thing is certain… somebody’s heart won’t make it out alive.

title: Breakfast With A Gangsta 3: An Urban Novel
description:
Haze is a man broken beyond recognition, his spirit shadowed by vengeance. Left for dead after an ambush, he lies low, plotting silently with a dangerous precision. His heart, however, remains locked onto one person—Milan, the woman whose essence consumes him. But Milan now wears a different man's Royce, whose wealth and influence conceal a darker truth.

Behind the illusion of Milan’s perfect life lies turmoil. Each day, she battles the haunting memory of what could have been with Haze. As the illusions crumble around her, every step she takes feels dangerously fragile. Torn between duty and longing, Milan struggles to protect her heart from further devastation.

Meanwhile, Ricky is navigating her independence after leaving Gunna, focusing on her twins and thriving business. But when hidden truths rise painfully to the surface, Ricky finds herself questioning everything. Was leaving Gunna a liberation or a mistake she’ll regret forever?

Some stories are destined to haunt you. As unresolved feelings resurface, every secret, every lie becomes a ticking bomb. Love demands a price—one that must be paid in full.

In this riveting third installment of the gripping street romance, love’s intensity burns deeper, betrayals cut sharper, and loyalties are fiercely tested. The streets remain mercilessly observant, and every move made could be their last.

Because when you test the heart of a true gangsta, the fallout spares no one.
