Breakfast With A Gangsta 3—a powerful fusion of African American romance, suspense, and raw emotion that will leave you breathless.

title: A Gangster's Promise 2: Finale
description:
Promise Valentine

Everyone knows that Doodie is my heart, so having his blood on my hands—literally—has shaken me to my core. The question plaquing my mind is, did my hubby and his family have anything to do with it? Possibly. Maybe. No. I don’t believe that Truth Kingston will go against his promise to me. He wouldn’t break my heart like that. He just couldn’t. I trust him fully, or do I?

For years, the Valentine and Kingston families have been at odds with each other. When blood is shed and an innocent life hangs in the balance, a dark secret from their past is exposed, causing a domino effect of tea being spilled, revealing a shocking connection between the rivals. As the truth comes to light, the two families have to set aside their animosity and work together to dismantle their common enemy. But can they contain their hatred long enough to silence their foes?

As alliances are forged and a united front is built, the Valentines and Kingstons discover betrayal hidden within and uncover new threats that needs handling. In this urban fiction finale, while controlling different territories in the streets of Chicago and establishing their dominance, Promise, Truth, and their families turn betrayal into unity, chaos into strength, and love into the one thing both families could agree on.

title: Bosslady Inc.: A Thug Legacy Story
description:
What’s understood needs no explanation when it comes to the infamous Kenneth Family.

This is Book 19 of the Legendary Thug Passion series.

Get lost in these pages with the new generation of Bosslady Inc. and Legacy Inc.

As they bring you that familiar feeling that only the first family of the streets can bring.

Get in tune because they’re back like they never left.

title: Taken By A Seven Figure Rich Hitta’: An African American Romance
description:
Two sisters. Two paths. One life-altering connection to the Coleman brothers that could build them… or break them.

Ryce has always played by the rules. The perfect wife. The responsible daughter. The woman who believed that if she did everything right, she’d get the fairytale ending. But fairytales are for fools. And when her husband’s betrayalshatters the illusion she’s built her life around, she’s left standing in the wreckage, questioning everything.

Then comes Sahil ‘Grim’ Coleman.

Atlanta’s most feared, most respected, most dangerously untouchable man. Sahil doesn’t just see people—he sees through them. And he sees Ryce. The parts of her she’s buried. The desires she’s never spoken out loud. The woman she’s been too afraid to become. With him, love is raw. It’s unfiltered. It’s nothing like the fairytales—and yet, she’s never felt more alive.

But can she risk her heart on a man who could destroy her just as easily as he could love her?

Regan was born into chaos. The daughter of their father’s mistress, she’s spent her whole life learning how to survive.Love? It was never a guarantee. And after watching her fiancé take his last breath right in front of her, she locked away her heart and threw away the key.

But then Sergio ‘Trigga’ Coleman reappears.

Kian’s best friend. The man with secrets. The one who knows truths about Kian’s life that Regan never did. And the more he reveals, the more Regan starts to realize—maybe the love she thought she lost was never what she believed.

Now, Sergio is standing in front of her, waiting. Watching. The chemistry between them is undeniable, electric, and all-consuming. But does she dare risk her heart again? Or will her fears keep her locked in the past, too scared to claim the love that’s been in front of her all along?

Betrayal. Power. Passion. Redemption.
Love has never been safe… but it’s always been worth it.

If you adore African American romance, second chances, and dangerously passionate relationships, Taken By A 7 Figure Rich Hitta  by LaKeisha will grip you from start to finish.

title: Saved By A Mafia Boss 3: The Finale
description:
The storm hasn’t passed—it’s only just begun.

Everything’s coming to a head—and not everybody’s walking away.

Kyla thought being with Romare would finally give her peace. But when she finds out Bronco Bell—cold, calculated, and feared—is possibly her father, her world flips. Now she’s questioning her bloodline, her worth, and whether she still belongs to the Croix family at all. How do you move forward when the truth feels like a trap?

Noa’s secrets are closing in fast. She’s been living two lives, and now it’s catching up—with the law knocking, and a newborn daughter to protect. Rook is doing what he does handling business, pulling strings. But even with all his moves, they might be backed too far into a corner. Noa has to figure out if the man she loves can really hold her down—or if this time, love just isn’t enough to save them.

Poet and Mocha are stuck in a loop of love and hurt. The feelings never left. Neither did the pain. Mocha’s trying to forget. Poet’s trying to forgive. But their silence speaks louder than words. The connection is still there—real, raw, and aching. They just have to is it worth bleeding for one more time, or are they both too broken to fix?

And while all that unfolds, the Croix family is under attack from every side. Enemies they can see, and some they never saw coming. People who’ve waited in the cut are finally making their move. The family’s been through war before, but this time, it’s different. It’s personal.

Lines will be crossed. Love will be tested. Blood might get spilled.

If you’re into African American romance, hood love that hits deep, and stories where loyalty can kill or save you, this one’s for you. It’s the final chapter in a legacy built on pain, power, and survival.

The Croix name ain’t just a title—it’s a target. And not everybody’s making it out.

title: A Virgin BBW and an Unhinged Hood Millionaire 2
description:
Kiersten’s life changed the night she was found bloodied and unresponsive in her dance studio. Now in a coma, the people who love her are falling apart trying to hold it together. Her best friend Jream is spiraling, searching for answers while hiding how deeply she’s falling for the one man she swore to avoid.

Saint is caught between being a street heir and a brother on the edge. With Kiersten barely hanging on, his old loyalty is starting to rot and the people closest to him might be the ones plotting behind his back.

Everyone has been side-eyeing Johnathan, he’s moving like he untouchable. He’s got blood on his hands and secrets in his phone. While he’s playing innocent in public, he’s building a quiet war behind the scenes.

As pressure builds, loyalty is tested, and the lines between love and survival start to blur and one thing becomes clear, nobody is safe.

title: A Virgin BBW and an Unhinged Hood Millionaire
description:
Twenty-year-old Kiersten Grey is done pretending. This BBW virgin has spent her life saving herself for real love—but all she got was Johnathan, a pretty face with a poisonous soul. Verbally abusive and a habitual cheater, he’s dragged her through emotional hell, leaving her questioning her worth and losing pieces of herself just to keep him happy. But that ends now. Kiersten is ready to break free, reclaim her power, and finally learn what it means to choose herself first.

Only problem… Johnathan’s not the type to walk away quietly.

While Kiersten fights for freedom, her older brother Saint Jefferson-Grey is caught in a different war. A self-made hood millionaire with deep ties to the streets, Saint's loyalty runs thick, but so does the pressure that comes with his name. In the midst of it all, he finds unexpected peace in Jream, Kiersten’s bold, beautiful best friend who’s tired of being overlooked. The chemistry between them is instant and dangerous. But with Melody, Saint’s unpredictable on-again/off-again ex still in the picture, love gets complicated fast.

As love and betrayal collide, the streets get hot—and Kiersten finds herself pulled into a deadly game she didn’t ask to play. The bullets ain’t got no names, and when the smoke clears, nothing will be the same.

Will she survive long enough to finally live for herself? Or will the war she didn’t start claim her before she ever gets the chance?

title: The Virgin BBW Surrogate 4: A Hood Billionaire Romance
description:
The secret was never meant to surface. But now… Chaos is about to erupt.

O’ thought he had everything on lock until a cold-blooded, calculated betrayal shook his world to the core. Mischa, the woman he once called his wife, was playing a deadly game. A game that robbed his Big Mama of everything— the life she deserved, the child she never knew was hers, and the love she was too scared to claim.
Now, the truth is out.

Ocean, the baby Emmy carried under the pretense of a NDA Surrogate Contract, was never Mischa’s from the start. The deception runs deep, tangled in schemes of medical fraud, stolen eggs, and ruthless manipulation. But Mischa underestimated O’ and Emmy’s ability to outplay her at her own game.

Will O’ and Emmy get their son back and live happily ever after? Or will the very thing lurking in the shadows tear them apart? Will Mischa pay the ultimate price for messing with a mother’s love?
Secrets unravel. Lives crumble. Blood spills. The war is just beginning, and when the dust settles…

Nobody will ever be the same again.

title: A WEALTHY GANGSTA AND HIS BBW WEAKNESS 4
description:
Some wars you walk away from. Others? You finish.

Cimani has always been the calm to his chaos, but loving a man like Kashtyn means understanding that peace don’t come easy. She’s holding him down, loving his daughter like her own, but when he tells her she’s the only future he sees, will she be ready to take that next step? Or will the dangers of his world make her question everything?

Kashtyn Grey built his empire from the ground up, but now, the streets are watching, the Feds are lurking, and his enemies are closing in. With his parents gone, betrayal at every corner, and his daughter back in his arms, there’s only one thing left to do, eliminate every threat standing in his way.

Ava played a dangerous game, and now? She’s paid the ultimate price. But her death doesn’t mean the storm is over. Loose ends still need to be tied, secrets are still lurking in the shadows, and Kashtyn ain’t stopping until he’s got full control over his city and his peace.

With new alliances forming, old enemies resurfacing, and the past refusing to stay buried, Kashtyn is on a mission. But when the pressure reaches its breaking point, one question remains… 

Will the war finally end, or will it cost him everything?

title: A Wealthy Gangsta and His BBW Weakness 5: The FINALE
description:
Kashtyn and Cimani have built the life they always dreamed of… Their love solid, their family thriving, and their legacy stronger than ever. The streets is a thing of the past. Now, it’s about securing their future, raising their kids, and figuring out what comes after the hustle.

But just because the war is over don’t mean life gets any easier.

Between Cimani’s empire expanding nationwide and Kashtyn adjusting to a life where he ain’t making moves, their world is changing fast. Juggling business, love, and family ain’t easy, but they’re determined to keep it all together. 

As they step into the final chapter of their story, one thing is clear, love got them here, but commitment, sacrifice, and trust will carry them to the end. And when it’s all said and done...

They’ll finally say ‘I do.’

title: On Us
description:
Avery went against everything to be with Ky. Her sister Ivy, who she loved more than anyone in the world and Vant who had taken care of her like she was his own blood, told her for years Ky was no good. Their relationship didn’t start ideally, but the love she had for him began long before they became public to the world. What was once a fairytale turned into a nightmare, and Avery felt like it was karma. She didn’t have any business being with Ky then, and the torment she had been put through showed they weren’t meant to be together presently.

Lake Porter, a man who dedicated his life to taking care of his brothers and living by his father’s word, finally catches up to the feelings he tried so hard to fight. Love wasn’t in the cards for him, and he had come to terms with that until a prissy, sometimes crazy, vibrant woman, shows him that he isn’t so cold and his heart did pump. She isn’t fazed by his mean persona and deadly dark eyes. Lake out of his comfort zone, and in the presence of a woman so alluring with energy so contagious, finds himself at the end of a bullet from the love gun. He quickly finds out that being with the woman of his choosing comes with baggage that he doesn’t mind carrying. But will Lake be able to break her from the curse that is his sworn enemy?

title: Stealing The Heart Of The Nanny
description:
Stox 

Love is an unfamiliar feeling for me. But after a beautiful nanny saved my life, I know that’s exactly what I feel for her. At no other time has another woman touched me this way. For this reason, I know for sure that I’ve never loved Taliyah on this level. I don’t know how to manage these new emotions for the nanny but they have me moving ruthless and reckless, even got me stepping outta character and crossing a line that I wouldn’t ever thought to cross. However, under no circumstance, have I ever needed a woman before but I definitely need this nanny in my life. She belongs in my world. In my bed. In my heart. And there are no laws that I’m not willing to break to keep her.

Nanny
: a person, in particular a woman, employed to look after a child in its own home.

Beautiful

Being a nanny is my passion and my purpose. Some people may look down on it but it’s my calling – it’s what I love to do. While dealing with the lowest point in my life, things took a sudden turn when a stranger, who was riddled with bullets, stumbled across my path while I’m squandering in a parking lot. After overhearing a follow-up execution plan, my quick thinking got this unknown man to safety and some life-saving help, officially making me his unrequested nanny. Once the mysterious being regained conscience and after learning his true identity, the notorious cartel boss, Stox Alexander, offers me an incredible opportunity that I can’t resist. But will it be the best or worst decision that I’ve ever made?

Beautiful’s big heart places her in a world that she’s not prepared for. And Stox’s cold heart began unthawing and beating new life after his near-death experience, courtesy of the nanny. But what happens when the professional lines are blurred and your heart becomes seized and compromised? In her riveting urban fiction story, national best-selling author Glitz brings you a new drama about love and its consequences. Check out Stox and Beautiful and find out if a nanny and a cartel boss can steal each other’s hearts.

title: Surrogate To An Unhinged Mafia Boss 3
description:
When the world falls apart, only the strongest love survives.

Grief has gutted the Black Flame Mafia, but love... love refuses to die quietly.

Bankston DeLuca is haunted by loss, fueled by rage, and clinging to the one woman who refuses to let him drown. Aurmoni is his anchor—his only source of light in a world gone dark. But even anchors can break when the current pulls too strong. As the walls close in, they’ll have to fight not just for survival, but for each other. Trust is fragile. And in Bankston’s world, love is a dangerous weakness.

Dante Reyes is torn between the blood ties that raised him and the woman who taught him how to feel again. Lena is everything he wants but nothing he’s allowed to keep—not with Giovanni unraveling and enemies closing in. As Giovanni descends further into madness, Dante and Lena are faced with a brutal stay loyal and be destroyed, or walk away and risk everything they've built together.

Old wounds reopen. New enemies rise.

And love—obsessive, consuming, and defiant—becomes the only weapon left.

In Surrogate to an Unhinged Mafia III, loyalty turns lethal, emotions run unchecked, and the line between protector and predator disappears. This is a world built on betrayal and blood, where passion alone won’t save you—you have to be willing to bleed for it.

If you’re a fan of African American romance, dark mafia love stories, and intense, emotionally charged plots laced with secrets, danger, and obsession, this final installment will leave you breathless. Not every couple survives the fire. But those who do? Come out forged in it.

title: A Virgin BBW and an Unhinged Hood Millionaire 5
description:
Kiersten never expected to fall in love with Sire, let alone be the one risking it all for his son. But when she and little Niko are kidnapped by the one woman Sire should’ve never underestimated, his past comes crashing into the present.

Locked in a dirty garage and forced to survive with nothing but wit and grit, Kiersten fights her way through trauma, betrayal, and pain. Meanwhile, Sire is out for blood. With Saint and III by his side, he tears through the city to bring his woman and son home. And when he does? Ain’t no going back. It’s forever.

Jream’s learning that love with Saint ain’t always soft, it’s raw, real, and wrapped in the kind of loyalty you don’t walk away from. While Saint handles business on the streets, she’s holding it down at Hair Haven, trying to keep her heart together through silence, danger, and death. But when it’s time to walk down that aisle? She does it like only a queen can.

III is stepping into the man he never thought he’d be, running the warehouse, standing on business, and falling harder every day for Mari, the woman carrying another man’s child but holding his whole heart. And Mari… She’s finally choosing peace, softness, and love that don’t hurt.

When it all comes full circle in Turks, with one wedding, one proposal, and one tear-filled reunion, the pain, the loyalty, and the ride-or-die love this crew has fought for finally gets its moment in the sun.

This ain’t just the end. It’s the beginning of everything they never thought they’d have.

title: A Hood Savage & A Good Girl 2: An African American Romance: Finale
description:
Welcome to Vine Grove, where love, loyalty, and secrets collide.

Gianni and Aura are on the brink of building something beautiful, but life in the hood has its own set of rules. When Gianni stumbles upon a secret that could tear their fragile bond apart, he’s left questioning whether the truth will save them or destroy everything they’ve worked for. Aura, now pregnant, feels the cracks in their relationship widening. She can’t ignore the doubts creeping in—especially when another man shows her the kind of attention Gianni’s been slipping on. With her heart on the line and her baby on the way, Aura must decide if holding on is worth the pain or if it’s time to let go.

Spencer is drowning in grief over his sister’s death, but instead of finding comfort in Styx, he watches their connection unravel. The weight of his baby mama’s drama and unrelenting demands push him to the edge, forcing him to question the life he’s built and the love he thought he had. Watching from the sidelines, Kionna sees Spencer’s pain as her chance to win back the family she’s always dreamed of. But some cracks run too deep to repair, and love doesn’t always wait for second chances.

In a world of relentless exes, baby mama drama, and family secrets that refuse to stay buried, loyalty will be tested and love will be put on trial. Can these couples survive the chaos, or will the weight of their pasts pull them under?

In this explosive finale to "A Hood Savage & A Good Girl 2", emotions run high, enemies hit harder, and hearts will be broken before the truth comes to light.

If you're a fan of African American romance, hood love, baby mama drama, second chance love stories, good girls and Alpha bad boys, then you’ll fall in love with A Hood Savage and a Good Girl.

title: Saved By A Mafia Boss 2
description:
From the author that brought you the unputdownable series: A Hood Virgin & A Rich Thug, Plan B Drama & Baby Mama's, and A Hood Savage & A Good Girl, comes the highly anticipated continuation of the Croix family saga.

Kyla Warren never believed in fairytales, but marrying Romare "Ruger" Croix was supposed to be a sacrifice of love—love for her family, if not for him. Their wedding day should have been the beginning of something unbreakable, but when disaster strikes, the very foundation of their union is shattered before the ink on their marriage license dries. As raw emotions collide and unspoken desires surface, Kyla and Ruger face a heart-wrenching choice: will they surrender to the chaos threatening to tear them apart, or will they stand defiant together and prove that what burns between them runs far deeper than mere obligation?

Meanwhile, Mocha and Poet find themselves trapped in an emotional deadlock. Both are prisoners of their own devastating pride, each too wounded to yield to the crushing weight of past betrayals and present consequences. But when the devastating truth about Envi finally erupts into the open, Poet is forced to confront a soul-searing reality he's desperately tried to deny. The question haunting their every breath becomes will he find the strength to forgive the unforgivable, or will Mocha lose him forever before their love ever has a chance to truly breathe?

On the other side of the family, Rook and Quest struggle beneath the weight of establishing a stable co-parenting dynamic, but deep-rooted trust issues continue to carve an ever-widening chasm between them. When a sudden, life-threatening danger puts them both in the crosshairs, Rook's world tilts on its axis as he begins to question everything he thought he knew—including the unsettling possibility that perhaps he's the one who should be doubting Quest instead of the other way around.

With calculating exes lurking in the shadows, waiting for the perfect moment to reclaim what they believe is rightfully theirs, and hidden enemies methodically closing in from all sides, the Croix family stands besieged by forces determined to exploit their every vulnerability. In this treacherous world where loyalty is everything and betrayal waits behind the most intimate smiles, will the bonds of family prove strong enough to hold their line—or will their enemies finally succeed in tearing apart the empire the Croix have sacrificed everything to build?

SAVED BY A MAFIA BOSS 2 – When love and loyalty collide with danger, who will survive?

title: Bloodline (Tin Star K9 #5)
description:
A US Marshal K9 Thriller

When her personal life spins out of control, Deputy US Marshal Caitlyn Reed is quick to volunteer for a case hunting a murderous fugitive in another state, far from home. She and Renegade escape the tangle of relational issues and jump into a forthright battle against crime.

Sheriff Colt Branson must grapple with the shock of family turmoil and an absent fiancée. While dealing with emotional upheaval in his world, Colt continues his search for the murderer of a local father and son that took place in Moose Creek months ago. His investigation uncovers the killer’s connection to a New York crime syndicate.

When Caitlyn suddenly falls off the radar, Colt risks everything to find her. He has nothing to go on besides Renegade and Caitlyn’s abandoned truck. Colt joins forces with the Reed brothers and a team of US Marshals led by Caitlyn’s mentor, Dirk Sterling. Together, their unit has the combined skill and manpower, but will they get to her in time?

Join the Posse!

title: Captivated by Danger (The Danger Family, #2)
description:
Diesel Danger is a man who is described as having a ‘god complex’ by those close to him.
He’s used to getting what he wants from women, when and how he wants it, with no pushback— until he runs into Greysen McCree.

title: Scent of Death (Scent #2)
description:
The disappearance of Camden County’s richest couple pulls Haley Richardson and her fiancé, Sheriff Dane Campbell, into a web of deceit, darkness, and death.

A childhood accident gave Haley a canine’s superior ability to detect scents, including people’s emotions. With the help of Jax, her faithful search-and-rescue dog, Haley inserts herself into the lives of the missing couple’s adult children, only to find a family with a twisted history and a lot of enemies. When another member of the family disappears, Dane and Haley weigh a disturbing possibility: Has a long-forgotten incident come back to haunt the family?

When the truth is uncovered, Haley and Jax race to save a life. Will Haley’s superior sense of scents help her to rescue someone she cares about? Or is she tracking the scent of death?

title: The Letter (Easton Island Family Saga Series, #2)
description:
Easton Island is the continuing saga of one woman’s journey from incredible loss to finding a past she knew nothing about, including a family who both embraces and fears her and a charming island that draws her in. This inspirational series is for lovers of family sagas, mystery, and a touch of romance.

Shortly after returning home from her whirlwind trip to Easton Island, Morgan receives a phone call from her mother’s best friend, letting her know that she’ll be moving out of Looking Glass Cottage and hints there is trouble brewing at Easton Estate.

Ronni warns Morgan that she might want to head back sooner rather than later. Anxious to find out what’s going on, she rushes back to the island.

When she arrives, she’s greeted with chaos after a family guest brings unwelcome change to Easton Estates and Morgan quickly makes tackling the problem a top priority.

As the events unfold, more of the family’s secrets are revealed, including who resides in the secret wing of the estate, and Morgan finally reads her mother’s letter.

After reading the letter, will Morgan embrace the island and her newfound family, or will she flee like her mother did so many years ago?

Find out when you grab your copy of Easton Island - The Letter today !

title: Live Like You Were Scrying (Hannah Hickok, #12)
description:
The weather in Casper Creek has yet to turn and Hannah Hickok is determined to take advantage of her downtime to engage in a bit of romance with her fianc� Cooper Wyatt. Unfortunately for her, the world has other plans.
An eerie howl draws Hannah and Cooper to Main Street during a snowstorm, and what they find confuses them. There's some sort of monster stalking the downtown area, and a woman has appeared out of nowhere in the creature's wake only to collapse in front of them.
Before Hannah can call for help, the woman disappears, leaving a mystery and a monster hunt on the menu.
Casper Creek's history is long and storied. This time, however, the trouble can be traced back to Hannah's own family. It seems the woman who disappeared has ties to her grandmother...and Abigail doesn't want to share the details with anybody, including her own family.
Frustrated, Hannah keeps digging, but what she finds is a mystery for the ages. It seems the stories she always heard, the ones about her late grandfather being a saint, might've been more fiction than reality. The truth of his past is about to collide with Hannah's future.
And nobody will ever be the same again.

title: Bewitched and Bothered (Moonstone Bay, #12)
description:
Hadley Hunter is taking some downtime with her fiancé Galen Blackwood. All she wants to do is bask in their happiness and pretend nothing bad could possibly happen.
This is Moonstone Bay, however. That’s simply not reality.
When Galen gets a call that an old-timer on the island is holding a gun on the guests at a local bar, Hadley accompanies him to the scene…and watches as the unthinkable happens. The man’s death is strange enough, but when news starts to spread that their victim had been carrying on with a woman who was young enough to be his granddaughter, things take an even odder turn.
It seems there’s an unknown power on the island, and this individual is casting the sort of love spells that force unusual couples to start burning—literally—for one another.
Not only are Hadley and Galen hot on the trail of an outside player, but they’re also targets.
Hadley has learned a lot since finding out she’s a witch. This lesson, however, might be too hot to handle.
The union of earth, air, fire, and water has become symbolic on Moonstone Bay. This time the union will lead to a whole new adventure.
Nothing will ever be the same again.

title: The Book of Romans - Holy Bible
Ranger Loyalty (Texas Ranger Heroes #8)
description:
No way to escape…

After the death of her fiancé, Olivia Leighton takes solace in her work as a wedding planner—until she receives threatening messages. Hiding out isn’t an option if she wants to keep her business afloat. But when she’s attacked and almost kidnapped during a reception, it becomes frighteningly clear the lengths her stalker will go to. 

Texas Ranger Cole Donnelly is horrified by the assault on Olivia. In order to keep her safe, he agrees to go undercover as her assistant. But being close to the stunning woman, and witnessing firsthand her kindness and fortitude, leaves him questioning the reasons he’s locked away his heart. 

With each bridal gown fitting and cake tasting, the peril mounts as Olivia's stalker grows bolder. Cole will do anything to protect her, but their forced proximity creates its own complication as he and Olivia grow closer. Can he capture her stalker before it’s too late? Or will the next event Cole plans be Olivia’s funeral?

title: Emi's Hero (Brotherhood Protectors Hawaii Book 6)
description:
Former Marine Force Recon operator George Ingram and Emi Sands story

From New York Times and USA Today Bestselling Author Elle James

Welcome back to Brotherhood Protectors Hawaii!

Fighting men and women, chosen for their skills, recommended by their peers and trained to protect, guard, extract and rescue. These agents are the elite, strong and determined, perfect for their assignments. Former military, special operations, use their combat and intelligence skills to assist those in need. Brotherhood Protectors, the brainchild of Hank Patterson, has established an operational base in the tropical islands of Hawaii, where trouble can lurk, even in paradise.

title: Flowering Inferno (The Bloomin' Psychic, #8)
description:
Did someone manifest murder or was it simply a tragic glamping accident?

Spring has arrived in the charming riverside town of Newberry, along with the thorn in Mia’s side—her formidable mother is in town to attend a manifestation retreat at a nearby glamping site. Mia reluctantly agrees to join her for mother-daughter bonding time and immediately regrets her decision when one of the retreat members is found dead.

Mia wants to help solve the case, if only to protect the women in attendance from the smooth stylings of Detective Derek Fairfax, but she’s also concerned about her mother’s reaction to Mia’s blossoming abilities. Madeline Albrecht is the one person capable of snapping the twigs of Mia’s personal progress.

As the investigation gains ground and tensions rise, it becomes clear to Mia that if they don’t crack the case soon, the victim won’t be the only one pushing up daisies.

Flowering Inferno is the eighth and final book in The Bloomin’ Psychic series.

title: All Wrong (Callaghan Brothers, Book 12)
description:
How can two people who are all wrong for each other be so right?

Corinne McCain has always had a thing for bad boys. The problem is, most of them are well, bad. Nick is different. Sure, he’s dark, mysterious, and totally rocking the bad boy vibe, but beneath his rebellious exterior lies a heart of gold.

She knows, because she’s been paying attention. Unlike him, who barely seems to know she exists.

Until she’s unwittingly drawn into a drug trafficking operation targeting teens at the Zone, that is.

Nick Milligan is no choir boy. Despite his efforts to leave his past behind, there are some things that can never be forgotten, forgiven, or undone. He’s made his peace with it. Mostly.

Deep down, he longs for a woman with a good heart and a wild soul. One who’ll accept him and his dark past and wants to share his future. But in his jaded soul, he knows there is no such woman for him.

In the course of identifying and eliminating the newest threat against his kids, however, he discovers he’s been wrong about a lot of things—including the fact that what he’s been looking for has been right in front of him all along.

Now, he can only hope he’s not too late …

title: Corralling the Cowboy
description:
From Writing Thrillers to Roping Steers, Love Changes the Plot

In the quaint town of Redemption Ridge, Bethany Shepherd has found solace in her beloved bookstore, Bethany's Book Barn, and in the quiet life she shares with her son. But the peace she's painstakingly built is shattered when renowned thriller author Ethan Thorn arrives back in town, hoping to master cowboy life for his next bestseller.

Ethan, who once captivated Bethany during a book signing at her store, is now trading in his pen for a lasso at Redemption Ranch. His clumsy yet endearing attempts at cowboy life bring a spark of humor to Bethany's otherwise guarded existence. Despite the walls she's built around her heart, Ethan's genuine charm and determination to write an authentic cowboy story begin to break through.

However, Bethany's past holds a dark secret. Living under witness protection, she’s constantly looking over her shoulder. Just as she begins to trust Ethan and dream of a future where love is possible, her hidden identity is threatened.
With their lives now entangled, Ethan and Bethany navigate a treacherous path filled with unexpected challenges, where love and courage become their strongest allies. As danger looms and their bond deepens, Ethan’s unwavering support might be the key to Bethany's safety and their future together.

Corralling the Cowboy is a heartwarming and thrilling tale of love, humor, and resilience. Join Bethany and Ethan as they discover that sometimes, the greatest adventures come when you least expect them.

Return to Redemption Ridge, Colorado and enjoy the faith, friendships, and forever-afters in this Christian Christmas Romance. Corralling the Cowboy is book 8 in the Christmas in Redemption Ridge series, but each of the books can be read on their own.

title: Some Cowboys Come Home for Christmas (Keagans of Copper Creek Book 9)
description:
She’s a single mom just trying to make it through Christmas. He’s a cowboy with a past he can’t outrun. Can the holiday season bring redemption and love to Copper Creek?

Bailey Nichols is struggling to keep it together. After her husband’s gambling addiction left her with a pile of debt, she’s been working non-stop to provide for her daughter, Anya. With Christmas approaching, Bailey is out of options and out of hope, unable to give Anya the holiday she deserves.

Carter Keagan recently returned to Copper Creek with more baggage than he knows how to carry. Trying to pay off debts from his bad boy days, he’s caught between the guilt of stealing from his family and the pull he feels toward Bailey. She and her daughter stir something in him, a desire to be a better man.

As sparks fly between them, Bailey and Carter must face their pasts and the future they want. Will the magic of Christmas help them find forgiveness and love, or will Carter’s secrets destroy their chance at happiness?

Author’s 

Some Cowboys Come Home for Christmas is a contemporary western romance set in Natalie Dean’s sweet romance world of Copper Creek. While this heartwarming Christmas love story can be enjoyed as a standalone, it’s also part of the beloved Keagans of Copper Creek series—a series that has earned multiple Kindle All-Star bonuses for its reader-favorite stories.

If you fall in love with Bailey and Carter’s journey, there are plenty more Keagan family romances to enjoy—each filled with heart, hope, and unforgettable love stories. Dive into the charm of Copper Creek and discover why readers can’t get enough of these swoon-worthy cowboys!

title: From Were to Eternity (A Witch on the Rocks Cozy Mystery Book 10)
description:
St. Pete Beach is getting weird. Between warlocks, shark shifters, and wolf packs going to war, Hali Waverly and Gray Hunter have their hands full. Things get even worse when shifters with ties to Gray’s pack start attacking people on the beach. What’s even weirder is that when the duo step in during a frothing melee, the shifters drop dead before they can be questioned.
How is that even happening?
Hali has her suspicions, and they revolve around Marmaduke Epson, the warlock who escaped punishment only weeks before. She’s convinced he’s close…and plotting against them. Finding him is easier said than done, however.
Hali is determined to track down Marmaduke and cut him off at the knees before he can cause more trouble. Unfortunately for her, the closer she gets, the weirder the mystery becomes. It seems Marmaduke isn’t the only powerful enemy in the area. And this new enemy means business.
Hali’s frustration with shifter politics is about to spill over. Marmaduke’s ties to Gray’s pack mean trouble for everybody involved.
It seems death is coming to St. Pete Beach. Just who will survive the ultimate fight, and what will the collateral damage look like?

title: Some Cowboys Brave the Flames (Keagans of Copper Creek Book 10)
description:
She’s his best friend’s little sister, all grown up. He’s the firefighter who stole her first kiss—and her heart.

Charlie Keagan has always been the one to stand on her own, but facing her old insecurities isn’t easy—especially when it comes to Mason “Ash” Ashton, the rugged smokejumper who disappeared from her life after a single, unforgettable kiss. Ash was her brother’s best friend, the one guy she could never have… but also the only one she ever wanted.

Now, years later, Ash is back in town, filling her thoughts with memories she’d tried so hard to bury. He’s still just as protective, and that fire in his eyes still sparks whenever they’re together. But with the danger of his job—and her brothers watching their every move—Ash knows better than to get involved with the Keagan family’s youngest.

But staying away from Charlie isn’t as easy as it sounds. Because some flames refuse to be extinguished, no matter how hard he tries.

Don’t miss the smoldering romance between Charlie and Ash in Some Cowboys Brave the Flames!

title: Magic & Mistletoe (Starry Hollow Witches, #18)
description:
Welcome to Starry Hollow, where spells were made to be broken.

It's Christmastime in Starry Hollow and Ember is not full of good cheer. Instead of indulging in spiked eggnog by a cozy fire, our favorite descendant of the One True Witch is busy helping Aunt Hyacinth contend with three persistent ghosts just like dear Scrooge, along with another, more threatening ghost from the past.

Can Ember save Christmas or will it all go to hell in a one-horse open sleigh?

Magic & Mistletoe is the 18th book in the Starry Hollow Witches series.

title: Marrying a Cowboy (Callahans of Copper Creek #8)
description:
Hello readers!

Next up in the Callahans of Copper Creek is Zeke Callahans love story! I’m hoping this is a surprise to some of you, as I’m thinking many people thought Brielle’s story would be the last one.

But surprise! I’ve done this with my last two series and turns out I really enjoy getting the love story of the single or widowed parent to you.

Zeke Callahan has had his hands full raising six daughters on his own. He’s a cowboy through and through and is possibly one of the most intimidating cowboys in Copper Creek.

But it’s time to start seeing his softer side. AND… to see him get his very own later in life love story.

A better description is coming soon! I can't wait to get you your final Callahan book.

title: Luke (Coral Canyon Cowboys #8)
description:
He swore off women when his ex told him he might not be their daughter's father. But a paternity test confirmed he is, and Luke Young has dedicated his life to Corrine and his brothers' band. There hasn't been time for a girlfriend anyway. He's tried here and there, and the women in small-town Coral Canyon are certainly interested in him.

But he's been thinking about his massage therapist for a while now...

Sterling Boyd struck out on her own last year, right when Luke asks her to go on tour with him. So she says no, and they begin a delicate dance around their feelings for one another. She's desperate to prove to the haters at her former spa that she's capable, that she's worthy, that she's visible.

The problem is, no one has ever seen her before.

Until Luke. He can't get her out of his head, and when she shows up at the Young Family New Year's Eve party, the whole night takes a turn for the better. And when his parents play their silly kissing song, Sterling is the blonde bombshell right in front of him.

She's panicking, because she's just told Luke's nephew that they're dating, so he won't set Luke up with a friend of his. And when that song plays...Sterling tips up and kisses Luke right on the mouth.

Now that real feelings are out, the sparks between Luke and Sterling are hotter than ever. Will Luke's status as a single dad and local celebrity put too much strain on their new relationship? Or will they find that taking a risk on each other is worth it to find belonging and true love?

Meet the next Young brother and continue the family saga in this clean, Christian, single dad cowboy romance by USA Today and Top 10 Kindle All-Star author Liz Isaacson!

title: Fastlander Phoenix (Fastlanders, #5)
description:
Wreck Itall is haunted by his past, and by his destiny in the mountains he has decided to call home. His mentor has been waiting to see which side he will choose—good, or evil—but Wreck himself doesn't know that answer quite yet. He is the newest member of the Fastlander Crew, but they are very different from him. It is safest for everyone if he remains an outsider. If the Crew knew how dangerous he really is, they wouldn’t have ever let him pledge.
No one can stop him.
No one can tame the monster inside of him.
No one can break down his carefully-constructed walls…until he meets Timber.
The quirky beauty has a dark destiny of her own, and awakens something inside of him that can never be released onto the world. Wreck knows it is safer to stay away from her because she is human, and has no idea what destruction is coming for Wreck and his Crew. It's not fair to put a human in the middle of the war that has been building for so long, but he can't seem to leave her alone. All he knows is that she brings out a side of him that could be the end of the world, and will absolutely be the end of Wreck. She dredges up the monster.

Timber Harris has a decision to make that she wouldn’t wish on anyone. She’s in search of a sign. After a chance meeting with an unlikely hero, she is feeling the winds of positive change finally shift in her direction. Wreck is abrasive and closed-off. He’s a shifter, and she’s never been exposed to shifters before. To the outside world, he is uncaring and cold and dangerous, but with her, in moments of vulnerability, she can see the man he could be. He’s dominant and fiercely protective, but she can drag a smile from him, and that feels important. She can see him slowly growing a heart.
Timber is falling fast, but the closer she feels to him, the more distance he tries to create. A therapist by day, Timber knows exactly what to do to break down those walls. The more she learns about him, the more she realizes humans really don’t know anything about the chaos that is happening in the shifter world.

War has come to Damon’s Mountains. Wreck is the biggest weapon they have, if only he can control his fire.
His destiny was always to become the biggest villain Damon’s Mountains has ever known.
Timber’s destiny is to stop him.

Expect the unexpected in this epic finale in T. S. Joyce’s monster-hit Fastlander series, where action-adventure and colossal world-building meet love stories that will tug at your heart for years to come.

****Content Explicit spicy love scenes, naughty language, and piles of sexy shifter secrets. Shifter animal battles and wars for territory lines show up in most of these books, which includes action adventure and violence. Intended for mature audiences.

title: Just a Cowboy's Love Song (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota #10)
description:
After losing his country music superstar sister in a plane crash, Jones Dunn brings his niece to Sweet Water so they could stay where no one will recognize or bother them. He doesn't intend to stay in town long, but a marriage proposal from an unlikely source makes him think that maybe his plans should change.

Mallie Woods couldn't be more embarrassed when her daughter proposes marriage to the handsome stranger she'd been singing with in the evening on their back porches. She's never even seen his face! But their shared history makes him seem less like a stranger and more like a friend.

Then, an unexpected offer forces them to make a decision neither of them were ready for. Could the cowboy's love song become family harmony?

title: Jem (Coral Canyon Cowboys #7)
description:
He's hung up his championship rodeo belts in favor of being a father to his two children. She's his high school sweetheart...and the woman he stood up last summer. Can Jem make amends in order to have a second chance with Sunny?

Jem Young is still healing from his vices, but he's determined to dedicate everything he has to his two kids. He's ready to move forward on his own, and he's got the house and responsibilities to prove it.

But yes, he's still lonely, and one morning, he texts his only single brother with a dating They each need a date before the family luncheon in a few days.

Jem knows who he wants to ask—the same woman he asked out last Sunny Samuelson. He dated her in high school too, and now that she's moved back to small-town Coral Canyon, he can't think about anyone else.

Too bad he went on tour and forgot to cancel with her. He had a lot going on at the time, in his defense, but she hasn't spoken to him since.

But when Sunny's father is the one who opens the door at the pancake house and causes Jem to fall and break his wrist, the nurse inside her roars to life. Her feelings for the hot rodeo cowboy haven't changed; they've just been dormant.

But now that he's back in her life, Sunny's not sure how long she can resist him. He's always been charming and charismatic, and she's definitely ready for some excitement in her life.

Can Sunny somehow rope this cowboy's heart? Or will his large family and their needs leave her standing out in the cold? 

Meet the next Young brother and continue the family saga in this clean, Christian cowboy romance by USA Today and Top 10 Kindle All-Star author Liz Isaacson!

title: Just a Cowboy's Happy Ever After  (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota)
description:
In the picturesque town of Sweet Water, two souls are intertwined in a bittersweet tale of missed chances and unfulfilled desires.

Lark Stryker, a compassionate veterinarian with a heart full of hope, can't forget the man who broke her teenage heart. She has built a fulfilling life centered around caring for others. But beneath her selfless exterior lies a lingering longing for the man who shattered her heart years ago. As she tends to her animal patients and nurtures the teenage girls in her shelter, Lark wonders if God has a greater love in store for her. W

ith each heartfelt prayer, she yearns for a lifetime companion. Will fate finally grant her the happiness she craves, or is she destined to rely solely on the Lord for solace?

Meanwhile, Jeb Malone, a man of unwavering integrity, carries the weight of his past decisions, trapped in a loveless marriage. He made a promise, then he made a vow. Being a man of his word caused him to sacrifice the one thing he loved. A man's integrity is a cold bedfellow. Will he ever have the desire of his heart?

As their paths converge once again, will fate give them a second chance at love or forever keep them apart?

title: Just a Cowboy's Fairy Tale (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota #9)
description:
Former firefighter Hines Cannon saved a life. But in the process, he lost his own. Hines Cannon, a recluse haunted by the scars of his heroic sacrifice, never expected to find love in the rural North Dakota town of Sweet Water.

But when a freak accident leaves him helpless, Eliza Walton, the woman he once saved, becomes his lifeline. As they spend time together, secrets unravel and barriers crumble.

Will the scars that bind them ultimately lead to a love that transcends physical appearances and ignites the flame of true belonging?

title: Cowboy Marrying the Lady (Coming Home to North Dakota, #12)
description:
Tadgh O’Reilly followed the racehorse he fell in love with across the ocean and to the barren fields of North Dakota.

Content to live with his young daughter in his small, caretaker’s cottage as long as he gets to see his beloved Thoroughbred every day, he never dreams that his life is missing something very important.

Ashley Christensen can’t believe she ran off the road and got stuck in a snow drift. But that’s just as well. After all, the heiress was running from a life she just couldn’t stand anymore. When a kindly Irishman takes her in for the duration of the storm, she pretends to have amnesia, just so she doesn’t have to answer any difficult questions.

Happy living with Tadgh, Ashley doesn’t want to leave, but when her past comes out, will she lose the only thing that’s ever been real to her?

Books in the Coming Home to North Dakota Series:

Cowboy Walking Away
Cowboy Coming Home
Cowboy Stealing My Heart
Cowboy Finding Love
Cowboy Dreaming Alone
Cowboy Rescuing Me
Cowboy Dancing All Night
Cowboy Falling Hard
Cowboy Looking at Me
Cowboy Wanting Everything
Cowboy Whispering My Name
Cowboy Marrying the Lady

title: Just a Cowboy's Lifetime Love (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota #11)
description:
After losing her husband in the line of duty, Annie last name moves in with her mother in Sweet Water, North Dakota with her two small children to try to put the pieces of her life back together.

Hired to book clients for the Dude ranch her husband's best friends started, Annie is completely uninterested in any type of relationship. In fact, she's finding it hard to get out of bed in the morning, let alone care what she looks like. She's heading toward depression and is holding it together - barely - for the sake of her kids.

Zeke hates seeing the pretty, young widow of one of his Air Force buddies struggling so hard, but he doesn't know what to do about it. Until the matchmakers of Sweet Water come up with a plan.

Will a roadtrip with two small children to house sit a cabin in the woods be what Annie needs? Or will they end up with more than they bargained for?

title: Warlander Silverback (Warlanders, #1)
description:
Lucas Slater is coming home.

His boss is the dragon who has been keeping shifters both in check and protected since they were forced to come out into the light all those years ago. Humans have granted shifters the freedom to police their own—Damon Daye is the judge, and Lucas Slater is his personal hand of justice. Born in the very mountains he has gone out into the world to protect, Lucas hasn’t been home in years. He is a different beast now than when he left these mountains as an adolescent gorilla shifter. Now he is a fully-mature, dominant silverback gorilla with years of fight training and no family group to anchor him down. Years ago something happened that catapulted him out into the world to find himself. Now that he is returning to Damon’s Mountains, everything he imagined is coming true. These mountains tug at his animal and press him to put down roots that could be the end of him. He is here to do a job, but when he saunters into a familiar trailer park and finds out the name of his next target, everything gets turned upside down. And even more unsettling? A ghost from his past has been brought in to test him, but for the life of him, he can’t tell if the gorgeous falcon shifter has been sent to trap him…or to free him.

Jenna Brown is just doing what she’s been asked.

She is living happily in Damon’s Mountains…but there is something missing, and her falcon is acting out. When she becomes part of an elaborate plan to draw one of the sons of the mountains back into her territory, the outcome feels important for reasons she can’t explain. She has a history with Lucas Slater, but he has no idea how big it is. He is different now in ways that are calling to her body. Massive, dominant alpha male with a big destiny ahead of him, and she has never laid eyes on a man sexier than him. The problem? Her animal is tethering a bond to him, and everyone knows Lucas Slater is a leaver whose animal attaches to no one. She is setting herself up for a big hurt, and messing up important parts of Damon Daye’s plans as their destinies begin to unravel.

They are both a part of something that is so much bigger than themselves—but every wise shifter knows that if you love something, you must be able to set it free.

A new Crew is forming in Damon’s Mountains. Readers have asked for the return “home” for years, and T.S. Joyce has listened in this first epic, full-length homecoming. Read on for new alliances, revelations, tested loyalties, old friends, Crew bonds, flaws that feel like perfection, turmoil that turns to soul-deep devotion, epic shifter battles, and an ever-evolving rebuild of something that was broken, but now will become the future of the mountains.

There’s a new Crew in town.
The Warlanders are going to take us home.

**************
Content Warning: Explicit love scenes, naughty language, and piles of sexy shifter secrets. Shifter animal battles show up in most of these books. Intended for mature audiences.

title: Cold Foot King (Wreck's Mountains, #1)
description:
Kingston Chase is buried underground in a shifter prison called Cold Foot.

Little does he know, an unexpected ally is breaking into the prison to set some of the inmates free, including the woman who has consumed his mind since the day she was brought down to his cell and introduced into the secret program he is a part of. If the humans knew what was really going on in this shifter prison, it would be all over the news, and Damon Daye seems to want just that. 

Every shifter knows Damon is not the dragon to mess with, but if King plays nice for a little while, he can secure a free ticket into one of the most coveted Crews in the world. Too bad he doesn’t work well with others. Katrina could though, and he would give his ticket to her in a heartbeat if it meant she would forgive him for what happened between them. 

King has been living a solitary life for years now, and being thrown into a team is jarring to the massive silverback gorilla that dwells inside of him. If he can stay out of Cold Foot, he could tie up all the loose ends from his previous life, but inside the walls of that prison, there is something he cannot live without.

Katrina is trapped in the consequences of her decisions.

She was brought to Cold Foot Prison after she helped her lion Pride attack Damon’s Mountains, and now her life is at a dead-end. She has so many regrets, and apologies to make, but she can’t do any of that from the cold walls of this place. When the first dragon roar rattles the walls of her cell, she knows something big is happening. What she doesn’t realize is that she is about to be pulled from her dark destiny, and thrust into a second chance she never expected. She has an old friend on the outside pulling some serious strings to get her a shot at making it into a Crew that others would die to be a part of, but her emotions are swinging high and wide as she struggles to adjust to life outside of the walls of Cold Foot. The one steadying factor? A silverback gorilla shifter she met one horrible day inside, who seems determined to protect her for reasons she doesn’t understand. King is huge, and dominant, and a fighter, but he’s pushing her toward the people she went to war with in Damon’s Mountains, and she can’t figure out his motive. For the life of her, she can’t figure out whether he is friend or foe. All she knows is that he is important to her, and to her animal, and he gives her hope. For a shifter like her, hope is terrifying.

Don’t miss the thrilling first book of T. S. Joyce’s brand-new Wreck’s Mountains series, where redemption is never out of reach. New Crew, new Mountains, new territory lines to defend, new shifters, new love, and new friends…you won’t want to miss where this exciting series is headed.

****Content Explicit spicy love scenes, naughty language, and piles of sexy shifter secrets. Shifter animal battles and wars for territory lines show up in most of these books, which includes action adventure and violence. Intended for mature audiences.

title: Catching a Cowgirl (Callahans of Copper Creek #6)
description:
She’s a cowgirl in danger. He’s a billionaire with a secret. How far will he go to protect her?

Eloise Callahan is feeling left behind. As her sisters get married off one by one and leave the family ranch, she’s wondering when it will be her turn. But then her luck seems to change. The handsome stranded motorist she rescued is showing interest in her.

Her older sister Brielle warns her to be careful, but what could happen in a small town like Copper Creek?

Shane Owens has a billion-dollar problem. His lying, stealing cousins show up in town, and they want more money from him. But this time, he’s putting his foot down and saying no.

After Shane’s greedy cousin takes Eloise out on a date, Shane hires her and pretends to be interested in her to keep her away from him. But they’ll have to keep their relationship a secret. He’s her boss and used to date Eloise’s sister, plus he doesn’t want his cousins to find out. It’s a foolproof plan, or so he thinks.

He didn’t plan on falling in love. Will they both end up broken hearted when Shane has to break things off in order to protect her?

title: Gabriel (Coral Canyon Cowboys #6)
description: He's a father's rights advocate lawyer with a sweet little girl. She's fighting for her own daughter. Can Gabe and Hilde find happily-ever-after when they're at such odds with one another?Gabe Young is splitting his time between Jackson Hole and Coral Canyon, where he's opened up a second branch of his family law firm. He's always been resistant to coming home, though all of his brothers now live in the small town where they all grew up.He likes the hour-long buffer, to be honest. But only between him and his big, loud family.Not between him and Hilde O'Dell. He's passed her ex's case to his partner and asked her out a few times now, but they've never been able to get their schedules to align. Then, one day, they do.Hilde is charmed by the tall, dark, single dad who knows how to be both a mother and a father. She's doing her best running her popular furniture store and raising her fourteen-year-old daughter alone. Always alone. And she's so tired of being alone.But Gabe is 12 years younger than her, and she's just not sure she's ready for an age gap quite so big...He is charming and sparks are flying, so she sets the bar for their first kiss really high, expecting him to fail spectacularly.But when he passes with flying colors - that is seriously the best kiss of her life - Hilde has to face She's falling for the cowboy lawyer, even when there's so much more than just her heart at risk. Can Hilde and Gabe figure out the distance between them and overcome it to find a happily-ever-after together?Meet the next Young brother and continue the family saga in this clean, Christian cowboy romance by USA Today Bestselling and Top 10 Kindle All-Star Author Liz Isaacson!

title: Just a Cowboy's Shotgun Wedding (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota)
description:
After her husband died, leaving her with six kids to raise on her own, Piper Hughes struggles to hold everything together on a hairdresser's small wage. She has no hope of expanding her two bedroom ranch house and doesn't want to rely on the charity of the town, either. She definitely doesn't want some strange man coming in, being too kind, stealing her kids' hearts and turning her world upside down. He'll be leaving when he's done. After all, what man would want a woman with six kids?

Former airman, Gideon Marsh, would've had the single mother's addition done last spring, but he'd broken his leg and couldn't work. But a building project is just what he needs to fill the long, cold, North Dakota winter days. Snow days with the kids will be especially fun.

Except he doesn't know these kids have more in mind for him than being a general contractor. As he's looking into the serious gaze of Piper's oldest son, something in him just can't call the kid's bluff.

So he ends up married.

Shocked at first, he decides it might not be such a bad thing. After all, he's never met a woman who intrigues him quite like Piper. Can he convince her to allow him to be her husband for real?

Reviews for Just a Cowboy's Shotgun Wedding

★★★★★ "Gideon's and Piper's story is so sweet! And there is a shotgun wedding, but it's not what you probably think. This is a really fun story." - Leis

★★★★★ 
"I have loved all the books in this series but this is by far my favorite!" - Demi

★★★★★ "This one really delivers. Definitely recommend." - Sharon

★★★★★ 
"I absolutely LOVED this book! How can a broken foot, a huge family crowded into a two-bedroom house and a mega snowstorm be the fixin's for a sweet romance?
Only in Jessie Gussman's imagination!
I think you'll love it, too!" - PNG Lynn

★★★★★ "WOW! MY FAVORITE IN THIS SERIES! I love all the books by Jessie Gussman but this one! I don't want to ramble about how I loved I wouldn't change a line in it! I read it in a few days (and I have very full days!!). Thank you Jessie Gussman for this book!" - Soleil

Books in the Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota 
Just a Cowboy's Convenient MarriageJust a Cowboy's Best FriendJust a Cowboy's EnemyJust a Cowboy's Midnight BrideJust a Cowboy's Love StoryJust a Cowboy's Secret BabyJust a Cowboy's Shotgun WeddingJust a Cowboy's PrincessJust a Cowboy's Fairy TaleJust a Cowboy's Love Song

title: Just a Cowboy's Love Story  (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota #5)
description:
Merrit and Sorrel Hines have been trying to find a husband for their mom because they want a dad. Their mom says to be patient, but at the rate she's going - always more concerned with what is happening at her diner than in looking for a husband - they'll be grown and out of the house until she gets around to finding someone.

So, they take matters into their own hands. If their mom is so into food, they'll concoct a dish that will make the first man who tastes it ask her to marry him.

Except it doesn't work.

Elias Stone intended to make a career out of the Air Force. But a secret that he was sworn not to tell caused him to be dishonorably discharged. Reeling from the unexpected turn, and betrayed by the one person he'd always thought would stand by him, he follows his crew to Sweet Briar Ranch in Sweet Water, North Dakota, where two cute little girls mark him as the man who needs to marry their mom. Unfortunately, marrying is the farthest thing from his mind.

Jane Hines knows her daughters are up to no good. She was married once, and has no desire to walk the aisle again. But a handsome stranger, a rumor of a love potion and a chicken recipe that could put her little restaurant on the map just might change her mind.

Can a bite of chicken, a little nudge by the town and a lot of trust create a family?

title: Just a Cowboy's Midnight Bride (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota #4)
description:
A woman who beat cancer, but longs for a family.

A man who can't shake his youthful reputation of instability.

A desperate midnight marriage.

Mav Stryker can't seem to convince the town of Sweet Water that he's not the kid he used to be. Of course, taking a gamble on high dollar cattle that didn't pay off, isn't helping anything. Especially when it causes him to face foreclosure.

Except, there is an inheritance, but he needs to act...by midnight.

Cassie Hoover has secretly been in love with Mav Stryker forever. He's never noticed her, of course. No man has. After all, she's "the girl with cancer." Except her cancer is in remission and she's more than ready for a family of her own.

If she marries Mav to help him get his inheritance, will he learn to love her in return? Or will it be the biggest mistake she ever made?

title: Just a Cowboy's Secret Baby  (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota #6)
description:
Jonah Mills is content keeping a low profile on the Sweet Briar Ranch, drumming up business for their crop-dusting service and learning how to be a rancher after years in the Air Force. His marriage was a mistake he doesn't intend to repeat.

Darby Woods comes to Sweet Water with Amber, her adopted daughter, looking for Amber's father, just as a group of girls make a video that goes viral on social media. The town is swarmed with ladies looking to be the lady with the Three Old Coots, and, while not intending to be in the running, Darby is somehow chosen.

Her new gig is great, except it doesn't pay anything. So, she takes a clerk job on Sweet Briar Ranch, where the man she's looking for lives, only he doesn't realize he's a father and she doesn't want to hurt her daughter if he isn't interested in fulfilling his responsibilities.

But when her daughter's birth mother shows up in Sweet Water to take her away from Darby, can she trust that Jonah will be the kind of father Amber needs? Can she find more than just a father for Amber, and maybe true love for herself as well?

title: Cowboy Whispering My Name (Coming Home to North Dakota, #11)
description:
Katie Dettinger didn’t expect to be a single mom. Didn’t expect to have her husband cheat and leave. Didn’t think she’d be alone raising her kids.

But she is. And it’s harder than she thought. There’s never enough time, never enough money and now she’s lost her job and might be losing her house.

When the Piece Makers come to her with a plan, she doesn’t have much choice but to go along with it, as much as she might not want to.

Flynn Powers is the quiet one. Steady. Never steps out of line. Is completely dependable and never does anything on the spur of the moment.

Except get married.

Katie and he had been best friends back in the day. How could he not help her out, even if it means a lifetime commitment?And, maybe, if she remembers that she can trust him and depend on him, what they have could grow into more.

Books in the Coming Home to North Dakota Series:

Cowboy Walking Away
Cowboy Coming Home
Cowboy Stealing My Heart
Cowboy Finding Love
Cowboy Dreaming Alone
Cowboy Rescuing Me
Cowboy Dancing All Night
Cowboy Falling Hard
Cowboy Looking at Me
Cowboy Wanting Everything
Cowboy Whispering My Name
Cowboy Marrying the Lady

title: Just a Cowboy's Enemy (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch North Dakota #3)
description:
Can these life-long enemies set aside their differences for the sake of a little girl and her horse?

Cormac Henderson is shocked when he discovered his friend from college has willed him half-interest in a high-dollar roping horse...and his daughter. But then he finds out that the woman who has hated him since high school is the person he's supposed to be sharing custody of both with. How could one piece of information twist up his life so fast?

Brooklyn Lepley is content baking and ranching with her sisters. Going to farmers markets and doing chores on their ranch. Her main goal in life is to stay away from Cormac Henderson, who humiliated her in high school and never showed a bit of remorse for it. Avoiding him is not the easiest thing to do in a small town like Sweet Water, especially since they've been tapped to man the kissing booth together for the summer festival. It becomes impossible when she is informed Cormac and she have inherited half-interest of a horse...and a little girl.

They have to work together for the good of the little girl, and as they do, they find that maybe the past doesn't have to define the future.

Can these two enemies find forgiveness and possibly even fall in love?

title: No Marriage of Convenience for a Cowboy (Escape to Cowboy Crossing Book 4)
description:
Small-town romance with faith, humor, and more than a dash of danger!

An elusive woman with secrets, a quiet cowboy, a precocious child and a rebellious teenager, and a marriage of convenience that hides real feelings...

Arianna Montemayor is so far from her comfort zone that it’s not even on the same planet when this eternal nomad and former runaway considers becoming an instant mom. To win custody of her niece and nephew, she needs a stable job, a house, and a husband, not necessarily in that order. For help, she turns to a local cowboy and the most responsible man she's ever met, Kieran O'Neill. But once scarred in many senses by men she trusted, dare she trust again?

Kieran would never refuse someone in need, especially orphaned children or the woman whose affection he’s been trying unsuccessfully to win. He's drawn to her even if she keeps everything about herself a secret. But if he marries her, it wouldn't be a marriage of convenience for him, but a real one. Then he discovers the children have scary secrets, as well, ones they don't realize themselves.

When danger strikes, will Arianna have to sacrifice her new life to keep Kieran and the children safe?

Escape to Cowboy Crossing COMPLETED SERIES!
Women scarred by their painful pasts, bonded like sisters by the secrets they share. Cowboys able to see the hurting hearts behind the tough facades. And someone willing to kill to get what they want...
Book 1: No Fake Dating for a Cowboy
Book 2: No Mistaken Identity for a Cowboy
Book 3: No Second Chance for a Cowboy
Book 4: No Marriage of Convenience for a Cowboy
Book 5: No Best Friends for a Cowboy
Book 6: No Mistletoe Kiss for a Cowboy

title: Chilled to the Crone (Spell's Angels, #11)
description:
Winter has descended on Hawthorne Hollow like a chilly blanket, and all Scout Randall wants to do with her days is snuggle in bed with her gas station chicken and wait for spring to arrive.

Nothing in her life ever goes the way she planned, however.

There are gods afoot, as if Scout didn’t have enough to deal with. The Nordic goddess Skadi is in town, and she has something specific on her mind.

With the new lamia apex down for the count—whether she’ll survive her ultimate transition, nobody can say—Scout thinks she has some breathing room to get to know the family that’s only recently come to town. Instead, she’s got a god to deal with, and Skadi means business.

Scout’s magic is ever-evolving but is she strong enough to face a god?
When another god arrives hellbent on fighting it out with the first god, Scout thinks things can’t get worse. She’s wrong. Things can always get worse.
A god fight is not what Scout was anticipating it. It’s upon her, though. Worse, it seems one of the gods might be partnering with the lamia apex with domination on their minds. What does that mean? An end for them all.

Scout has been reticent about facing her new reality. She’s out of time, though. She either has to agree to take on the mantle of the pixie apex, or Hawthorne Hollow—and ultimately the world—will fall into ruin.

It’s time for a war. Is Scout ready?

title: Deadly Evidence
description:
A single mom. A teenage daughter. A ranch to protect. And danger growing in the dark of night.

Grace Remington is determined to hold onto her Texas ranch. But with her hired hands disappearing and even greater threats looming, she finds herself faced with an impossible dilemma. Stay and fight, or lose everything she has worked for?

But then a stranger arrives at her door and asks for a job. He's lean, fit, and very, very capable. But who is he--and what does he really want?

Is he the answer to her prayers, or will his arrival lead to the loss of everything she and her daughter hold dear?

The books in this four-book Christian romantic suspense series can be read in any order.

title: Some Cowgirls Love Single Dads (Keagans of Copper Creek #2)
description:
She’s a recovering addict on the road to redemption. He’s a single dad hoping for a second chance with his high school sweetheart. Will the magic of Christmas reignite their old flame?

Annabel Keagan’s journey to recovery from addiction has been anything but easy. Haunted by past mistakes and the fear of commitment, she’s reluctant to open her heart to anyone, especially Dalton. But when he comes back to Copper Creek with his young son in tow, fate has other plans.

Dalton Quaid, a single dad back home to help is ailing father, is determined to show Annabel that she’s deserving of happiness. But winning Annabel’s heart won’t be easy. Especially when she sees his ex-wife in town.

As Annabel and Dalton work together on the ranch, their shared history resurfaces, reigniting the sparks they once knew. But can Annabel conquer her fears and trust herself enough to commit to Dalton and his son?

title: Love for a Lifetime (Love in Blackwater #2)
description:
They’ll always be friends, but they can never be more. 

Dawson Keller has held a torch for his best friend’s little sister for as long as he can remember. He might be a flirt, but his heart will always belong to Olivia.

Olivia Lawrence lives to serve others and work on the family farm. Helping people and tending animals keep her mind off the one thing she wants but can’t have—a family.

Her brother’s best friend might joke that they’re meant to be, but he doesn’t know how little she has to offer a husband. Especially a man like Dawson who loves kids and makes everyone laugh.

On top of that, Olivia’s best friend is head over heels for Dawson, and hurting her friend is out of the question.

Dawson keeps showing up to save her at all the wrong times. From a disastrous wedding date to an unfortunate camping incident, Dawson is always there when Olivia needs him.

When Dawson finds out her secret, and her friend feels betrayed, Olivia is at risk of losing them both.If you loved the Blackwater Ranch series and the Wolf Creek Ranch series, get ready to fall in love all over again in Blackwater, Wyoming.

title: A Cowboy's Growing Grace (Sweet View Ranch #2)
description:
Ezra Clyborne, a man of principles and routine, never expected Alaska, a woman embroiled in a world of trouble, and her children to turn his world upside down.

His offer of marriage was meant to be a safe haven, a simple solution to her troubles, but it becomes the foundation of a bond that deepens with each challenge they face.

Yet, as they confront the threats lurking around them, Ezra and Alaska discover that love often thrives in the most unexpected places. Can love grow in the shadow of danger, and can Ezra's ranch become a haven for a heart in need of healing?

title: There I Find Joy (Strawberry Sands Beach Romance #4)
description:
Luke Landry will avoid the matchmaking Miss Heather at all costs. Miss Heather will do anything to get her granddaughter hitched, and Luke seems to be her favorite target. If Kristen were such a catch, she wouldn't need her gram to find a husband for her. Every time Luke runs into her, sparks fly, and one or both of them leave angry. Why can't Miss Heather see Kristen and he would never be any good together?

Kristen Shower knows people avoid her because of her gram. But family is family and blood is blood and despite her flaws, Kristen loves her gram. And she doesn't appreciate Luke Landry's negative attitude toward the one person in the world who loves her and wants the best for her. So she avoids Luke at all costs, until they are tapped to provide a family for two little foster girls.

After working together to make a home with Luke, Kristen realizes that maybe joy could be found where one leasts expects it - right in front of her.

title: His Sixth Sweetheart (Ivory Peaks, #6)
description:
She's had a crush on him for decades. He's finally in a place where he feels ready to date the boss's daughter. Can Cord and Jane take their relationship to the next level without getting burned?

Jane Hammond has grown and matured a lot over the years. So much so that she's now working in the accounting department at the massive family company in downtown Denver. But she's living on her family's farm, which her older brother now owns. Her father lives in the generational house, and he still has his eye on Jane's wild streak.

That, and that alone, has kept her from pursuing Cord Behr, the cowboy who's worked her daddy's farm for fifteen years.

Cord has secrets no one knows but Jane's father. The man took him in when he shouldn't have, and he's loved Cord as a son, guided him, and taught him. Cord won't do anything to upset Gray Hammond - but his feelings for the man's daughter have been growing and growing since her return to the farm.

And she's an adult now...

So when her cousin gets married, Cord makes his move and asks Jane to dance. The spark is hotter than ever now that it's been uncovered, but they have a long way to go to build happily-ever-after. Can she make her father see she's not fourteen years old anymore? And will it even matter if Cord can't tell her the truth about his past?

title: The Cowboy Who Loved Texas (Three Rivers Romance™ #3)
description: He’s got something to prove to his brother and father. She’s just trying to save the endangered owls that nest in the trees on his family’s ranch. Dawson Rhinehart doesn’t want to deal with the gorgeous Wildlife Conservation Officer, but Caroline Thompson isn’t going away. Will he burn all the bridges between them before he realizes just how sweet a relationship with her could be? Return to Three Rivers in this small-town saga romance where the legacy of the past meets the promise of the future. Revisit beloved characters and fall in love with a new generation in the Second Generation in Three Rivers Romance series!

title: Witches Get Stitches (Witch on the Rocks, #8)
description: Hali Waverly is in a holding pattern following hip surgery. She’s getting better, but she still has to be careful…especially living so close to the beach. Still, she thinks it’s safe enough to go out for dinner with her boyfriend Gray Hunter…right up until they’re swarmed by escaped prisoners. Hali thinks everything is okay until one of the prisoners uses magic on Gray and forces him to attack Hali. She manages to snap him out of it, but Gray no longer trusts himself and Hali is left with a doubting boyfriend as well as a lot of unanswered questions. Even though most of the prisoners are recovered right away, a few manage to evade capture, including the witch who hexed Gray. Things get worse when the witch approaches Hali with a Help her prove her innocence and she won’t go after Gray again. Otherwise…Gray is going to be her target, and she isn’t shy about what she’s going to do to him. Hali and Gray have to work together to make sure he’s not taken advantage of. With Hali not at a hundred percent, though, that’s easier said than done. Not all witches are created equal.
