Hali is powerful, but what happens when she comes up against a type of magic she doesn’t know how to defeat? She’s determined to protect Gray at all costs, even if she has to put herself on the line to do it.

title: Mystic Shadows (Isle of Enchantment Mystery Book 4)
description:
When notorious loan shark Vincent "Vinnie" Marlowe is found dead in the heart of Coconut Bay, all signs point to a deadly power struggle within the supernatural underworld. Iona Vale, a witch with a talent for reading emotions, had long dreamed of bringing Vinnie down, but solving his murder is only the beginning.

As Iona dives into the investigation, she discovers that Vinnie's reach extended far beyond his reputation—his iron grip on the local businesses left a wake of fear, betrayal, and broken alliances. With her trusted (and sometimes too enthusiastic) celestial sidekick, Spark, and her complex, yet charming partner, Kai, by her side, Iona unearths secrets buried deep within Coconut Bay’s paranormal community.

But when personal stakes arise, and Aunt Phee’s café and safety are threatened, Iona realizes the case may hit closer to home than she could have imagined.

With the arrival of Grant, a perceptive district attorney, Iona finds herself caught between the steadfast warmth of his company and her longstanding yet unresolved connection with Kai. As clues point to a deadly alliance between the town’s most unlikely suspects—a corrupt security officer, a manipulative fortune-teller, and a real estate mogul hiding behind a charming smile—Iona must put all of her feelings aside before she loses more than she ever bargained for.

title: Twisted Love With A Billionaire 2: The Finale
description:
After Block’s biggest kept secret is threatened to be exposed, he tries to get ahead of it by using his power in the city. 
Amber is appreciating her time with Block until she is harmed by someone she least expects. 
Bri is still on the hunt for Block’s attention, and she doesn't care who she has to cross to get it. 
Chyna is busy juggling her pregnancy along with Kenny who is demanding she take money from Rome.
Rome is still battling with his loss and does something drastic to make himself feel better. 
With everyone in control of their destinies, we get to see who has enough grit to make it through the storm. Though the love created between everyone is Twisted, it still has a chance to make a turn for the best. 

Twisted Love With A Billionaire 2: The Finale

title: He Who Findeth A Hood Virgin: An African American Romance
description:
In the wealthy world of New Orleans elite, Janiya Alexander is the baby of a family with high standards and lofty expectations. Her innocence is every man's weakness, especially her father King’s. Traumatized by a past she struggles to overcome, Janiya seeks solace in self-medication while striving to meet her parents' high expectations. Desperate for a break, she plans a daring weekend getaway with her best friend Shakira, unaware that this trip will turn her life upside down.

Bear, a man hardened by the streets of Haiti and the violence of America’s most notorious gun ring, has just finished a five-year prison sentence for a crime he didn’t commit. Love was never on his radar—his focus was freedom and survival. But when he encounters Janiya, a rare and complicated woman, his carefully laid plans begin to unravel.

As their worlds collide in an unorthodox arrangement, Bear's icy exterior starts to melt under Janiya's warmth. But secrets lurk in the shadows, threatening to shatter their fragile bond. Can Janiya maintain her identity amidst Bear’s chaotic life, or will the weight of uncovered truths pull them apart?

Let's take a trip down to New Orleans with Miss Jazzie, the African American hood romance author who brought you "A New Orleans Virgin & A Hood Millionaire." Now she's bringing you an unputdownable second chance love story filled with emotions, love, and betrayal. Through Bear and Janiya’s eyes, experience a love story where secrets are revealed, emotions run high, and every bond is tested. Will their love survive the ultimate test, or will the past destroy their chance at happiness?

title: He Who Findeth A Hood Virgin 2: An African American Romance
description:
Being in love is hard, especially when that love comes from a cold-hearted monster. Romance has a price, but is it too high when he wants your soul?

Janiya gave away her innocence in the name of passion and matters of the heart, unaware of the damage that would follow. A house full of secrets threatens everything she has felt for Bear, leaving her heartbroken. What she thought would be a blossoming romance and solid bond has left her drowning without a lifeline.

Bear, a rare and complicated man, succumbs to the euphoric feelings Janiya brings to his heart, which verge on obsession. She is the cure to all his ailments. As secrets are exposed and people start to disappear, Bear begins to question if being with Janiya is really worth it. Should he have remained the monster he was born to be, or become a stronger man to keep Janiya in his possession?

When secrets unravel and threaten to tear Bear and Janiya apart, will Janiya love Bear through the pain, or return to the simpler life she had before him?

If you're a fan of rich cheating Alpha men, second chance love stories, billionaire and millionaire romance, this one is for you.

He Who Findeth A Hood Virgin 2 (An African American Romance) by Miss Jazzie.

title: A Virgin & The Rich Jamaican The Next Door: An African American Romance (A Virgin & The Rich Jamaican Next Door Book 1)
description:
A Virgin & The Rich Jamaican Next Door by Candy Moore

Imagine being the daughter of a billionaire yet still enduring a tough upbringing. Caprice Turner's life has been filled with pain, heartache, and betrayal. Raised in a rough part of L.A., Caprice is likely the only virgin her age, a result of a devastating incident in her teenage years. Estranged from her father all her life, Caprice’s world takes a drastic turn with one phone call and a single request.

Due to the dire situation at home with her mother, Caprice has no choice but to accept her father's offer. Her life quickly transforms from one of struggle to living a lavish lifestyle with the man she has always longed to know. As Caprice tries to adjust to her new surroundings and get to know the family she never knew, she encounters the intriguing neighbor next door—a wealthy Jamaican named Damien King, AKA Owl.

Damien is everything Caprice never expected. Despite their rocky start and clashing personalities, there’s an undeniable chemistry between them. What begins as an enemies-to-lovers situation soon evolves into something deeper. Caprice finds herself drawn to Damien's charm and confidence, discovering that beneath his tough exterior lies a man who understands her pain and past.

But their budding relationship faces numerous obstacles. In the midst of this, old wounds are reopened, and Caprice must navigate through betrayal and secrets to find her own path to happiness.

"A Virgin & The Rich Jamaican Next Door" is an African American romance that beautifully blends the themes of enemies to lovers, arranged marriage, and second chance romance. Follow Caprice as she embarks on a journey of self-discovery, healing, and unexpected love in this captivating tale by Candy Moore.

title: A Hood Virgin & A Rich Thug: An African American Romance
description:
Xylo Simmons has always been a fighter, pushing through life’s toughest challenges. Homeless and struggling, she meets Creed, a young, wealthy Alpha boss who can have any woman he wants. She thinks he'll ditch her when he finds out she’s a virgin, but instead, he changes her whole world. With a fancy home, a new car, and a solid job with benefits, Xylo’s living a life she never imagined. Just when she’s ready to give him her heart, Creed drops a bombshell.

Creed lives by his own rules, always chasing money and the fast life. Meeting Xylo gives him a rare sense of peace, but it’s not enough to change his wild ways. He sees her virginity as a prized possession and gets frustrated when she holds back, despite everything he’s done for her.

When Creed loses big at Gray Escapes casino, he’s stuck owing the owner, Keaton “Kozi” Gray, a serious debt. Desperate, Creed offers up Xylo’s chastity, knowing it’s not his to give. Kozi, a powerful and rough-around-the-edges guy, is instantly drawn to Xylo. She’s not feeling his rude attitude at first, but slowly, she starts to see another side of him in his high-stakes world.

Just when Xylo starts to feel comfortable, an old flame from Kozi’s past shows up, threatening to mess everything up. Will Kozi’s feelings for Xylo survive his past drama? Can Xylo protect her heart from his harsh charm, or will he end up being her biggest mistake?

If you're a fan of African American romance, virgin love stories, second chance romance, and high-stakes drama, you'll definitely love "A Hood Virgin & A Rich Thug" by S.L. Partee.

title: Salt Don't Go In Tea: An African American Romance
description:
Amari thought getting pregnant and having a baby by a hood-rich industry goon would put her at the top and in his #1 spot. She imagined a life filled with money, fame, and all the perks of being tied to someone in the game. But instead of the dream, she got a cheating baby daddy who left her to raise their son on her own. Determined to make a name for herself, she jumps into the world of influencing, thinking her best friend’s success would make it easier. But this industry is cutthroat, and Amari quickly realizes that loyalty is rare. Is it already too late for her to break free?

Yara, a top influencer in Chicago, is engaged to the head of the city's hottest record label. On the surface, she’s living a dream life, but behind the scenes, it's chaos. Between juggling rumors of his infidelity and raising their kids alone, Yara’s on the verge of breaking down. And the whispers? They might not be just rumors—the other woman might be someone closer than she thinks.

Saint and Psalm are brothers, but they couldn’t be more different. Saint embraces the fame and attention, soaking up everything his career brings, while Psalm stays out of the spotlight, preferring a quiet life. But when Amari steps into their world, everything changes. Can these brothers survive the storm she’s about to unleash?

In this African American romance, nobody escapes the drama unscathed. Hood love, fake friendships, and betrayal set the stage for a wild ride where love is dangerous, and the tea always comes with a little salt.

If you're a fan of drama-filled hood love stories with cheating baby daddies, messy relationships, and fierce women, you’ll love "Salt Don’t Go In Tea" by J. Dominique—author of "Taken By A Rich Beast", "Alone In Miami At 3 AM", "Every Savage Deserves A Hood Chick", and "I Bought Every Dream He Sold Me."

title: My Good Girl 2
description:
Journal was separated from her brother and sister at the age of six. For years, she had this image of what she thought her oldest sister, and oldest brother lifestyle might have been like moving past the day that they were both adopted. After a conversation with Harmony after all these years, she already knows that her life was nowhere near as perfect as Journal made it out to be. Here Journal is now, faced to face with her brother, but she gets the surprise of a lifetime, upon finding out about her brothers transition. All Journal wants is to have the perfect relationship with her siblings, and to make up for the years of lost time, but does everyone want that?

A new face is added to the scene and his name is Grady Joseph. Grady is the man that Harmony has been seeing for the past year. There seems to be some sort of built up animosity that Grady has towards Genesis. Can that built up animosity be the reason why Journal and Harmony’s relationship may take a turn for the worst?

Prepare to be entertained with this roller coaster read. Secrets, lies, enemies, and snakes are popping out fast, leaving almost every relationship to be tested.

title: It’s Always That One Project Chick 2: An African American Romance (It's Always That One Project Chick)
description:
Love is never simple, especially when loyalty and heartbreak are at war. Just when Taylen thinks she’s finally found a safe haven in Ace’s arms, his so-called baby mama, Kamry, makes a disruptive entrance. Her past wounds ripped wide open, Taylen feels that familiar sting of betrayal creeping in, forcing her to question whether she’s destined to be played again. Determined not to lose herself in another messy love, Taylen decides she’s done for good. But will her heart truly let go of a man like Ace?

Ace isn’t the type to give up easily. Known as one of the city’s richest and most ruthless dope boys, he’s used to handling any threat that stands in his way—especially when it comes to love. But with Kamry bringing new enemies into his world, Ace is forced to fight harder than ever. He made Taylen a promise, to be the man who’d shield her from hurt. Now, he’ll go to any lengths to prove it, but only if she’ll give him that one last chance to make things right.

And then there’s Chris, who’s struggling with a heartbreak of his own. After years with Autumn, he never thought she’d walk away so quickly. With her eyes now on a new love, Chris’s desperate pleas fall on deaf ears. Can he bring her back to what they once had, or has he lost his girl to a new contender?

Prepare yourself for a wild journey through passion, betrayal, and the raw realities of hood love. If you're drawn to stories of project chicks and dope boys, rich Alpha men, and unforgettable hood love stories, "It’s Always That One Project Chick 2" by Jenica Johnson will pull you in from page one.

title: Pregnant By The Coldest Millionaire 4: An African American Romance
description:
Love, secrets, and an unexpected twist—Will Noxi and Waka’s marriage survive?

Waka didn’t understand why our intimacy had faded. His comments about our love life stung, but what hurt more was his rejection of our baby. How could I tell him I might be pregnant, and it happened on our honeymoon? Waka wasn’t ready to be a father, and I feared he’d question everything about our relationship. I didn't want to lose him over this secret, but I didn’t know how to tell him the truth. I was scared that revealing my secret would shatter our fragile love, leaving me to choose between my relationship with Waka and the life growing inside me.

Our love life had become as dry as the Sahara, and I couldn’t figure out why. It was as if Noxi couldn’t stand the sight of me. All of my efforts seemed to push her further away. Noxi has shut down emotionally, cutting me to the core. Whatever was bothering her, she kept bottled up inside, refusing to tell me. The tension was so thick that I had to leave my own house.

Caught between love and fear, Noxi and Waka must navigate the delicate balance of their relationship. One secret could ruin their marriage. Will their bond be strong enough to withstand the truth, or will the weight of unspoken words and hidden suspicions pull them apart? Dive into their world of urban romance and drama, and discover if love truly conquers all.

Fans of African American romance, rich alpha men, second chance love, and dramatic pregnancy stories won't be able to put down Pregnant By The Coldest Millionaire 4 by Princess Diamond. This book delivers intense emotions, gripping drama, and the twists you crave.

title: Taken By The King Of Dallas: An African American Romance
description:
Remedy dedicated her life to being the perfect wife while supporting all of her husband Ken’s dreams. Thinking that her life was near perfect, she was left feeling blindsided, broken, and betrayed by his request for a divorce after being his backbone for over eight years. Overlooking the constant signs of infidelity, Remedy had to find out the truth the hard way.

Forced to pull herself together while going through the worst disappointment of her life, Remedy swore off dating and vowed to never let another man take her through what Ken had. It wasn’t until a year later when a chance encounter with a cocky, handsome, but rugged stranger made her want to throw all caution to the wind.

Rich is a wealthy alpha male and hustler by nature. Being crowned the King of Dallas at a young age contributed to his cocky ways. Born into the game, it had always been his mission and main focus to live up to his family’s name. Rich thought that he had everything he could want in life, that was until he met Remedy. Set on doing whatever it takes to make her his, Rich exposes a side of himself that he didn’t know existed.

Trying to balance the streets and his love life, Rich is constantly faced with obstacles, making it hard on his new relationship. When a secret Rich thought he’d buried pops up at his doorstep, there is no limit to what he’ll do to make sure he protects those he loves. With surprises around every corner, will love be enough, or will Rich’s lifestyle be too much for Remedy to accept after everything she’s already been through? Find out in this explosive, hood love story.

If you're a fan of African American romance, millionaire love stories, second chance romance, and divorced women finding love again, then "Taken By The King Of Dallas" by Bonnie Blanco is for you.

title: Spoiled By A Hood Billionaire 3: An African American Romance: The Finale
description:
In the finale of "Spoiled by a Hood Billionaire," Biggz, the businessman with a heart of gold, runs his empire with an iron fist. But even the toughest hustler can get knocked off his game by love. Biggz is fighting for his life after a brutal run-in with Hope. Blessyn, determined to stay by his side, helps him recover, but that's just the beginning of their troubles.

Blessyn is carving her own path, despite her troubled past and messy situation with her estranged husband, Zero. When Biggz entered her life, he didn’t just offer protection; he offered her the world. She’s raising her son Zane, building a future, and dodging the drama Zero keeps bringing.

Biggz’s strength and vulnerability draw her in, but their love isn’t easy. They’re constantly tested by enemies, street politics, and their own insecurities. Biggz has to maintain his street credibility while being the man Blessyn needs, and Blessyn has to figure out how to be with a man who wants to give her everything without losing herself.

Their story is one of real passion and constant struggle. From surprise gifts to shared dreams, Biggz shows Blessyn a love that’s as tough as the streets but as real as it gets. He treats her like a queen, giving her a taste of the finer things while holding down his empire. Blessyn, with her strength and warmth, helps Biggz see beyond the hustle, bringing stability to his chaotic life.

Despite the danger and drama, their bond only grows stronger. Their journey is a rollercoaster ride, proving their love can withstand anything. Even as they face new challenges, they find new reasons to celebrate their life together. From expanding their family to supporting each other’s dreams, Biggz and Blessyn show that real love is about loyalty, sacrifice, and holding each other down.

"Spoiled by a Hood Billionaire" is a story of love, hustle, and the power of a true ride-or-die relationship. In a world where loyalty is rare and danger is always around the corner, Biggz and Blessyn’s love is constantly tested, proving that together, they can conquer anything.

If you’re a fan of African American romance, second chance romance, and enemies to lovers, this book is for you.

title: Pregnant by the Coldest Millionaire
description: "I don’t have a good track record with men, so I’m not used to men being nice to me. "In this heart racing and unputdownable love story of "Pregnant By The Coldest Millionaire" by Princess Diamond, Noxima "Noxi" Carver embodies the strength of a woman, marked by the challenges of her past relationships with men. Both mentally and physically scarred by her former fiancé, Zade, Noxi is stuck with a million-dollar hospital bill, years of trauma, a significant disability, and financial struggles. Once on a path to become a professional cheerleader like her mother, Noxi now finds herself closing off to the world, haunted by heartbreak and a deep-seated fear of men. To her, they all cheated, they all got women pregnant and left. And in her eyes they wasn’t trust worthy. Up until she met, Wakeem “Waka” Wild, the youngest of The Wild Boys and a bill collector for The Chicago Syndicate. Waka, wrapped in mystery, wealth, and respect, approaches love cautiously, having faced false accusations of harassment and endured probation. Noxi is drawn to Waka's charisma, his luxurious lifestyle and overall allure, discovering a sense of safety in his presence. Their paths cross unexpectedly one pivotal night, setting off a chain of events that forms an unbreakable bond between them. What begins as a casual meeting transforms into an impromptu date, reigniting Noxi's belief in the goodness of men. As Waka and Noxi immerse themselves in their evolving love story, they remain blissfully unaware of a shared adversary lurking in the shadows. Zade, fueled by anger, hatred, envy, and a thirst for revenge, becomes a looming threat poised to dismantle their newfound happiness. Can Waka's protective instincts shield Noxi from Zade's impending attack, or will Noxi once again become a casualty in the hands of her vengeful ex-fiancé? The narrative unfolds as a poignant love story, where love and danger collide, testing the strength of their bond and resilience in the face of adversity. This new African America Romance will leave you speechless. If you’re a fan of charming rich Alpha men, second chance romance and drama, this one is for you.

title: Pretty Girls & Rich Thugs
description:
After making the best decision to maintain guardianship over her brother, 24 year old Gianna Jones positions herself stuck in an unwanted place—a loveless marriage. While under her controlling spouse’s ruling thumb, Gia comes to an unbearable crossroad when her husband tries to enforce an undesirable lifestyle on her. Together with her NFL prospect husband, Xavier, Azaria Henderson enjoys living the fairytale lifestyle. However, after life starts life-ing and removes her only love from her life, Zari becomes career-focused and becomes cold to love, turning off her once heated heart. A true hustla to the core, Sinayah Thomas is a self-taught nail artist turned business owner, becoming the most sought after nail tech in Atlanta. When a shared trauma brings these women together, a healing relationship is formed, creating an unbreakable friendship through bonding and supporting each other.

Grimly well-known as the most feared brothers in Atlanta, Memphis, Kanon, and Gage Hendrix are verified kingpins that doesn’t mind letting their savagery and malice show. As the oldest, Memphis oversees their organization, ensuring that it runs smooth and maintain intact. Kanon, the youngest, put his love for money and numbers to use by handling the financial aspect. Gage is that middle child that everyone warns you about—the one who is always on the rampage, the forever hothead, and stays on the ready. In their line of work, being upfront with each other and keeping communication opened is a must for the brothers. When Gage hides a detrimental secret from his family, what happens when their close-knit bond is tested?

After a common enemy triggers a domino effect into their lives, the friends’ and brothers’ pathways align, causing them to create a super pact to take down their adversary. However, in the midst, the thin line between business and pleasure is crossed when a fierce attraction is too hard to deny. Mixing the two is never the goal and certainly is not recommended. But when three pretty women and three rich thugs becomes familiar, all the rules are thrown out of the window. In 
book one
 of this African American urban fiction series, get to know the ladies and the brothers as they embark on a solidarity journey of revenge, retribution, and requited love.

title: A Savage In Stilettos
description:
“Tell your daughter, I apologize.” ~Miss~

The Malone family is the top criminal mogul in Chicago, having both legal and illegal entities. Everyone speculates that they are a crime family but no one can ever prove it. Monte Malone loves all of his children but his first born daughter, Missy “Miss”, is definitely made in his image. And she’s definitely a daddy’s girl and a dominant force to be reckoned with. So it will take a lot to impress her or gain her attention. When Miss wasn’t looking, a debonaire, savvy, educated, and rough neck casino owner ease his way into her personal space, saa-wolling up her time whenever she wasn’t working. Will this mystic man be the one to open her heart? Or will he end up being the one to cause her the worst pain?

Dressed to kill. Stilettos on point. Purse game unmatched. But don’t let her stunning looks, big butt, and beautiful mind fool you. Miss is hardcore to the bone and have no qualms about unaliving her threats. This first high-powered, very active African American urban fiction installment deals with jealousy, a bevy of secrets, underlining lust, unwavering protection, and love in the making. Meet Missy and her family and see how a sanctioned savage in stilettos get down for those she loves.

title: Pretty Girls & Rich Thugs 2
description:
As the old cliché says, “If it ain’t one thing, it’s another.” And the Hendrix brothers and the best friends are finding out just how true that is.

Taking on new roles as being men in relationships, the Hendrix brothers are actually starting to enjoy life more, especially with the special women in their lives. Having fun and enjoying your family in the comfort of your home should be nothing but good eating, lots of smiles, and plenty of laughter. However, the end of book one demonstrated how it can easily go from a happy family affair to a complete catastrophic moment. Dealing with the life-altering events, the brothers are left stunned, stupefied, and shaken. 

In book two of this heart-pumping African American urban fiction story, the men and women are reeling with more questions than answers. Red-hot tempers run high. Sheer accusations are made. New connections are unveiled. Sacred secrets remain hidden. And scheming snakes are exposed. The Hendrix trio embarks on the journey of finding their sworn enemies and paying back lethal retributions for the irrevocable destruction they have caused. One click and discover how the spitfire ladies are standing on business right by their sides on this riveting new sequel.

title: A Savage In Stilettos 2: Finale
description:
In book one, high-level betrayal and soaring jealousy from loved ones and enemies alike bridge a gap into hating on Missy, trying to cause her total demise. In book two, these daunting attributes are prominent even more and the lengths the forged partnerships go through to get on top are immeasurable. In the midst of her chronic chaos, Miss receives stimulating news that shakes her to her core.
In this alluring and heart-pounding African American urban fiction finale, things are set ablaze. Secrets are revealed, disheartening truths, and devious treachery surface and Miss’s world is turned upside down. No doubt about it, Miss is very classy. May even be a little bougie. But one thing is for certain and two things are for sure, Missy is definitely a savage walking in stilettos. The question is, how long and how far will she walk?

title: Pretty Girls & Rich Thugs 3: Finale
description:
In this blazing finale, the lives of three close-knit best friends continually intertwine with those of the three enigmatic Hendrix brothers. Amidst their interconnected stories, resilience is tested while buried family secrets are unearthed. The crew amps up and renews their relentless battle with longstanding enemies, grappling with the repercussions of explosive events. And romance continues to blossom, creating an atmosphere of passion, love, and vulnerability.

In this third installment of this fiery African American urban fiction saga, the narrative unfolds against a backdrop of uncertainty, mystery, and simmering conflicts, stemming from a prequel where lives are severely altered and are hanging in the balance and where their fate is shrouded in doubt. Find out how it all comes to a head for the Pretty Girls And Rich Thugs.

title: Free Me From You 3
description:
Since part 1 of this series, we’ve been on an rollercoaster ride with all the characters. There have been so many things happening at once, that it’ll make you question is a happily ever after even possible? June and Free were introduced to us, and they both played their part in why the relationship had so many shortcomings. So many opportunities presented themselves for both of them to walk away, but through it all, they stayed, and they are finally in a place where they could possibly get it right.

Free already knows what it feels like to lose a sister, and she’s hoping that she doesn’t have to experience that hurt again with Dionne. Life has already been rough for her this past year, so losing Dionne is the last thing that she needs right now.

Come take one last ride with the crew, and let’s see what they’re up to one last time. So many things need closure, enemies need to disappear, and we have to see June and Free get it right, especially after all that they’ve been through.

title: Alone in Miami at 3AM III
description:
When life hits you hard, it hits you like a storm, and that's exactly what Sevyn is feeling right now. With the police breathing down her neck, a drug case threatening to crash down on her, and a husband out for blood, she's in deeper than ever before. Losing Zaakir, her rock, feels like the final straw, especially with the risk of him discovering her ties with the cops. Can Sevyn navigate through this mess and come out unscathed, or is this where Tramel finally gets the best of her? Then there's Zuri, who thought she'd escaped the shadow of her ex, only to find new troubles brewing. Just as things start looking up with Shai, family chaos barges in, threatening the peace and happiness she's so desperately sought. With a baby on the way and her family's never-ending drama, Zuri's future with Shai is hanging by a thread. Will love be enough to overcome these hurdles, or will her family's interference be the deal-breaker? As if relationship woes weren't enough, Shai and Zaakir find themselves tangled in a mess of betrayal and secrets, with hints pointing towards Shai's dad as the snitch. Trapped in a web of deceit, they need to figure out how to clear their names while stuck behind bars and win back the trust of their partners. 

Dive into this gripping finale where trust is fragile and betrayals run deep. It's a rollercoaster of emotions, where loyalty is the ultimate test, and the line between friend and foe blurs. Alone In Miami At 3 AM the finale is here and it’s heart pounding. If you’re a fan of J. Dominique, rich Alpha men, second chance romance and cheating men. This one is for you.

title: Her Heart My Soul 2: China & Keem
description: China and Keem’s love isn’t bound by titles. What they have is soul stirring and heart wrenching. Thus, China remains loyal to her heart when she finds out about snakes playing in the grass. However, when trouble finds its way interfering with their paths, things take a turn for the worse, and China’s life is hangs in the balance. Keem is ready to make the city bleed. Revenge is all he can see, and he fights tirelessly day in and day out to exact revenge on whomever was bold enough to make an enemy out of him. As pieces of the puzzle come together, Keem embodies the Grim Reaper, snatching the souls of anyone who thought they could penetrate the walls of his family. Only, wreaking havoc won’t guarantee saving the life of the one person who means the world to him. Keem and China find themselves backed into a corner, fighting for love, life, and everything in between. All the while, their enemies seek to dismantle their soul tie. But what their enemies don’t know is that they have an entire army ready to go to war for them. Suited and booted for war, the toy soldiers don’t even see what’s coming for them. However, when the smoke clears, will everyone in Keem and China’s camp remain standing?

title: Thug Ambition: A Legacy Inc. Love Story
description:
For years you’ve witnessed the toxic love affair between the infamous Thug and Tahari Kenneth. Their love affair produced children that you’ve watch grow up and follow in their parents footsteps.
Life is good for the Kenneth Family. However, the struggles of living up to their parents expectations is rough on KJ and Ka’Jairea.
KJ wants his father to fall back and let him run things his way. Thug is in retirement but can’t seem to let his son be the force that he has taught him to be.
Ka’Jairea is having it hard trying to juggle being her mothers protege, a wife, and mother. Which causes her to rebel against her family and her husband Hassan.
Kaine, Kash, Yah-Yah, and Kahari are going through their own personal woes, as they climb up the ranks in their parents organization.
In this installment of the Thug Legacy series you’ll get to see Thug and Tahari come to the realization that their choices as parents have had a profound effect on their children. The AMBITION inside of the Kenneth children surpasses anything Thug and Tahari could ever imagine.
They both will have to dig deep and become the hands on parents they’ve never been.
All the while standing ten toes down behind their LEGACY.

title: Queens and The Kingpins Who Love Them
description:
In this third installment to A Kingpins Queen series. Queen is stepping into her role as Mrs. Quentin Quartermaine with a point to prove. She’s not allowing anyone to destroy what her and Quentin has built.
Giving birth to his first born son has solidified her a place in his life for the long haul. Which makes Quentin far happier than anyone can ever imagine.
Situations have arisen that will cause Quentin to make a tough decision that has the potential to ruin everything he has worked for. Including the family he has created.
His crew is riding shot gun as usual and ready for whatever. Not too far behind are the ladies who have all found their place amongst the powerful men of the Quartermaine Dynasty. For the first time in these ladies life they get to love and be loved in the most unexpected ways.
The Queens have been sitting pretty while their Kingpins run the city. It’s a life they’re not trying to give up. So, the ladies do whatever needs to be done to hold down The Dynasty!
Follow the new first family of the streets as they maneuver through the gritty streets of the Chi dealing with love, war, and corruption!

title: Daughter of a Thug, Wife of a Gangsta: A Thug Legacy Story
description:
Love has never been easy and Ka’Jaiyah Kenneth is learning that the hard way. After all these years of being known as the problem child she realizes she needs to Boss Up. Especially, if she truly wants to be Mrs. Yahmeen Nazari. It won’t be an easy task for Yah-Yah because she’s a spoiled, rich, Daddy’s girl that’s set in her ways.
She may be content with that but Yahmeen is not. He needs a lil baby that’s gone listen and she don’t take orders easy. He’s a Gangsta in his own right and in order to takeover he needs Yah-Yah riding shot gun beside him so they can reign supreme. It will take drastic measures to happen in order for her to truly find her place. After all she’s the child of the infamous Thug and Tahari Kenneth. It’s in her DNA and the streets expect nothing less of her.
Take a ride with Yahmeen and Yah-Yah as they embark on a journey of Hood Love like no other. Brace yourself because this love affair gets Gangsta!

title: Ambitions of a Thug: Passion, Paradise, and The Legacy
description:
Life for the Kenneth Family has always been the epitome of great. The family has always lived the life they made for themselves.
We’ve watched them fight in different battles, where love and war is concerned.
If there is nothing we’ve learned from this book series. It’s that generational curses are real.
Thug and Tahari’s relationship has always been tumultuous and filled with passion. At the same time, the power they’ve acquired as a team may be the very thing that breaks them up.
Their children have had a front seat to their parents toxic behaviors.
So, much so history is repeating itself.
In this installment, the family will learn the battles they’re fighting with the ones they love. Stems from the battles they have yet to fight within themselves.
Take another ride with the family that introduced you to Thug Passion, Thug Paradise, and Thug Legacy. Now it’s all about the Ambitions of a Thug, and the lengths they’ll go to in an effort to keep their crown.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Honesty & Trust
description:
Trust is a man of action. Play with him, his family, or his money, and he's coming for you. However, somewhere, deep down, he also has a heart. So, when he's betrayed by the blood of someone he considers family, he offers a bit of grace and exercises a little control in regards to retaliation. Instead of committing murder, Trust takes an alternate route when it comes to collateral damage. 

Honesty lives a simple life and with Christmas fast approaching, everything around her was supposed to be amazing. Her man wasn’t perfect but being that he was there for her during a dark time, she allows more than she should for the sake of love. However, when she finds herself in a sticky situation, the person she thought would be there for her left her stranded, and the last person she thought would give her protection ends up providing her solace. 

Life's twists, turns, and bad decisions lead Trust and Honesty to Winter Crest during the holiday season for different reasons. Tempers flare, secrets are revealed, and things get messy when revenge is at the center of it all. Come take this final Winter Crest Christmas ride, and see how Trust and Honesty's life choices play out.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Infamous & Thankful
description:
Christmas is here! Snow, Christmas lights, and festivities are just a few things people can't wait to see and do for the holiday. For Thankful, Spirit, and Sleigh, Christmas may not be so merry.

Thankful moved to the Cove Projects to care for her aunt. She ends up pregnant and five years later she wants better for herself but she can't see a way out. Her son and her friends are all the motivation she needs, or so she thought. When Infamous comes to her rescue one too many times, her outlook on life changes, but tragedy strikes again, this time it may be too much for her to handle.

Spirit is just living her life carefree. She's been through so much in life that her trust is very minimal. Thankful and Sleigh mean everything to her. She has covered up her past well until secrets come out right before Christmas that have the ability to break her. She tries to remain strong, but it's becoming too much. She wants so badly to stay out of the dark place she visited years ago. Will the holiday festivities be able to put her back in the Christmas Spirit?

Sleigh is a Christmas fanatic that loves her eggnog. She is also the glue that holds the trio of best friends together. Sleigh is ready for her friends to find love and be happy for the holidays. She is always giving out advice and looking out for her friends, but she is holding a secret that she knows will break them. She's been holding this secret for years, which may cause one of the friends to explode.

Join these best friends for the Christmas holiday. You are going to laugh and cry with them, but most of all, you are going to enjoy getting in the Christmas SPIRIT while learning to be THANKFUL, and riding Santa's SLEIGH.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Pure & Luxe
description:
“Christmas is a time where Souls align!”

What’s a thriving city without a Litty club? The word lit is lightly putting it when speaking on Club Luxe. Owning the hottest establishment in Winter Crest, Pennsylvania, Luxe takes pride in his first major investment. Luxe has created a high-class, three-level, all-in-one club using dope money. With street fame and respect, a family that adores him, the baddest and the naughtiest on his payroll, and all the money he could imagine, Luxe is at the top of every woman’s Christmas list. 

Pure Peppermint is a southern belle that’s down on her luck. The last few years of her life have been all but Jolly, and just when she sees herself tapping into her inner Scrooge, she gets a call leading her to Luxe’s doorstep. What happens during the holidays when a damsel in distress meets Mr. Claus? Luxe Claus, that is!

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Holidae & Nativia
description:
With the odds stacked high against her, Nativia Black still has her holiday spirit. A single mother trying to make sure her daughter has a merry Christmas. Nativia navigates through the holiday season in survival mode. Until a charming and very handsome thuggish man comes into her life as a blessing in disguise. 

Being one of the largest arms dealers on the East Coast and his family owning the oldest and most prominent church in Winter Crest, Holidae Snow finds juggling his time between family and the streets leaves no time for real love. When Holidae and Nativia’s worlds collide, he doesn’t expect to find real love.

title: Mano & Melani- A Hood Love Story
description:
The wedding of the century is about to go down but there will be some drama first!
Mano cannot wait to marry Melani, but secrets from his past may break up the union he fought so hard to build.

Melani ultimately chose Mano whether her father agreed or not, now that all this drama is coming into their lives. Will Melani rethink her decisions? With a baby on the way Melani has to make some hard decisions and fast!

Will Melani and Mano make it down the aisle or will the past force its way into the present? Gabe tried to protect Melani from headaches and heartbreaks will this be a hard lesson learned? Can Mano figure everything out and prove to everyone that Melani is both physically and mentally safe by his side? Love stories always have happy endings, but will this Hood Love Story prove to be something different?

title: When It All Falls Down
description:
Kaviance Xavier, who is known in the streets as Khaos, lived deep in the game and was ruthless in the streets. However, when tragedy strikes, instead of burning the city down, Kavi decides to leave the game. With a heavy heart and a tired mind, Kavi no longer has the desire to be the ruthless man the streets raised him to be. And he definitely wasn’t looking for, or thinking about, love. Kavi accepted what would be his new normal, a life alone, trying to put the pieces back together.
 
After the wreckage of his life fell down, Kavi began to find what he least expected to experience and that was love. Stuck between not wanting to ever love again and the sexy femininity of the two women that plagued his mind. Kavi was suffering an internal battle on how to move. In addition to the war he was battling within, the streets came knocking, trying to pull him back in.
 
Zayvion, Kavi’s brother, was ready to do whatever he needed to have his brother’s back. Dealing with his own issues surrounding love and commitment wouldn’t hinder his loyalty. However, while in the midst of eliminating the problems that came with being in the streets, Zayvion also had to deal with unexpected feelings, followed by being deeply hurt. The pain he experienced only made him more ruthless. So, he was ready for whatever the game tried to throw at him and his brother.
 
For Kavi and Zayvion, the war with their enemies seemed to be much easier to handle over the war they were battling internally. They could only hope that the issues plaguing them won’t spill over and get in the way of handling business. The road ahead for these two brothers isn't going to be easy, but as long as they stick together everything should be all good.

title: The Quartermaine Dynasty
description:
The Quartermaine Family have spent years establishing themselves. From the elite and prominent to the hood and gritty. The Dynasty has made their mark across the city of Chicago.
Deep hidden secrets from the past have hit the family like a ton of bricks. These secrets have the potential to dismantle The Quartermaines as they know it.
In this fourth installment of A Kingpins Queen there will be repercussions and consequences they never saw coming.
Follow The Quartermaine Dynasty and the couples you’ve fell in love with. As they embark on a emotional journey that will have you holding your breath and clutching your pearls by the time you’re done reading!

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Clarke & Tinsley
description:
Clarke and Tinsley couldn't be any more different from one another. He's older, and set in his ways, while she is younger and full of holiday cheer. Christmas is right around the corner, and she is ready to enjoy it. Clarke on the other hand, has barely even noticed that it's the holiday season.

When they are forced together on an assignment, the tension is at an all-time high. Tinsley is willing to make it work, hoping for a boost in her career, yet Clarke is completely against having a partner.

However, that doesn't stop the chemistry from brewing between the two of them. The temptation is strong, and will not be ignored. Before Clarke knows what is happening, his sights are being set on Tinsley, and he will stop at nothing to have her for himself.

The age gap, along with the fact that they work together causes Tinsley to be hesitant, but she can only fight against him for so long. He's too handsome, too charming, and entirely too confident. Are they strong enough to keep their distance, or will the Christmas spirit help them to find love in the most unlikely way?

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Kingston & Noel
description:
Life hasn’t always been nice to Noel. She has a secret that she vows to take to her grave. Moving on with her life, years later, she is now one of the best estheticians in Winter Crest. Imagine her surprise when the secret she tried so hard to forget, walks in seeking her services. 

Living the fast life, Kingston didn’t see himself slowing down anytime soon. Literally stumbling upon his greatest gift had him rearranging his future. Content with his life how it turned out, he didn’t think he needed anything else until he laid eyes on Noel. 

Things pick up quick, but we all know what’s done in the dark always finds its way to the light. Will secrets leave hearts shattered? With the holiday approaching will Kingston and Noel be able to move forward now that everything is on the table or will secrets be the end to all?

title: The Carter Cartel: Nori Carter
description:
The Carter Cartel always came out on top. Lynx knew it when he sat at the head of the table, and he knew that passing the reigns of the business down to Nori & Malik wouldn’t change anything. There would always be something, or someone, to watch out for. But the Carter men had eyes and ears everywhere, so fear never moved through them. They were the ones to incite fear, and that wouldn’t change no matter who was in charge.

Nori was ready to step up, even if that meant burying every emotion he had deep down. Making sure the family business ran smoothly and keeping fear running through the hearts of anyone who thought of testing him, was Nori’s top priority. He didn’t have time to focus on the hard, emotional decisions that had to be made before he became the man in charge. He couldn’t risk showing he had feelings. His enemies would target anything Nori showed emotion towards, so he reigned everything in, keeping tight control on everything in his life. He would never give anyone the satisfaction of besting him. That wasn’t possible because he was the best. And he would have it all… at all costs.

title: Every Block Boy Needs A Little Love 3
description: Synopsis

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Indiana & Ransom
description: Rapper Ransom knew the moment he made it big that he would retire at thirty. Clubbing and wildin' out are things he's no longer interested in, and Ransom is ready to retire, get married, and have kids. His wife-to-be, has other plans, however, and leaves him jilted on their wedding day weeks before Christmas. Ransom finds unexpected solace in Indiana, one of the leasing agents at The Carver Condominiums, where he lives. Indiana and Ransom have more in common than they expected, and their sexual chemistry is off the charts. Childhood trauma and recent loss are reasons why Indiana doesn't care for the holidays, and she and Ransom are both able to distract each other from their problems. When Ransom realizes he's been spending a lot of time with Indiana, he comes to the conclusion that it would be absurd to get attached to someone so soon after he was left at the altar. Indiana doesn't want to be a rebound, and she knows becoming attached to Ransom is no good either, but the two can't seem to stay away from each other. Will the holidays be the thing to bring them to their senses?

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Ice & Snow
description:
He’s from Winter Crest. 
She’s from Los Angeles. 
He’s well established, fresh out the projects.
She’s up and coming at the Glow Bar.
But they both have one thing in common… wanting love and a peaceful life for Christmas 

After losing her husband on Christmas Day, Ice’lyn Saint felt closed off to the world, so she needed a fresh start at life with her two small sons. Winter Crest seemed far away, but it instantly became home when she moved there from California. Finding love in her new city was the last thing on her list, but two charming men go out their way to sweep her off her feet for Christmas.

Jailyn Snow takes pride in his position as a philanthropist, especially around Christmas time. While doing the Lord’s work, he finds himself becoming a guardian angel to two little boys that needs him. While looking out for them, he finds himself looking out for their mother.

Snow and Ice wants to give everybody the world for Christmas, but end up giving themselves to the one they love.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Josiah & Harlow
description:
Winter Crest isn't the only thing icy this holiday season. The same can be said about Harlow's heart. Having her heart shattered a million times left her wanting a man for one reason, and that reason wasn’t for love.

Josiah thought he wanted to play the field. However, that quickly changed once he touched down and crossed paths with the beautiful Harlow Miracle.

The hood is all he knew. Luxury living is all she knew.

When these two encounter each other at the Carver Condominiums in Winter Crest, will they fall for one another? Or will the fact they are complete opposites cause Harlow to be in the same loveless situation that she's been in before?

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Alaura & Ru
description:
After losing the last parent that she knows, Alaura tries to get back into the swing of life but losing her grandfather is just the first of her misfortunes. Things begin to unravel and she doesn’t know if or how she can put it all back together. She meets a man who can relate with her loss and helps her get into the Christmas spirit.

Ru never thought his future would be a single father to his daughter. A year ago his life changed forever, but every day he pushes forward because he’s his daughter’s strength. Bumping into Alaura for the first time, he feels that there may be someone for him after all. After everything they’ve been through they’re both hesitant to give this a try, but them finding each other in the city of Winter Crest may just be what they both needed.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Qadir & Rumi
description:
After catching his wife in bed with his brother, Qadir Wright swore he’d never give his heart to another woman. Since then, he’s only used women for one thing and one thing only. However, when his long-time assistant has to leave the company for a family-related emergency, Qadir is forced to find a replacement. 

Rumi Allen wants nothing more than to give her younger brother the life he deserves. Having lost their parents two years ago in a fatal car accident, Rumi wants nothing more than to move away from the projects and give her brother the life he deserves. When her cousin tells her of a new position at her job, Rumi believes she just might be able to make good on the promise she made to her brother. Little did she know, she’d get a Christmas miracle of her own.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Sunset & Russ
description:
Sunset Johnson finds herself fed up with her half ass relationship. Deciding enough was enough, she heads back to her hometown, Winter Crest, leaving behind the fake picture perfect imagine. But not before doing something that would put her on Santa’s naughty list.

What she thought she was leaving behind in Houston, TX. follows right behind her, making it hard for her to forget that regretful, yet fulfilling night.

Dive into this short story and get a peek into Winter Crest. Where a chain of events take place, that will tug at your heart because everyone deserves a gift from Santa. No matter how naughty or nice you are.

title: Spoiled By A Hood Billionaire 2: An African American Romance
description:
With Chyna and Blessyn taken away, Biggz springs into action without a second's thought. He's set in his move through danger-filled city streets, coming through opponents to make sure Chyna and Blessyn safely come back home. But their homecoming doesn't, in fact, round up everything, as loyalties are tested and secrets begin to reveal themselves, putting Biggz in a fix. He has a tug-of-war between his pride and his heart, walking the tightrope. Fighting the inner demons, he faces by baring the painful truths of the past, at every unpredicted twist, Biggz finds himself nailed to excruciating choices that challenge his loyalty but believes that in the end one thing alone—family comes first.

Blessyn goes deep into the heart of Biggz's world and produces unearthed realities that would break the link they have knitted. Even her relationship would be tested by their faithfulness to each other, as she wrestles with an opportunity to be in love with a man of great wealth and complexity. As their secrets are exposed and the terrible truths of what really went on during one terrifying week come out, they find themselves both torn and compelled to stick together—or break up.

"Spoiled by a Hood Billionaire 2" weaves a tale of love, betrayal, and the strong desire of a love that defies all. Biggz and Blessyn know that they are playing with fire, and even the slightest mistake could cause them to lose their relationship. Join them on this roller-coaster ride one more time to see how on earth "being loved by a billionaire" could possibly have its ups and downs—serious, even life-threatening challenges. Can the love shared survive the tests put before them?

title: Finally Famous
description: If nothing else Rahlo is loyal. The five-letter word runs through his veins like blood and expels from his body like his next breath. With a new contract on the table, the rap star learns that fame and fortune don't necessarily change you. It changes the people around you.Taylor is living her best life! The plus-size beauty unapologetically challenges society's rules for big girls. With a slick mouth and dangerous curves, Taylor captures the eye of a rapper who has her questioning her current relationship.Take a ride with the duo as they navigate through money-hungry family members and heart-numbing betrayal. Together they learn that being loyal to the wrong people comes with a price that can cost them their lives!

title: Skye Fall (The Moon Run Series Book 5)
description: Coming to a final conclusion with this Moon Series. Recap! This is a black urban fantasy fiction Novel. All her life, Jasmine has been groomed in Atlanta’s high society to be the perfect woman of wealth. Soon to be married off to Percy Hugo Milton to keep money circulating between black families, she realizes she’s stuck in a dead end relationship where he basically, “ain’t shit”. Money matters most, marriage is nothing but a business deal, and love is nonexistent in Percy’s eyes. Not to mention he finds her particularly boring, and uninspiring. Jasmine becomes desperate when she seeks the help of a spiritual guide. An eccentric witch named Delilah Skye who grants her three things she wants in life. Friendship, great sex, and true love. Yet, the reading doesn’t go as planned when Delilah informs Jasmine that everything she wants is hidden in the man she hates the most. Percy. After a wild drunken night in Atlanta a few years ago with some girl he never planned on seeing again, Homer Skye thought he had life figured out. He had the plans laid out to propose to his long time girlfriend Nasia Stewart, move her into a house, and start his family immediately. The all american dream. That is, until he runs into his one night stand, Pia Milton, and their two year old daughter he knew nothing about. With the Moon becoming full almost every night in Atlanta, things start to turn upside down as these two stories collide at the hands of black magic, family ties, and messy drama. Determined to find true love, Jasmine takes matters into her own hands by proposing a deal to her cheating fiancé. Pia has to come to terms with tolerating her child’s father, and the black magic that runs deep in his crazy family. While Homer struggles with the thought of this woman who lied about their daughter for two years, might just be the one he’s meant to be with all along. Fine This story contains a little magic, belief in the impossible, and a few other random things and people that make up the story. Might be some hood shit in here too, I don’t know. I say, just read it.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Eira & Kodak
description:
Eira grew up feeling like no one wanted her until she felt a genuine love from Kodak, the neighborhood thief in a Grinch mask. With a past she was determined to overcome, she now had a wealthy boyfriend and was the proud owner of the hottest clothes and shoe store in Winter Crest’s Galleria. But when she locks eyes on a new resident to her side of town, she can’t help but wonder, is it truly all good?

Kodak started robbing young to supply his brother and cousin with the necessities to even have life. With a mom who couldn’t stay off drugs and so many people depending on him, he needed an escape and he found one, in Eira. But that was years ago, and he was now on a mission to find the person who set him up for a robbery he ironically did not commit causing him to lose out on six years of his life. Will he be okay with what he finds during his mission?

Two souls who meet under the most traumatic circumstances become close in the most healing way to only have to live without each other after fate takes another turn. Will fate choose to align them once more, or will the dark secrets that lurk in disguise burn any possibility for them to finally complete one another?

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Aspen & Gabriel
description:
Aspen Brooks had it all. A good career working at Winter Crest General Hospital and a man she wanted to spend the rest of her life with. Or so she thought.

Cole was everything in Aspen’s eyes. He had a good job working as a real estate agent and he showered her with love every chance he got. When a secret that he’s been hiding for months is revealed, Aspen’s heart is shattered into a million pieces.

With the Christmas holiday approaching, Aspen is no longer in the Christmas spirit until a blast from her past resurfaces and has her rethinking her feelings on love.

Gabe and Aspen once shared a love that they both walked away from due to their budding careers. However, when Gabe moves back to Winter Crest, he’s adamant on the two of them having another chance at love.

Will the two reconcile their love for one another or will Aspen let what one man did to her miss out on the love that she truly deserves?

title: A Winter Crest Valentine's: Ice & Snow
description:
Love is in the air…

Ice is pregnant and one of the top barbers at the Glow Bar. Snow is content in his love life and career. In this romantic spin-off, you will see where their insta-love will end up.

Nutmeg is in love, and Orion worships the ground she walks on, but his past is causing a roadblock, and he’s hoping it won’t affect the woman he loves the most, which is Nutmeg.

This Valentine’s Day in Winter Crest runs deeper than the season of love…

title: Billionaire Love
description:
It was time for Jada to put herself first, even if it came at the expense of breaking up her family. She didn’t want her toxic home life to affect the mental well-being of her children. They deserved better than what she had. Moving forward with plans of living her best life, Jada was met with more challenges, making her question if being a single mother was better than being in a relationship but still feeling alone. 

Damien had it all but felt like he had nothing at the age of thirty-eight. He led a life that consisted of counting his money, mapping out ways to make more money, and then flipping that income for an even bigger profit. His life revolved around always being on the go and building a bigger empire. There was little time for anything else in his life.

Even though Jada and Damien had set their sights on leading successful lives, not thinking about love, their paths cross, and they are both forced to look at things differently. Sometimes, all it takes is a glance, a touch, or a shared smile to make the fast-paced world skid to a halt. With the outside world fading into the background, these two could possibly find in one another what they’ve been missing.

title: The Wife Of A Jamaican Billionaire
description:
In the heart of the middle-class life in Miami, Ash-leigh—a young, stunning woman with a heart as golden as the Miami's sunsets—navigates life with grace despite her current financial struggles and rough circumstances. As a loving mother to Kairo, her bright and adoring son, she is the pillar and backbone of their small family. However, their world is constantly shaken by the emotional and toxic relationship she shares with Kairo’s father, Kyron. Once deeply in love, Ash-leigh and Kyron's relationship now lies nearly in the pits of hell, marred by money problems and bitter arguments that their son cannot help but overhear through the thin walls of their humble home.

For Ash-leigh, it is a daily struggle to reconcile the harsh, unfaithful man Kyron has become with the man she once loved so deeply. She dreams of being his wife, hoping they can be the happy family she craves. But with each obstacle she and Kyron faces, that dream seems to slip further down the drain and far out of reality. Just when Ash-leigh is on the verge of giving up hope, a twist of fate introduces her to a world she never dared to imagine. She crosses paths with a charismatic Jamaican billionaire, Denver Steele AKA Devil, whose affection for her could be the ticket out of the relentless grind of poverty that has defined her life.

Now, Ash-leigh is faced with a choice. Can she abandon the man she once loved and the father of her child for the promise of a brighter, more secure future? Or will she stay and fight for her family, risking it all in the process? As Ash-leigh teeters on the brink of two vastly different worlds, she must navigate a path that challenges her values, her family, and her very sense of self.

In "The Wife of a Jamaican Billionaire," Candy Moore crafts a heartfelt and evocative narrative that delves into the human consequences of love, sacrifice, and tough choices. It is a love story that will pull at your heartstrings and immerse you in the sun-soaked beautiful city of Miami.

title: The Wife Of A Jamaican Billionaire 2
description:
In Part 1 of "The Wife of a Jamaican Billionaire", Ash-Leigh's fake marriage proposal and fake fiancé were supposed to be simple and straightforward. Once she is accepted, her son Kairo will be safe and maybe her ex-fiancé will learn to finally appreciate the woman she was, and Denver Steele AKA Devil will keep his businesses and hopefully gain another.
Everybody wins! However, Ash-Leigh was not expecting to live under the same roof as Denver. That's when things really began to heat up. I mean how was Ash-Leigh to resist this man? His nickname might have been Devil but his face and body appeared to have been Heaven sent.

However, when Ash-Leigh learns of Denver's true reasons for wanting to get married before she gets a chance to confront him with her findings, she ends up in a coma. Now, Denver, who has fallen head over heels with Ash-Leigh, is left in a state of despair.

Denver never believed he would actually want to get married, more so to be a stepfather to the young rebellious teenager who robbed his jewelry store. Never leaving Ash-Leigh's side at the hospital, Denver and Kairo are more than relieved when she finally opens her eyes.

Life took another sharp left turn for both Ash-Leigh and Denver when they are faced with another devasting challenge once Ash-Leigh's awake.

Will Denver get the chance to profess his love to Ash-Leigh and will they both walk down the aisle with real intentions and not fake ones?

Let’s take a luxurious ride through the streets of Miami with Candy Moore in her African American Romance and drama-filled tale of love, hate, triumph, and heartbreak.

title: Bought By A Rich Brooklyn Hitta 2: Finale
description: At the end of book one, Heat’s past shows back up with a startling and surprising newcomer. In book two, Heat is on edge as unlimited questions swirl around but being hit with devastating news regarding his twin sends him in an uproar. However, when addition haunting information is revealed and surfaces, Heat’s life is really thrown into a tailspin. Now that Heat and Iceland are on the same page and are expecting, will his past interfere with his promising future? Through all of the chaos and mockery, will Iceland stay and be his forever rider? Or will his torrid life sends her packing and never looking back?Iceland loves Heat without a doubt. However, when Heat leaves her without answers when storms start brewing, Ice is determined not to live life as she had before with her former husband. Using her voice and her actions, she makes Heat very aware of her intentions and how much she is willing to take and what she won’t take. After experiencing Heat’s icy demeanor, will Iceland be a woman of her words and leave the Brooklyn hitta who has captured her heart and love?In this very heated and blistering cold finale, secrets are revealed and hit hard, killing, stealing,and destroying lives and homes. Living in one’s truth is a simple gesture but it wrecks lives when you’re doing the opposite. Check out how Heat and Icelynn’s lives are forever changed, determining if being brought by a hitta was worth it after all.

title: Charmed by a Rich N*gga
description:
With the world at her creative fingertips, her best friend by her side, and her perfect man loving her, 27 years old Chicago “Chi” Owens is beautiful inside and out with a tough girl interior, just like the city she’s named after. Following the death of her father, Chi becomes a true momma’s girl, living with mom as well as owning a fashion designer shop together, creating remarkably exquisite gowns for any occasion. With years invested and despite her family’s grievance, she envisions living a full life with Main, marriage and kids. While ignoring people’s unwanted updates and warnings about her man and his wandering ways, Chi denies the truth until it glares in her face, confirming his deceitfulness and crushing her simultaneously.
With a ruptured heart, a shattered mind, and a betrayed spirit, Chi dips out of the city she loves for a much needed getaway, visiting her favorite cousin in the A. While mending her reeling heart and weaving her life back together, her plan to be FNF is dismantled after encompassing a real rich n*gga, getting lost in his charming ways. By becoming a target on Dame Caston’s radar, Chi doesn’t know all that it entails or comes with it but she soon finds out. With all of the heartbreak she has suffered, will Chicago open her mind and heart to let love in again so soon? Can she be someone’s ride or die?
In Book One of your favorite Pen Pusha’s enthralling and thrilling, action-filled African American urban hood drama, all kinds of pandemonium land at Chicago’s feet. From ultimate betrayal to baby mama madness to certain death to unyielding love. No one is untouchable. Majority will feel pleasure and pain. Dive in and see how susceptible you are to a real n*gga’s charming ways.

title: A Virgin Heiress And A Hood Billionaire
description:
When he was 10 years old, Khozen’s life was severely dismantled by the deaths of his parents. After going through foster care, Khozen is reunited with his uncle Storm, who moves him from the Chi and resettle in New York. Now years later, dangerous and powerful street moguls Storm and Khozen are returning back to the Chi for legitimate business when Storm run across a blast from his past, unknowingly placing Khozen face to face with his future. Or is it intentional? When Storm assign Khozen a new task, will he be able to complete the assignment? Or will this be the one time that he let his uncle down?

After the death of her grandma, instead of staying in a child’s place, Adora takes on the role of mothering her drug addicted momma while working, going to school, and ensuring her mom’s ever growing drug debt are paid. When she encounters an unfamiliar man who has connection with her mom and dad, Adora’s life as she knows it takes an interesting twist, forcing her to become involuntary imprisoned due to no fault of her own. However, when life intervenes along the way, Adora loses something more valuable than gold but gains a lot more in the process.

With a 90 day deadline on the line, things get more than complicated when a virgin heiress meets a hood billionaire. Khozen and Adora are the complete opposite but there is an undeniable attraction that just won’t go away. Book one of this urban fiction African American BBW love story brings a world full of uncertainty, secrets, unknown danger, and forbidden lust while love looms right over the horizon.

title: Protected By A Gangster: Mishelle's Story: Standalone
description: At 14 years of age, Mishelle would give anything to stay in a child’s place. However,it is difficult for her to do since she takes care of her household along with heryounger brother and her mother. The cruelty of the world is shown to themon a daily basis, from their neighbors to their school to their own family. But whenthe finest dude in their hood comes to her aid, Mishelle is thrown off by his kindnessand protectiveness but welcomes it wholeheartedly.When she turns 15, Mishelle’s world is turned upside down, with pieces shatteredso badly that they are hard to mend. Committed to taking care of her brother byany means, she discovers a trusted life lesson that sometimes your family is notalways your blood family and that blood is not always thicker than water. On theflip side, her gangster protector shows her the definition of love and care.Fast-forward years later, Mishelle learns the hard way between a real man and a grown little boy. Life turns her every which way but loose, but she is still holding on for dear life. In this soul-searching and heart-wrenching urban fiction African American novel, best-selling author Dedra B. brings you a story where art imitates real life, offering unwavering love, hope, protectiveness, and security in a world full of struggle, cruelty, hardships, and misfortune in this full length standalone.

title: The Wife Of A Jamaican Billionaire 3: The Finale
description:
In the gripping finale of "The Wife of a Jamaican Part 3", Miami's sunlit boulevards and shadowy corners play host to a stirring tale of love, passion, and second chances.

Heartbroken Ash-Leigh faces every mother's worst nightmare when her ex-fiancé, Kyron—the man she once believed was her forever—takes their teenage son. Amidst the swirling emotions of betrayal and lost love, she's compelled to make a heart-wrenching choice, setting in motion events that lead to unforeseen and devastating consequences.

Denver, known to many as "Devil", finds his world shattered when he realizes his beloved wife, Ash-Leigh, is missing. Fueled by love and desperation, he ventures into Miami's underbelly, risking it all to protect his family.

Love is further tested as brothers Dallas and Desert grapple with their own romantic entanglements. While Dallas seeks solace with Chastity, Desert faces past demons in a complicated relationship with Cloud and memories of a failed secret relationship.

In this passionate African American Romance, love, loyalty, and fate collide. As these captivating characters navigate their intertwined destinies, the boundaries between love's salvation and heartbreak become thin as a wet paper-bag.

title: A Virgin Heiress And A Hood Billionaire 2: Finale
description:
At the conclusion of part one, Adora receives a surprise ending, but could it be true? In part two, the twists keeps on twisting. It seems like everyone and everything in her life as well as Khozen’s is doing the Cha Cha Slide and putting it in reverse.
What everyone has known seems to disappear right before their very own eyes. Making it hard to separate illusion from reality. The past won’t stay buried. And the present keeps on life-ing. In this urban fiction African American final installment, being an heiress and a billionaire is not without their own sets of problems. In fact, more problems appear to be in store at every corner. Get into this finale and see if Adora and Khozen can overcome the mountains of lies, betrayal, and secrets that lie within their path.

title: First Come Thugs, Then Come Marriage 4
description:
With love, pain, and heartache, the Grand family is in a mess. Angelina does something crazy that puts Kal in the hospital, fighting for his life. Knight wants to pull together as a family, but Blessing ain't having it—she blames him and makes sure he knows it.

Knight hits the streets, desperate to find Angelina. But a nagging question follows Is she the only one messing things up?

Bishop and Deja's love is on the rocks. Deja remembers everything and knows Bishop went ahead and got married. Heartbroken, she's ready to walk away for good. That's until she finds out her mom and sister sold her business and are even trying to sell her house. Now, she wonders if she might need Bishop more than she thought.

Rook and Golden are smack in the middle of all this. Golden's husband is the reason the family's in trouble in the first place. Golden thinks about going back to him to protect her new family, but will Rook let her? And should he?

And don't forget about King. Nobody knows where he is, but everyone feels his absence. Will the Grand men save their love lives and their business, or will they get played?

J. Dominique has thus far brought you a complete four-part series with a sprinkle of hood love, African American romance, and a spoonful of drama and secrets that you'll love.

title: A Billionaire's Weakness 3
description:
All Lee wanted was to win Constance back into his life. When he finally succeeded the couple barely had time to celebrate the reunion. Bruce was threatening to expose a big secret of the Yoshida family, he wasn’t Lee’s biological father. Aside from Lee’s CEO title on the line, the real hurt was the identity of his real father.
 That was about to shake the entire family upside down. Also, Lee still has been keeping certain details about himself from Constance. Eventually he’ll have to come clean which terrified him that he could scare her off for good.
Jackie and Charley’s relationship was headed in the right direction. Both were making big strides in their careers. However, Charley is told a devastating fact about her late mom and it’s big enough to destroy her relationship with her dad forever. Not to mention Joshua and Sanjay have developed a plan to come between the two.
With desperation comes dangerous outcomes that will be someone’s demise. Secrets are revealed, trauma revisited, and limits are pushed to the breaking point of no return. What lines will enemies cost to maintain order, wealth, and power. The FINAL installment of this three-part series will keep you on the edge of your seat with each page turn.

title: When A Texas Millionaire Wants You 2
description:
As Essence James faces the heart-wrenching reality of her crumbling marriage, she casts aside her vulnerability, determined to rise stronger than before. While she strives to provide stability for her sons amidst the chaos, her vindictive soon-to-be-ex-husband, Maurice, seeks to undermine her at every turn. His shockingly hidden second family is a devastating blow, but Essence is determined to remain unbroken.
Maurice, a man consumed by his own ego, struggles to accept the downfall of his marital paradise. He's confronted by the painful truth that he may have lost the best thing in his life. But instead of humility, Essence's newfound strength and independence push him further into a vengeful spiral.
Giovanni Saint, a handsome boss with his own battles, who's rising against his enemies one at a time. But even he isn't immune to the charms of the beautiful Kassandra. She's a temptation that could jeopardize everything he holds dear.
Dive back into the world of love, betrayal, and redemption, and discover whether the wounds of the past can truly be healed. Get ready to cry, laugh and be upset all in one with part 2 of "When A Texas Millionaire Want’s You." Queen Rae is back and her pen is lethal and her African American love stories is unputdownable.

title: Exchanging My Ring For A Street King 2
description:
Just as Ava begins to see a glimmer of hope in her life, another obstacle emerges, casting a shadow over her newfound optimism. The love she once sought for solace has proven to be detrimental. Will she be open to giving love another chance?

Eli has steadfastly fought for his place in Ava's life, despite her attempts to push him away. He carries emotional baggage that hinders his ability to be with her, yet his consistent display of love persists. Could his hidden secret threaten their relationship?

Ava and Eli experienced love at first sight, but an excess of a good thing can be harmful. How will these two navigate their complicated situation?

title: A Billionaire's Weakness 2
description:
Constance

Rewind to earlier that morning

“Wife?”
“Yes, his wife, as in till death do us part.” The woman in front of me waved her bony finger in my face that had a big diamond wedding ring on it.
I heard Charley, Kitty, and Simmora ranting over Joshua. They weren’t paying me and what I faced any attention.
“Let’s step to the back,” she suggested when she looked behind me at my sister and friends.
At this point, there was no reason for me to object. She switched toward the back like a model on the runway. I watched her put her briefcase on the table, then she turned to me. The woman wasn’t ugly at all. Japanese descent but with no accent.
