Her lips were full, her hair was long and brunette, and her skin was milky white. Her eyes were round with a slight slant. I saw the cattiness, sneaky, and scheming ways she had about her. She was too posh, almost like an AI image.
“Let’s start over—”
“We really don’t have to. Your name is Meixiu Sato-Yoshida, and you are Kiyoshi Lee Yoshida’s wife.” There was no need for her to keep repeating that. I finally got it and realized this was real...

Finding out the man Constance possibly fell in love with was married shattered her entire world.
Jackie and Charley have ended their relationship before it truly begun. Charley decided to remain faithful to her boyfriend Joshua. But when it comes out that he did not give Charley the same loyalty she has to deal with that.

Major, Lee's childhood friend, is back in town and has his eyes kn Constance. The timing is perfect for him to mend her broken heart.

Bruce and Sook Yoshida are still determined to take control of their sons lives by any means necessary.

Trust is broken, certain people will spiral out if control and trauma wounds will reopen and so much more in this second installment of A Billionaire's Weakness.

title: Alone in Miami at 3AM
description: What happens when fate brings two people together in Magic love City of Miami… a drunken night of pleasure?Zuri Ross was on a mission to save her marriage, even if that meant doing something completely out of character to please her husband. When she realizes that he isn’t as deserving of her sacrifice as he seems, she’s left feeling a mix of emotions. Hurt and anger being the most prominent. She finds solace at the hotel’s bar, at the bottom of multiple shots. With revenge on her mind, it’s not hard to fall into the arms of another man who just might be everything she didn’t know she needed.Shai A’santi just wanted to be left alone. After a betrayal of his own, he’s in Miami waiting for the smoke to clear from a hasty decision. A late-night drink brings the rich bachelor in contact with the beautiful Zuri Ross, and he’s immediately enamored by her. After finding out about their similar situations, he decides that a night of pleasure could be the answer to mend both their broken hearts.When Sevyn Ellis finds out her best friend is in trouble, she drops everything and jumps on a flight to come to the rescue. Having a few marital issues of her own, she plans to let loose, and when she runs across Shai’s cousin, Zaakir A’sante, he seems like just the person to help her. Will one night of passion change the course of both their futures?Zaakir A’sante was just out to have a good time while making sure his cousin was staying out of trouble. But as soon as he laid eyes on the mysterious Sevyn, he knew he had to have her. She was different from any woman he’d ever encountered and wasn’t trying to force things to be more than what they were. Not used to a woman being so nonchalant, Zaakir finds himself wanting to know more about her, and the more he finds out, the more he wants to know. When feelings get involved where they shouldn’t, will the pair take the leap and admit their feelings for one another?One night in Miami brings four people together, but will their return to Chicago tear them apart? Find out in "Alone in Miami at 3AM" by Author J. Dominique Williams. This African American romance is hot and unputdownable.

title: I Let A Country Boy Get Me Pregnant 2: An African American Romance
description:
Teena thought she found calm waters when she reconnected with Giuseppe, her first love from fourteen years ago. But as they rekindle their romance, Teena finds herself drawn into the dysfunctional web of Giuseppe's family. Their dark secrets and complicated bonds threaten to capsize their relationship before it can truly set sail.

Meanwhile, Psalms continues his inner struggle, tempted by his growing attraction to Teena yet wary of coming between her and Giuseppe. But Teena's heart remains divided, torn between the familiarity of the past and the excitement of the present.

When Leelee resurfaces pregnant with Teena's ex Phear's baby, the tangled bonds of friendship and family loyalty get tested to the max. Teena reaches out to support her troubled friend, only to realize some wounds run too deep.

Lies are told, trusts are broken, and shocking truths emerge that turn Teena's world upside down. Will the power of love stay afloat, or will the poison of betrayal sink everything from the inside out? Dive into the second installment of "I Let A Country Boy Get Me Pregnant" to find out.

title: When A Texas Millionaire Wants You 3: The Finale
description:
In the gripping finale of this fast paced and heart tugging trilogy, the stakes are higher, the passions deeper, and karma is ready to have her final say. Essence, Giovanni, and Maurice – each entangled in a web of power, money, and cheating for no reason – find themselves at a crossroads where every choice comes with a price.

Essence, once ensnared in Giovanni's betrayal, emerges with a newfound strength. This time, she's choosing herself, embodying the glow of a woman who's not just surviving but thriving against all odds. Her transformation sends a powerful message to the loss of a good woman is his burden to bear, a lesson he learns too late.

Maurice, meanwhile, grapples with the harsh taste of his own medicine. Abandoning what he once had for a fleeting illusion, he faces a harsh reality. When he seeks solace in the arms of the one woman who's always been there, he's met with a stark truth – there's an undeniable finality in a woman's resolve when she's truly fed up.

Giovanni, ever the relentless pursuer, refuses to accept Essence's rejection. To him, every 'no' is just a hurdle in his quest for love. His determination, bordering on obsession, blinds him to the fact that Essence's heart has journeyed beyond his reach. Even as she finds solace in another, Giovanni sees nothing but a challenge to be conquered, not realizing that some fires only burn what's left to ashes.

As their paths converge and diverge, each must confront the reality that not all quests for power, money, and love lead to a happy ending. In this emotionally charged finale, the characters must navigate the complexities of the heart, the weight of their choices, and the unpredictable whims of fate. Who will emerge unscathed, and who will be consumed by the flames of desire and ambition?

title: I Let A Country Boy Get Me Pregnant 3: An African American Romance: The Finale
description:
In this heart pounding conclusion of “I Let a Country Boy Get Me Pregnant,” Teena's heart is like a hood turf war of love and regret. Torn between the ache of second chance love and the thrill of forbidden passion, she finds herself at a crossroads, haunted by a choice that could change everything.

Teena believed she knew heartache, but nothing prepared her for the searing pain of watching the man she loves marry another woman. Her world, once filled with dreams of their future, crumbles to dust at the altar, leaving her to pick up the pieces of her shattered heart.

Giuseppe, a man haunted by shadows of a troubled past, finds himself trapped in a web of memories and longing. His love for Teena is has nearly faded, yet it's a love entangled with pain and the ghosts of yesterday. Torn between the past and the present, Giuseppe stands at a crossroads, wrestling with the agony of letting go. Can he release the love that has defined him, or will he cling to the remnants of a dream?

Psalms, ever the loyal heart, finds himself ensnared in a love that defies reason. Ebony, a constant presence in his life, has been his rock, his anchor in the storm. Yet, Teena's allure pulls him into a whirlwind, making him question everything he thought he knew about love and loyalty. As Teena dances dangerously between him and his brother, Psalms is drawn into a game of the heart, where the rules are unclear and the stakes are high.

In this tale of passion and betrayal, love is the most relentless and treacherous battlefield. It's a war where hearts are on the line, boundaries are obliterated, and sometimes, the price paid is far greater than one could ever imagine. As the dust settles, who will remain standing? Who will be broken by love's unforgiving hand?

Dive into this unforgettable journey of love, loss, and redemption, and discover the powerful conclusion to the saga of Teena and her country boy. This is more than a African American romance—it's an exploration of the deepest human emotions, a testament to the enduring power of love, even in the face of the greatest odds.

title: Exchanging My Ring For A Street King
description:
All Ava Nelson wanted out of her marriage was for her husband to be all about her. To love her in all the ways in which she loved him. Ava flees town, attempting to escape the turmoil caused by her husband. While seeking refuge, a man by the name of Eli ‘Slick’ Cortez charms his way into her presence.

Much like his childhood nickname, Slick is known around Atlanta as the shrewd gentleman who’s deeply entrenched in the drug game. Slick’s life revolves around the dangerous world he has carved out for himself, but his relationship with his girlfriend is deteriorating, plagued by trust issues and turmoil. That is until Ava mistakenly stumbles her way inside his mind.

Will they find the solace that their hearts so desperately need? Is Ava going to give her marriage a try or Exchange her Ring for A Street King?

title: Plan B Drama & Baby Mama’s 3: An African American Romance: The Finale (Plan B Drama & Baby Mama's)
description:
S.L. Partee brings an electrifying close to a saga that has captured the hearts and minds of readers everywhere with "Plan B Drama & Baby Mama's 3." This final installment in the series is a testament to Partee's mastery in weaving drama, suspense, and raw emotion into a narrative that keeps readers on the edge of their seats.

In this gripping finale, Shayne's world is once again turned upside down as evil makes a relentless comeback. The unexpected return of Elim threatens not just her peace but also the lives of those she cherishes. As the drama reaches its zenith, the stakes skyrocket, challenging relationships and forcing difficult choices that send lives into a dizzying spiral.

Wylde faces his own turmoil, grappling with a shift in his family dynamics that leaves him reeling with questions and doubts. His decision to push people away in a bid to protect them ironically starts to erode the trust they once placed in him. Alone and uncertain, Wylde must navigate a labyrinth of deception and betrayal, especially when he discovers that his greatest enemy shares his bloodline. His actions and their consequences paint a vivid picture of struggle and resilience.

Lishan and Wood are not spared from the storm. The revelation that Wood has a son throws their relationship into uncharted territory, leaving Lishan feeling alienated in her own life. Their love is tested like never before, raising the can they withstand the relentless pressures of life's unexpected challenges?

"Plan B Drama & Baby Mama's 3" is more than just a story; it's a rollercoaster of emotions, a complex tapestry of human experiences, and a fitting conclusion to a series that has enthralled readers from the very beginning. Join S.L. Partee in this unmissable finale that promises to leave a lasting impression.

title: Baby For A Billionaire Plug
description: Six years ago, despite her parents’ warning, beautiful and naïve Haiti native, Arielle Etienne, falls in love with a smooth-talking American man and makes the grown decision to move to the US to live out her dreams, unknowingly leaving her home on the back of broken promises. Arriving in Atlanta, her reality and dreams are quickly shattered after learning the true nature of her man. Now at the age of 24, Arielle is desperate and ready to change her life and circumstance. When an opportunity presents itself, she puts a plan in motion but her great escape doesn’t pins out like she hoped. When a dire situation arises, Arielle is thrown at the mercy of a stranger. Will the stranger turn out to be her unexpected savior? Or will he turn out to be her worst nightmare? After dealing with a mentally-ill mother, escaping their volatile environment, and keeping his sister safe, all 12 years old Saint Miller ever wanted is a family to call his own. Out of options, Saint decides to join the neighborhood gang, the Black Spades, preparing to do whatever to keep his sister safe and warm. However, their lives are forever changed on the night he’s supposed to fully get integrated into the gang life. Fast-forward 17 years later, 29 year old Saint and his sister have literally gone from rags to riches. After earning his way up in the family business, he is ready to take on a new promotion, solidifying his position as the head plug. However, not everyone is happy about his come up and is ready to deaden the situation. But when a surprising event interrupts his life, Saint is on the verge of getting exactly what he wants. But will the trouble brewing around him stop him from achieving his ultimate goal?Trust is challenged. Secrets are revealed. Strangers becomes family. And enemies are not necessary strangers. Arielle and Saint come from very different worlds, but their goals are the same… to have a family. Will the past interfere with the present? Since Arielle’s trust has been broken, can she find it in her heart to trust again? Check out author Talehia’s new thrilling African American urban hood story, Baby For A Billionaire Plug, and see how Saint and Arielle’s world collides.

title: Can't Get Enough Of His Hood Love
description:
Getting it by any means necessary is what Cheyenne constantly had to tell herself, when it came to providing for her and her nine-year-old sister. With the two of them not having a father figure in their lives and living with a drug addicted mother, Cheyenne is left to tend to her sister, while also trying not to let life beat her down.
While running the streets in the hood, alone, Cheyenne finds herself in a horrific situation. However, saved by a well-known guy in the hood named Keylow, she somehow finds herself secretely attrated to him, even through the hard demeanor and crazy behavior. 
As the story unfolds, they both find themselves stuck between a rock and a hard place due to the fact, they are both dealing with someone.
There’s a storm brewing in this love tale and rocky roads ahead, but dive into this first installment of Can’t Get Enough of His Hood Love and see if fate brings two hearts together, or will past and current relations keep them apart?

title: Pregnant By A Down South Millionaire
description:
From the author that brought you the bestselling Taken By A Wealthy Man
"Sometimes our mothers' advice hits hard, but when my Mama told me that all men are dogs, that ninety-nine percent of them will cheat, and one hundred percent of them will lie, she was speaking a painful truth. Some men are just overgrown little boys, never grasping that it's time to man up. Let's talk trust issues, shall we? Tuh. They might wine and dine you, but the second they figure out you're not a woman to be trifled with, they switch up real quick." Sincerely, a woman emotionally drained from being played and cheated on.

Doll, ever the hopeless romantic, has faced heartbreak more times than she'd care to admit. Finally, she summons the courage to kick her toxic ex, Jerrell, to the curb. Fast forward four years, and a bombshell secret shatters her world—a secret her entire family, including her so-called best friend Stoney, had been keeping from her. Heartbroken and disillusioned, Doll swears off love. That is, until she crosses paths with Scar, the epitome of the men she vowed to avoid.

Scar may have been born into wealth, but he didn't rest on those laurels. Carving a name for himself in the gritty Montgomery streets, he now co-owns one of the most opulent hotel chains in the South. Money pours in, but something—or rather, someone—is missing. A seasoned player, Scar can have any woman swooning, all but one. Doll becomes a captivating challenge, a tantalizing puzzle he's hell-bent on solving.

Contrary to his unsettling name, Schizo is a man of deep affection, especially for those he holds dear. Convinced he's found his soulmate, he’s ready to dedicate his life to her. But then fate throws a wrench into his plans, leaving him emotionally torn between two one he loves, and one he's helplessly in love with.

Meanwhile, Stoney's heart is pulverized when she learns her relationship with Wade was built on lies. Her eyes wander towards forbidden territory—her enigmatic boss, Schizo. Emotions surge like an unstoppable wave, and now she harbors a secret—a secret that promises her the world, if she's willing to shatter a few hearts to get it.

title: When A Texas Millionaire Wants You
description:
How far should a woman have to go to make a loveless marriage work? Essence James confronts not just the absence of affection but also a deep, soul-crushing loneliness, all while wearing a painful fake smile. Every effort to win the love of Maurice, the man to whom she has devoted her life, costs her more than just self-respect. Misplacing the blame for her failed marriage, Essence physically starves herself in an attempt to save her family. Battling depression, anxiety, and rejection takes a toll on her mental and emotional health, bringing her to the brink of no return. Using her recent weight gain as a convenient excuse, Maurice coldly abandons her and their two children, utterly disregarding the emotional wreckage he leaves behind.

Giovanni Saint, a man whose presence in her office at the halfway house, alters the course of her life, providing her an emotional revival. Despite his label as a felon fresh out of prison, and his current residence in a halfway house, Giovanni brings something into Essence's life that she has long missed. Their counselor-resident relationship develops into something deeper than friendship, offering mutual support and companionship.

Even as Giovanni navigates his own problems—legal troubles and a turbulent past—he steps in when Maurice shatters Essence's world by kicking her out and leaving her penniless. In a society that often dismisses him due to his criminal record, Giovanni rises to become not just a businessman and a wealthy Texas hustler with charm and charisma, but also Essence's unexpected savior. He teaches her valuable lessons about love, respect, and self-worth, emphasizing that every woman should have a real man to provide for them.

In the name of love and friendship, they both learn harsh truths. Giovanni realizes that not everyone deserves a seat at his table—from a backstabbing best friend to a manipulative mother and a trifling baby mama filled with drama. Yet, in Essence, he finds a genuine connection, one that teaches both him and her that blood isn't always thicker than water.

title: Pregnant By A Down South Millionaire 2
description: Doll is on the brink of securing the life she's always envisioned, a life filled with love and romance. But as she stands on the cusp of this new chapter, echoes from her past rise to challenge her newfound happiness. Distinct figures from days gone by emerge on her doorstep, their motives ranging from heartfelt to hidden agendas. This love story is not just about passion but also about trust as Doll's relationships are strained, compelling her to make a life-altering choice.Amidst the relative calm descending on the city, the Millionaires' enclave finds itself drawing unwelcome attention. Keeping a low profile becomes increasingly difficult, particularly with Schizo's erratic behaviors adding to the fray. Parallelly, Scar's own romance is in turmoil as he grapples with concealed truths, threatening to drag him back to bygone habits."Pregnant by a Down South Millionaire 2" is more than just an urban love story. It peels back layers of family secrets that have individuals questioning their very core. Embark on a tale of romance where every turn holds a fresh surprise.

title: Pregnant By A Down South Millionaire 3: The Finale
description:
No woman should have to experience this type of heartache and pain.

Betrayed. Heartbroken. Determined.

Doll's life is a whirlwind of emotion when a devastating secret comes to light. It's not just any secret – it's one that shakes the very foundation of her world, sending her on a soul-searching journey into her past. She's always been strong, but this revelation tests her like never before.

Stoney's heart is in pieces. The loss of her daughter is a pain so deep, it threatens to consume her. Every day is a battle with her grief, and even Schizo's unwavering support can't seem to reach her. She's drowning in sorrow, struggling to find a reason to keep going.

In the midst of their personal turmoil, another tragedy strikes, bending them to the breaking point. Being with a millionaire was supposed to be a dream, but for Doll, it's turning into a nightmare. How much more can she take before everything she's worked for crumbles to dust?

Vulnerable. Resilient. Hopeful.

Doll and Stoney are two women bound by love and plagued by loss. In a world where their strength is constantly tested, they must confront the harsh truths of their lives.

For Doll, it's the realization that love can be a double-edged sword, cutting deep when you least expect it. For Stoney, it's learning that even in the darkest times, there's a glimmer of hope – if only she can hold on.

"Pregnant by a Down South Millionaire 3" is a raw and emotional journey through love, betrayal, and the strength of the woman’s love. This African American romance is a testament to the power of healing and the unbreakable bond of love. It includes second chance romance and enemies to lovers theme.

title: My Curves Captivated a Hood Millionaire: A BBW Love story
description:
Protecting one’s peace at all cost was one of the most important things in a person’s life.
 After loving the wrong man, a tragic event occurred releasing Ivyanna and her son, Chase, from a world of turmoil. She then packed them up and moved to Philadelphia to have a fresh new start in life.

With Chase’s medical condition always grabbing at Ivy’s pockets, she worked hard to make sure he and she had everything they needed to survive and still live a little. But when things slow down with some clients, Ivy turned to do the unthinkable to keep things afloat. In the midst of her new career, she ran into someone who would forever change her view on life and love.

Knox Carr was the eldest twin to Kai Carr, and older brother to Kali Carr. He was not only the head of the family due to his strong willed, militant, and intelligent ways, but he was the poster boy for the greatest dad. While Knox was still heavy in the streets, he was making a way for his family and circle to get out of it alive.

Kai and Kali had something up their sleeve which would’ve brought in more money than they were already making, but was it worth it? Knox would later learn of their secret and all hell would break loose.

While Ivy gets adjusted to her new work positions, she must also learn how to juggle being a mom and having a love life, but will she give the right person the time of day? Knox had his hands full with family, business, and the streets. He felt the weight of the world on his back but did he have enough strength to not fold under pressure?

title: My Curves Captivated a Hood Millionaire: A BBW Love Story 2
description: Heart wrenching secrets were revealed, and the revelations left people uneasy. Everyone had a past but it was slowly catching up to their present and causing havoc for their futures.Ivy was finally allowing love in again, but with a guarded wall. But that was until Knox worked his way to knock it down. The two bonded tightly due to their sons health conditions, finding comfort and peace within each other. While their connection grew, so did issues around them.Every day it seemed as if a new problem surfaced. Between Kali and Kai’s mess, Lanae being MIA, Junior’s health, and a new budding business venture, Knox had his hands full. Ivy was there in his life at the right time to ease his stress, but did she have what it took to hold down a man of his magnitude who constantly had to be the boss and problem solver?

title: A Section 8 Chick & A Philly Millionaire 2
description:
I thought life was looking up, my kids were happy, I was happy. Yet, life did what it did best for me and took a turn for the worse. I had found me a man; he was thugged out yet he treated me with so much respect. Had me on cloud nine, feeling like the best thing walking in those projects. Out of nowhere, this man stopped talking to me AND MY kids, which ended up hurting more than I wanted it to, more than I'd like to admit. He was starting to remind me of the last person I dealt with.

Watching my dad lay lifeless in that bed had me wanting to make amends with the only parent I had left, but that was just a thought. I kept thinking the drama was over in my life, but I was starting to see it was never ending. Each time I felt like I had stuff handled, problems came crashing in like the waves hitting the sand on the beach.

I swore I wanted that hood love that came with the money and the clothes, until I had gotten a taste of it. Now I wasn’t sure how I felt about it. Morgan was my girl, and she was constantly trying to make sure I was okay. I had spent so much time faking being okay that it was so easy to pretend I was. I couldn’t let myself go backwards, and I definitely couldn’t let the haters I accumulated see me down bad.

Sage thinks she’s felt it and seen it all. What she doesn’t know it's betrayal is right around the corner, and enemies are closer than she thinks.

With its plot-twisting, steamy lovemaking, and drama-filled love story, "A Section 8 Chick and A Hood Millionaire 2" will have you emotional and shocked to see who's really there for Sage and who helped her problems grow bigger.

title: Ballad of A Boss Wife: Bless and Bianca's Story
description: In this day in age most women dream of a Fairytale love affair. The one where Prince Charming swoops in like a thief in the night and steals your heart. This here ain't no Fairytale. This love story is straight off the streets of Chicago where it's kill or be killed.Meet seventeen year old Bianca Bismillah. She's beautiful with a bright future ahead of her. Bianca exudes more confidence and poise than most grown women. That's exactly what makes twenty five year old Brion "Bless" Williams take notice to her outside of being his younger sister Niema's best friend.In his eyes she was like a little sister. In her eyes he was everything she needed to protect her from her dysfunctional home life. Their age difference was his biggest issue but age was nothing but a number to Bianca she had to have Bless to herself.In the unluckiest of circumstances she gets him and more than she ever bargained for but being so strong minded and strong willed Bianca refuses to lose. She's going to make her mark as the Boss' Wife or die trying.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Wish & Sage
description:
Sage Johnson just wants to bring holiday cheer into her life after finally getting on her feet. For the first time in a long time, she finally has something to celebrate until she runs into a handsome man with a Grinch-like spirit.

Samad “Wish” Benjamin isn’t the Grinch that stole Christmas, he just doesn’t have much to celebrate these days. Tragedy pushes him into a trajectory with happiness no longer being his first priority. That is until Sage brings light into his darkness, leaving him wanting more.

Like a string of Christmas lights with a blown bulb, all Samad needs is a little fixing, but Sage is no handyman. Will her carefree and merry spirit be enough to melt the ice around his heart for the holiday season? Or will he tuck himself away in a cave and wait out Christmas in Winter Crest?

title: In Love With An East Coast Maniac 3: Grizz And Sundae
description: In the finale everything is coming to an end. Tweeti is dealing with the fact that her husband might be gone, and she may have to raise her son alone. Life comes fast and hits you hard, and Tweeti is learning that. The statement, you won't miss them until they are gone is the soundtrack to Tweeti's life. Will Jah pull through or will he leave Tweeti and Taz? With Dakota still around, will Tweeti tie her timberlands and handle what her husband should have ended months ago? Uzi is running around trying to find out who had the balls to come at his brother - A McKnight at that. Along with that, he has to deal with his fiancée and daughter too. Whoever is coming at them, they're coming hard. Will Uzi find out who in their camp is coming for their head? Paisley is preparing to become a mother and adjusting to loving a Maniac. With Nisha being pregnant and confessing her love for Manic, Paisley is feeling insecure. Not to mention, Manic is working all kind of hours and neglecting her. Life throws them a curve ball and Manic has to make a life or death decision... will Manic make the right decision? Will he and Paisley's relationship survive his decision? Sundae walked out of Grizz's life. Finding out that she's pregnant and dealing with her mental illness, she has more to think about than Grizz and Teyanna. Will Grizz win her back? Or is Sundae really over Grizz and has moved on? With Grizz finding out exactly what Teyanna been up to, will he let her slip through his fingertips like before? Or will he get his hand dirty and deal with the snake he should have killed years ago? In this finale, there is no such thing as a happy ending. While some couples may get their happy endings, others won't. In life, there are no guaranteed happy endings.

title: A Staten Island Love Affair (A Staten Island Love Affair, #2)
description: In the sequel, Myeisha has to deal with if she wants to deal with Rucka having a wife and daughter. With her own situation, she’s trying to decide if she feels like taking on Rucka and his baggage too? Kenya held Rucka down his entire bid and even risked her career for him. When he got out, she received not one call from him. Finding out that he’s back in the city, she’s ready to see exactly what, or who he has been getting into. Orlan has a past that he has failed to tell Mirror about. After Ronnie blurted it out in front of everyone at Dymond’s birthday party, he has a lot of explaining to do. The question is, will Mirror allow him to? Or will she cut Orlan off and decide to raise their child alone? If that isn’t enough, Orlan has been hiding a secret that could end his friendship with Hudson for good. Will he finally tell his best friend something he’s been hiding for years? Or will he continue to keep his mouth shut about the situation? As Maliah and Teck grow closer, she can see herself with him. With Staten stepping back, she’s allow to fully put herself into her relationship and raising her son. What happens when she finds out that Teck might have some ties to her family after all? Get ready to take another ride to Staten Island in this explosive sequel.

title: In Love With An East Coast Maniac 2: Grizz And Sundae
description: In the sequel, the statement don’t take people for granted couldn’t be more true. With Tweeti sitting in Jail for assaulting her husband’s baby’s mother, will she get out? Will Tweeti find out just how much Jah has gotten himself into during their marriage? Paisley has an important decision to make. Does she choose her baby or Rome? With Paisley being pregnant with Manic’s baby, will he force her to leave Rome? Or will he leave it in her hands? If Paisley isn’t enough, Nisha comes with some news of her own. Will this ruin what can happen between Manic and Paisley? Sundae is loving life with Grizz. That is until Teyanna moves into their home. When Grizz starts questioning Sundae, will they make it? Or does Teyanna have ulterior motives? Find out how it all goes down in this sequel that will leave your jaw on the floor.

title: In Love With A East Coast Maniac: Grizz And Sundae
description: In this spin-off you’ll meet Paisley. Paisley is in a relationship with Rome. Rome is in a relationship with multiple women, the streets and lastly Paisley. While she knows she deserves better, she sits by his side while he continues to disrespect her. Rome comes with a baby mother who isn’t interested in being a mother, a one year old and a hand problem. Paisley spends her day working as a dental receptionist and her nights raising Syria and Rome’s one year old daughter, Sayana. Manic wants Paisley. Paisley wants Rome. Manic has had his eye on Paisley for an entire year. When she finds herself inside his jewelry store pawning her promise ring, he sees this as his opportunity. Met with the revelation that she has a boyfriend. The mention of a boyfriend doesn’t slow down his advances toward Paisley. Especially when he runs into her and she’s sporting a black eye. While Paisley is trying to save her relationship, Manic is trying to save her. What if Manic is closer to her boyfriend than he thinks? Tweeti is adjusting to being a mother, wife and college student. With school taking up her time, she doesn’t have as much time as she would like to spend with her son and husband. Coming from nothing she’s determined to make her husband and son proud of her. When Jah starts acting weird, keeping late hours and getting caught up in lies, does she take a step back from school? Jah thought Zuri was gone when he proved that he didn’t father one of her twins. Except, Jah didn’t realize when you put skeletons in the closet they start to fall out. One Sundae is out of the mental institute and moved in with Grizz. She’s adjusting to her medicines and living with a man. Grizz is adjusting and learning about Sundae’s mental health. While he loves her and wants to marry her, he knows he has to take it slow. Marriage, kids and a future together seem so far since her mental disease stands in the way of that. Will Grizz and Sundae get to have a future together? As if Sundae’s health issues isn’t enough, Grizz’s ex pops back into the picture with news that tests Grizz’s heart. Will he help her out? Or is he still harboring feelings from how they ended years ago?

title: In Love With The King Of Harlem 4
description: Being in love with the king of Harlem comes with some obstacles, and Remi is about to find out just how many she may have to jump. After ending things with Reno, Remi is gunned down in cold blood by a mysterious person. Who shot Remi? And did they achieve their goal of killing her? Uzi just got his girl back, and now he might have to bury her. Is Remi strong enough to survive this, or will Tweeti end up burying the one person she loves the most? After finding out that she’s carrying Jah’s baby, Tweeti is scared as ever. Scared to face reality that she’s about to become a mother, she does the unthinkable, but does she go through with it? Will Jah ever trust her again, or will this end things for them? Jah wants nothing to do with his family, but when someone threatens to come for them, he has no choice but to stand by their side. Although Shad isn’t his biological father, he’s still a McKnight at heart. What happens when the person attacking the family, just may be family? Wynner is dealing with the fact that her husband won’t leave Olay alone. After telling him over and over again to leave her alone, he still hasn’t stopped. Did Qua cheat with Olay, or did Olay make it more than what it was? Being in love with the king of Harlem is no easy job, especially when everyone wants your spot, but Uzi makes it look so effortlessly. When someone in the shadows is working overtime to take everything he has worked hard for, will he crack under pressure, or will he work double time to protect his family and kingdom?

title: I Let A Country Boy Get Me Pregnant: An African American Romance
description:
I exhaled deeply, a wave of longing and regret washing over me as I watched Phear get up from the chair. I got up too, placing my hand on the glass partition, desperately hoping he’d reach out and touch his hand to mine. But he didn’t. He just looked at my hand with a pained expression, as if he wanted to bridge the distance between us but couldn’t bring himself to be vulnerable.

After eight years together, the chasm between Phear and I felt cavernous. The man who had taken me in when my mama died by suicide had become a closed-off stranger. We barely hugged anymore, let alone said "I love you." I think he resented how much I had come to depend on him over the years. My neediness was too much for him to handle on top of his own issues. But I clung to the shreds of our relationship, wishing we could have the family I always dreamed of.

It wasn’t until a customer offered me a job as a music teacher that I considered leaving. Working with those kids stirred long-buried memories and dreams within me. Little did I know that taking that job would also lead Giuseppe Stefani back into my life after years apart. Just as I was getting to know the captivating Psalms Blue, my messy past came barreling back.

Between my controlling ex who refused to let go, a manipulative new boss, and an old friend who needed me, I found myself caught in a vortex of complicated relationships and choices. My demons, it seemed, were determined to keep their claws dug deep in my heart. The men I should have run from became temptations I couldn't resist. Maybe that's what happens when you let yourself get tangled up with those down south country boys.

In this first edition "I Let A Country Boy Get Me Pregnant" by Krystal Armstead, she brings you an emotional love story filled with drama and African American romance that will have you nearly in tears and late for work the next morning.

title: Plan B Drama & Baby Mama's
description:
Shayne Rogan thought she'd found the man of her dreams a decade ago. Elim Byers, with his handsome, smooth dripping brown skin and a family name everyone respected, had once been her world. He showered her with affection, making her believe in love. But, as time revealed his true colors, their fiery romance faded into a suffocating cloud of a whole lot of cheating and mistrust. Now, juggling the joys and pains of motherhood with two children, Shayne's once-vivid dreams of love are overshadowed by the weight of reality.

Lord here comes Fion Wylde Katri, a man whose presence demands attention. Returning to oversee his family's business, he didn't expect to cross paths with a woman like Shayne. Both carry the baggage of past relationships — Wylde, tethered to a long-time girlfriend, and Shayne, still healing from Elim's betrayals. Their undeniable connection and bond is crazy and unbreakable, but they tread carefully, trying to keep things strictly business.

However, when troubles from Shayne's past resurface, threatening to pull her under, will Wylde step up? Or will he prove to be just another man full of sweet words and empty promises?

Immerse yourself in a tale of raw passion, resilience, and the lengths a woman will go to protect her heart. Can Shayne find the real love she's been searching for, or will life force her hand to play her 'Plan B'?

title: Flexin' On My Ex, Loving A Boss 2
description:
De'arra, who initially agreed to help clear her boyfriend's $100,000 debt, finds herself unexpectedly falling for Assad, an incredibly wonderful man like none she's ever known. As their connection grows stronger, things seem to be going surprisingly well for De'arra. However, the sudden revelation of Izzy's hidden truths threatens to derail her commitment to their agreement.

Meanwhile, the relationship between Paige and Trevin grows more profound each day, but it's tested by a terrifying encounter Paige has with her ex, Millz. This confrontation exposes Paige's unresolved feelings for Millz, catching Trevin off guard. Faced with this revelation, Trevin's reactions become increasingly unpredictable.

Embark on a journey through the unexpected and dramatic twists in this emotionally charged sequel, a true roller coaster ride of drama and emotion.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Beno & Hazel
description:
In the city of Winter Crest, Beno is known for being a hardworking hothead. so it comes as no surprise that he spends two years of his life behind bars after being crossed by the one closest to him….…..after being betrayed, the last thing on his mind is committing to another woman but we all know that the best plans are the ones not made.

Hazel has had enough of people, and their holiday spirit. Having a man beat on her and claim to “love” her is wearing her down quickly and with no other family around, Hazel quickly retreats to what she knows. But when an unexpected Christmas gift falls in her lap, will she take the opportunity and snatch up her saving grace, or will her fear of the future convince her there’s no way out?

title: Taken By A Wealthy Man 2
description:
Taken by a Wealthy Man 2 takes you right back into the heart of the city where love and loyalty are on the line. This is the hood love story you've been waiting for, with the drama cranked up to the max.

Dream's made a choice that might cost Levi his life, and it's thrown her world into chaos. At the same time, her relationship with Kilo is getting serious. They've got a deep connection that words can't explain.

But life isn't letting Kilo rest easy. His past catches up with him when Jacori comes back on the scene. Now, Kilo's got to make hard choices that could break his family apart. He's always known that it's loyalty, not blood, that makes a family.

Journee's also got her share of trouble. Life's thrown a curveball her way and it's testing her relationship with Maze. Will she stay strong, or break under the pressure?

Taken by a Wealthy Man 2 is a ride through the ups and downs of urban life. Love, drama, and family are tested. Will their ties hold, or will everything they've built come crashing down? This urban romance is sure to keep your heart racing and your mind buzzing. You won't want to miss it.

title: A Section 8 Chick & A Philly Millionaire
description:
All I need is a little help, or just someone to understand and let me know I’m doing the right thing. I need that reassurance that other women often speak about. On God, I'm trying my best, yet life keeps beating me down. Will I take a thug or drug dealer? You damn right I will. Nevertheless, he's still a man, regardless of his occupation, and a man to teach me how to be a woman. Lead me—even if he's got a little gangsta in him. It's something about them hood Philly guys with them big beards, carry big guns, and them deep rugged accents that just... Girl, if you know, you know. Maybe that's too much to ask for. My momma and daddy straight gave me the boot when they found out I was pregnant. So, finding someone to love me, when my own parents couldn’t, feels like a losing battle. My baby daddy couldn't do nothing for me but knock me up, again and again. A fool, that's what I was for letting him—a bum who already didn’t take care of the ones we had. I thought I had some kind of hood love. His PlayStation 5 was more important than his kids. Smdh.

When I got my Section 8, I just knew life was going to get easier for me. NOPE, it only got worse. I was searching everywhere and praying to God daily for a better life. But it feels like God is busy helping someone else, or he just can't hear me.

From the rough streets and projects of Philadelphia, I wasn't aiming to become just another statistic. I was determined to rise, even if it meant doing things I never wanted to.

And just when I thought God had put his AirPods in and left me out to dry, my longtime friend, Keyz, came back into my life. My heart wasn't sure how to act. This man was everything I didn't know I needed—a lifesaver, if you ask me. My body craved that man, and my kids grew to love him too. Slowly, life looked like it was turning up. Until the storm clouds rolled back in. Is Keyz my salvation, or just another chapter in my saga of pain?

Take a seat and follow the life of Sage, a woman grappling with the trauma of living in the Section 8 projects of Philadelphia, love, and life itself, as she fights to beat the odds.

In this sizzling, spicy, heartfelt read, you'll ride every emotion. Your heart will race as the drama unfolds; each twist and turn will have you on the edge of your seat. Will life beat Sage down, or will she rise, learn from her past, stand strong for her kids, and forge her own path, regardless of the relentless curveballs life throws her way?

title: Pregnant By A Ruthless Billionaire (Freaky Weekend With A Trill Billionaire series Book 2)
description:
“You take care of yourself. We forgot to grab a Plan B, but I trust you’ll be responsible to get one once you land.”

“Shit,” she panicked. “Yeah, I will. Thank you again for the weekend.”

That's where it ended in Freaky Weekend With A Trill Billionaire. Chas was so high from the two days with Omega, that she forgot the one thing he was adamant about her getting — the pill.

Not knowing what to do, Chasity chose to keep her pregnancy away from Omega. What she thought was right, ended up being something that would hurt him.

title: First Come Thugs, Then Come Marriage
description:
In J. Dominique's electrifying novel, First Come Thugs, Then Come Marriage, the city of Chicago serves as the heartbeat for a riveting tale of passion, power, and heartbreak, as the notorious Grand brothers navigate the treacherous world of love, family loyalty, and the criminal underworld.

Dive into this captivating story, as Knight and Bishop Grand tussle with their own hearts and the women who ensnare them. Knight, the dutiful eldest son, is torn between his loyalty to his family and his love for his best friend, Blessing Griffin. When he is compelled to marry for power and status, he must face the consequences of his choices, especially when Blessing's return to Chicago reawakens long-buried emotions. Will Knight be able to reconcile his duties with his heart's desires, or will he lose the woman he loves forever?

Meanwhile, Bishop, the enigmatic and seemingly heartless enforcer of the Grand family, finds his world upended by the alluring Deja Brooks. As she reels from her own personal tragedy, Deja discovers solace in Bishop's embrace, drawing him into a passionate and tumultuous journey of self-discovery. As secrets and desires threaten to destroy their newfound love, will Bishop and Deja find the strength to surrender their hearts to one another?

First Come Thugs, Then Come Marriage masterfully weaves the stories of these unforgettable couples, exploring the complexities of love and loyalty in a world where every connection is a means to an end. J. Dominique's enthralling narrative will have you on the edge of your seat, yearning for more. Don't miss the chance to experience this breathtaking tale of passion, sacrifice, and the ultimate pursuit of happiness.

title: First Come Thugs, Then Come Marriage 2
description:
In First Come Thugs, Then Come Marriage 2, the stakes are extremly sky-high for the rich and heartless Grand brothers, their lives entangled in a web of love, lust, and deception on the ruthless streets of Chicago.

Knight Grand, the heart of the Grand trio, finds himself torn between duty and desire. His heart yearns for Blessing, the captivating woman who stirs his soul, yet he is shackled to Angelina, his pregnant wife - a pawn in a dangerous game orchestrated by their conniving families. Amidst the shadows of treachery, can Knight seize his chance at true love with Blessing and safeguard his impending twins, or will he lose everything in the pursuit of his heart's yearning?

Bishop Grand, the ladies man that thought he could play the field with ease. Yet, the tables turn when emotions barge in uninvited. When Deja, his fiery love, discovers his secret fiancé and recoils from him, Bishop is plunged into a powerful storm of realization about the depth of his love for Deja. But is his love potent enough to halt his impending nuptials with the enigmatic Lovelie?

Meanwhile, Rook Grand, the wildcard of the Grand men, treads a perilous path, indulging in secret life with Golden, one of their own employees. Known for his reckless antics, Rook's latest escapade may be the catalyst that sparks a devastating chain of events. Will his dalliance with Golden sabotage another Grand union, or might it prove to be the unexpected lifeline they desperately need?

Immerse yourself in the gritty underbelly of Chicago, where love battles betrayal, and loyalty clashes with deception. Reunite with the Grand crew, as they navigate the labyrinth of their complex relationships, where every decision could make or break their unity. This is a saga of resilience and redemption, of love lost and found, and of the relentless pursuit of a happiness that always seems just out of reach.

title: The Night a Rich Thug Saved Me
description:
He’s her billionaire boss…and the only man who can save her.

Kasino Billionaire is irresistible. A good-looking, charming man. Too bad because he has sworn off relationships forever. He was sick and tired of women betraying him. After his ex-girlfriend left him for his childhood friend and another woman that he fell for setting him up, he was done with love. However, not even a man as heartbroken as Kasino could deny the alluring beauty of Kloey.

Kloey Clarke is mesmerizing. Men fawn over her exotic features, butt-length hair, and inviting curves. Too bad she’s not interested in dating. After missing several years of her life due to an undiagnosed illness, she was finally cured. As a result, her parents were broke. They had to sell everything, going from riches to rags.

Deep down inside, Kloey felt as if her parent’s current struggles were all her fault. Determined to give them the anniversary party they deserve, she vows to get a job in order to pay back the money she borrowed.

From the moment Kloey applied for a job at Kasino’s luxury resort, their fate had been sealed. They were thrust together involuntarily, changing both of their lives forever.

As they continued to get to know each other on a deeper level, Kasino sees two cars creeping down the street. He is sure that they are about to do something stupid. Will Kasino be able to shield Kloey from danger? Or will she be a casualty, ending their love before it can blossom?

title: Pregnant By The Coldest Millionaire 3
description:
Waka, a life bursting with nothing but promise and glee, now plunges into despair and uncertainty on a fateful evening dedicated to nothing more than charity, as he desperately clings to life. It's in these teetering moments between life and death; his mind is eternally revisited by the woman he loved—Noxi—and the dreams they had shared. Now, this is more of a far-off reality than anything else in his life. The possibility of reclaiming a future—one that has abruptly hung in balance with Noxi—giving more fuel to the determination as he fights for one worthy cause.

Noxi, on the other side, is trapped in a web of sorrows and guilt, replaying their last argument, which, cruel irony, had taken place right before the charity event. This bitter exchange, mayhap the last, will lie heavy on her heart; it imbeds doubts into her mind as to whether her harsh words could possibly have occasioned the calamity. Still, in the turmoil, there was a flicker of hope that continued to burn deep within, silently pleading for things to grant the mend that has been broken and for Waka to return to health and within the circle of her arms.

As the series of "Pregnant By The Coldest Millionaire" progresses, readers will witness how the tragedy and mesh of misunderstandings test the depth of Noxi and Waka's love. This chapter seeks to explore whether their bond and love is strong enough to survive the tempest of emotions and challenges it faces. Is there any road back to each other under the suffocating shrouds of doubt and fear, or does the pressure of this ordeal begin to cause them to drift further and further apart? This is a storyline moving down the path of love, resilience, and a journey to a second chance romance. If you’re a fan of African American romance, millionaire Alpha men, or downright rude rich thugs. Then "Pregnant By The Coldest Millionaire 3" is for you.

title: A Section 8 Chick & A Philly Millionaire 4: An African American Romance: The Finale
description:
In "A Section 8 Chick & A Philly Millionaire 4: The Finale," my heart's journey unfolds, a tale steeped in the raw realities of love and survival. Here I was again, questioning God, and everyone else, as life's relentless challenges tested my spirit. Each time I thought I had the upper hand, life countered with a blow that sent me reeling, forcing me to question my very existence.

Amidst this turmoil, my faith and desperation to keep my children and myself above water clashed with the harsh truth of our lives. Every step forward was a battle, a struggle to avoid the missteps that threatened to drag us back to the depths of the slums. My focus wavered, stumbling across problems that knocked me off my high horse, each one a reminder of the precariousness of our situation.

But then, amidst the chaos, an unexpected love blossomed. A love that was as much about survival as it was about passion. He came from a world so different from mine, a Philly millionaire whose presence promised a respite from the relentless hardships. Yet, the path of our love was fraught with the same trials that had long been my companions.

The odds were stacked against us, but together, we were determined to rise. This wasn't just a fight for control over my life; it was a fight for our future, a testament to the power of love in the face of life's harshest realities. "A Section 8 Chick & A Philly Millionaire 4: The Finale" is a story of resilience, hope, and the transformative power of love against all odds.

title: Girl, If I Was You: An African American Romance
description:
Oh, so he cheated cheated? Girl, If I Was You…
Wait! You went through his phone and saw WHAT? Girl, If I Was You…
His other baby mama showed up at your work saying she's pregnant again? Girl, If I Was You…

We all know that friend who's quick to say what they'd do in any situation. And let's be real, we've all been that friend at some point.

Cynne Monroe's life got turned upside down when she started listening to the opinions of her friends and family a bit too much. After years with her child's father, she decided to follow their advice, making choices that ended up hurting the one who loved her most. She thought she'd find something better, but life had other plans. Karma has a way of coming back around, and for Cynne, it came back with a vengeance.

Larenz is a man who knows patience and determination. When he sets his mind on something, he's all in. Life hasn't been easy, but he's always believed things would get better. His love for Cynne never wavered, even when everything else was uncertain. He believed that if he could get everything else in line, she would come back to him. His love was stronger than any challenge, until one day, he had to start looking out for himself.

Cynne was always looking for something more, not realizing what she had right in front of her. By the time she sees the truth, it might be too late. Will Larenz give her another chance, or has he moved past her way of thinking?

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Ryan & Ruby
genres: Holiday|Christmas|Romance|African American Romance|Novella|Enemies To Lovers|Holiday Romance
description:
Ruby spends her holiday season spreading love and joy. As an interior designer, she moves throughout the city sprinkling holiday cheer through her meticulous Christmas designs and overall fabulous decor. Living in Winter Crest, a city founded on Christmas Eve, only heightens her love for the season. Every corner of Winter Crest is filled with joy. That is until she meets her Grinch of a neighbor, Ryan. His cold, rude demeanor instantly turns her off. While Ruby’s mind may be unimpressed, her body zings with excitement every time Ryan is near.

Ryan is a loner. He dislikes being around people, and he despises Christmas even more. As a self-made reseller, Ryan has limited contact with the outside world, which is his preference. However, several run ins with Ruby, his annoying neighbor who he claims talks too much, only heightens his appreciation for silence. He claims he hates her, but instead of simply walking away when their paths cross, he finds himself wanting to shut her up in ways that set his body ablaze.

Ryan and Ruby are total opposites, and bump heads whenever they are near one another. But along with the building animosity, there also lies a strong attraction that could melt Winter Crest’s worst snowstorm. They simply need to figure out how to douse the flames without tearing each other apart.

title: The Night a Rich Thug Saved Me 2
description: When Kasino’s body landed on top of mine, I didn’t know he was trying to protect me… Kloey was thrilled when Kasino showed up to her parents’ anniversary party. She looked forward to spending personal time with her boss and possibly stealing a kiss in the process. Never in her wildest dreams did she imagine that Kasino would be on top of her in a nasty dumpster. She was so heated when he threw her like a frisbee on top of a bed of trash. Instinctively, she didn’t know whether to be mad at him or tap into her feminine energy, taking full advantage of this private moment with him. Kasino’s intense attraction to Kloey was absolutely insane. He wanted to throw caution to the wind when Kloey offered herself to him out of fear. As badly as he wanted to take her up on her offer, he turned her down. He might be from the streets, but he was a gentleman at heart. His natural instinct was to protect Kloey, especially when he sensed a threat nearby. Kasino and Kloey thought their special night was ruined due to a huge misunderstanding. What they don’t know was a weird turn of events was in the works. Not only will this be a life-changing night, but they also have no idea if they will even survive the so called Demon Night. The Night A Rich Thug Save Me 2 is an action-packed, drama filled, and emotionally charged love story with plot twists, betrayal, and relationships problems.

title: Taken By The King Of Dallas 2: An African American Romance
description:
Rich has always prided himself on protecting those he loves, willing to go to any length to keep them safe. When he finds himself caught in a sticky situation, he must navigate a treacherous path to save his brother's life. With danger looming from every direction, Rich must stay calm and strategize carefully to overcome the obstacles in his way.

Remedy had finally let down her guard, envisioning a future with the man of her dreams. Rich had shown her that not all men were the same—or so she believed. When one of Rich's deepest secrets is revealed, Remedy is left torn and uncertain about her next steps. Though she doesn’t want to leave him, she struggles to forgive the betrayal she feels.

As a wealthy Alpha male with flaws and cheating problems, Rich fights to prove his unwavering love for Remedy while also facing the challenge of maintaining his title as King. Unforeseen events force him to continuously demonstrate his worthiness and strength. The stakes have never been higher, with both his heart and his reign on the line.

"Taken By The King Of Dallas 2" is an African American romance that will captivate you, showcasing a story of second chances, hood love, and women’s drama. Just when you think you understand the story, unexpected twists and turns will leave you craving more.

title: It's Always That One Project Chick: An African American Romance
description:
Taylen was a dope boy's dream, but far from your typical project chick. Growing up, she learned the hustle that only the streets could teach—gritty, relentless, and real. She chased her dream of marrying young and building a family, but what she never saw coming was the nightmare she’d have to a husband who lied, cheated, and tore her down, one bruise at a time. Between the side chicks, late-night calls from unknown numbers, and endless arguments, Taylen had finally reached her breaking point. After a gut-wrenching divorce, she's ready to reclaim her life, determined to rise from the ashes, believing the worst is finally behind her. Just as she starts putting her life back together, a stranger steps in and shakes up her entire world—opening doors she never thought she'd enter again.

Ace Pierre runs his city with power and confidence, a king among men. Women were never a problem for him; they flocked to his magnetic energy. But real relationships? They weren't part of his game plan. With a baby on the way with his so-called baby mama, situationship, or whatever she is, Kamry, Ace isn’t sure if they're even ready for such a big commitment. Between the trust issues and secrets that linger, Ace does what he can to make it work—until a call from one of his realty companies changes everything. Stepping into a situation he didn't expect, he bumps into Taylen, a woman whose presence alone leaves him breathless and his carefully constructed life in jeopardy.

As their worlds collide, Taylen and Ace find themselves tangled in a whirlwind of unexpected passion, raw emotion, and a connection that neither saw coming. But with old flames, lies, and jealous eyes watching their every move, can they fight against the odds to make love work? Or will the weight of the past and the drama that haunts them prove too much to bear?

If you're a fan of African American romance, good girls and unhinged Alpha men, second chance romance, thug love, and hood drama, you'll fall in love with "It's Always That One Project Chick" by Jenica Johnson.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Prolific & LaBella
description:
After dealing with drama and heartbreak, LaBella lets her best friend, Whisper, whisk her away on a getaway to help her forget all of her problems. Taking a break from reality was what she needed, and Dubai gave everything it needed to give... fun, excitement, and sexy men! However, now that LaBella is back home, and in time for Christmas, the terrible memories that plague her attempts to resurface.

Prolific may be a dangerous and rich oil tycoon, but deep down he is just a man that is ready to switch lanes and leave the fast life behind. However, he didn't think there was a woman that would be able to match his energy. So, he resigned himself to the lonely life, and indulged in pleasures of the flesh whenever the mood struck. That was until the one woman who caught his attention came rushing back into his life like a river parting the desert.

Secret watches from the sideline as everyone live their lives. All the while, she’s dealing with her own issues. Being the sister of the infamous Prolific and Psalm, no one wants to come near her. All the men either fear for their lives or their wallets. However, carrying on an affair with someone who should be off-limits, gives Secret everything she didn't even know she needed, but when things blow up, it could end up causing irreparable damage.

Love, lust, drama, and family are all tied into the lives of this group of Winter Crest residents. Things will get bumpy and futures are uncertain, but one thing is for sure... this will be a Christmas to remember.

title: The Right of Love (Wayward Love #3)
genres: Romance|African American|Friends To Lovers|African American Romance|Urban
description:
“After the hot sex comes the real world.” 
 
“What was that?” 
 
“My therapist once said, ‘after the hot sex comes the real world. Or in wayward love, the drama is sprinkled in between passionate lovemaking’.” 
 
“That sounds more like one of them novels you like to read.” 
 
“No. Ours is too hilly to be a traditional romance story.” 
 
And it is. Journey the conclusion to Love Belvin’s riveting “Wayward Love” series, and see how errant the path to Isaak and Kennedi’s happily ever after is. What is a perfect love story? Does it not include disappointment, betrayal, distractions, guilt, and anger? 
 
Just how much can these two take before they decide the victory of love isn’t worth the pain? 
 
Note: This is the final installment of a three book series. It contains expletive language, and sexual content. If you do not wish to have these elements in your reads, this is not the venture for you.

title: The Left of Love (Wayward Love #1)
description:
She's from a lakeside suburb, padded by two parents, an overindulgent godmother, and all the amenities of affluence they can provide her. But that's not enough. Kennedi wants to experience the full benefits of her femininity at the tender age of twenty-one, a task she takes on at college, and one she’s more than determined to fulfill.

He's an aspiring entertainer from the dark side of the inner city. Survival for Isaak is very much an option he plans to conquer. He has to make it out of his impossible circumstances, and sacrifice is definitely the name of the game, even if it means running the risk of sacrificing one of the most delicate and positively influential bonds he’s ever made.

A social experiment has never been so revealing and frightening for either one of these unassuming individuals. How could two people from the starkest contrast of rearing build an impenetrable bond in just three months? How long will it take for them to dig through their differences to understand those forces that connect them? At what cost will they find harmony to coexist?

Publisher’s This is the first installment of a three book series. It contains expletive language, sexual content, and ends on a cliffhanger. If you do not wish to have these elements in your reads, this is not the venture for you.

title: The Virgin Wife of a Billionaire 3: Finale
description:
As the gripping finale to Taniece's acclaimed series, which includes "Pregnant By A Down South Millionaire" and "Taken By A Wealthy Man," "The Virgin Wife of a Billionaire 3" is a story of love, betrayal, and redemption.

Family secrets spill like hot tea, putting Law in an uncompromising position that causes him to lose two of the most important people in his life. With his world crumbling around him, Law must work ten times harder to hold his falling empire together. He refuses to let everything he has worked so hard for fall apart.

Meanwhile, Honey is determined to mend a broken relationship, no matter the cost. When something she values most is taken away from her without warning, she is left feeling incomplete and yearning for more out of life.

With a war brewing between the Blancos and Andres, everyone’s lives are thrown into turmoil. As the dust settles, who will truly come out on top?

"The Virgin Wife of a Billionaire 3" is guaranteed to tug at your heartstrings. This African American romance is filled with drama, deceit, and love. If you're a fan of African American romance, BBW love stories, cheating rich Alpha men, second chance, and enemies-to-lovers stories, you're definitely going to love this. Taniece masterfully weaves a tale that will leave you yearning for more long after you reach the last page.

title: Revenge Sex and Karma: The Temptation of Revenge, the Spell of Sex, the Justice of Karma
description:
Can love truly survive betrayal?

In a world where ambition, lust, and power often overshadow love and loyalty, Revenge, Sex, and Karma delves into the complexities of relationships and the inevitable consequences of our actions.

Follow the story of a man deeply in love with his wife despite her hidden betrayals. As he navigates the moral dilemmas of forgiveness and revenge, he is drawn into a web of seduction, deceit, and temptation, with two other women playing critical roles in the unfolding drama. Madam, a woman of beauty and manipulation, and Dhara, a mastermind of logic, add layers of intrigue and tension to his life.

At its heart, this tale isn’t just about betrayal; it’s about the choices we make and the karmic consequences that follow. Will love prevail? Or will the darkness of ambition and lust consume them all?

A gripping story of love, betrayal, and redemption, Revenge, Sex, and Karma will leave you questioning the thin line between revenge and justice, love and lust.

 This book contains mature themes and explicit adult content. Reader discretion is advised.

title: Cold Killer (Cooper Harrington Detective # 4)
description:
Coop’s new client has been dead for the last twenty-five years.

Despite all their wealth and success, the Covington family has been cursed with tragedy. Twenty-five years ago, two horrific accidents threatened to ruin their business and livelihood. This, followed by two deaths in the family, forever change them. Now, the patriarch of the family is dying, and the son everyone thought died so long ago, returns.

Dax Covington wants Coop to help him prove his identity and find out who tried to kill him. Then, there is the matter of identifying the remains of the body buried under Dax’s headstone.

Dax ran away all those years ago, convinced he knew who the killer was and the motive, but was he right? He needs Coop’s help getting to the truth, even if it means the worst—someone he loves is the killer.

Will Coop be able to unearth old evidence and solve the case before it’s too late?
Cold Killer is the fourth book in the award-winning Cooper Harrington Detective Novels, featuring Coop, a Nashville lawyer turned private detective known for his love of coffee, snarky t-shirts, and talent for solving cases. He, along with his faithful dog, Gus, and his right-hand assistant, Annabelle, work together to solve murder cases full of twists and turns.

You’ll find a bit of humor, a dash of southern charm, a dog who is more like a furry best friend, plenty of comfort food, and murder, of course. If you enjoy complex characters with a few quirks and plots that keep you guessing, you’ll love Tammy L. Grace’s mystery series.

title: Dead Wrong (Cooper Harrington Detective #3)
description:
A murdered business partner. A hundred million dollars. A client who claims his innocence.  
 
Coop’s client is a renowned scientist in the pharmaceutical industry. The pending charge is the murder of his business partner, and a hundred million dollars provides the motive. As an arrest looms, the desperate client seeks Coop’s help to uncover the real murderer. 
 
All evidence points to the mild-mannered scientist. He asserts his innocence and begs Coop to uncover the clues the police overlooked. Coop and Annabelle, his faithful sidekick, work around the clock to sift through the evidence in search of anything to clear their client. As always, Coop’s loyal golden retriever, Gus, along with the sometimes meddling, but well-meaning Aunt Camille, support the investigative efforts. 
 
Connections are exposed, and suspects interrogated, but all the promising leads evaporate. Their determination wanes when they discover additional persuasive evidence against their client, causing Coop to doubt his instincts. With increased persistence, they unearth a damaging secret. A vital piece of evidence provides the thread that unravels the case, leading Coop to uncover the killer and the motive for murder.

title: A Wealthy Gangsta and His BBW Weakness 2
description:
Nothing in the streets stays hidden forever...

Bakari thought he had it all figured out, his money, his power, and the woman he swore would always belong to him. But when the past resurfaces and secrets start slipping through the cracks, he realizes the real war ain’t just in the streets, it’s in his own circle.

Kashtyn knows better than to let his guard down. Snakes don’t always hiss; they smile in your face. But when the walls start closing in and the FEDS move in closer, he’s left questioning who’s real, who’s fake, and who’s been feeding the wolves.

Cimani never asked to be caught in the crossfire.

All she ever wanted was peace.

But when old flames ignite, when past wounds reopen, and when jealousy turns deadly, she finds herself trapped in a war that might cost her everything.

title: Mystic Deceit (Isle of Enchantment Mystery Book 7)
description:
Coconut Bay is preparing for the biggest concert event of the year, and rockstar Cameron Steele is set to headline the show. But the celebration quickly turns deadly when Cameron is found murdered just minutes before hitting the stage.

Iona and Kai are quick on the scene and ready to investigate. It looks at first to be an accidental overdose until the evidence points to something much more sinister. As the music festival rages on, Iona and Kai (with her trust sidekick Spark), must navigate the glittering world of fame and secrets to uncover the truth.

Who had it out for the rockstar?

Was it his ex-girlfriend and bandmate, whose bitterness over their breakup may be clouding her judgment? Or what about Cameron's assistant? A bright woman who'd been hiding something from her past. Let's not forget Max Porter, a rival musician with a longstanding feud with Cameron, who’s desperate to claim the spotlight.

With the concert crowd still buzzing and the truth buried deep, Iona and Kai must untangle the lies before the killer hits their final note.

title: I’m Pregnant… What You Telling Me For 2? (I’m Pregnant… What You Telling Me For?)
description:
I caught feelings for a man who was never truly mine, nor was he supposed to be. I fell deep into a love so forbidden, so intense, that it consumed every piece of me. Maybe that's exactly what I get for chasing that “I need a Big Dawg” trend from the internet. Now my life feels like it's spinning helplessly in a raggedy washing machine at a corner laundromat—chaotic, messy, and completely out of control.

I knew better. Those boundaries should've never been crossed—but knowing and acting were two different worlds entirely.

Why did I let myself fall for a successful, handsome, yet utterly dangerous man—a genuine menace to society who showed me a softer side he kept hidden from everyone else? Behind closed doors, we shared nights of passionate kisses, intimate pillow talks, laughter that made us forget our struggles, and moments so intense they left marks on our souls. Yet from the start, it was he didn't want love, didn't desire a family, and initially, neither did I.

Sometimes, you dive headfirst into chaos, desperately hoping the story ends differently. Despite every red flag and every screaming instinct telling me to leave, I chose to stay—chasing a love that was never promised.

Now, I'm pregnant, feeling painfully unwanted, and undeniably desperate—craving the love only he can provide, longing for his touch, needing his embrace to feel secure. The truth was there all along, yet I can't stop yearning to be the peace he desperately needs but won’t admit to. Can I somehow convince him that the home he runs from is right here with me, with us?

I'm Pregnant...What You Telling Me For 2 by Yona Pearson is a deeply emotional African American romanceexploring forbidden desires, heart-wrenching choices, and the lengths we go to when our hearts are bound to someone who’s emotionally unavailable.

title: Like a Movie (Cottage on Gooseberry Bay)
description:
Cottage on Gooseberry Bay is a heartwarming mystery series about finding answers and fostering hope while building friendships and embracing the magic of life by the sea and small-town holidays.

In book 19 in the series, Ainsley and the gang volunteer to help out with the annual Movies on the Beach event Gooseberry Bay is known for sponsoring every summer. While Josie and Hudson are busy manning the food truck, Jemma takes on the task of organizing the volunteers and Coop and Ainsley are asked to help with security. When a local man is found dead and it is determined that he was killed in the exact same manner as the victim featured in the movie that week, new deputy Dani Dixon is sure she has her killer. The problem is that after a bit of digging on her own, Ainsley isn't so sure about Dani's conclusion. When the local police balk at the idea of widening their investigation, Ainsley decides to take matters into her own hands.

title: Love Auction III: When Love Finds You
description: August Richards is a badass FBI agent on the hunt to find her partner's killer(s). August doesn't need any distractions to keep her from doing her job. But when she strolls into the office of Jake Morgan, things change dramatically for her. She works for Morgan Shipping Company undercover as an accountant.Jake Morgan didn't appreciate Agent Richards accusing him of smuggling illegal drugs through the port. He was a well-known, respected, wealthy businessman. However, his thoughts and feelings began to change once she started to work for him undercover. August wasn't about to let Jake Morgan distract her with his good looks or sex appeal. She'd gotten along fine with her casual sex partners. But heartbreak caused her to harden her heart.When Jake Found out she was a part of the auction, it was a chance for him to claim her and win her heart. At the auction, he found out he wasn't the only contender for her bid.Will Agent August Richards find her partner's killer(s)? Will Jake win her bid and her protected heart?

title: The Weaving of Kente: Navigating Change in the Age of Quantum
description:
In the loom of the digital age, humanity must be the weaver.

In this bold and timely book, author, entrepreneur, and creative thinker Javette Nixon issues both a call and a as we enter the Age of Quantum—where AI, digital technology, and quantum computing reshape how we live, learn, and lead—entire communities, especially those on the margins, risk being left behind.

The Weaving of Kente
 is a rallying cry for inclusion, ethical leadership, and digital empowerment. Drawing inspiration from the rich symbolism of Ghana’s Kente cloth, Nixon masterfully interweaves Afro-Caribbean history, philosophy, storytelling, and innovation to offer a roadmap for navigating disruption and reclaiming human agency in a rapidly changing world.

This is not just a book about technology—it’s a guide to reclaim your narrative and shape a more just and empathetic digital future.

In this book, you will learn 

 • Understand the social and emotional impacts of artificial intelligence
 • Build leadership resilience in a rapidly evolving tech landscape
 • Strengthen digital literacy and ethical decision-making
 • Reframe your role in shaping tomorrow’s stories, systems, and communities

Whether you’re a changemaker, leader, student, or lifelong learner, The Weaving of Kente reminds us that the time to act—to weave with wisdom and care—is now.

Get your copy and start shaping the digital future today.

title: Ommniverse: The Ultimate Guide to Online + Offline Customer Experience
description:
Are you a business owner stuck between growing your brand and solving daily customer chaos? Struggling with inventory, confusing refunds, or loyalty programs that just don’t work?

OMMNIVERSE is your practical, story-driven guide to mastering OmniChannel commerce, integrating your online and offline retail operations, and delivering unforgettable customer experiences across every touchpoint.

Instead of dry theory, this book unfolds through emotional, real-life conversations between a retail business owner and a calm, seasoned OmniCommerce expert. Together, they explore how to solve problems around returns, loyalty, inventory, discounts, and more without losing your sanity or soul.

Inside This Groundbreaking
