✅ How to transform your physical + digital store into a unified shopping experience
✅ Step-by-step guidance for handling refunds, returns, cancellations, and tough edge cases
✅ Understand the emotional psychology of loyalty, pricing, and customer frustration
✅ Learn the power of SKU logic, product presentation, and seamless inventory tracking
✅ Turn customer complaints into opportunities that build long-term brand trust

Whether you run a retail chain, a D2C eCommerce startup, a WooCommerce, Shopify or Magento store, or manage customer service or CRM teams this book will feel like it was written for you.

With powerful storytelling, real implementation frameworks, and deep retail wisdom, OMMNIVERSE helps you bridge the gap between technology, emotions, and business growth.

About the 
Tejash Shah is a technopreneur with over 22 years of experience, having led 1500+ eCommerce transformations for brands across India and globally. As a CTO and mentor, he fuses karmic clarity with cutting-edge retail tech to help businesses evolve with heart and strategy.

Read it like a story. Apply it like a system. Remember it like a conversation.

title: For the Love of Fame
description:
For the Love of Fame follows Eli and Luc, two aspiring actors whose chance meeting sparks a love as intense as it is immediate. What begins as a fast-burning romance soon becomes a shared dream; together, they turn their cameras toward each other and find themselves rising in a world that measures worth by likes and followers. Their connection is real, but fame doesn’t come without a cost. Every photo, every post, blurs the line between who they are and who the world wants them to be, and soon, everyone wants to know everything. To their audience, they’re "couple goals"; to each other, they’re just trying to hold on.

As the attention grows, so do the cracks beneath the surface. Luc starts to crave something quieter, while Eli still reaches for more. When a role takes Eli across the world, distance forces them to face the truth about love, ambition, and the life they built under constant watch. For the Love of Fame is a tender exploration of what love costs, and what it means to keep it alive when the world never looks away.

title: Berserk, Vol. 23
description:
Desperate as Guts, the Black Swordsman, has been to reunite with his former captain and lover, the now-mad Casca, he’s quickly learning that being together is as dangerous as being apart. What should be a simple journey to the safety of Puck’s homeland proves to be a gauntlet of perils, as the Mark of Sacrifice each bears brings the fury of Hell down upon them, and Guts discovers that in his darkest moments he himself is the greatest danger to the woman he loves.

Created by Kentaro Miura, Berserk is a fiery manga apocalypse, an ominous omnibus of furious action, fearsome horror, and funereal humor that strikes a power chord in the hearts of its devoted followers and strikes down the rest like a scythe through wheat. Bring in the sheaves!

title: Fractured Memories: Because Demented People Need Love, Too
description:
In 2009, Emily Page’s father was diagnosed at the age of 65 with frontotemporal dementia, a form of dementia that strikes earlier and progresses more quickly than Alzheimer’s, and for which there is no treatment to slow the progression of the disease. Being so young, Page hadn’t had much experience with dementia, but she began documenting, in writing and art, her family’s heartbreaking and hilarious experiences. 
As a professional artist, she had often turned to art as a self-prescribed therapy to help deal with life’s trials. This battle was no different. She utilized the elephant as a symbol for dementia, and incorporated sheet music into the paintings because her dad had been a jazz musician. Eventually, Page created 40 paintings that are included in the book. She also began blogging about the range of issues that arose daily as the disease progressed, documenting everything from her own fear of getting dementia, to her dad’s transition to diapers (and the various places he opted to drop his drawers and just “go”), to combatting his compulsions like the need to “clean” the cars with steel wool, to an exploration of how he might have gotten the disease, to finding the right dementia care facility, to the best ways to make him giggle. Page approached the disease from the fresh viewpoint of a younger caregiver. As her blog following grew, so did the suggestions from readers that she turn the blog into a book. After hearing too many horror stories about traditional publishing contracts, she decided to self-publish. She ran a fundraising campaign for her book, Fractured Memories, and presold over 500 copies in less than a month.
“My dad was my best friend. He embraced the ridiculous, looked for the good in people, and mentored and helped people whenever he could. Following his diagnosis, when people asked how he was doing, he’d answer, ‘Not bad for a demented guy.’ He looked for the light hiding amidst the pain. He chose to be very open about what he was going through in the hopes that it would help other people cope with their own diagnosis or a loved one’s diagnosis. Writing this book seemed a fitting way to honor that legacy.” 
Page doesn’t shy away from the ugly, raw emotion of life with dementia, but she also looks for the laughter where it can be found. Rest assured, you will love her father as much as she does when the book is done, and perhaps gain some insight about how to cope with your own loved one’s dementia or how to support a caregiver. 
Fractured Memories is available through Page’s website at http://shop.emilypageart.com/t/the-book.

title: Sanibel Treasures (Shellseeker Beach #2)
description:
New arrivals to Shellseeker Beach prompt Eliza to extend her trip…and fall deeper under the spell of Sanibel Island. The group of close family and friends are determined to settle the ownership of the beachfront property once and for all. But it seems there are forces outside of their control determined to shatter all their dreams.

As she takes time to reconsider her career, Eliza’s daughter finds herself in the middle of conflicting feelings for two very different men. Balancing what she wants with what she needs, this shrewd businesswoman discovers that sometimes the best decisions are made with the heart, and not the head.

These resilient women face new challenges, build lasting friendships, and find a second chance at love, all while they fight to save Shellseeker Beach’s greatest treasure of all…the family that they’ve finally found.

Come to Shellseeker Beach and fall in love with a cast of unforgettable characters who face life's challenges with humor, heart, and hope. For lovers of riveting and inspirational sagas about sisters, secrets, romance, mothers and daughters…and the moments that make life worth living.

title: Poltergeist Rider (Hannah Hickok, #13)
description:
Spring has hit Casper Creek. That means construction on Hannah Hickok’s future home with her fiancé Cooper Wyatt is finally commencing, and work on the new restaurant in town is getting close to completion. Everything should be perfect in her world.
There’s just one little problem.
A ghost from the past has decided to haunt the present…and he’s not a normal ghost. He’s riding a ghost horse. And, oh yeah, he’s firing a gun. Ghost bullets shouldn’t be a threat, and yet these bullets are killing people.
A scarf left at one of the scenes leads Hannah to look at the area’s bootlegger past. It seems there’s a cabin not far from Casper Creek, and their ghost might have originated from there. Where has he been for the past century, though? And, more importantly, why is he back?
As the bodies begin to stack up, Hannah begins to suspect they’ve got more than a murderous ghost on her hands. The human element of the equation is impossible to uncover, however.
Hannah is determined to find answers. She just needs a place to start looking.
It’s a fight to the finish, and ghost bullets aren’t the only thing Hannah and her friends need to worry about. There’s a new evil afoot…and this time, the gang might not be up to the challenge.

title: Taken By A Wealthy Man
description:
Taken By A Wealthy Man: An Unputdownable hood love that’ll grab you from the very first page to the last word.

"I believe in love, I jus' don't want it," says the young handsome thug Kilo Ben-Ari, a man haunted by the traumatic love story of his mother. He's determined to guard his heart, until a vulnerable Dream crosses his path and forces him to question everything he thought he knew about love.

Dream, a woman betrayed by the only person she ever trusted, seeks refuge in the arms of a wealthy man who promises to help her heal. But as her heart mends, she finds herself entangled in a web of lies and manipulation that threatens to consume her. Will she rise above the deceit or be forever trapped in the shadows of her past?

Now Journee is a whole other issue, a driven high school senior focused on escaping the suffocating grasp of Montgomery, Alabama. Her carefully laid plans are disrupted when she encounters a boss with a lot of motion that she barley knows whose allure makes her question all she thought she wanted. In the face of desire, will she risk everything for a chance at true love?

Taken By A Wealthy Man masterfully intertwines the lives of Kilo, Dream, and Journee in a gripping hood romance of passion, deceit, and drama. As they navigate the treacherous waters of love and betrayal, they must confront their darkest fears and ultimately decide what they're willing to sacrifice for a chance at redemption.

Get ready to lose yourself in this enthralling novel. Taken By A Wealthy Man will captivate readers with its raw emotion, compelling characters, and unrelenting suspense, proving that love can triumph even in the face of devastating heartbreak and betrayal.

title: Amending the Christmas Contract
description:
She made this contract to avoid breaking his heart, but will keeping it mean breaking hers?

Ruby Hayes is happy as a single lawyer, but if she can count on anything, it's that her family and friends' incessant meddling will be center-stage when she shows up single (again) for the holidays. Rather than endure one more blind date or suffocating set-up, Ruby hatches a plan.

Levi Thompson has accepted the bachelor lifestyle since Ruby left him behind years ago, but his friends and family are determined to see him settled down. Levi has no intentions of succumbing to their well-meaning pressure, so it seems like a win-win to agree to Ruby's proposal, even when she shows up with a crazy formal contract typed and ready for his signature.

As they navigate the Christmas season together, their charade begins to feel increasingly real during horse drawn sleigh rides and cozy fireside conversations.

With the looming deadline of both Christmas and the contract, Ruby and Levi must confront the daunting choice between keeping their ends of the Christmas Contract, or surrendering to the undeniable pull of their hearts.

Visit Redemption Ridge, Colorado and enjoy the faith, friendships, and forever-afters of the Christmas in Redemption Ridge series of Christian romance.

This series is a spin-off continuation of the best-selling Heroes of Freedom Ridge Series with all new characters and traditions, but the same magic of community and romance readers love.

title: Blind Date with the Hero (Heroes of Freedom Ridge, #18)
description: She’s on a series of blind dates, but all she can think about is her Secret Santa… Alexis would rather skinny dip in a snowbank than make good on the bet she lost. Ten blind dates? As though the holidays weren’t hard enough, now she has to sit at awkward Christmas parties with men who were more likely to be intimidated by her military experience than infatuated. At least her Secret Santa was keeping things interesting. K9 Specialist Jared Keen couldn’t believe his luck when he got his best friend’s name in the Secret Santa pool. After years of wishing he could tell Alexis how he felt, this is his chance to show her instead. At the same time, he just needs to convince her that their friendship can handle the pressure outside the friendzone, and pray that one of her ridiculous blind dates doesn’t derail his plan. Return to Freedom, Colorado and enjoy the faith, friendships, and forever-afters of the Heroes of Freedom Ridge in this Christian Christmas romance.

title: Building a Team (Baseball Buddies #1)
description: When Luis joins his new baseball team, the Manatees, things seem pretty hopeless at first. Some of his new teammates―including "loud and obnoxious" home-run slugger Jimmie―are mean to him or to each other. His new coach doesn't tell the players everything to do like his old coach did. And some of the Manatees seem more interested in goofing off than in sportsmanship or working hard. Then Luis is surprisingly named captain of his new team, and he finds himself with a whole new set of problems. How will he get this odd-ball group of teammates to work together?

title: Nature Ninja Saves the Natural World: A Children's Picture Book to Inspire Young Nature Heroes Ages 4 to 8
description:
**Kirkus' Best Books of 2023 & Kirkus' starred review**

Whether you're planting trees or helping the bees, every little action to care for nature counts!

Nature Ninja and two friends - a wise owl mentor, Boobook and a trusty sidekick, Stick - are on a mission to save the planet.

Upon realising that they're not allowed out of their backyard on their own, they question if they really can make a difference.

The story is an energetic eco-adventure that sees the characters taking a series of actions to care for nature in their own backyard.

With Boobook's guiding words and Stick's help, Nature Ninja learns that with a little patience and persistence, their actions do make a difference.

Children will follow along to see if they achieve their mission and feel empowered discovering that every little action to care for nature where they live counts.

Nature Ninja Saves the Natural World is more than just a children's book to encourage kids to care for nature. It's a unique call to action to inspire the next generation of nature heroes, taking children on an age-appropriate hero's journey.

This book is perfect for nature loving kids, families, parents and teachers who want to embed nature play and outdoor learning into their classrooms and lives. A great children's book for Earth Day - and every day!

EDITORIAL REVIEWS

"Nature plus ninjas make a winning combination!... sure fire inspiration for budding environmentalists!" - Kirkus starred review

"A fast-paced, ENERGETIC picture book showing young readers how they too can help save the natural world. Highly recommended!" - 5 STARS The Wishing Shelf

"An entertaining, attractive, and fun book to learn about nature and shows one how to be proactive in a straightforward way." - 5 STARS Readers Favorite

WHY THIS IS AN IMPORTANT AND POWERFUL BOOK FOR CHLDREN AND OUR PLANET

When young children hear about environmental challenges outside of their understanding or influence they can feel worried and disempowered.

This book helps children know that the biggest and best difference they can make for the planet is to care for the nature that's right outside their door.

It shows them that when each of us care for nature in our own backyards, balconies, classrooms and neighbourhoods, together our collective actions can make a big difference for the planet.

NATURE NINJA SAVES THE NATURAL WORLD CAN SUPPORT CHILDREN'S LEARNING AND DEVELOPMENT BY:

- Addressing environmental issues in ways that children can understand

- Inviting and empowering children to consider ways they can care for nature 
 where they live

- Demonstrating personal and social and emotional skills such as patience, 
 persistence, teamwork and resilience

- Introducing thought provoking themes

- Featuring a unique concept, memorable plot and relatable characters

- Enhancing early literacy with quality text features such as:

 * Alliteration

 * Repetition

 * Hyperbole

 * Rich vocabulary

 * Rhyming and rhythmic qualities

 * Idioms

 * Text that encourages active participation

 * Featuring vibrant and detailed illustrations with visual elements that 
 complement and enhance the text

TEACHER RESOURCES TO HELP YOU GO BEYOND THE BOOK

Nature Ninja Saves the Natural World is perfect for classroom projects and includes access to nature-inspired teaching and learning resources. Links to Nurture in Nature's website to access these resources are provided inside the book.

• Kirkus' Best Books of 2023
• BREW SEAL OF EXCELLENCE – 5 Stars
• WINNER: BREW Children's Book Excellence Award 2024 - 3 Categories – Children’s Book of the Year (Overall Winner), Nature Book of the Year & Publisher of the Year (Nurture in Nature Books)
• WINNER: 2024 International Readers Favorite Book Awards – Silver Medal – Children Educational
• WINNER: 2024 American Writing Awards Children’s Book of the Year – 2 Categories – Education & Nature
• WINNER: 2024 BREW Book Excellence Awards – 2 Categories - Children's Book of the Year & Sustainability Book of the Year
• WINNER: 2024 Nautilus Book Awards – Silver Medal – Children’s Picture Books/Fiction Ages 2-6 Years
• WINNER: 2024 The Wishing Shelf Book Awards – Silver Medal – Best Cover Children’s/YA
• WINNER: 2024 BRAG Medallion
• WINNER: 2024 Purple Dragonfly Awards – Honorable Mention – 2 Categories – Green/Environmental & Picture Books 6 & Older
• WINNER: 2023 Story Monsters Approved Book Awards – 2 Categories – Picture Book Fiction & Green Living/Environmental Issues
• WINNER: 2023 The Wishing Shelf Book Awards – Silver Medal - Children’s/YA Audiobook
• WINNER: 2023 International Firebird Book Awards – Children Nature
• FINALIST: 2023 The Wishing Shelf Book Awards – Books for 6-8 year olds
• FINALIST: 2023 Funky Kids Radio – Children’s Audio Story of the Year

title: The Chocolate Shop on Amelia Island (Seven Sisters Book 5)
description:
The saga continues with secrets, surprises, and sweet temptations…

Sadie Wingate has been keeping secrets...from her family and from her brand new husband. But once the truth is revealed, her whole world melts like a truffle in the sunshine. Can Sadie finally settle for a sweet life on Amelia Island…or will stability send her searching for the next adventure?

Raina nears her delivery date and signs the papers ending her marriage, but there’s one thing missing in her life. Despite being the fixer in her family, the only solution to her heart’s dilemma seems all wrong for this newly-divorced mother of infant twins. But how can she say no?

Madeline's one and only love reappears, and this enigmatic man turns her well-ordered life upside down, while Susannah orchestrates major changes on Wingate Way.

When the winds of change blow over the candy store on Amelia Island, the Wingate women learn over and over again that the bond between the seven sisters is as strong as steel, as soothing as a seaside breeze, and as lasting as their family legacy.

The Seven Sisters Series

The Wingate women are unique and unforgettable...but they all share inner strength, abiding love, a few quirky traits, and the ability to support each other through every challenge. This family is founded on love and laughter and a sisterhood unlike any other.

The Seven Sisters series will consist of seven books with recurring characters, continuing stories, heartbreaking and hopeful moments, later-in-life romance, a touch of mystery, and lots of happy tears.

All of the books will be available in digital, paperback, and audio formats.

The Beach House on Amelia Island (book 1)
The Café on Amelia Island (book 2)
The Bookstore on Amelia Island (book 3)
The Florist on Amelia Island (book 4)
The Chocolate Shop on Amelia Island (book 5)
The Dressmaker on Amelia Island (book 6)
The Inn on Amelia Island (book 7)

title: Winter's Peak (Winter Black #23; Winter Black: Season Two #5)
description:
It’s lonely at the top. And deadly at the bottom.

Sexual harassment isn’t the type of case Private Investigator Winter Black usually takes. But it’s a welcome distraction from whoever’s been sending creepy, anonymous text messages to her phone and set up cameras to spy on her home and office. And after her new client reveals that one of her female coworkers hanged herself after fending off their boss’s sexual advances, Winter suspects there’s more to the story.

When another woman disappears, she’s certain.

Posing as an employee, Winter sets her sights on uncovering the truth at the climbing equipment company, starting with the powerful and well-connected boss who seems intent on showing her the ropes—in more ways than one. But when an employee's body is discovered at the bottom of a gorge, strangled by self-tightening rock-climbing knots, it's clear there’s a killer on the loose, and he knows exactly what he’s doing. And his victims aren’t random.

With employees dropping like flies, Winter must uncover the madman behind the murders before she becomes the next victim caught in the killer’s web.

The mystery and suspense continue with Winter’s Peak, the fifth book in the Winter Black Season Two series, a gripping thriller that will tie you up in knots. If you give someone enough rope, they’ll eventually hang themselves. Or you.

title: A Motive to Kill (Blake Wilder FBI Mystery Thriller Book 22)
description:
“Urgent Code 10. Gunshots heard inside Honeybee Lounge on McComb Street. Backup needed.”

There’s been a mass shooting with over 23 casualties in Atlanta.
FBI agent Blake Wilder and her team are called by D.C. Headquarters to spearhead the case.
Upon their arrival to the crime scene, they are greeted with hostility by the field officers present.
Unfazed by the tension, Blake begins to sort through the identities of many victims, most of them high profiled lawyers.
While attempting to identify a motive, the team sorts through the deceased lawyers' case files.

Soon after, Blake realizes that the footage and evidence regarding this case has gone missing.
And this case now leads to a dead end.

All is seemingly hopeless until a crucial lead points to one undeniable truth.

title: The Inmate's Secret (Blake Wilder #21)
description:
It should be the season of joy, but one inmate has a secret he's taking to the grave…

FBI agent Blake Wilder is basking in the holiday spirit.
When she receives a phone call from an old high school friend regarding a murder case.
She reluctantly agrees to visit him in prison. There he begs her to investigate his case to prove his innocence.
He is currently serving a life sentence for a murder he claims he did not commit.
While glossing over his case, Blake notices that there are potential discrepancies in the original investigation.
It seems her friend, the inmate, has been keeping secrets from her.
And as Blake dives deeper into the case, she finds a trail of illicit affairs, abuse, incompetence, and a shocking twist that no one saw coming.

Lust, pride, envy, deception, and murder. Some have secrets they’d kill for.
This inmate has a secret worth taking to the grave.

title: Shadow's Loss (Shadow Island #14)
description:
The path to power is paved with blood.

In the wake of a landmark election on Shadow Island, the tide of power is set to turn. Newly elected Sheriff Rebecca West stands ready to dismantle the Yacht Club’s ruthless grip over the island. And she isn’t alone. She has her team as well as the newly elected chair of the Select Board by her side.

But victory comes at a perilous cost.

The ballots have barely been counted when tragedy strikes. The new Select Board Chair’s life hangs by a thread after a deliberate sabotage turns her victory drive into a fight for survival. As Rebecca begins her investigation, she uncovers another layer of deceit tied to the island’s power-hungry elite. And they aren’t finished yet.

With the stakes higher than ever, Rebecca is ensnared in a dark maze of loyalty and betrayal, where every shadow conceals a threat and trust can be fatal.

In Shadow’s Loss, the fourteenth electrifying installment of Lori Rhodes and Mary Stone’s Shadow Island series, the battle for justice could cost them everything. Because in this game, winning might just be the most dangerous result.

title: Shadow's Siege (Shadow Island #15)
description:
Shadow Island is under siege.

Just a few short months ago, Sheriff Rebecca West thought her toughest battles were behind her. But nothing could have prepared her for the turmoil she’s faced since coming to Shadow Island. Attempts on her life. Heartbreak. Betrayal. And that’s just the beginning.

The worst is yet to come.

Still reeling from the shocking discovery of who’s behind Shadow Island’s exclusive and depraved "men’s" club, Rebecca is determined to take them down. There’s only one problem. One by one, the members end up dead. Tongues cut out, hands chopped off—the message is clear...

Dead witnesses can’t talk. Now everyone is a potential victim.

Is there a traitor in the club’s midst? An accomplice turned executioner? Or is the Yacht Club killing its own members rather than risking the police questioning them?

As the desperation of the masterminds behind the Yacht Club increases, so does the body count. In her relentless pursuit of the truth, Rebecca risks unraveling not just the secrets of the Yacht Club, but the very fabric of her own heart.

Shadow’s Siege, the tensely climactic fifteenth installment of the Shadow Island Series by Mary Stone and Lori Rhodes, is a chilling reminder that just when you think things can’t get worse, they do.

title: Last Resort (Emma Last FBI Mystery #9)
description:
He's checking his list, checking it twice. Which agent's fate will be sealed tonight?

Haunted by the whispers of the Other, a chilling real-world threat has Special Agent Emma Last and the Violent Crimes Unit on high alert. Their recent victory against D.C.’s gangs is overshadowed by a sinister promise of vengeance that materializes swiftly, claiming the life of a young FBI recruit.

"I’ll spell it out in the blood of one of your agents."

This brutal act marks the beginning of a deadly game, drawing Emma and her team into a dark web of danger, where every clue leads them deeper into the mystery and closer to the monster stalking them from the unseen.

And that’s just the beginning. When the body of a cop working the dead agent’s crime scene surfaces the next day, the VCU team comes to the chilling realization that the killer isn’t just watching. He’s one step ahead of them.

Even worse...

He knows where they live. And he’s not just coming for one of them. He’s coming for them all. And they may not get out of this one alive.

Last Resort is the ninth book in the Emma Last series by bestselling author Mary Stone, where no one is safe when they’re on a madman’s list.

title: EL TERCER TESTIGO (Spanish Edition)
description:
Novela de ficción basada en un hecho histórico real. Todo comienza con el descubrimiento de un habitáculo secreto durante la reforma de una mansión modernista en la zona alta de Barcelona. A partir del hallazgo de una serie de evidencias en el interior de un baúl (cartas con amenazas de muerte, un croquis con una dirección muy concreta, una jeringuilla usada…), se encenderán las alarmas que harán temblar los pilares sobre los que se había edificado la cristiandad. 
Un investigador muy avezado no cejará en su empeño por desenmascarar la solución del enigma. Enseguida se topará con una brillante abogada, el yin y el yang, la cual se convertirá en aliada hasta los confines del más allá. Una bella historia de amor, abrazada por la magia y la química de las dos almas gemelas, y repudiada por cierto sector.
La pareja de detectives removerá cielo e infierno (pagando un costoso peaje) hasta conseguir resolver el misterio escondido desde hace casi un siglo. La actuación del tercer testigo fue trascendental para desenterrar las piezas clave.
La lucha del bien contra el mal, y viceversa, serán una constante en el transcurso de esta novela de ficción. Elizabeth y David lograrán esclarecer la verdad acerca del accidente fortuito que sufrió el genial arquitecto.
Acción trepidante envuelta con una prosa nítida y veloz.
1) Un enigma por descifrar y enterrado desde hace muchísimas décadas.
2) El enfrentamiento del cielo contra el infierno.
3) Juicio Final entre Ángeles y Demonio.

title: Sinister Snack Attack (Two Broomsticks Gas & Grill Witch, #10)
description:
Join Stormy, Hunter, and the whole crazy crew as more trouble hits Shadow Hills.

Stormy Morgan should be on top of the world. She’s engaged, about to move into her dreamhouse, and her magic is stabilizing. In fact, she’s becoming one heckuva witch.
Too bad trouble keeps finding her.
This time it comes in the form of a gang of kids who appear to be stealing cars from various townsfolk. It’s become a big enough issue that everybody in town is becoming unnerved, paranoid even. Their solution is to form a Neighborhood Watch, which should be okay in theory. Unfortunately, the reality is anything but.
Stormy’s dreams are being plagued by threatening shadows, to the point where she thinks she’s being watched. On top of that, there’s something odd going on with the mayor and his wife, which just might involve one of Stormy’s cousins. That would be enough to keep Stormy busy, but there’s more.
The residents are acting odd. They’re not just fighting crime, they’re treating it as if it’s life or death. They’re getting aggressive, and everybody is in danger. That’s everybody.
Stormy doesn’t know where to start. Is she dealing with one problem or multiple problems? She’s going to need help to get to the bottom of things. Even her powerful allies might not be enough to save the town.
Shadow Hills is home but suddenly it feels like a different place. Will Stormy be able to save Shadow Hills—and everybody who lives there—before it’s too late?
Strap in. You’re about to find out.

title: Children of Quill: Escape
A Christmas to Remember
description:
In the snow-draped village where children's laughter pierces the cold air, "A True Believer" unveils the stirring story of Lily, a young girl with fiery red hair and emerald eyes, facing a profound Christmas revelation. Clad in her pink scarf and bobble hat, Lily writes to Santa in her diary, her faith in holiday magic unwavering. Yet, her spirit is tested when her friend Sophie reveals a sombre Santa might just be a myth. This revelation threatens Lily's cherished beliefs, but instead of succumbing to doubt, she embarks on a quest to discover the reality of Santa Claus. "A Christmas to Remember" weaves a heartwarming narrative of innocence, faith, and friendship, as Lily and Sophie navigate the true essence of the Christmas spirit, proving that some magic is indeed real. This tale is a testament to the enduring power of belief and the magic that binds us during the festive season.

From the hushed whispers of doubt to the resilient bonds of friendship, join Lily as she seeks to uncover whether the spirit of Santa Claus really exists. This enchanting narrative is a testament to the enduring wonder of Christmas, promising to warm your heart and restore your faith in the magic of the season. Perfect for anyone who cherishes Christmas traditions and the timeless question of what it truly means to believe.

title: A Hood Savage & A Good Girl: An African American Romance
description:
Aura Ellis knows the pain of Hood Love all too well. A tragic event in her hometown of Vine Grove, Kansas, left her guarded and deeply focused on her career, her only escape from the heartbreak of her past. But one night, pushed by her best friend, Aura steps out of her routine, unknowingly walking straight into the arms of a man who could change everything.

That man is Gianni “Grim” Kennedy—mysterious, magnetic, and with a street reputation as strong as his resolve to stay unattached. A true hood savage, Grim avoids commitments like the plague, especially with single women who come with baggage. But when Aura’s beauty and quiet strength cross his path, he finds himself captivated in ways he never expected. What begins as one passionate night leaves an imprint neither can ignore, even when they walk away thinking they’ll never meet again.

Yet fate has a way of throwing them back together, pulling them into each other’s lives as if by design. Grim’s wealth and reputation only make Aura more hesitant, and the secrets he guards could shatter everything they’re building. As Grim’s possessive side starts to surface, Aura questions whether she can trust him with her heart—and the shadows of her own past.

Meanwhile, Styx Wade is trying to rebuild her life after a humiliating breakup. Convinced love isn’t in the cards, until Spencer Moore shows up. He’s got the charm and looks to make any woman drop her guard, but Styx has been hurt before, and she’s not about to let anyone in easily. But as Spencer shows her what it means to be loved with patience and respect, Styx begins to wonder if he’s worth the risk.

With emotions high and secrets lurking, both couples must confront the ghosts of their pasts to create a future together. "A Hood Savage & A Good Girl" by S.L. Partee is a Black romance filled with rich men, resilient women, raw passion, and drama that keeps you hooked. If you’re drawn to stories of second chances, hood love, and unbreakable bonds, this one’s for you.

title: Mystic Mistletoe (Isle of Enchantment Mystery Book 5)
description:
*****A crossover from An Enchanted Waters Mystery Series!*****

The holiday season is anything but peaceful in Coconut Bay as Iona finds herself in the middle of a high-profile murder investigation. The victim, Sylvia Dawnwood, was co-owner of Celestial Bay Inn, a new luxury supernatural retreat catering to Coconut Bay’s magical elite. Sylvia’s suspicious death sends shockwaves through the community, especially when it’s discovered she kept a ledger of secrets on her guests.

Sylvia had no shortage of enemies. Allegra Frost, socialite witch and rival; Harlan Keene, a local businessman whose secrets run deep; Mira Hart, potion master with a grievance; Lucian Webb, her rejected business partner—all had ties to Sylvia and all had something to gain from her downfall.

As Iona and Kia dig deeper, they uncover traces of dark magic, hidden rivalries, and longstanding grudges that seem to twist around Sylvia’s life like strands of mistletoe. With her spirited companion, Spark, by her side and holiday lights casting a glow on each clue, Iona finds herself unraveling secrets that could shatter the fragile peace in Coconut Bay.

title: SACHIE’S HERO (Brotherhood Protectors Hawaii Book 7)
description:
As a mental health counselor and hypnotherapist, Sachie Moore has witnessed the worst effects of drug addiction, mental and physical abuse on young people. After working with victims of violent crimes for the Honolulu Police Department, she finds herself the target of a stalker. To get away from the soul-sucking stress of her job and leave her stalker behind, she moved to the Big Island of Hawaii. There, she sets up her own practice, helping teens deal with addiction and abuse but on a much smaller scale.

Once again targeted by a mysterious stranger, Sachie calls the Brotherhood Protectors.

Tagged as the strong silent one, Teller Osgood might not joke around with the others, but he's fully committed to the team and would sacrifice his life for any of the men he calls brothers. Assigned to protect a pretty mental health counselor, he must face the demons of his childhood to expose the source of Sachie's threats. In a race against time, Teller and Sachie risk their lives and hearts to stop evil before he claims his next victim.

title: Mystic Betrayal (Isle of Enchantment Mystery Book 6)
description:
When a retired high school history teacher is found dead clutching a treasure map, Celeste Witch Iona Vale and her now-official boyfriend, Kai Marinos, dive into a case as murky as the waters surrounding their island home. Mr. Crumbmungen had a knack for storytelling, but it seems one of his tales—a legend of a sunken ship and lost treasure—held secrets someone was willing to kill for.

With Spark’s enthusiasm lighting the way (and occasionally causing mayhem), Iona and Kai must unravel the mystery buried in the past before the tides wash away the clues. As their relationship takes a new turn, so do the dangers—both magical and mortal—that threaten to pull them under.

Can Iona navigate the stormy waters of love and murder, or will this treasure hunt prove to be their undoing?

title: Salvaging His Faith (First Responders of Faith Valley #15)
description:
Dr. Dustin West thought his time of service was over...
But when there's a catastrophic event at the local hospital, he has to step back in.
It's not easy being the head of your family after losing the love of your life. Dustin knows better than anyone how quickly life can change. His wife died of cancer four years ago, and he's been jaded ever since. But when he ends up having to treat Patty Peterson for a mysterious illness affecting the town, he realizes that maybe he can have a second chance at love.

Patty Peterson has sworn off men after her husband ran off with another woman two decades ago. At least, all of them besides her son, who runs the local dinner. He's all the man she needs. Or so she thinks, until she ends up spending time with Dr. Dustin West during her visits to the hospital. She's heard the rumors that he's just as grumpy as she is, but somehow, against all odds, they bring out the best in each other. Will they manage to admit their feelings before it's too late?

You'll love this first in series suspenseful romance from award-winning and bestselling author, Jenna Brandt, because everyone loves to see a struggling hero find his way to a happily ever after.

Get this full-length mature-age, returning doctor, suspenseful Christian romance, family drama novel now.

★★★★★Fall in love with a small Texas town filled with heroes willing to put their lives on the line for others. Brothers wearing the same badge, cousins fighting the same fire, paramedics saving citizens, all while trying to find their way to the perfect soulmate.★★★★★

title: Infinity Ledger: Part 3 - "The Rarak Chronicles" ("The Rarak Chronicles “)
description:
🌌 Infinity A Cosmic Saga of Hope & Peril 🚀

Embark on an epic adventure across the vast expanse of the universe in "Infinity Ledger," a thrilling science fiction saga. 💫 Witness civilizations rise and fall as the fragile threads of existence are tested by forces beyond comprehension. At the heart of it all lies the Decay, a living shadow of chaos threatening to unravel the very fabric of the universe. 🌑

Once, the Rarakari, an ancient crystalline species 💎, sought to preserve harmony with the Infinite Ledger—a vast network designed to foster cooperation among countless worlds. But their vision shattered, and now, a new generation must rise to the challenge. Join Captain Arlen Voss and the crew of the Eternal Balance as they journey beyond the known universe 🌠, seeking the lost shards of the Ledger.

🌟 What awaits in the depths of space? 🌟Ancient enemies lurking in the shadows 😈New allies with unexpected powers 💪Forgotten truths about the universe's history 📜The Decay's true nature revealed 💥In a tale of resilience, unity, and trust 🤝, the crew will discover not only the secrets of the Decay but also the strength of diversity and the enduring power of balance. Will they rebuild the network that once safeguarded the universe, or will the Decay consume all? ⏳

Perfect for fans of space operas, science fiction adventures, and stories of hope in the face of overwhelming odds. 📚

👉 Don't miss this gripping cosmic adventure! Click "Buy Now" and join the fight for the fate of the universe! ✨ #ScienceFiction #SpaceOpera #Adventure #CosmicSaga #EpicFantasy #NewRelease

title: Love, Fun and Life: Poems that Laugh, Hug & Inspire — Funny, Romantic & Deep Reflections for Every Day
Bitcoin Galaxies: Part 2 - "The Rarak Chronicles “
description:
🚀 Bitcoin Galaxies - Part 2: "The Rarak Chronicles" 🌌

In the vast reaches of space, the enigmatic Rarak civilization has left an indelible mark on the universe. As creators of the Infinite Ledger—a cosmic blockchain recording the history of existence—they sought to protect the delicate balance of the cosmos. Their disappearance, following a technological catastrophe, left only a cryptic "The ledger continues. The vaults are infinite. Trust the code."

🌟 Enter the Galactic Bitcoin Alliance (GBA), a coalition of civilizations inspired by the Rarak's legacy of decentralized economy and interstellar cooperation. As the Interstellar Autonomous Exploration Fleet (IAEF) ventures into the Andromeda galaxy, they uncover secrets that could unravel the very fabric of the universe.

Uncover the true legacy of the not just as pioneers of decentralized currency but as guardians of cosmic equilibrium. The discovery brings with it monumental danger, igniting a battle for survival. ⚔️

As the Eternal Ledger expands, the GBA faces critical decisions that could determine the fate of everything they cherish. Can they uphold the balance, or will chaos reign? 🤔

Join a breathtaking journey through the stars—a tale of trust, sacrifice, and the relentless pursuit of balance in an uncertain universe. Prepare for thrilling adventures, ancient secrets, and powerful technologies that challenge the nature of existence itself. 🌠

Pre-order your copy of Bitcoin Galaxies - Part 2: "The Rarak Chronicles" today! 📚✨ Be part of the conversation on our Bitcoin Galaxy Telegram Channel and embrace the infinite possibilities.

🔑 Trust the code. Embrace the legacy. Explore the infinite.

title: Bitcoin Galaxy: Bridging Civilizations Through Decentralization ("The Rarak Chronicles “ Book 1)
description:
Bitcoin The Cosmic Revolution of Trust and Freedom 🚀💫

Imagine a future where Bitcoin is not just a global currency, but the cornerstone of an interstellar economy, uniting civilizations across galaxies. Bitcoin Galaxy takes you on an epic journey through time and space, from the birth of Bitcoin in 2009 to its role as the fundamental currency of a decentralized galactic alliance. 🌍➡️🌌

In this thrilling tale, you will follow the enigmatic alien, Rarak 👽, who plants the seed for a new world order—one built on trust, transparency, and decentralization. As the story unfolds, Bitcoin grows from a fringe experiment into the financial backbone of human civilization, enabling humanity's colonization of the stars ✨🌠. With Rarak’s guidance, the Galactic Bitcoin Alliance rises 🌌💰, uniting diverse worlds in the fight against corruption and inequality.

But what lies within the mysterious Genesis Vault 🔐, locked away for centuries? And can a decentralized galaxy truly escape the cycles of greed and power that have doomed civilizations before? This novel answers these questions while exploring the profound impact of Bitcoin on human evolution, values, and society 🌍⚡.

Bitcoin Galaxy is more than just a sci-fi thriller—it’s a vision of a future shaped by Bitcoin’s transformative power 🌐💡. Whether you're a Bitcoin believer or a skeptic, this novel will challenge your perceptions of trust, value, and the potential of decentralization 🔥.

Are you ready to explore the universe’s most ambitious economic revolution? 🌠💸 Join the journey today and discover the limitless possibilities of a decentralized galaxy!

Join the conversation and be part of the Bitcoin Galaxy community—connect with fellow readers and enthusiasts on Telegram and dive deeper into the story 🤖💬.

title: Mateo & Nicole (Palmers of Copper Creek Book 1)
description:
She was his secret crush. Now she’s his employee… and a single mom.

Mateo Palmer swore he’d never risk his heart again. The last time he did, he was left waiting at the altar. Now, he keeps things light—never serious, never lasting. But when Nicole Reynolds walks into Winding Creek Ranch looking for a fresh start, everything changes. She was always the one who got away, and fate has just handed him a second chance.

Nikki needs this job to provide for her six-year-old son. She never expected her new boss to be Mateo—the man she secretly adored in high school. He’s charming, flirty, and just as handsome as ever. But she knows better than to believe a man like him would ever want forever with a woman like her.

He’s determined to prove her wrong. She’s convinced he’ll walk away. But love—and a little boy with a shy smile—might just rewrite their story.

Don’t miss the heartfelt, small-town romance in 
Mateo & Nicole, Palmers of Copper Creek Book One
.

title: ONE MIND OVER ALL MATTERS-PART 1: THE ULTIMATE GUIDE TO IGNITING DISCIPLINE AND FOSTERING LEADERSHIP
description:
It's all in the mind."

In the face of physical limits, the mind prevails.

But what fuels the minds of great leaders?

This book reveals how discipline ignites leadership, transforming every aspect of life. Discover the power to lead, inspire, and conquer through unwavering mental fortitude.

title: Warlander Beast Cat (Warlanders, #2)
description:
Kru is trying to fit in to the newly-formed Warlander Crew on the edge of the blue dragon’s territory, but a vision from a seer has sent his head into a tailspin. He has no control of the saber-toothed tiger inside of him, and now a past that broke his animal is coming after him to finish the job. He’s finding a strange comfort in a sassy beauty who is the glue holding the Warlanders together. Cadence is the daughter of an Alpha, and her animal is tightly under control. Kru secretly admires her, but he knows he will never be a safe bet for a mate. The best he can hope for is friendship, but hanging around the trailer park with Cadence has him wishing for more. His body can’t stop craving the sexy vixen, and his animal is paying way too much attention to her. All he wants is to hide what Damon Daye has saved him from, but Cadence makes it very tempting to share his secrets. Too bad his secrets could cause a catfight that brings war to Damon’s Mountains.

Being a Warlander is pure chaos. Cadence is doing her best to make sure everyone is settling in to the trailer park, but one of the Crew has her attention more than the rest. Kru is witty, and confident, and a monster when he is Changed. That disconnect with his animal has her wanting to figure him out—a very dangerous game with a shifter like him. The closer she gets to him, the more the mysteries unravel, and now she’s in a game of cat-and-mouse that she doesn’t want to end. Kru is a big, dominant, hot, good man with a bad-boy attitude, a talent for making her feel safe, and a deep understanding of what a Crew truly should be. He has her questioning everything. He has warned her that he has a past, but she isn’t prepared for what is barreling toward the mountains she has always called home.

Don’t miss this riveting second full-length installment in T.S. Joyce’s bestselling Warlander series. It has taken awhile to return home to Damon’s Mountains, where it all began…
Let’s stay here for a while.

************************
Content Warning: Explicit love scenes, naughty language, and piles of sexy shifter secrets. Shifter animal battles show up in most of these books. Intended for mature audiences.

title: Fastlander Fighter (Fastlanders #4)
description:
Captain Walker was in control of his inner grizzly before he joined the Fastlander Crew. Now, having his brother as his Alpha has his animal riled up and fighting everything. When he sees a woman from his past, he knows she has the ability to understand his history, and that chance meeting dredges up the urge to lean on the fragile human. Sloane has changed in the years she’s been gone from Damon’s Mountains, but those changes intrigue him. She isn’t the woman he thought she was all those years ago…she’s more. On the verge of a war with the Holland Pride, the timing isn’t great for bringing a human potential mate into the picture. She’s kicking up instincts inside of him that could get them both annihilated. The good man in him knows she needs to remain untethered to the Fastlanders and all the trouble the Crew will bring, but the monster in him doesn’t care.

Sloane Middleson has just had her life turned upside down, and now she’s back near her hometown trying to figure out her next step. Captain Walker was the boy she had a crush on all those years ago, but he wasn’t a good match. Now? Captain is different. Bigger. Grittier. More dominant…and in many ways, more frustrating. She can’t stop seeking him out though, and she doesn’t know what is wrong with her. She is drawn to him in ways that make no sense to a logical, responsible woman like her. Bringing him into her life is complicated, to say the least, but sometimes life doesn’t have the best timing. She thought her story was ending, but Captain is showing her that the adventure has just begun.

Don’t miss this exciting installment in T.S. Joyce’s new monster-hit Fastlander series—where everyone is C-Team, and the mountains are coming back to life.

****Content Explicit spicy love scenes, naughty language, and piles of sexy shifter secrets. Shifter animal battles and wars for territory lines show up in most of these books, which includes action adventure and some violence. Intended for mature audiences.

title: HR Compass for Organizational Success and Sustainability: An Authentic, Research-Backed Blueprint for the Future of Work
Princely Mistakes (Aether's Revival, #11)
description:
Things were supposed to settle down after the Bloodrock war. Even with the upcoming wedding to Verka, things should have gotten calm. For a time, it even looked like it might, giving the family hope. However, Krogga was proving to be a far more dangerous post than they’d thought it would be.

The spies who’d been hounding them had to be dealt with, revealing them to be a few clans from the empire. They’d had to kill all involved, only bringing further trouble when an Imperial investigator arrived to question them. They held strong, and eventually, the investigator left with more than enough evidence of the clans being sanctioned.

The wedding finally arrived, and the family celebrated Verka joining them. Gregory overcame the ritual of the climb up the temple road, including talking Ragnar down. Having married Verka just before the solstice, all of them were looking forward to a week off to enjoy their newest addition.

Sadly, it was right in the middle of the Festival of Krog that Buldoun blundered. Launching an unprovoked and deadly attack, Buldoun might have managed to capture or decimate the city if not for Gregory’s foresight. When the attack was finally thwarted and the Buldounish ships sailed off, the city began to pick itself back up.

The Pettits did their best to help the city, all while wondering what would happen next. More of their family would be arriving during the year, and Krogga would be turning its angry gaze toward Buldoun. There was so much waiting to be settled that anything could happen, and they still had years left on their posting in Krogga.

title: S(h)akti to M.D.: Dust, Dreams & Determination
ÉPREUVE : 365 Keys to Vibrant Longevity: What if true longevity consisted of adding life to time and time to life!
Speak. Connect. Close.: Turn first conversations into closed deals without sounding salesy
description:
You don’t have a sales problem. You have communication disconnect.
 In her first book, Speak. Connect. Close., Certified Financial Planner and Coach Anbarasi
 Marimuthu reveals why polished pitches, and clever scripts still fall flat because clients buy
 based on connection, not content.
 This book introduces the four communication styles that shape every buying decision and
 shows you how to spot them within the first 60 seconds of any meeting.
 Packed with relatable stories, easy-to-use templates, and practical tools, you’ll learn how to
 adapt your messages in real time, so clients feel understood, valued, and ready to say “yes”.
 With this book, you can forget pushy sales tactics and awkward follow-ups. Instead, you’ll
 discover how 
 1. Read clients instantly and accurately.
 2. Handle objections gracefully.
 3. Close confidently without pressure.
 4. Build trust that creates loyalty, referrals, and repeat business.
 Packed with insights and scripts you can immediately use, this book is your useful guide to
 transforming conversations into long-term client relationships and turning sales into something
 that feels natural, authentic, and successful.

title: Dead of Winter (Battle of the Bulls #2)
description:
Bucking bull shifter, Dead of Winter, is desperately trying to hold onto one of the top three spots in the PBSRC. He’s coming off a shoulder injury though, and he’s looking for something to keep him motivated to put his body through the strain of bucking in rodeos every week. Hints about his past are making it into the public eye, and the pressure on him is bigger than ever, but when he sees a stranger in the crowd at a rodeo, she just might be the key to turning things around. Raven looks like a tough-girl, but her sweet demeanor has his bull paying attention. He’s falling way too hard, and way too fast, and he doesn’t know her intentions yet. She’s a Hagan, and those shifters are nothing to mess with. Their inner animals are territorial and ill-tempered to say the least, but that only adds to Raven’s mystery. She could be the motivation he needs…or his downfall. Only time will tell.

Raven has a plan: meet the bull shifter who can answer questions about her biological family, and ask him how she can control her animal. Meeting Dead of Winter isn’t easy. He’s in town for a rodeo and signing autographs after he bucks, and what starts as a VIP meet-and-greet turns into a week-long adventure of self-discovery, and falling hard for the man who is teaching her all about herself. Her animal isn’t like his, or any of the rest of the herd though. She’s a lean, mean, human-stomping machine and there’s no controlling her once she’s on the loose. Dead’s options are simple—see the animal and run, or see the potential and push her to be bigger than she ever imagined. Her life is taking a drastic turn, and it’s overwhelming and exhilarating. And now, she just needs to make sure Dead, and all the people he loves, survive her.

Content Warning: Explicit love scenes, naughty language, and piles of sexy shifter secrets. Intended for mature audiences.

title: Quickdraw Slow Burn (Battle of the Bulls #3)
description:
Bucking bull shifter, Quickdraw Slow Burn, has had one focus, and one focus alone—winning that coveted title of number one bull in the world at the final Battle of the Bulls event. He’s trained relentlessly for this day, but he’s been drawn into a small herd of other monstrous bull shifters and is figuring out that he doesn’t have to celebrate his successes, or mourn his losses, alone anymore. When he meets Annabelle Faulk at a rodeo, she doesn’t look so intimidating, but she's got one gnarly wolf residing inside of her. Maybe that's part of the attraction. Quickdraw has tried and failed to find a match before, but this time is different. One unexpected night with her has him hooked, addicted, and bewitched. But when she finally accepts the plane tickets he’s been sending her to meet up again, she isn’t the same woman he met a month ago. Something has changed in her, and Annabelle’s reserve around him is confusing. It’s messing with his head, right before the biggest bucking event of his life. Annabelle has a big secret; he just can’t figure out what it is.

Annabelle Faulk is in big trouble. Something unexpected has happened to her that will change the course of her life forever. There’s a man she can’t stop thinking about in Quickdraw, but she is hyper-aware of how she could alter his life as well, and it has the potential to kill his career. When she finally goes to confront him, he doesn’t make it easy to cut ties. In fact, he’s caring toward her, and protective, and all the things she and her wolf have always wanted in a mate. It’s really hard to say a necessary goodbye, when goodbye is the last thing on earth she wants to do. Caught between a rock and a hard place, she is now growing that protective instinct to keep him safe from what’s happening. Someone is poisoning the bulls, and Quickdraw is the number one target. No matter what their future holds, Annabelle and Quickdraw have to keep each other alive…no matter what.

Content Warning: Explicit love scenes, naughty language, and piles of sexy shifter secrets. Intended for mature audiences.

title: Learning the Art of Electronics: A Hands-On Lab Course
description: This introduction to circuit design is unusual in several respects. First, it offers not just explanations, but a full course. Each of the twenty-five sessions begins with a discussion of a particular sort of circuit followed by the chance to try it out and see how it actually behaves. Accordingly, students understand the circuit's operation in a way that is deeper and much more satisfying than the manipulation of formulas. Second, it describes circuits that more traditional engineering introductions would postpone: on the third day, we build a radio receiver; on the fifth day, we build an operational amplifier from an array of transistors. The digital half of the course centers on applying microcontrollers, but gives exposure to Verilog, a powerful Hardware Description Language. Third, it proceeds at a rapid pace but requires no prior knowledge of electronics. Students gain intuitive understanding through immersion in good circuit design.

title: The Carpenter's Daughter
description:
Alt Cover ASIN: B01D6PIWMS

One word can change a life.
Sarah Sharpe has grown up as a carpenter’s daughter, knowing only the rough and work-heavy world of her father’s blue-collar profession. Abandoned by her mother as a baby, she’s lived twenty-one years content to drive nails at her dad’s side. Following her father into the world of construction was a natural path, and she took it without a second thought. But a harsh comment about her “butch” appearance sends her on a search for identity. 
Enter handsome and easygoing Jesse Chapman, the roofer she meets on her first foray into volunteer work for Homes For Hope. In every way, the quirky man is her opposite—confident, a people kind of guy, and most importantly, happy. His likable qualities continue to draw her in, and for some reason he keeps coming back to her. But they can’t be more than friends—he’s made that crystal clear. Except for a handful of times…and the confusion is driving her crazy. 
Sarah’s quest for self-definition becomes more tangled than she ever imagined, and she discovers that the journey will take her deeper than clothes and makeup. Filling the void in her heart becomes an obsession she cannot escape. How far is she willing to go to discover who she really is?

title: Touch of Innocence  (Coventry Saga #5)
description:
From a USA Today bestselling author comes a gripping story of mystery, romance, and pulse-pounding suspense.

How can she save the little girl next door from being exploited if nobody believes her?

Grace used to try to save people, but that was before she realized how powerless she is. Now, she avoids emotional ties, working from her secluded cabin, content with her aloneness. When eight-year-old Lily starts hanging around, Grace enjoys her company but carefully keeps her distance—until she discovers the girl is being exploited. Little though she wants to, she must get involved, even if it means risking her own safety to secure Lily’s.

Andrew can’t help but be drawn to his new neighbor and her beautiful foster child. When he learns about Lily’s disturbing history, he offers to help Grace prove her suspicions about the girl’s father. But the more they learn, the more puzzling Lily’s history seems. They work together to unravel the mystery, determined to ensure Lily ends up with a family who loves her.

But Lily’s father isn’t giving up his muse—or his obsession—that easily. He believes Lily is rightfully his, and he’ll do anything to get her back.

Don't miss this thrilling page-turner, the latest in the addictive Coventry Saga.

title: Marshal (Tin Star K9, #3)
description:
The U.S. Marshals service seeks a K9 Unit for their elite strike team tasked with hunting down America's most wanted criminals. Caitlyn Reed and her K9 partner, Renegade, are called up to the varsity to face this harrowing challenge. Has she bitten off more than she can handle?

Moose Creek Sheriff Colt Branson finds himself in the foray as a part of the U.S. Marshal’s new federal, state, and local joint task force aimed at bringing down the worst of the worst who have taken up refuge in his own backyard, the windswept wilderness of northeastern Wyoming.

Caitlyn, Renegade, and Colt battle not only the heinous outlaws, but the rugged Wyoming mountains. In this cat-and-mouse thriller, who is hunting whom?

Please note: this title will be released in advance of the posted date.

title: Cocoa Beach Reunion (Sweeney House, #3)
description:
As Sam dips her toes into the surf…and a new romance…the Sweeney family continues to grow. Their estranged sister returns from a life on the road with a staggering new hurdle the family must overcome, while John learns to navigate a whole new life and tries to save his marriage. Can this tightly-knit group emerge stronger than ever as they face some of life’s most difficult challenges?

The Sweeney House Series

The Sweeney House is a landmark inn on the shores of Cocoa Beach, built and owned by the same family for decades. After the unexpected passing of their beloved patriarch, Jay, this family must come together like never before. They may have lost their leader, but the Sweeneys are made of strong stuff. Together on the island paradise where they grew up, this family meets every challenge with hope, humor, and heart, bathed in sunshine and the unconditional love they learned from their father.

Cocoa Beach Cottage – book 1
Cocoa Beach Boardwalk – book 2
Cocoa Beach Reunion – book 3
Cocoa Beach Sunrise – book 4
Cocoa Beach Bakery – book 5
Cocoa Beach Cabana – book 6
Cocoa Beach Bride – book 7

title: The Yank Striker: A Footballer's Beginning
description:
He’s DJ Ryan, an All-American wide receiver about to graduate high school. But he’s still in the shadow of his All-American quarterback brother Trey Ryan and his dad, college football national championship coach Junior Ryan. Why not join them at Hamilton State University in Texas for glory and a title, while kickstarting a future NFL career and financial security? Even if it is tough for him to be in the same room with his dad.

However, there’s a couple of complications. Football likes its heroes to be men who get turned on by women, but DJ’s attracted to people regardless of what sex they are or aren’t. He doesn’t advertise that, just like his mother doesn’t advertise that she left his dad for a woman of her own.

Then there’s DJ’s love for the other sport known as football - soccer. He’s a talented striker for both high school and semipro teams. By coincidence, a scout from the Premier League club Donford FC in London notices him by chance and offers DJ a tryout…

Is he going to head to the NFL, or cross the Atlantic and take a risk on the unknown? And will he live life in the shadows or out in the open?

title: Achy Breaky Hex (Hannah Hickok #14)
description:
Hannah Hickok has a lot on her mind.
She’s engaged, with a wedding around the corner.
She and her husband-to-be Cooper Wyatt are building a house near the cosplay western town she inherited from her late grandmother.
And she’s gearing up for a fight with the witch who wants to steal her magic and kill her.
All of that falls by the wayside when Hannah realizes that people are starting to develop magical crushes…and the outcome is ugly when the fighting begins.
First up is local Sheriff James Boone’s teenage daughter. She’s overwhelmed by a spell when her latest crush’s attention is on the line.
Then the women at the bakery, all sisters, start fighting over the same man.
Then Cooper decides to come to blows for Hannah’s honor and it almost results in someone’s death.
Hannah is understandably confused. The only thing she knows without question is that there’s witchy magic afoot. Where is it coming from, though?
Hannah’s life is leading toward a specific fight. This fight, however, needs to be won before she can look to the future. Unfortunately for Hannah, the odds of winning are long.
There’s no evading the fight. So, here it comes.

title: Witching on the Job (Moonstone Bay #13)
description: Hadley Hunter came to Moonstone Bay to find herself. That included finding her passion in life. She just didn’t think it would involve becoming mayor. She has no qualifications, other than being a powerful witch. Half the town is rooting against her. The other half is just sitting back to see what happens. Only a handful of people are rooting for her, but they’re the only ones who matter. When a body appears on the beach, one that’s been stabbed in the back and surrounded by curse runes in blood, Hadley finds her attention split. She might be the new mayor, but she’s also interested in what killed a former member of the power-hungry DDA. The investigation involves old grudges, hidden files, a new witch in town, and the island’s biggest secret. Hadley isn’t ready for any of it, but she’s not going to have a choice. Someone on the island is trying to keep dark information from coming to light, and it’s going to put them all in danger. So, brace yourselves, because the new mayor is about to face a very old problem. Can she solve the case and keep the island safe? That’s anybody’s guess, but the odds are stacked against her.

title: Autumn's Chase (Autumn Trent #12: Autumn Trent: Season Two #3)
description:
Some evils never die—they evolve.

FBI Special Agent Autumn Trent is desperate for something to focus on besides the lingering emotional fallout of their last two cases. And the growing distance between her and Aiden Parrish, her supervisor and boyfriend. So when a new case lands on her desk, she jumps at the distraction.

Who knew bloodshed could provide relief?

The case is as gruesomely appalling as it is distracting. Two homeless drug addicts dragged to death by their necks, their bodies throw in the James River. More puzzling still is the discovery of the corpse of another homeless man a month before…killed in the same brutal manner and tossed in dumpster.

Why target those who’ve hit rock bottom?

Dead men don’t tell stories. With nothing to go on but three corpses that were never meant to be found and a questionable witness’s identification of a British accent, Autumn hits dead end after dead end.

She knows two things for sure. The sadistic killer enjoys torturing his victims. And she’s going to collar him before he collars another scapegoat destined for a harrowing death. Even if it costs her relationship with Aiden.

Autumn’s Chase, the third book in Season Two of Mary Stone’s bestselling Autumn Trent FBI Series, will force you to confront a horrifying truth: some nightmares aren’t just history repeating itself—they’re alive and relentless.

title: Have U Ever: A Urban Romance
description:
Have you ever needed something so bad you can’t sleep at night…

Zemira Stewart is a twenty-seven-year-old entrepreneur. She owns Elegant Spa, and from the outside most people believe her life is perfect. And why wouldn’t they? Her mother is a famous singer and her father is a successful music producer. What people don’t know is that she grew up lonely with numerous nannies playing the role her parents should have. Their absence left her fantasizing about an unconditional love. She always longed for it but never received it. 

Well, until she met Jason “Dink” Wilkins, an inmate at a Virginia federal prison. The couple instantly falls in love and gets married while Dink is still an inmate. When he’s released, Zemira quickly realizes he isn’t who he claims to be, and what starts as the perfect romance soon turns into a nightmare. 
Dink’s actions threaten to push Zemira into the arms of another man. But does this stranger have her best interest at heart? 

When forced to make a decision, will Zemira choose to save her marriage or take her chances with the other man? Will Dink let her go? Or will he start a street war that causes bloodshed throughout Annapolis?
Have U Ever is an urban romance novella that asks the question, what are you willing to do for love?

title: Insane 4 U 3
description:
The crew is back for one final round. Everything about this series has been absolutely insane. We’ve witnessed deceit, heartbreak, and a whole lot of betrayal. There have been good times too. The love between these characters has been nothing short of amazing and definitely something worth fighting for. A whirlwind of emotions has been on the rise since this series started, but in the end, everyone will rightfully receive the ending that they deserve.

Take one last ride with these characters, and witness how everything unfolds. With all of the craziness that has taken place since this series began, it’ll be beautiful to witness a perfect happy ending.

title: Me & My Beretta
description:
Beretta Diaz. We were introduced to her when she was a beautiful, snaggletooth, seven-year-old little girl, full of sass and energy. Years have gone by, and she’s now twenty years old. A lot has changed since we last heard from Beretta. She’s now a junior in college, a social media star, and a certified ‘IT’ girl. She and Skyro are still dating and more in love than ever. As days go by, their relationship is just like any other relationship that has its ups and downs, and their love for each other is tested.

Last we heard from Skyro, we knew it was in his plans to become one of the biggest drug lords to come out of Miami, Florida. Now that he’s no longer in school, he can give the dope game his all and work even harder to get to the top.

With Skyro's dangerous lifestyle, there are plenty of enemies lurking in the shadows, wanting nothing more than to make him disappear. Could it suddenly be too much for Beretta to affiliate herself with Skyro? She’s doing big things, but being Skyro’s girl is starting to feel like she’s playing Russian Roulette with her life.

title: The Girl From Englewood
description:
Reason defied the odds. She climbed the ladder of success, despite being a black woman from one of Chicago’s most notorious neighborhoods. Her professional life shines brightly as an Emergency Room physician. But her love life is in shambles. After divorcing her controlling, narcissistic husband, she’s only encountered men that are just like him, who are intimidated by her success. But as soon as she gives up on love, she meets Lake, a single-father, with a checkered past, that oozes swag and dominance.

Lake and Reason's lives collide in a heart-stopping encounter when Lake becomes Reason’s unlikely savior. Destiny intertwines their paths, sparking an instant and intense connection that neither of them saw coming.

However, their budding romance is swiftly threatened by crippling external forces. Reason finds herself trapped in a web of manipulation as her ex-husband continues his attempts to destroy her. Shocking revelations from Lake’s past and disloyalty shatters his relationships with those he trusted. As his world crumbles, he fights to rebuild the shattered pieces of his life. Yet, amidst the chaos consuming their lives, Lake and Reason cling to their love for one another.

Just when Lake and Reason believe they can overcome the challenges, tragedy strikes both of them with devastating force. Their lives are thrown into disarray, and their budding romance hangs in the balance.

title: Campus Chronicles: Kamaria & Kyree's Story
description: Kamaria Laurent has spent majority of her college career flying under the radar. As a plus sized girl who's always faced criticism from her peers and family, all she wants to do is stay out the way and get her degree. That all changes when she meets Mr. Popularity himself, Kyree Pierre. Kyree has had the opposite college experience from Kamaria. He throws parties, dates around, and makes the most of the time he'll never get back. When he crosses paths with Kamaria he convinces her to do the same thing. They're both on borrowed time with graduation rapidly approaching, so they want to live it up together. They quickly learn that the saying "opposites attract" is factual. But what will happen when outside forces come into play and challenge their blossoming relationship? Will their love be able to make it past the campus? (This is a standalone)

title: For The Streets: Summer 2021 (For The Streets/ Summer's Just Begun Book 1)
description: Kiyor and Bishop are both anti-relationships for similar reasons. Two people crossing paths with the same mindsets should be smooth sailing right? Wrong! Join Kiyor and Bishop for this chaotic and toxic ride.

title: A Virgin's Heart, A Millionaire Thug's Dream: Standalone (The Virgin And Millionaire Thug Series)
description:
When Ivy was uprooted from Houston her senior year of high school, she was sure she was going to despise her new life in
Dallas. Living with her Uncle Riley was turning out to be worse than she could’ve ever imagined, and she was ready to graduate and move on with her life. When her uncle suggested she link up with his daughter, she turned up her nose at the idea because they were so very different. Ivy was for all things good, and Unique was the opposite, doing what she wanted and chasing after bad boys. Ivy was hesitant about the connection between the two of them but gave in when her back was against the wall and she needed a favor. That one favor put her in the path of Truce Owens who was the most handsome man she ever saw.

Truce was the neighborhood hero who made money, stood on business, and intimidated everyone with his thuggish ways.
Truce loved money and women, drowning himself in both anytime he had a chance. Truce was handsome, tall, both humble and cocky but only when he needed to be. Falling in love was the last thing on Truce’s mind, but that was until he ran into the woman of his dreams who would change his outlook on love forever.

Dive into this story about a chance encounter that could turn into a forever love if the cards are dealt right. When opposites
attract, the connection is often as powerful as ever, but sometimes a few differences can pull them apart leaving two people broken hearted and yearning for each love.

A Virgin’s Heart, A Millionaire Thug’s Dream.

title: Millie's Cruise Ship Mysteries: Ketchikan Killer (Cruise Director Millie Mysteries Book 3)
description:
There’s a killer in Ketchikan and Millie may have the key to solving the case, if she and Captain Armati can stay alive long enough to see justice served.

Cruise Director Millie Mystery Series is the new spin-off series from the wildly popular Millie’s Cruise Ship Cozy Mysteries by Author Hope Callaghan.

 Recipe Included!

--------------------

Millie’s Alaskan Adventures are off to a shaky start when she loses her passport after arriving home in West Michigan. Unable to fly to Vancouver without it, she and Captain Armati book a flight to Ketchikan, Alaska where they’ll catch up with Siren of the Seas for the summer season.

While waiting at the airport, Millie notices a woman who appears distressed. Thinking there’s a chance she might be in some sort of trouble, she follows her to the bathroom and asks her if she’s okay. The woman claims to have met a man the previous night and thinks he may be stalking her. Despite Millie’s suggestions, the woman is reluctant to alert security.

The couple finally reach Ketchikan and set out to explore the town on foot. Just hours after their arrival, they discover there has been a murder – the murder of the young woman Millie met in the airport.

Believing she might have valuable information, Millie and Nic visit the local police station. Soon after, disturbing incidents start to occur. Are Millie and Nic being stalked by a Ketchikan Killer?

Find out when you grab your copy of Ketchikan Killer today!

title: Gold
description:
Twenty-year-old Gold Badeaux is living the life of every girl’s dreams. By day, she’s splurging at New York City designer showrooms; by night, she’s wined and dined and frequenting the hottest spots. She’s an it-girl, living the high life, and things couldn’t get any more fabulous. Still, despite her stunning looks and couture closet, Gold’s rise from the gritty streets of Newark has been far from idyllic. With every step she takes forward, her past is over her shoulder. Most times, it’s for the worse, but every blue moon for the better. Though she has a host of eligible bachelors at her feet, only one man can hold her undivided attention. There’s just one he’s off-limits.

Follow Gold on her journey of highs and lows in this urban coming-of-age tale fusing money, friendship, love, sex, and power. This is just the beginning. Welcome to Gold’s world.

title: Needful Noor: Book Two: Conclusion
description:
NEEDFUL A TWO-PART MEGA NOVEL

She escaped the life she had, to find the life she needed…

How much of our fate is circumstance?

Noor’s life path has always been potholed with obstacles.

But she was a survivor, an adapter…a proud wanderer.

Still, the deep yearning for more kept her motivated to conquer every hindrance, because there had to be more waiting - somewhere.

Hitchhiking her way to a new coast, she lands at the feet of money, prestige, and a soul-touching love, all at the doing of a chance job opportunity.

But it doesn’t mean all even terrain, and her past has a problem letting go.

Still, Noor is convinced destiny has brought her to the life she deserves.

She won’t allow the girl she was stop her from becoming the woman she needs to be.

Rules don’t apply, and she’s tired of letting life happen to her.

She’s determined to finally get everything she’s ever wanted.

Everything she’s ever needed.

title: The Calling Chase: A Chase Fulton Novel (Chase Fulton Novels Book 30)
description:
When a former teammate makes a desperate cry for help from two thousand miles away, Chase Fulton and his team of American covert operatives launch a rescue mission unlike anything they’ve undertaken in their storied career. From the Sea of Cortez to the burning Amazon jungle, the chase is on inside the mysterious and ancient world of tribal existence, at the farthest reaches of civilization. In a world where every step could spell obliteration for the team, they must become masters of their new environment in order to pluck their brother-in-arms from the clutches of an evil that exists in the haunting expanse beneath the centuries-old canopy of trees flourishing under bright, subtropical skies.

When the team discovers that retrieving their fellow fighter is but the thinnest of layers covering a far more sinister campaign, they must somehow find the courage to stand toe to toe with an invisible, nefarious enemy before the clock runs out and the warriors of tactical Team Twenty-One are but one more forgotten secret eternally absorbed by the endless and unforgiving jungle.

title: Justice in the Keys (Florida Keys Adventure #23)
description:
When a man’s body washes ashore in the Lower Keys, Logan Dodge’s initial reaction is to trust reports that it was an accidental drowning. That is until the departed is identified.
