Logan learns that the corpse that drifted onto the popular beach is a man he once knew—a man who’d once saved his life.

Suspecting foul play, Logan flies across the country, searching for relatives of the deceased along with other faces from his past who he feels may hold the keys to unraveling the truth. But the former Navy SEAL runs into trouble at every turn. He quickly learns that the man’s death is just the tip of the iceberg, and that the body count will continue to rise if he can’t track down those responsible.

title: The List (Coastal Fury Book 54)
description:
A chance encounter at Miami's bustling waterfront throws MBLIS Agent Ethan Marston into a deadly game of cat and mouse when a desperate stranger hands him evidence of the decade's biggest conspiracy. A massive cover-up. A list of names that powerful people will kill to protect. And now they're hunting Marston too.
With his phone compromised, his own agency on his tail, and professional killers closing in, Marston goes dark with his unwanted companion. His partner Robbie Holm leads the manhunt to bring him in, but unlike the other forces pursuing them, at least Holm wants Marston alive.
Cut off from allies and resources, Marston must keep his paranoid companion alive long enough to expose the truth. But as bodies start dropping and the noose tightens, he begins to realize the stranger's paranoia might be justified. The list is real. The danger is real. And the people on that list will stop at nothing to make sure their secrets stay buried.
Sometimes the hardest part isn't uncovering the truth—it's living long enough to expose it.

title: The Capitol Chase: A Chase Fulton Novel (Chase Fulton Novels Book 31)
description:
When the arduous battle tempo catches up with American covert operative Chase Fulton and his team, a little R and R is exactly what the doctor ordered. But for operators like Team 21, there’s no such thing as downtime.

Hundreds of innocent cruisers aboard a luxurious ocean liner could never imagine the horrors that lay ahead when a band of pirates seizes control of their floating chariot and the vacation of a lifetime turns into an unimaginable terror at sea.
The mastermind behind the piracy must pay the price for his terrorism, but is he one of the untouchable elites? Is he—or anyone—truly above the law when standing face-to-face with the warriors who’ve devoted their lives to protecting those who cannot protect themselves?

Will Chase and his team be forced to step across the line in the sand they’ve drawn for themselves, or will the powerful forces hiding behind the flag finally back down when faced with certain destruction?

Don’t hold your breath . . . or perhaps you should . . . as you take to the sea with Chase and his band of fearless warfighters on an adventure that promises edge-of-your-seat excitement, heart-pounding drama, unimaginable feats of heroism, and twists no one could’ve seen coming.

title: Chasing Dragons (Coastal Fury Book 55)
description:
A long-awaited vacation in Cuba should be exactly what Ethan needs after nearly losing everything. No cases. No threats. Just sun, sand, and precious time with Tessa. But when a local historian's tales of mysterious ships and hidden caves catch his attention, Ethan can't resist diving into one last investigation—one that could finally reveal the truth about a legendary vessel he's been hunting for years.

Meanwhile in Miami, what starts as an innocent Civil War reenactment turns deadly when Agents Marcus Baker and Robbie Holm discover someone has replaced the prop weapons with real firearms. As they race to uncover who would go to such lengths for revenge, they'll need all hands on deck—including the enigmatic Agent Reeves—to prevent history from repeating itself in the deadliest of ways.

Two cases. Two cities. And a dragon's worth of secrets waiting to be unleashed.

title: Deadman's Dance: Coyote Run Mystery Book 4
description:
A body in a wine cask, a missing heir, and a deadly secret waiting to be uncorked…

Canine rehabilitator Maddie “Mad Girl” Whitney, still reeling from a recent breakup, struggles to hold her life together as her once-lonely, small-town life expands with friends, family, and new staff complicating her every move. Fortunately, her loyal pack of incredible dogs is always by her side. But when she stumbles upon a body sealed in a cask, Maddie is drawn into the high-stakes world of wealthy wine collectors and secrets worth killing for.

The intrigue deepens when two connoisseurs vanish on a hike. Maddie must make the heart-wrenching decision to reunite with her ex, Sheriff Oliver Desjardins, and the Midnight Runners K-9 Search & Rescue Team. Working side by side, Maddie and Oliver navigate the case’s dark twists and their own unresolved emotions. As the mystery unfolds, Maddie realizes the danger runs far deeper than she imagined. Is a “Cabernet Killer” on the loose?

In wine country, there are secrets people will do anything to protect—even if it means more bodies in the cellar.

title: SEAL's Secret (Alpha SEALs Hawaii Book 4)
description:
One night of passion will forever change their lives...

Navy SEAL Hudson “Torpedo” Brown has an instant attraction to the sexy blonde realtor he meets on the beach. She’s leaving Oahu in days, but not before they share one unforgettable night together.

Layton O’Connell doesn’t expect her entire life to implode after a tropical vacation. When her ex-husband gives up joint custody of their daughter, she moves with her to Hawaii. But she’s got another surprise to share—she’s pregnant with Hudson’s baby.

Layton’s new real estate career in Oahu quickly takes off, but when she goes missing, Hudson is desperate to find her. Can Hudson get to her in time—and make her his forever?

SEAL’s Secret, a standalone novel, is book four in the sizzling Alpha SEALs Hawaii series.

title: Just Breathe
description:
Jay Marshall, an edgy junior theater major, befriends Emma Montgomery, a celibate Christian sophomore transfer student with bipolar disorder.

They bond after Emma's embarrassing tumble and become best friends. Emma falls for Brady Ellison, but Jay secretly loves her while he continues to mess around with Brie. Emma and Brady date, but he doesn't want to respect the fact that she wants to wait until marriage to have sex. Meanwhile, Jay ends things with Brie, who holds a grudge. Emma discovers Brady's infidelity and breaks up with him.

Emma and Jay's friendship deepens as they work on a play together. After a traumatic incident, Jay realizes his love for Emma. They stay up all night talking and attend church together. Jay confesses his feelings, but Emma asks him to wait. When more tragedy strikes, Emma realizes her true feelings

title: Amarel Mountain (Anu Awakes Series Book 2)
description:
Descendants of the Tolku the tree dwelling Yakku, cave dwelling Koru, and the Field Yakku navigate a world reshaped by the cataclysmic Killing Swath. As the Living System of Tatchlan is revived, old powers awaken, and the supreme leader, the Majastas, passes the mantle to a successor, uncertainty grips every society.

Amid buried structures, mysterious artifacts, and ancient secrets, these disparate groups uncover truths that will challenge their beliefs, reshape their communities, and draw their paths inevitably together. Political upheaval, societal transformation, and spiritual revelations collide in a story of survival, legacy, and destiny.

A sweeping epic of worldbuilding, alien civilizations, mystical systems, and profound philosophical exploration.
Perfect for readers who love Dune, The Left Hand of Darkness, and immersive, multilayered epic fantasy

title: Rooted: A Wildlife Tree's Journey
description: A Wildlife Tree's Journey is an emotional account of a tree's life that has come full circle. When Dendro doesn't produce buds in the spring, he is forced to face this life-changing development. Vincent, his mentee, faces an uncertain future.

title: One Chill Millionaire 5: Fox Legacy
description:
After the failed attempt on Connor’s hit, life takes a turn for everyone. Nicki and Quest are trying to mend their fractured relationship with a child, while Brees is determined to do whatever it takes to win Leah back. Just as things start to calm down, their father Fox creates a spark reigniting the drama as he comes on the scene.
Fox is ruthless, he is confident, and in his head, he's the driving force behind all of the success around him. Will their father ever balance out their lives, or will his presence cause a shift no one saw coming?

One Chill Millionaire 5: Fox Legacy

title: Eternal Ledger ("The Rarak Chronicles “)
Big Day, Big Everything
description:
Tonny is the son of Death, waiting for the day his father would finally take him to work. But his dad does not return from the human world. Someone has taken him, and Tonny sets out to find him in a world he has only studied.

Big Day, Big Everything is a British, darkly funny fantasy about family, courage and trying to keep your dignity while saving the world in magical underwear.

title: Finding Peace (Baytown Boys #4)
description:
The Baytown Boys 
 
Military duty called them away to war zones, but after tours overseas, the group of friends found their way back home as men, seeking the peaceful little seaside town. Now, the band of brothers, together once more, work to provide a place for less fortunate veterans to call home. 
 
Brogan MacFarlane, a former Marine, filled his days with hard work at the family bar and his nights running along the shore to rid himself of the war memories he would rather forget. But there was one thing in town that provided a distraction…the pretty cop with the haunted eyes. 
 
Ginny Spencer loved the small, shore town and her job, as long as she could keep people at arm’s length. Former Army Military Police, she carried her own battle scars deep inside and that was just where she planned on keeping them. If only the surly bartender with the Irish blue eyes did not make her long for more. 
 
When reports of a Peeping Tom in town escalate to a man accosting women, Ginny and the Baytown police work to find the culprit, but for her, it opens wounds she would rather forget. Brogan, seeing her pain, steps in, no longer willing to sit on the sidelines. And in doing so, allows her to soothe his nightmares as well. 
 
When two scarred souls come together, their love allows them to find the peace they’ve been seeking. 
 
****Due to scenes of an explicit sexual nature and language that some consider crude, please be warned - for 18+ only! If you do not like alphas with heart who fall instantly in love with strong female characters while dealing with real life issues...again be warned!!*****

title: Scriptural Rosary
description:
Amazon's first Scriptural Rosary prayerbook specifically optimized for the Kindle. 
 
Pray the Rosary with Scripture. Includes all Mysteries of the Rosary: Joyful, Sorrowful, Glorious, and Luminous.

title: The Last Christmas Puppy (Wyoming Danger)
description:
Alone over Thanksgiving yet again, Poppy Williams figures the Christmas holidays will be just as quiet.
Or will they--as threats and growing danger begin to mount?

With their baby due in four weeks, her daughter and son-in-law can’t travel to Wyoming. And after a dying friend recently left a basset hound--now with a litter of puppies--and a feisty cockatiel in Poppy's care, she can't travel to see them, either.

Now she has eight-week-old puppies romping in her kitchen and a cockatiel barking orders and singing opera tunes at her as she contemplates the future. Finding homes for the animals hasn't been easy in this tiny town hidden up in the Wyoming Rockies. All nine pups were going to their forever homes this week, but now one buyer has disappeared and another has backed out. And no one has enquired about the cockatiel or the puppies’ mother.

But far worse, someone has been vandalizing her property, and is now going after her.

And now her ex-husband has shown up in town and that can't be good. Or is it?

With a winter storm approaching, can she hope for an early Christmas miracle?

Another suspense-filled inspirational romance by USA Today Bestselling author, Roxanne Rustand

Download today and immerse yourself in a heartwarming story you won't forget!

title: Killer Secrets (National Forest K-9, #3)
description:
A small town’s deadly past is exposed in the newest installment of the suspenseful National Forest K-9 series by Kathleen Donnelly.

Until an avalanche ripped down a mountainside, exposing a serial killer’s dumping grounds, Antler Valley, Colorado was a quiet town. Now Forest Service officer Maya Thompson and her beautiful K-9, Juniper, must catch the murderer before they become the next targets.

With the neighboring town’s new overconfident sheriff deterring the entire investigation, a murderer on the loose and heartthrob deputy Josh Colton racing through her mind, Maya is at a crossroads. Josh is ready to go all in, but Maya has one foot out the door. As she lets her guard down, she needs to accept that she’s falling deeply in love with him, no matter how risky it may be. 

When evidence from the Antler Valley victims links the murders to deaths in other ski towns, secrets long buried are unearthed. Maya and Juniper must run toward an answer, though finding it might lead them directly into a fatal trap…

National Forest K-9

Book 1: Chasing Justice
Book 2: Hunting the Truth
Book 3: Killer Secrets

title: Loving a Cowgirl (Callahans of Copper Creek #7)
description:
Hello readers!

Next up in the Callahans of Copper Creek is Brielle and Wade Keagan’s story! I am super excited to get this story out to you.

Brielle’s story has been a long time coming! In this story, you’ll find out about her big secret and why she’s been afraid to get serious with anyone.

If you’ve been following the series, you’ve already met Wade Keagan. He’s big and strong, a lot like Zeke Callahan himself. He’s had to be the head of the household since their parents died and it hasn’t been easy.

A better description is coming soon! I can't wait to get you your next Callahan book.

As always, thank you for sticking around with me. See you soon in Copper Creek!

title: Krash Right Into You (The Kalloways)
description:
Krash, better known as Krash the Jeweler, Lucas is a well-known, handsome jeweler
in his city. Not only did Krash have the looks, but he also had a presence known to make
women fall to his feet. Krash had the looks, women, popularity, and deep pockets to match.
Still, with it all, Krash found himself searching for something genuine and authentic.

SaKoya Prescott is a beautiful, humble, yet intelligent travel nurse with big dreams
to one day be her own boss alongside her best friend. SaKoya decided to take one more job
before pursuing her dreams. Leaving her family, best friend, and situationship, Koya sets
out to visit her hometown and complete a traveling nurse assignment for the next six
months. However, what happens when you literally Krash right into your past?

Meeting back up after nearly fifteen years of not seeing or hearing from each other,
Krash and Koya find themselves hanging out like old times. The only thing now was that
they were adults, and the chemistry they had as adolescents only intensified and became
undeniable. Still, with Koya's assignment only being six months, what happens when her
time is up?

title: A Cowboy's Forever Faithful (Sweet View Ranch #1)
description: In the friendly town of Sweet Water, North Dakota, Ellen and Travis's friendship flourished, firmly rooted in shared laughter and dreams. As Travis returned to Sweet View Ranch, his purchase of Ellen at auction seemed to shatter the boundaries they had once embraced. Stirred by newfound emotions, Ellen grappled with conflicting feelings when Travis asked her to assist him in finding a wife. Bound by loyalty and love, she faced a heartbreaking choice—guide the man she secretly longed for toward another's arms or summon the courage to reveal her true feelings, risking their cherished bond.

title: Seaside Cowboy's Best Friend (Seaside Cowboys, #2)
description:
A strict, career-minded lawyer, an easygoing flirtatious cowboy, a mysterious disappearance, and a mischievous puppy… Can childhood friends with opposing personalities become more? Back in her small coastal town, divorced and heartbroken lawyer Marina Helms is a fish out of water helping in her mom’s seafood restaurant kitchen. Then Marina lands in hot water when she agrees to help her best friend, Kai Lawrence, find the brother he didn't know he had. She just needs to keep her crush on Kai under wraps until she goes back to her demanding job and lackluster life. A part-time cowboy, part-time pirate impersonator, and full-time player, Kai wanted Marina to spread her wings. But his protective instincts flare up when he inadvertently leads her into danger. He can’t walk away now. And he can’t put a lid on his feelings, either. Will their dangerous search unite them—or lead to disaster? Welcome to Port Sunshine, a small coastal town where a family of cowboy brothers discover the treasures of love and uncover the mysteries of their pasts!

Book 1: Seaside Cowboy's Second Chance
Book 2: Seaside Cowboy's Best Friend
Book 3: Seaside Cowboy's Marriage of Convenience

title: Chilled to the Bone (Two Broomsticks Gas & Grill Witch #9)
description:
Stormy Morgan is flying high. She’s engaged. She’s used to her new routine. She’s even learning about being a witch. All of that changes when a local podcaster’s house goes up in flames and a body is found inside.
Carl Winslow was not a nice man. He spent his time stalking local family vloggers so he could cast aspersions on their life choices. One family in particular draws his ire, and he fights with them the night of the fire. Are they to blame for the podcaster’s death, though?
Stormy and her fiancé Hunter Ryan are on the case, and the further they dig into Carl Winslow’s life, the more they realize that nothing in Shadow Hills is as it seems.
Stormy was already working against forces she didn’t see coming. There’s a conspiracy of people who were apparently waiting for her to manifest her powers working against her, though. They have plans for her. They also had plans for Carl.
As evidence begins mounting, it points to one particular person. Only Stormy is convinced it has to be someone else. She’s determined to get to the source of the death and destruction wreaking havoc on her once quiet small town.
She has to survive to find her answers, though, and that’s not a given.
It’s a race against the clock. Either Stormy finds what she’s looking for and stops Shadow Hills’ most recent threat, or everybody suffers in the wake of yet another bout of magical mayhem.
Who will survive? You’re about to find out.

title: The Don’s Virgin Possession 2: The Finale (The Coalition)
description: Following a revelation that shattered his entire world, Omari wrestles with the choice he has to make. Should he keep the woman who held his heart captive by his side or let her go for good?Juli, on the other hand, has been nothing but honest. Before her secret was revealed, she was as clueless as the Don. However, while she wants to continue to be with him, she won't force nor beg him to stay.Meanwhile, Dante is determined for the O'Reilly's to become one with the Asante clan, and he will stop at nothing until he completes his task.As the enemy plots to take them down, the two lovebirds try to navigate their way through troubled waters. With all hands on deck and memories of the past still fresh in their minds, they start to lash out at each other. Some words are said that can never be taken back. However, when tragedy strikes, they have to face the consequences.But will it be together?

title: Surrendering to Love (Love on Sanctuary Shores Book 3)
description:
When love takes flight, redemption finds its harbor.

These days, the cockpit of her seaplane is the only place Angelica Fielding feels purposeful and in control. When she’s high above the tranquil waters surrounding Sanctuary Island, her spirit is as free as the Lake Huron breeze. If only that peace followed her on the ground, instead of the endless grief she keeps pushed down while focusing on inheriting her uncle’s thriving charter business.

When a face from her past turns up, all that she’s buried deep inside threatens to spill to the surface and destroy everything she’s strived for.

Weary from the relentless demands of his medical career, Colton Brunswick needs a change. Past mistakes have left him empty and numb and he no longer recognises the man in the mirror. He hopes his position as the new doctor on Sanctuary Island will give him the chance to reassess his life and heal his wounded spirit. He’d prescribe a fresh start for anyone else, so why not himself? But starting over is one thing. Confronting his past and dealing with the regret he’s carried over the loss of his best friend for so long is something altogether different. If he can’t forgive himself, how can his best friend’s sister?

As Angelica and Colton navigate the waters of their tragic past, faith might just be the ally they both need.

Welcome to the shores of Sanctuary Island, where six bestselling authors of Christian romance bring you stories of love and redemption. From tender romance to enduring faith, each standalone novel in this series promises unforgettable characters and heartwarming small town charm.

title: Tumbling into Tomorrow
description:
A ballerina on the run, a widower guarding his heart…Will they find hope, love and healing on the shores of Sanctuary Island?Harper Mackenzie is a gifted ballerina with impeccable discipline over every aspect of her life. Except that life has suddenly pirouetted out of her control. She accepts a housesitting job on Sanctuary Island, expecting the quiet of the northern winter to calm the chaos and provide a refuge from her toxic ex.

She didn’t expect her childhood crush to still be living there. 

Nate Hawthorn’s love for his daughter is as deep as his connection to the island. But the joy of fatherhood can’t erase the grief of losing his first love, and he knows he doesn’t ever want to go through that again.

Still, his locked-down heart can’t stop him from wanting to help the city-slicker pixie he remembers from summer camps on the island when the winter becomes too much for her to handle. But helping is as far as he can go. If only Harper wasn’t so alluring. Not to mention good with his daughter. 

Amidst the snow-covered landscape, Harper and Nate find themselves drawn to each other, despite the obstacles of their pasts. Supported by the warm embrace of the island's close-knit community and united by their rediscovered faith, they’ll both have to choose whether they let the past hold them back or embrace a future they never expected.

Welcome to the shores of Sanctuary Island, where six bestselling authors of Christian romance bring you stories of love and redemption. From tender romance to enduring faith, each standalone novel in this series promises unforgettable characters and heartwarming small town charm.

title: Wishing for Mistletoe
description:
When the heart pens its own holiday romance, even a skeptic can find magic under the mistletoe.

On Sanctuary Island, Ariel Highbridge seeks refuge from crippling writer's block and a disillusioned heart. As a writer of Regency romances who's been betrayed by love herself, Ariel struggles to weave tales of romance when her own faith in it has frayed.

Tom Fuller is a devoted schoolteacher and a widower, whose life orbits around his daughter Shauna. He has sworn off the possibility of new love. Yet, the arrival of their enchanting neighbor stirs an unexpected warmth in both father and daughter's lives..

As the island's Yuletide enchantments weave their spell, Tom and Ariel find themselves drawn to each other. Ariel's burgeoning belief in love and Tom's tentative steps towards healing suggest that perhaps, this Christmas, they could write a love story of their own.

But their fledgling romance will soon face its ultimate test, and it will take the magic of the season and the island's charm for their love story to prove the most enchanting tales don't end—they simply transform into new beginnings.

* * *

Welcome to the shores of Sanctuary Island, where six bestselling authors of Christian romance bring you stories of love and redemption. From tender romance to enduring faith, each standalone novel in this series promises unforgettable characters and heartwarming small town charm.

title: The Woman in Green from Cromarty: A Legend
description:
All Kelly wants is a fresh beginning, but when she meets an elderly woman who claims to be her great, great grandmother and finds an ancient evil that wants her baby’s blood, she reaches for archaic tradition.

Kelly is certain she’s begun a better life and seeks refuge for herself and her young daughters after fleeing a dead marriage. But something goes very wrong when a frightening troll appears at the window of her second-story apartment, and she learns her premonition is spot something is after her daughters.

Gudrun claims to be a relative from the 1400's come to stop the woman in green from Cromarty from draining her daughters’ blood. Kelly disbelieves the elderly woman and discounts her premonition until in the dead of night, she finds an ancient evil hoovering over her oldest daughter’s bed ready to open a vein with her toddler watching. Kelly needs to trust one troll over the other because evil won’t stop until it drains every drop of her children’s blood. She does discover small comfort but who is the bigger threat? The evil after their lives or the man stirring her heart living under their noses?

title: Treacherous Depths (Eden Mercer K-9 Mystery Thriller #4)
description:
For fans of pulse-pounding thrillers and intricate police procedurals comes a story that will plunge you into the darkest depths of human nature. In the misty coastal town of Nightfall, Oregon, Officer Eden Mercer faces her most harrowing case yet. When a fishing charter boat sinks under mysterious circumstances, leaving multiple casualties and one traumatized child survivor, Eden is thrust into a labyrinth of lies, greed, and murderous intent.

As she delves deeper, Eden uncovers a sinister web of financial fraud and deadly secrets, stretching from Nightfall's quaint streets to the treacherous waters of the Pacific. With each revelation, the danger mounts, forcing Eden to confront a killer who will stop at nothing to keep the truth submerged.

The clock is ticking as Eden races to unravel a complex web of deceit that stretches from Nightfall's seemingly peaceful streets to the highest echelons of local power. With each new lead, the list of suspects grows, and Eden soon realizes that in this close-knit coastal community, anyone could be harboring deadly secrets.

When another life hangs in the balance, Eden must risk everything to navigate the treacherous depths of human depravity. Can she unravel the truth before the killer strikes again, or will she find herself dragged under by the weight of Nightfall's darkest secrets?

Dive into "Treacherous Depths" and lose yourself in a heart-stopping tale of suspense, betrayal, and the relentless pursuit of justice in the face of unspeakable evil.

title: Total Eclipse of the Hex (Crescent Moon Mysteries #6)
description:
Murder is on the menu in Cypress Grove... and the catch of the day is deadly.

When a celebrity chef dies after a dramatic event at the Crescent Moon Inn, innkeeper and part-time sleuth Amelia Matthews finds herself juggling magical mayhem, suspicious guests, and a daughter who’s suddenly back in town—and not happy about her mom’s witchy lifestyle.

What should have been a showcase of Cypress Grove's culinary scene descends into chaos during a violent summer storm, with tensions simmering among a wine bar owner with a grudge, an increasingly unhinged assistant, a suspiciously knowledgeable newcomer, and a city council member who won't stop singing — or drinking. All signs point to toxic pufferfish poisoning, but Amelia senses something far more sinister at a disturbing force that threatens not just her inn's reputation, but her daughter's safety.

With the power out, the storm raging, and the clues piling up, Amelia must uncover the truth before anyone else falls victim to the killer trapped under her roof. Can she solve the case while keeping both her magic and her family ties intact?

Total Eclipse of the Hex is a paranormal cozy mystery packed with charm, suspense, and a dash of magic! While it can be read as a standalone, the books in the Crescent Moon Mystery Series are best read in order.

title: Monster Madness: Mysteries of Meri (Familiar Kitten Mysteries Book #37)
description:
Halloween arrives in Coventry with more tricks than treats when Kinsley Wilson discovers something sinister lurking behind the town's annual festivities. While juggling her struggling donut shop during her manager's honeymoon and hosting a candy swap for local kids, Kinsley encounters a desperate mother and her troubled teenage daughter who seems to be battling something far darker than typical adolescent angst.

As trick-or-treaters prepare to flood the streets, whispers circulate about the abandoned mansion on the edge of town, a place where local teenagers have always dared each other to knock on Halloween night. But this year, the rumors feel different. More dangerous. And when someone ends up dead on the mansion's porch, posed like a Halloween decoration, Kinsley must navigate a maze of panicked parents, mysterious midnight gatherings, and a mother's desperate love to uncover the truth.

With her sarcastic familiar Meri by her side, her two young daughters eager to trick-or-treat, and her sheriff husband Thorn officially on the case, Kinsley races against the midnight hour to solve a murder that's anything but supernatural... even if the motive behind it might be. Because in Coventry, sometimes the scariest monsters are the lengths people will go to save the ones they love.

title: A Ghost of a Chance: A Clowder Cats Cozy Mystery #6
description:
Halloween is in full swing at the Valewood Resort, and Eden Brooks is conjuring up the perfect spooky season a haunted house tour filled with ghostly illusions, creepy corridors, and just the right amount of fright. As the resort’s PR manager, Eden is determined to make this event a scream... for all the right reasons.

But when someone turns up dead inside the haunted house, the festivities quickly turn into a nightmare. Was it a tragic accident or something far more sinister?

With whispers of real ghosts circulating through the resort and tensions rising among the guests, Eden must rely on her feline sleuths and her sharp instincts to uncover the truth. Because in a house full of secrets, even the dead don’t always stay silent.

title: Pendle Island Witch Mysteries Complete Books 1-12
description:
Chelsea Moon has had better days. Weeks. Months. Years.

When real life gets too hard Chelsea decides to fly back to Pendle Island, a place she has not been since she was born. She’s looking forward to a vacation, but when she arrives, she’s quickly thrown into mayhem. Her Great Aunt Griselda has died, and Chelsea is needed at the funeral.

She’s barely halfway through a stack of breakfast pancakes when her cousin Lizzy drops another bombshell. Chelsea is a witch, and her Great Aunt didn’t just die. She was murdered.

Things go from bad to worse when Chelsea and her cousin start to follow the breadcrumbs. Her Great Aunt had been an infamous miser and hated by just about everyone on Pendle Island. Witches don’t get much more wicked than Griselda.

After an ancient legal loophole leaves Chelsea as the sole heir of Griselda’s estate, she suddenly finds herself in charge of a haunted house on a hill, home to a mad pirate ghost, a talking cat, and a burly lumberjack with a curious secret.

If that wasn’t enough, she’s got a dreamy sheriff to contend with, and a silver-tongued lawyer who is as charming as he is cunning. It’s a lot to process, especially when Chelsea learns about a family curse dangling over her head. The last thing she wants is to end up like her man-eater mother, but it seems she can’t help attracting attention…

With a curse to run from, a murder to solve, and a needy cat to please, Chelsea finds her plate fills up very quickly. There’s also the small matter of avoiding death and learning magic, but that’s easy enough. Right?

12 Books. Over 1,700 pages. All in one boxset!

title: Magical Renovation Mysteries Books 1-6
description: Six full length-novels!1000 pages of reading. Start this delightful series full of all things Southern!If you love sassy heroines, fixer uppers, wounded heroes, and spunky old ladies, you're going to love these books! Clementine thought she had escaped the past... boy, was she wrong. Southern gal Clementine Cooke is busy. The house renovation business she runs with her best friend in the small town of Peachwood, Alabama, is thriving. That is until Clementine discovers her partner dead, encased in poured concrete. It looks like murder. Clementine starts to investigate, quickly realizing that not only had her so-called best friend spent years lying to her, but plenty of folks wanted her dead--from the unionized wizard mafia to the old lady quilting club. But even with haters coming out of the woodwork, Clementine finds herself fighting off suspicion. She must locate the killer before the local police chief tosses her in jail and throws away the key. With no one to turn to, she enlists the help of a wizard suffering from amnesia. But there's a hitch--he might not remember who he is, but Clementine does, and for her own reasons, she’s not talking. Can Clementine clear her name and save her business? Or will this be one magical renovation that winds up in demolition? Why wait? Start reading the series now!

title: Magic & Midnight (Starry Hollow Witches, #16)
description:
Everything’s coming up Roses in Starry Hollow. Ember is thriving both personally and professionally, along with the other descendants of the One True Witch, and life has never smelled sweeter—until the bloom is off the rose, of course.

When a resident known as the Midnight Surfer is found dead on Balefire Beach, the community is shaken. The aging surfer was a fixture in Starry Hollow, albeit an ornery one, and the whole town is eager for Sheriff Nash to solve the case. With more suspects than grains of sand, the sheriff needs all the help he can get, and Ember is more than happy to offer her services.

Meanwhile, Marley falls under the influence of an older friend and begins to test boundaries at home and school, much to Ember’s dismay. The broomstick mama isn’t used to challenging behavior and it seems the only way to hold on is to let go.

Will the gathering dark clouds have a silver lining or will Ember succumb to the dead of night?

Magic & Midnight is book 16 in the Starry Hollow Witches series.

title: Wild Witch (The Nomad Witch Book 7)
description:
Scarlett Prynne and Runeclaw took one on the magical chin from the Luminous Veil. Now it’s time for payback.

While they were guarding against one kidnapping spree, the Veil performed another. But Scarlett has a lead on the captives, and for once, she’s going to be the one delivering trouble rather than receiving it.

The Veil won’t be stopped by just one strike, though. Camus’ plans to control captives and their owners with magical mind control collars could make him unstoppable. All he needs to do is get the collars on, place the servants, and then activate the magic inside them.

Time is ticking away while Scarlett, The Witches on Wheels, and the Spell Riders search for the key lead. 

Scarlett may need a new kind of magic to beat the Veil this time. An elderly witch wants to teach her how to use blood magic to track someone. Is it enough? And does it pose its own threat?

Meanwhile, Maddox and Amber will collaborate on getting Dusk Runner ready for battle. And Rath the troll will happily teach her to be better at throwing knives, in accordance with his mantra, “Must Train.”

But will anything be enough to root out the Veil’s location so they can finally destroy the group? 

Only one way to find out.

For action, magic, snarky banter, martial arts, mystical creatures, and a dash of mystery, join Scarlett and Runeclaw on their next adventure.

title: Magic & Mirrors (Starry Hollow Witches, #17)
description:
Welcome to Starry Hollow where spells were made to be broken.

All spell breaks loose when the residents of Starry Hollow start appearing to others the way they see themselves. When a dead body is discovered amidst the chaos, supernatural sleuth Ember Rose takes charge of the investigation, alongside a very tall and not-remotely-green Deputy Bolan. Thanks to the spell Sheriff Nash finds himself all wolf, which also impacts his attempt at a marriage proposal.

Can Ember find the killer who’s hidden in plain sight or is she doomed to get lost in the smoke and mirrors?

Magic & Mirrors is the 17th book in the Starry Hollow Witches series.

title: Dirge for the Dead (Strife After Death Book 3)
description:
Cora Hart was expecting ocean breezes, fancy cocktails, and a quiet weekend away from supernatural nonsense when she checked into the brand-new Ivory Hotel. But when a snooty travel critic takes a fatal tumble from the widow’s walk, Cora finds herself diving headfirst into another murder—with a saltwater ghost, a secret note, and a suspicious spell jar all floating around the scene.

Now she must dust off both her instincts, keep her Kitsune in check, and untangle a case full of jealous rivals, buried secrets, and one very persistent spirit who refuses to rest. To complicate things further, Damon—charming, enigmatic, and annoyingly perceptive—arrives with his own hidden agenda and a knack for showing up right when everything goes sideways.

With a hotel full of influencers and suspects, time is running out—and if Cora isn’t careful, she may be the next guest checking out… permanently.

The skeletons are coming out of the closet…

title: Kill the Willing / Bury the Past But Shoot It First / Reload Faster / Dead In Plain Sight / Tomb Raiding PhD / Tomb Raider Emeritus (I Fear No Evil #1-6)
description:
Wanted: Tomb Raider - No experience necessary. Requires Life Insurance. Will be working with deadly magical artifacts and killers.

Kill The Willing:
Shay Carson had a wake up call when a hitman was sent after her. Her previous profession was getting a bit personal.
Then, life offered her a chance to disappear, and she did.

What's a girl to do with a very specific set of skills?
Take up Tomb Raiding!Behind every complicated woman is a story. For Shay, it happens to be a little complicated and she can't share with her new friends.
Better to lie to her friends, than have to kill more for knowing too much!

Bury The Past, But Shoot it First:

Magic is back on Earth and there’s money to be made. 
It didn’t take long for Shay Carson to figure out that being a hitman isn’t good for a girl’s retirement plans. Time to fake her own death and get the hell out of town. Start over in L.A. with dream job number two – tomb raider in a world just coming to terms with magic. Just as dangerous a profession but the payoff’s bigger even if someone’s still shooting at her.
Good thing this girl has better aim and no problem pulling the trigger.

Reload Faster:

Killer for hire needs to retool her skill set. Find a new career with a little less risk.
Meet Shay Carson – Tomb Raider for hire. Good with weapons, works badly with others, can leave at a moment’s notice and not thrown by magic.
She’s already making a name for herself on the dark web. Rich people in search of treasure willing to pay to send someone else. Look out world…

Dead In Plain Sight:

Shay Carson's rep as a tomb raider grows, along with her list of new friends. 
The former killer for hire has managed to figure out what a life looks like without killing off her inner circle. But a teenage elf may upend all of it.New adventures across France hunting for the lost scepter of Dagobert protected by dark magic or finding the answers to a broken piece of machinery that’s 300 million years old. Not your typical day job.
Shay is not your typical woman… just ask Brownstone.

Tomb Raiding PHD:

What do you do when someone threatens your man? If his name is Brownstone, you can take the easy way out and just tell him. He’ll take care of the rest.
But if you’re Shay Carson, archaeologist of magic and history, you take care of it, permanently. It’s her specialty.
In a surprising twist, Shay’s turned out to be teachable and is taking along Lily, a Gray Elf to help her settle the score, while Peyton, her IT specialist with a love of costumes and pizza has her back.

Tomb Raider Emeritus:

Shay Carson has a secret. Not all aliens are Oricerans.

title: Some Cowboys Fight for Love (Keagans of Copper Creek Book 11)
description:
She left him to save him. But some cowboys don’t give up that easy.

Daniel Keagan has always been the quiet one—steady, strong, and protective. But when Aria Rivera enters his life, he sees past her dazzling smile to the pain she tries to hide. And when her walls start to crack, he’s determined to be the one she can trust.

Aria knows better than to believe in fairy tales. Her controlling ex still holds too much power over her life, and when he threatens Daniel’s future, she makes the only choice she can—walking away from the man she loves.

But Daniel isn’t a man who backs down from a fight, especially when the woman he loves is in danger. As secrets unravel and the past refuses to stay buried, Aria and Daniel must decide if love is worth the risk.

With everything on the line, can these two find the strength to stand together?

Author’s 

Some Cowboys Fight for Love is a contemporary western romance set in Natalie Dean’s sweet romance world of Copper Creek. While this heartwarming love story can be enjoyed as a standalone, it’s also the final book in the Keagans of Copper Creek series—a series that has earned multiple Kindle All-Star bonuses for its reader-favorite stories.

If you’ve fallen in love with the Keagan family, don’t worry—Copper Creek is far from finished! Stay tuned for more swoon-worthy cowboy romances in this beloved world.

title: The Retirement Planning Accelerator: The Fast-Track Guide to Financial Independence, Healthcare Planning, Optimized Tax Strategies, and a Secure Future
description:
The Retirement Planning Accelerator by Jon J. McKenzie is your go-to guide for navigating the complexities of modern retirement. Combining decades of expertise in entrepreneurship and financial planning, McKenzie offers a step-by-step approach to achieving financial independence.

This book delves into every facet of retirement planning, from building a solid financial foundation and understanding investment strategies for various life stages to managing healthcare costs and optimizing taxes. McKenzie's insights are actionable, easy to follow, and designed to empower readers of all backgrounds.

The chapters are enriched with real-world examples, case studies, and practical exercises, ensuring readers can apply the lessons immediately. Whether you’re just starting to save, preparing to retire, or looking for strategies to sustain a fulfilling post-career life, this guide has you covered.

At its core, The Retirement Planning Accelerator is about more than just numbers; it’s about embracing a holistic lifestyle that prioritizes financial well-being and personal fulfillment. McKenzie’s empathetic tone and actionable advice make this book a must-read for anyone seeking peace of mind in their golden years.

Don’t leave your retirement to chance. Take control of your future with Jon J. McKenzie’s The Retirement Planning Accelerator.

description:
Are you asking yourself, ”Is this It?!” Has the magic gone from your life? This is the book for you!

It's Not Over Yet! Create a Life of Purpose and Happiness After 60 is an empowering guide dedicated to inspiring seniors to embrace aging with optimism and joy. This book redefines the aging narrative, presenting it as a time of newfound possibilities, richer experiences, and deep fulfillment.

With warmth and wisdom, the author shares her journey of transformation, offering a roadmap for others seeking to create a life filled with purpose and happiness. Through personal anecdotes, practical advice, and insightful reflections, readers are guided to rediscover their passions, redefine who they are, and cultivate a life that reflects their deepest values.

It’s Not Over Yet! invites you to journey with the author through 7 inspirational 

RealizeResurfaceReviewRedefineReengageReimagineRevitalizeWhether you’re retiring, navigating life changes, or simply seeking a fresh perspective on your future, It’s Not Over Yet! provides the encouragement and tools you need to make this stage of life your most fulfilling yet. Embrace this time with confidence and creativity—your best years are still ahead!

If you want to create a life of incandescent joy in your golden years, this book is for you! Buy it now for yourself or someone you love.

description:

You’re not alone.

title: WALL PILATES FOR SENIORS OVER 60: 28-DAY BEGINNER-INTERMEDIATE, INTERMEDIATE-ADVANCED CHALLENGE FOR WEIGHT LOSS, IMPROVED MOBILITY, STRENGTH, AND FLEXIBILITY
description:
Looking to revitalize your senior years and become more active? Wall Pilates is your ticket to achieving a healthier and more energetic lifestyle!Getting older is nothing to be ashamed of — in fact, you should be proud of your age and the accomplishments that come along with that! But that doesn’t mean that health is as effortless as it used to be.

A few years ago, things were different — balance seemed to come naturally, those aches and pains weren’t ever present and nagging, and it was way easier to stay active. The daily grind of working kept you on your feet, and it seemed like you just naturally felt good!

Now, between hobbies, quality time with family, and taking care of responsibilities, it can be hard to squeeze in time for exercise… and even harder to manage existing health problems. In fact, less than 1/4 of seniors get enough exercise!

Well, it’s time to rewrite the narrative that says that seniors can’t be active, revitalized, and energetic. It’s time to take charge of your health and regain the strength and stability you once had.

And how are you going to accomplish that? Through wall Pilates, of course!

Wall Pilates isn’t just an exercise; it’s a method for empowering yourself during a new chapter of life — and that starts now.

In this simple yet effective resource for wall Pilates for seniors everywhere, you’ll 

How to jumpstart your journey with a health assessment, comprehensive, no-nonsense materials, and succinct guidance for safetyMindset and How your mindset impacts exercise (and everything you need to have a positive one!)Hot and cold — warm up and cool down with effective strategies for improving healing, ensuring safety, and optimizing workouts50+ wall Pilates exercises ranked by fitness level, helping you make the most of every single exerciseYour guide to forming workout routines that last just 15 minutes — no more “I’m out of time” excuses here!Two unique 28-day guides, taking you from beginner to intermediate and from intermediate to advanced when it comes to exercisingPro tips for modifying any exercise to your own fitness level (so that you control the exercise, and not the other way around)And much more! 

For many people, exercise seems just out of reach. They think, there’s surely such a thing as “too old” for exercise, right?

Wrong. Don’t let age be something you define yourself with. Anyone can do wall Pilates regardless of age, fitness level, or mindset — all you need is a body and a desire to transform your life.

In your golden years, you deserve nothing but good health and happiness, so it’s time to steer this exciting next chapter of your life in a new direction!

If you’re ready to revitalize, protect, and stabilize yourself through the fun art of wall Pilates, scroll up and click the “Add to Cart” button right now!

title: The Ultimate WHY Book for Curious Kids - Vol 1: The Sky: Fun Facts and Answers to Mind-Blowing Questions About Science Explained in 5 Minutes or Less (The Ultimate "WHY" Book)
description:
The Ultimate WHY Book for Curious Fun Science Facts and How Things Work Explained with Simple Analogies in 5 Minutes or Less

Turn Your Child’s Curiosity into an Adventure—In Just 5 Minutes a Day!
Children are naturally inquisitive, asking endless "Why?" questions about the world around them. As a parent, it can be tricky to provide answers that are both simple and engaging. Enter The Ultimate WHY Book for Curious Kids, a fun and interactive way to satisfy your child's curiosity about the sky. This book offers exciting science facts, simple analogies, hands-on experiments, and activities that make learning both easy and enjoyable for even the youngest learners.
Whether your child wonders, "Why is the sky blue?" or "Why do clouds float?"—this book invites them to explore science through colorful images, playful explanations, and engaging activities designed to keep them entertained and learning.

What’s Simple analogies to explain tough sky questions like "Why does it rain?" in a way that even the youngest learners can understand.The best mini-experiments to bring science to life and keep your child engaged, excited, and eager to learn more.The secret to answering tricky questions like, "Why does the sun follow us?" without ever feeling stumped.Hands-on activities to keep your child entertained while learning why the sun sets, why stars twinkle, and how to spot constellations throughout the year.

title: FUN IDEAS FOR RETIREMENT: ULTIMATE GUIDE TO PHYSICAL AND EMOTIONAL WELLNESS, UNIQUE TRAVEL TIPS, CREATIVE HOBBIES, AND EASY BUCKET LIST ADVENTURES FOR MEANINGFUL GOLDEN YEARS
description:

Are you eager for activities that will stimulate your mind, invigorate your body, connect you with others, and rejuvenate your spirit?
Are you searching for new adventures that won't break the bank but unsure where to begin?
If you answered yes, you're not alone.

This newfound freedom can be challenging and navigating through endless possibilities can be daunting- but it doesn’t have to be!
"Fun Things to Do in Retirement" is your empowering guide to thriving in retirement, uncovering effortless hobbies, aspirational adventures, and stress-free wellness tips tailored just for you.
Here's a peek at what you'll uncover The secret to finding purpose in your retirement years, unlocking limitless opportunities.The ultimate list of fulfilling hobbies to try at home, ensuring every day begins with excitement.Adventure The ultimate guide to traveling on a budget without sacrificing experiences.Foolproof physical activities tailored for different fitness levels, ensuring you stay strong and active.Stress-free wellness tips to enhance your mental, physical and spiritual well-being.Dynamic social engagement tips to keep your social butterfly wings fluttering.Create an enriching bucket list, inspiring you to pursue dreams long set aside.Discover uplifting volunteer opportunities that make giving back easier than ever.How to expand your horizons with heaps of lifelong learning options.Simple tech tools for beginners, helping you stay connected and engaged in today’s digital world.Revel in the countless and impactful activities that will not stress your finances or fitness level.Relatable stories of retirees who found immense satisfaction in the simplest adventures.
...and much more!

A step-by-step guide helping you to find your own way through the retirement landscape without feeling overwhelmed.
The author will help you craft a roadmap toward an engaging and fulfilling life, even if you've never picked up a new hobby or traveled before now.
Whether for yourself or as a heartfelt gift for someone approaching retirement, this guide offers the inspiration and tools to make the most of every day.If you're ready to transform your retirement journey and fill your days with joy, exploration, and purpose, then scroll up and click "Add to Cart" now!

title: Give up on me: Part 1 (The king's empire)
description:
Give up on me Part 1A young prostitute with a shattered past and a fractured future crosses paths with a pimp who she hopes might give her what she thinks she needs. But is his world really any better than hers?

As she navigates a dangerous game of power, loyalty and desire, old friendships break apart, and new alliances form. Can she mend broken bonds, or will her choices lead to irreparable damage?

In a world where love, money and control collide, hearts will be broken, and lives forever altered. Will she choose the man—or woman—who truly holds her heart? Or is she destined to lose herself chasing a dream that may never come true?

title: The Complete Guide to Herbal Remedies & Natural Medicines: Harness the Power of Plants to Safely Detox, Boost Your Energy, Enhance Immunity, Treat Common Ailments and Achieve Holistic Health

title: Rumi and the Retribution (Gabriel McKnight Book 1)
description:
You Are What You Seek.

Gabriel McKnight, a decorated former U.S. Navy SEAL and bestselling author, sees his perfect life come unraveled when he’s named the prime suspect in a murder case after his twin brother vanishes without a trace. Now on the run from the law, Gabriel embarks on a desperate worldwide quest to clear his name and uncover his brother’s fate.

His only ally is Noor Rahman, the scion of a once-powerful Iranian dynasty whose past intertwines with a mysterious book of Rumi’s poems left behind by her deceased parents. Together, Gabriel and Noor decipher cryptic passages suggesting a link between the historic murders of Noor’s family and his brother’s disappearance. From the back alleys of Washington, D.C., to the bustling streets of Paris, and the vibrant vistas of Tehran, they navigate a labyrinth of danger and deception leading them inexorably to Rumi’s mystical resting place in Turkey.

But discovery comes with a perilous cost. With every revelation, Gabriel and Noor inch that much closer to unlocking the sinister truth behind their parallel destinies. Can they outwit their unseen foes and decode the final mysteries before they themselves become the final casualties in this deadly game?

title: Dead Man's Hand: Forger's Book 1
description:
Marcus is a charming, smooth-talking lover of life, excelling at everything he touches, especially Texas Hold 'em. Armed with his sharp wits, keen observation, and a metaphorical ace up his sleeve, he constantly seeks out exclusive games. When he learns about a high-stakes poker tournament in New Orleans, he races to join, eager for the challenge.

Along the way, Marcus uncovers the identity of the man running the tournament-one of the most powerful criminal masterminds east of the Mississippi. Ignoring the risks, Marcus enters the game, only to realize he's in deeper than expected. Now, he must rely on more than just his usual tricks if he's to survive. With his life on the line, Marcus will have to use the unique skills that set him apart from others.

As the stakes rise, he quickly learns that smooth talk and poker prowess might not be enough. To outwit the mastermind behind the tournament and escape unscathed, Marcus must stay a step ahead. His survival depends on more than luck; it's a game where only the sharpest can emerge victorious.

title: Til Death (Coastal Fury Book 56)
description:
When MBLIS Agent Ethan Marston arrives in St. Lucia for his colleague's wedding, he's hoping for a few days of sun, sand, and relaxation. Instead, he finds himself thrust into a deadly investigation when the best man from another wedding party is found dead in suspicious circumstances.

When a second body drops and an attempted murder follows, Ethan and his partner Robbie Holm uncover a tangled web of deception, betrayal, and forbidden romance spanning both wedding parties. The idyllic Caribbean setting becomes the perfect hunting ground for a methodical killer with a talent for poisons and a twisted sense of justice.

With the clock ticking and Bonnie and Rivers' wedding just hours away, Ethan must catch the killer before anyone else falls victim, all while navigating tropical cocktails, resort intrigue, and a murderer who proves that paradise can be deadly.

title: One Chill Millionaire 6: The Osamas (The Finale)
description:
After Fox pulls off the unimaginable to get back in Quest’s good graces, the family's dynamics start to shift, creating a temporary peace. As time goes by, they each navigate their new realities, some filled with happiness and others shadowed by past struggles. Just when it seems like calm has settled in, Quest's next fight in Vegas is set and this will bring everyone back together in the city it all started in. This trip ignites a series of unexpected drama that threatens to unravel the bonds the couples have built. As the tension escalates, the question who will find their happily ever after, and who will be left still searching for love after the chaos?

One Chill Millionaire 6: The Osamas (The Finale)

title: Berserk, Vol. 36
description: What Guts the Black Swordsman and his companions had seen as an island refuge for monstrous sea creatures and the ghost ship of the demonic Bonebeard is, in fact, the very lair of the malefic sea god that controls them. With no avenue of escape, Guts must once again don the Berserker armor to give his company any chance of survival. But without the protective influence of the sorceress Schierke, Guts risks being forever lost within the cursed armor and becoming an even greater threat to his comrades

title: One More Kiss (Northern Pines #1)
description:
S he needs to hide from her past. He only wants to be left alone. What could possibly go wrong?

A disillusioned lawyer searching for a quiet life in a small town inadvertently ends up sharing his elderly aunt’s vacant house with a woman who has secrets to hide from her troubled past, a young daughter, and a menagerie of epic proportions.

And then a threatening stranger surfaces...

Humor, romance...and a mystery!

Roxanne Rustand is the USA Today Bestselling author of forty romance and romantic suspense novels—both Clean & Wholesome and Christian fiction. Her books have sold over 2.75 million copies.

title: 전지적 독자 시점 5 [Jeonjijeog Dogja Sijeom 5]
description:
Episode 93 - Episode 99

Only I know the end of this world.

One day our MC finds himself stuck in the world of his favorite webnovel. What does he do to survive? It is a world struck by catastrophe and danger all around.

His edge? He knows the plot of the story to the end. Because he was the sole reader that stuck with it. Read his story to see how he survives!

title: Shadow Slave: Book 42
description:
Growing up in poverty, Sunny never expected anything good from life. However, even he did not anticipate being chosen by the Nightmare Spell and becoming one of the Awakened - an elite group of people gifted with supernatural powers. Transported into a ruined magical world, he found himself facing against terrible monsters - and other Awakened - in a deadly battle of survival.
What's worse, the shadow powers he received happened to possess a small, but potentially fatal side effect...
