title: It's All About Cowboys Too
description:
Discover love and family in this set of six clean, stand-alone, cowboy romances with a dash of suspense!Enjoy hours of heartwarming reading with six more stories about strong-willed forty-something women in small-town Cowboy Crossing and the swoon-worthy single-dad cowboys who love them. Though sometimes those rugged handsome men might need a nudge—or a push! Six sweet, wholesome romances, each with a happily-ever-after, books 7 -12 completing the Cowboy Crossing Romances series!

Book 1: Show Me a Mistaken Identity
Can a fun-loving cowboy with a precocious daughter and a guarded woman with a mistaken identity find a path to happiness together?
Book 2: Show Me a Fake Fiancé
Can a fake engagement become real for a single-father cowboy and a brokenhearted single mom?
Book 3: Show Me a Stand-in Husband
Can an accidental marriage between a rebellious cowgirl and a straitlaced single-dad doctor grow into true love?
Book 4: Show Me a Reunion
When a reunion of childhood best friends leads to a marriage of convenience, can it lead to love, too?
Book 5: Show Me a Family Saga
A busy matriarch and a risk-loving younger man with a secret… Can his granddaughter in need bring these opposites together?
Book 6: Show Me a Fake Engagement
A rock star, a social worker, and a teen in need of a family. Can their pretend relationship become real?
What readers say about the 
★★★★★ "An excellent romance with down-to-earth characters and an intriguing storyline that pulls you in from the very beginning." Sheila L VINE VOICE
★★★★★ "Full of love, laughter and intrigue." MomB
★★★★★ "You walk away with a light, happy. loving warmth from the romance of the story." MaryEllen
★★★★★ "Just give yourself time to read cover to cover because you won’t want to put this fabulous book down until the very end.” Sarah Sarber
★★★★★ "Incredible, so much drama, excitment, challenges, heartache and always so much Love.
What a incredible family, I know it's a book but the way its written, you feel all their challenges." CM
★★★★★ "It was beautifully written and the storyline is heartfelt and believable along with fascinating characters." Nancy

title: Blaze (Coral Canyon Cowboys #5)
description:
He's dark as night, a single dad, and a retired bull riding champion. With all his money, his rugged good looks, and his ability to say all the right things, Faith has no chance against Blaze Young's charms. But she’s his complete opposite, and she just doesn't see how they can be together...

...so she ends things with him.

But Faith Cromwell can't seem to stay away from Blaze. Rather, they keep getting put together by fate, God, or just plain bad luck. She's not sure which.

As the owner of Hole in One, a struggling doughnut dessert truck, Faith feels married to her business. And she's minding that business the day of a charity food truck rally, which Blaze shows up to.

Blaze Young doesn't know why the pretty redhead thinks the way she does. Of course, he's never been one to try to figure out women all that much. He's focused on being a single dad, a back surgery survivor, and rekindling his faith. Oh, and his enormous family keeps him enveloped in drama all the time.

But Faith - he'd really like to figure out how to keep her in his life too. He is at the charity rally, but not of his own choice. If he'd have known that's where his ex-in-laws were going for their Thanksgiving desserts, he'd have begged out of the visit.

But he's here now, and they're taking donations at the door. Fine. He has billions in the bank and he quickly scribbles out a check.

He has no idea that the Lord has once again orchestrated it just-so for him to come face-to-face with the lovely Faith Cromwell...and for her to win part of his donation.

Can Faith and Blaze get on the same page? Or will this third try at a relationship also end in heartache for both of them?

title: Cowboy Looking at Me (Coming Home to North Dakota, #9)
description:
Brawley Powers made a mistake he's regretted for almost eleven years. But he didn't realize he had a daughter from that night until a stranger comes to town and puts the pieces together.

Brawley sees the truth, but he's not sure if the mother of his daughter even knows who the father is, and whether she does or not, if she'll let him be a part of her life.

He starts an anonymous letter writing campaign to soften her heart, just to pave a path to his little girl, but he finds himself falling for the funny and sweet woman behind her emails she sends back.

Can they overcome the mistakes of their past and make a beautiful future together?

Books in the Coming Home to North Dakota Series:

Cowboy Walking Away
Cowboy Coming Home
Cowboy Stealing My Heart
Cowboy Finding Love
Cowboy Dreaming Alone
Cowboy Rescuing Me
Cowboy Dancing All Night
Cowboy Falling Hard
Cowboy Looking at Me
Cowboy Wanting Everything
Cowboy Whispering My Name
Cowboy Marrying the Lady

title: It's All About Cowboys (Cowboy Crossing Romances #1)
description:
Discover love and family in these six clean cowboy romances laced with danger and sweetened with faith!Hours of heartwarming reading with an edge of suspense and mystery in these stories about curvy forty-something women in small-town Cowboy Crossing in the Show Me state and the swoon-worthy single dad cowboys who love them. Though sometimes those rugged handsome men might need a nudge—or a push! Six sweet, clean, wholesome romances, each with a happily-ever-after!

Book 1: Show Me a Marriage of ConvenienceAn ex-player cowboy with a little son, the boy's shy plus-size aunt, and a reluctant modern marriage of convenience only the boy is excited about…Book 2: Show Me a Second ChanceA single-dad cowboy, a woman with a secret who left him, and a second chance at love neither of them expects…Book 3: Show Me the BossWhen a weeklong cowboy with a son becomes the three-day boss of an outspoken plus-size veterinarian, these opposites might attract-or combust.Book 4: Show Me Best FriendsA “steel cowboy” with a wounded spirit, an ex-cop who’s never forgotten him, and a baby in need of love… Can these childhood best friends become more? Book 5: Show Me My Brother's Best FriendA woman in jeopardy and her brother's best friend she'd once crushed on meet again before Christmas… When the past comes knocking on her door, will she choose love or closure? Book 6: Show Me a Family for ChristmasA brokenhearted widower with a sad daughter. A secret bodyguard working as a nanny. Can they become an unlikely family this Christmas?What readers say about the ★★★★★ One of those books that are so much fun, with so many jewels of wisdom and encouragement, that you enjoy the story more each time you read it.” Sarah Sarber★★★★★ “I loved everything about this book. Not only is this story witty but it also deals with trust, forgiveness, body shaming, jealousy and unconditional love.” – Judi Duncan★★★★★ “What a great book! I loved the characters and loved how they fell in love.” Lovestoread★★★★★ “This was a great love story. Didn't want to put it down. I felt every emotion while reading.” - Mary★★★★★ “An excellent story! I was surprised by some of the things that happened, and laughed a lot.” – Barbara W

title: The Cowboy's Beauty (Sweet Water Ranch, #3)
description:
He couldn’t face her. She was too beautiful.

*Previously titled Cowboys Don't Marry the Beauty*

He’d been deformed in a farming accident years ago.

He’d managed to build a successful business on his North Dakota ranch, but clients didn’t need to see him. His sister handled the face of his company.

Until his sister took a vacation and hired an out-of-work supermodel to take her place.

He couldn’t show himself to her. Although after dark he could share his love of the stars with her.

But the more he hides, the more she wants to see.

Can he trust her with his face? Because he’s very close to losing his heart.

title: Sweet View Ranch Cowboy Romance Box Set
description:
Join us in Sweet Water, North Dakota for small town values with lots of faith, family, fun and, of course, romance!

Book 1 - A Cowboy's Forever  After almost a decade away from Sweet Water, North Dakota, Travis Feagley is back in town, but his arrival is anything but smooth.

Book 2 - A Cowboy's Growing  Ezra Clyborne, a man of principles and routine, never expected Alaska, a woman embroiled in a world of trouble, and her children to turn his world upside down.

Book 3 - A Cowboy's Secret  Asher Clyborne's unspoken love for Sondra has lingered in the shadows, veiled by loyalty to his brother. But when Asher takes her to his mountain cabin after her fiance breaks up with her, a freak accident leaves Sondra as the only person who can save his life.

Book 4 - A Cowboy's Heart of  Could Claudia Clyborne and Beau Hanson use the things life throws at them to look past their differences and forge a strong, forever relationship? And if they do, will one of them have to give up their lifetime dream?

Book 5 - A Cowboy's Gentle  The date was a disaster since Ryland didn't say a word the entire time and Lucas ended up eating her food. But somehow they go on another one. And another.

Book 6 - A Cowboy's Calm  Tillman Steiner thought the woman just exiting the jail might still be a little tipsy when she couldn't seem to walk in a straight line and knocked into him. He's not excited in the least to find out that he's assigned to work with her for the next six weeks as they plan Sweet View Ranch's first ever rodeo. But appearances can be deceiving and he starts to realize that Phoebe is not what he thought.

Reviews for Sweet View 
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "Highly recommend. Faith is well shown. I would like to read more books like this heart warming and inspired I'm really glad to find this book" - kim prinz
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "Love the way love of God, is woven in each book. Christian faith, and love of family make these books wonderful reading." - Kindle Customer
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "God is the center of this Cowboy book ! It was suspenseful ! Well written! Kept my interest till he end!" - Kindle Customer
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "This was such a wonderfully sweet Christian romance. The characters are realistic, Christian values. I hope you take the time and check out this wholesome Christian series. As always happy reading." - christine
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "I'm totally enjoying this series and getting to know all the characters. I can't wait to read more about these siblings. I loved Alaska and Ezra’s story. Theirs is a heartwarming story. I enjoy how this author shows God working in the lives of her characters. A captivating read that I read straight through." MJ
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "I love this book. The plot is great and so are the characters. This is a great author. This is well worth reading." - Marilyn Gamble

title: Seaside Cowboy's Treasure (Seaside Cowboys Book 9)
description:
His family hates hers, and the feeling is mutual. Can love change it all?

Fresh out of a relationship and job, Lorraine Rochefort returns to her hometown, planning to stay only long enough to patch things up with her estranged elder brother. There's just a minor obstacle—he's missing after an argument with Rio Lawrence. Then Rio, the handsome cowboy and now a helicopter pilot she'd once pined for from afar, knocks her off her feet and steals her breath away—literally.

Bad blood already lingers between their families due to her mother’s rumored affair with his father before he died. Now her brothers and father harbor fresh resentment against Rio himself as they blame him for the disappearance of one of their own.

Rio needs help clearing his name and uncovering a painful family secret, and Lorraine needs someone levelheaded and unbiased to find her brother. United in wanting to end the hatred between their families, can they do it all without their growing affection getting in the way?

Welcome to Port Sunshine, a small coastal town where a family of cowboy brothers discover the treasures of love and uncover the mysteries of their pasts!
Book 1: Seaside Cowboy's Second Chance
Book 2: Seaside Cowboy's Best Friend
Book 3: Seaside Cowboy's Marriage of Convenience
Book 4: Seaside Cowboy's Fairy Tale
Book 5: Seaside Cowboy's Assistant
Book 6: Seaside Cowboy's Love at First Sight
Book 7: Seaside Cowboy's Christmas Wish
Book 8: Seaside Cowboy's Forget-Me-Not
Book 9: Seaside Cowboy's Treasure
Book 10: Seaside Cowgirl's Forevere Love

title: One Snowy Amish Night
description:
When a snowstorm forces Ripley and Nate Campbell off the road in the heart of Amish country, they seek help in the first house they find.

For Sadie Weaver, the arrival of the Campbells is a divine test of faith. Still grieving the loss of her own unborn child, she struggles to welcome the sight of a heavily pregnant Ripley on her doorstep.

As the storm rages outside, the two couples form an unlikely bond, until Ripley goes into labour three weeks early. Sadie must put aside her misgivings to help a woman with whom she has nothing in common.

One Snowy Amish Night sets in motion a chain of events that will change their lives forever.
Perfect for fans of Amish fiction and stories of hope and renewal, this holiday read will stay with you long after the last page.

title: Aenti Sarah's Christmas
description:
Sarah Fisher has already endured her share of heartbreak, and never imagined it would strike again so soon. When her brother and sister-in-law tragically pass away, Sarah is left to raise their two young children and manage the family woodworking business on her own. Determined to keep the family together, she faces mounting challenges—especially when her most experienced employee abruptly quits.

Desperate to keep the business afloat, Sarah hires Daniel Miller, a skilled woodworker and young widower with a son of his own. Daniel’s expertise transforms the struggling shop, and the friendship that grows between them soon deepens into something more. But as their bond strengthens, so does the scrutiny of their Amish community.

The district bishop doubts Sarah’s ability to balance her responsibilities and sets a Christmas deadline for her to prove herself—or risk the children being placed in separate homes. With time running out and everything on the line, Sarah and Daniel must work together to create not just a successful business but a loving home for their blended family. Can they overcome the odds and find hope, love, and the promise of a brighter future before Christmas?

title: A Secret Courtship
description:
Love may be the only thing they didn’t plan for.

At twenty-five, Rachel Bontrager is the last unmarried daughter in her family—and her parents are panicking.

Rachel is mortified when they schedule a meeting with a visiting matchmaker.

Meanwhile, Noah Lapp finds himself in a similar bind. His parents have also enlisted the same matchmaker, convinced he needs help to find a wife.

Desperate to escape his looming appointment, Noah ducks behind the barn—only to discover Rachel already hiding there.

What begins as a shared moment of frustration turns into a clever they'll pretend to court each other to get their families off their backs and avoid being matched with strangers.

It’s simple. It’s safe. It’s only pretend…Until it isn’t.

As Rachel and Noah spend more time together, stolen glances turn into lingering touches, and whispered plans become unspoken dreams.

Will Noah find the courage to speak his heart? Can Rachel trust that love can grow even from the most unexpected beginnings?

Fall in love with this heartwarming Amish romance about trust, timing, and the way Gott’s beautiful plan unfolds—just when we least expect it.

title: The Amish Snowman
description:
The snowman melted, but their love still stands.

As children, Levi Mast and Sarah Yutzy were inseparable, sharing snowy adventures and their love for the magic of Christmas. But as they grew older, unspoken feelings and fear of rejection drove a silent wedge between them. By the time Levi realized how much Sarah meant to him, it was too late - his hesitation cost him everything. 

Now, years later, Levi returns to the community he left behind, carrying a heart full of regrets. For Sarah, Christmas has lost its sparkle, her life marked by loss and the responsibilities of motherhood. When the first snowfall of the season brings them face-to-face, memories of their shared past - and the love they never declared -begin to stir. 

Can they find their way back to the warmth and joy they once shared? Or will the icy walls of time and pain keep them apart?

title: Hearts in the Storm
description:
Torn by family. United by fate.

Peter Hertzler has always known one thing—the Lantz family is off-limits.

Their families have been feuding for years, and no one has ever questioned why. But when a powerful storm hits their quiet valley, Peter faces a choice that could change everything.

Annie Lantz is usually calm and sensible, but when the storm strikes, she rushes out into the chaos. Lost and scared, the last person she expects to be her rescuer is Peter Hertzler.

Forced to take shelter in an old cabin, Peter and Annie are stuck together as the storm rages outside. In those few hours, they see each other differently—not as enemies, but as something more. As secrets come to light and feelings grow, the wall between their families’ cracks.

Can their growing love survive the weight of an old feud? Or will their attraction be torn apart like so many before them?

Escape into a touching Amish romance filled with forbidden love, deep-rooted family drama, and the hope that love can heal even the oldest wounds.

title: The Amish Patchwork Family
description:
Can a Patchwork family come together?

Naomi can’t wait to get married and have a family, but sometimes Gott’s plans aren’t our own.

When Beth, Naomi’s sister, lost her husband unexpectedly, Naomi knew she couldn’t let her sister face the grief alone. With two little boys and a baby on the way, Naomi put her own life on hold to help Beth deal with the grief, the pregnancy and the children.

Naomi and Isaac had been courting for a few months, but ever since Beth’s husband passed away Isaac couldn’t help but feel neglected. He knows Naomi needs to support her sister, but surely she can’t ignore him completely.

Beth encourages Naomi to spend more time with Isaac, which leaves Naomi feeling guilty when Beth faces unforeseen complications following premature onset of labor. Faced with mortality, Isaac supports Naomi every step of the way, but when she makes a life-altering decision on his behalf, it might just be too much to forgive.

Follow this heartwarming tale of loss and love as Naomi and Isaac try to find love and a future amidst the challenges of reality. Can Naomi think of her own future and step away from her sister? Or does her sister hold the future Naomi never imagined living? Find out today in this sweet Amish romance

title: Hopelessly in Love: The Lantz Family Saga - Book 4
description:
Mary dreamed of finding love, but she never expected to find it in the wrong place.

The Lantz family have grown not only in their U-PICK business, but also as Benual and Lily welcome their first child. With her siblings finding love and happiness, Mary can’t help but dream of finding the same.

She is overwhelmed when asked to help organize the annual Christmas market. The moment Mary meets the mayor though, an Englischer, she knows arranging the Christmas market will be the least of her problems.

Steven Hobbs is a wealthy man and the youngest mayor their town has ever seen. But with every meeting, Mary finds herself falling deeper and deeper in love with an Englischer that would never fit into her world.

Will this be her last Christmas with her family, or will Mary remain true to her faith and give up on love entirely?

Enjoy this sweet Amish romance, and catch up with Benual, Salome, and Thomas, as they embrace their sister’s impossible romance.

Can this final installment of the Lantz family saga bring Mary a miracle, or will the Lantz family suffer another a loss?

title: The Amish Quilting Circle Volume 1: Books 1 to 10
description:
Discover the heartwarming charm of Faith's Creek, where love, tradition, and the spirit of the quilting circle weave together the lives of those seeking happiness and a place to belong. This exclusive Amish romance box set brings you ten touching tales of love, forgiveness, and the powerful bonds of community. Perfect for readers who treasure sweet romances and the promise of a happy ever after, these stories are a testament to faith, hope, and the enduring power of love.
The Amish Quilting Circle Volume 1: An Amish Romance 10-book Box Set
Dive into a world where the simple life blossoms with unexpected joys, where every season brings a new chance at love, and where the quilting circle of Faith’s Creek plays matchmaker, weaving together the threads of the most unlikely romances.
Includes:
The Englischer’s Folly: In a tale of heartbreak and hope, Naomi Troyer's journey through disappointment leads her to an unexpected crossroads between a comforting past and an intriguing new love.
The Amish Dream: Amidst the challenges of daily life and caring for her ailing father, Sadie Erb discovers that love, with a little help from a quilting circle, might be closer than she ever imagined.
A Christmas Sleigh Ride Home: As Christmas approaches, Martha Kuhn must navigate through family discord and rival affections to discover where her heart truly belongs with a little nudge from Faith's Creek's quilting circle.
Together at Christmas: Join the quilting circle as they strive to unite Amanda and Dominic, proving that the holiday season is ripe for miracles.
Amish Christmas Angels: See how a chance encounter between Barbara and Elijah around Christmastime kindles a new beginning.
Caring for Christmas: Cheer for Miriam and Paul, two shy souls brought together by the spirit of the season and a dash of holiday intervention.
Amish Secret Baby: Delve into Clara’s story, a tale of secrets, redemption, and the courage to find love again.
The Foundling in the Flowers: Unravel the mystery with Annie, a florist who finds more than she bargains for among her blooms.
Eve’s Big Decision: The Amish Quilting Circle welcomed Eve despite her mistake. Can she now find love, family, and a home in Faith’s Creek?
Love, Heart, and Memory: Get lost in Leona’s journey of self-discovery, lost memory, and the pursuit of true love.
Each story in this collection offers a glimpse into the lives of those who call Faith’s Creek home. These tales are imbued with the warmth of community, the strength of character, and the simple joys of Amish life. Immerse yourself in a world where faith leads the way to breathtaking happy ever afters, and the quilting circle stitches together more than just fabric but the hearts of all who join.
Embrace the simplicity, cherish the journey, and discover love that lasts a lifetime. Add this box set to your collection today, and let the stories of Faith’s Creek inspire your heart and renew your spirit.

title: Amish Snowflake Collection (6 Book Boxset)
description:
Love In A Christmas Storm
After losing his parents in a tragic accident, Gideon struggles to care for his younger sisters and manage the family farm alone. As a fierce Christmas storm approaches, his friendship with Miriam deepens, forcing them to confront the possibility of a love that could change everything.

A Second Chance At Christmas
Rachel and Peter always believed they were destined to be together, but when life pulls them apart, they begin to question their future. Is their love just a dream, or will fate give them a second chance?

Coming Home For Christmas
Clara left her close-knit community on Christmas Eve to pursue success as a dressmaker in an Englisher town, but as the holiday approaches again, she begins to question whether she's found what she truly wanted. As she reconnects with Jacob and misses home more than ever, Clara must decide if success lies in the life she's built or the one she left behind.

Christmas Matchmaker
Paul and Lydia, unaware of their perfect match, are drawn together by fate, sparking an unexpected romance. With Christmas approaching and obstacles in their way, a little matchmaking may be needed to guide their reluctant hearts toward love.

The Business of Love At Christmas
Facing a looming Christmas Eve deadline to pay off a massive bakery debt, Sarah Fisher, with her faith and determination, joins forces with the rival Miller family to organize a Christmas market that could save her family’s business. As snow begins to fall and tensions rise, Sarah discovers that cooperation—and perhaps something more—might be the key to a new future.

A Christmas Blessing
Naomi and Levi long for a child, a dream that remains unfulfilled despite years of hope and prayer. As Christmas nears and new possibilities arise, Levi's unwavering faith sparks hope that their long-awaited blessing may finally be within reach.

title: Lorna's Christmas Hope: An Amish Romance of Faith, Forgiveness, and Christmas Miracles (An Amish Christmas in Faith's Creek Book 5)
description:
Will the season of miracles bring them the love they've both been longing for?

Lorna Burkholder has spent her life putting others first, raising her younger sister and running a growing repair business in Faith’s Creek. Despite her self-reliance and skills, Lorna can’t help but feel that something is missing—until she meets Thomas Deitweiler, a talented carpenter with a kind heart and a troubled past.

Thomas is used to Christmases filled with heartbreak, but a chance encounter with Lorna sparks a connection neither of them expected. As they work together on the town’s Christmas pageant, their growing friendship stirs feelings of hope and love.

But when disaster strikes, threatening their shared project and their newfound bond, Lorna and Thomas must lean on faith and each other to discover if their hearts are meant to unite this Christmas.

Step into Faith’s Creek and experience a heartwarming Amish romance filled with love, faith, and the magic of the holiday season in Lorna's Christmas Hope!

title: Abigail's Amish Christmas (The Amish Quilting Circle #19)
description: In the serene lanes of Faith's Creek, where every snowflake tells a tale, Abigail Lantz finds that some stories are written in destiny's own ink.In the heart of Amish country, Abigail Lantz’s life has been threaded with dreams, inked letters, and an unwillingness to ever leave the safety of her home. Abigail is painfully shy and retiring. When the quilting circle suggests she visit a cherished pen pal, she does not believe she can.However, some destinies cannot be stopped. When Abigail and Rhonda Flaud’s lives finally intertwine, can the heartfelt bond of two women weave a love story for another?Abigail finally meets Rhoda against the snowy backdrop of the coming Christmas. But amidst the quilting circles and festive pageants, a silent, unexpected spark kindles between Abigail and Rhoda’s brother, Gabriel. Can the shared glances and whispered confessions culminate into love?But when snow blankets the roads, delaying departures, will the white Christmas be a blessing in disguise or a test of faith?Dive into a tale of destiny, written not just in letters but in heartbeats and hushed conversations under a snow-kissed sky.

title: The Amish Faith and Family Collection: 16 Book Box Set
description:
FREE to read with Kindle Unlimited - 16 romances of Amish Family and Faith.

A simple world of love, faith, family, and romance is brought to you in this wonderful collection of 16 Amish romances suitable for readers of all ages.

See how love is universal, how we all struggle to overcome and to find the one who is right for us. This collection will warm your heart as you can’t wait to turn the pages.

In this box set:
A Spring Baby Dilemma
A Spring Baby surprise
A Spring Baby Blessing
A Spring Baby Joy
The Loves She deserves
A Love Tested
Eliza's Faith
Patience’s Faith
Annie's Faith
Light and Love Through Faith
Eve's story
Bridget's story
Catherine’s Story
Love and Faith
Elizabeth - A Baby Blessing
A Baby to Love

Grab this set with 16 much-loved romances about the plain life of the Amish.

title: The Amish Sisters Complete Series: Amish Romance 4 books box set (Heart warming complete Amish Romance series)
description:
The King Sisters are respected for their strong faith, their love for family, and their loyalty to their Amish community. But what looks like perfection soon leads to problems, the likes of which none would have ever expected. 
Follow them as they live, grow, learn, and oftentimes, make mistakes, while never losing sight of what matters the most in the world. Walk with them as they traverse through a life that’s not devoid of turmoil or heartache. 
These four stories prove that no matter what life throws in their way -- pain, suffering, devastating illness, love, loss, or tragedy – the Amish King sisters are, above all else, a family worth rooting for and a series worth reading time and time again. 

Book 1: The Choice 
Baptized into the Amish faith, Emma finds her heart divided between family, community and forbidden love for an Englischer man. 

Book 2: Faith 
Three Amish women, three tests of faith. Will they persevere in their love for Gott or will their hardships harden them to Gott’s benevolence? 

Book 3: Heartache 
The King Sisters have come a long way, but life isn’t done throwing obstacles in their path. While Rachel must find the man who will make her happy, Emma must overcome the daunting risks to her unborn child. 

Book 4: Torment 
The King Sisters have faced their fair share of troubles, but up until this moment, their worries have never been greater. One longs for a family of her own; another is desperate for much-needed change; and the other faces the biggest challenge of her life. Will the King Sisters pull through their greatest challenges and finally find the peace and grace they’ve worked so hard to achieve? 

Each book in the Amish Sisters series is a stand-alone read, but to make the most of the series you should consider reading them in order. 
All of Grace Lewis’s books are clean and wholesome.

title: Sweet Amish Love Collection.: 16 Book Box Set
description:
Sixteen wonderful Amish stories in one boxed set.
***FREE WITH KINDLE UNLIMITED***

This collection brings you sixteen wonderful Amish Romances filled with love, faith, hope and joy to warm your heart. If you enjoy sweet, clean, wholesome romance, you will Love Mary Lantz books.In this collection

A Suitable Amish Wife

The Amish Doctor

The Amish Widow’s Second Chance

Amish Miracle of Love

Ester’s Amish Healing

Betrayed Amish Love

A Perfect Amish Husband

The Amish Recluse

The Amish Insight

An Amish Change Of Heart.

The Amish Path

The Orphaned Amish Family

A Sure and Certain Amish Love

The Amish Family Table

A Stronger Amish Love

The Proud Amish Woman

title: Amish Love in Faith's Creek: 15 Book Amish Box Set (Amish Romance Collections and Anthologies)
description:
FREE to read with Kindle Unlimited. 15 complete sweet Amish Romances.

A simple world of love, faith, family, and romance is brought to you in this wonderful collection of 15 Amish romances suitable for readers of all ages.

Open this set and live amongst the Amish while they find true love through faith.

Included in this box set:
Sacrifice for Love
Grow into love
Love's Redemption
Amish Loving Heart
Amish Lost Baby
Amish Love in a Storm
The Solitary Amish Man
Amish Love for the Children
Amish Love and Acceptance
Wildflowers to Heal an Amish Heart
An Amish Test of Faith
The Amish Wanderer
Stealing the Amish Heart
Redeemed by the Amish Love
The Amish Widow's Faith

Grab it now to read today.

title: Amish of Faith's Creek: 4 Book Box Set
description:
4 beautiful Amish romances brought together for the first time.

Welcome to a simple world of love, faith, family, and romance as you step into Faith’s Creek with these sweet Amish romances suitable for readers of all ages.

See how love is universal, and how we all struggle to overcome daily problems and find the life that is right for us.

This collection will warm your heart as you can’t wait to turn the pages.

Included:
A Return to Faith
Since her mother left, Roseanna Wagler has been happier hiding on the farm than living the life of a traditional Amish woman. But love can find you anywhere and it seems she can’t hide forever.

The Amish Landscape
Emma works tirelessly for an Englischer clothing factory but she's barely making ends meet. The only thing that makes her happy is painting. It's her passion but is it vain and does it go against the Ordnung?
Blacksmith Jesse is intrigued by Emma's sad eyes and beautiful paintings. He wants to figure out why she's sad and is determined to help.
Can Jesse convince Emma that Gott gifted her with a talent that should be embraced?

Light After the Darkness
When Mary’s second child was born it should have been a moment of celebration. It should have brought her closer to her husband but the reality is much different. Can she overcome this terrible darkness and get back to a life of faith and love?

All Good Things
Mary and Henry Glick are desperate for a baby. Do, all good things come to those who wait, or are they destined to live a life of emptiness and bitterness?

These inspirational romances will bring the warmth of love into your reading.
Grab this set now, to find out if each couple can keep their faith and find true happiness.

title: Phoebe's Christmas Hope: An Amish Romance of Faith, Forgiveness, and Christmas Miracles (An Amish Christmas in Faith's Creek Book 3)
description:
Christmas is coming and Phoebe is tired of fighting off an old flame.

Phoebe Mast thought she was content with her simple life at Faith’s Creek café, serving kaffee and fritters to her close-knit Amish community. But as the first snow falls, bringing a chill to the air and warmth to her heart, her quiet world is turned upside down by shy Simon Lehman.

Simon has his own problem. His parents keep introducing him to potential brides, but Simon wants to marry for love. Phoebe has a wonderful idea. A charming "pretend" courtship. But guilt and more makes it not as simple as she’d hoped. As Christmas draws near, could it be that Gott has other plans?

With snowflakes dancing and community gatherings in full swing, let your heart be warmed by a story of faith, friendship, and the sweet promise of love wrapped in the glow of Christmas magic.

Curl up with Phoebe’s Christmas Hope and experience the wonder of love blossoming in the heart of an Amish winter.

title: Amish Christmas: Faith and Family (5 Amish Brothers #4)
description:
Will Moses lose the woman he loves before he gets a chance to admit his feelings?

Widow Betsy Knepp is new to the Faith's Creek community. She's a little older and never expected to find love again until she met Moses Phillips. Could it be possible?

Bad news, breaks Betsy’s heart and she believes that she must let Moses go. She takes the decision to leave Faith’s Creek, hoping he will forget her and move on.

With Christmas getting closer, Moses still misses the woman he loves. Can his troubled brother take him to the city and find her in time? When does and he learns her secret will he let her go?

Find out if the family and faith can pull them all together in time for Christmas.

title: Adopted by Faith (The Amish Quilting Circle #12)
description:
In the quiet and steady rhythm of Oregon, eighteen-year-old Cilla Hope’s world is turned upside down when she uncovers the secret of her birth – she was adopted.

Driven by an undeniable longing, she journeys across the country to Faith's Creek, Pennsylvania, seeking her true roots.
Cilla arrives in the midst of her cousin Katie and Levi's joyous wedding celebration. The surprise sends ripples through the gathering.

Can Cilla and Katie uncover her hidden past?

Another surprise awaits when Cilla crosses paths with Abner, who is training to be a chef. Unbeknownst to Cilla, their destinies are intertwined, and it will bring astonishing revelations to the forefront.

As Cilla settles into her new life, a delicate yet powerful bond starts to form between her and Abner. Amid their deepening connection and the discovery of shared passions, a complex question arises – can love truly bloom between them, or will people drive them apart?

This heartwarming Amish romance follows a remarkable journey of self-discovery, entwining family ties, cherished friendships, and an extraordinary love that transcends boundaries.

Set against the backdrop of a quaint Amish community, this poignant tale serves up an irresistible mix of tenderness, tradition, and sweet surprises. It’s a testament to the enduring power of love and the timeless beauty of finding one's place in the world.

title: Leah's Christmas Hope: An Amish Romance of Faith, Forgiveness and Christmas Miracles (An Amish Christmas in Faith's Creek Book 2)
description:
A newcomer who claims he's Amish brings uncertainty to Faith's Creek this Christmas.

When Leah Graber meets the mysterious Gideon Wagler, a businessman from Chicago who claims to be “as Amish as her,” she’s not so sure she believes him. With his cappuccino order and city ways, he’s out of place in Faith’s Creek—especially during the bustling holiday season. Yet, as they share time in the café and the snowy Pennsylvania countryside, Leah begins to see glimpses of a deeper, kinder man beneath his polished exterior.

But Gideon has secrets—and his unexpected return to his Amish roots may be more complicated than he’s willing to admit. As Christmas draws near, Leah finds herself wondering if this newcomer will become part of her own Christmas miracle… or if he’s just using her.

Will Gideon’s visit bring Leah the happiness she’s dreamed of, or will he leave her wishing for a different Christmas gift?

This heartwarming Amish Christmas romance is filled with faith, love, and the magic of community. It is perfect for fans of Amish romance who long for a clean, sweet, seasonal story with a twist of mystery and plenty of Christmas spirit.

title: Coming Home to Love: Amish Romance
description:
She left with a broken heart… now she’s back to heal it.

A tender tale of loss, redemption, and the enduring power of love within the Amish heartland.

Widowed and weary, Ruth Zook never imagined she’d return to the Amish community she once left behind. Pressured by her late husband to forsake her faith and family, Ruth has spent the last few years raising her two young children in a world that never felt like home. Now, with Joel gone and a deep longing stirring in her heart, Ruth finds herself on the doorstep of her childhood home—craving forgiveness, connection, and the peace of a simpler life.

Back in Mulberry Flats, Ruth's unexpected return sends ripples through the quiet community. Especially for Amos Schrock, the steadfast farmer who once loved her from afar. Seeing Ruth again awakens feelings he buried long ago—along with fears he thought he’d overcome.

As Ruth fights to regain her place in the community, Amos must decide whether he can risk his heart once more. Amid whispers of disapproval, the tender bond between Ruth and Amos begins to blossom. But with her future uncertain and the past still casting long shadows, will love be enough to bridge the divide?

In a world bound by tradition and tested by time, Coming Home to Love is a story of redemption, enduring love, and the homecoming that changes everything.

Get Your Copy of this Wonderful Amish Romance story - Today!

title: Shelter in the Storm (Amish Seeds of Faith Book 1)
description:
When tradition and innovation collide, will love be strong enough to bridge the divide?

Rebecca Lapp has built her life on perfect order. Since losing her mother at twelve, she's kept her Amish family together through meticulous planning and unwavering devotion to tradition. But when a violent storm forces her to seek shelter with Jacob Zook—whose innovative ideas have always raised eyebrows in their community—her carefully constructed world begins to shift.

As drought threatens their farms and livelihoods, Jacob's revolutionary irrigation system offers hope—and ignites controversy. Rebecca finds herself drawn not just to Jacob's kindness and ingenuity, but to his vision of honoring tradition while embracing thoughtful change. Yet their growing attraction becomes a lightning rod for those who fear any departure from the old ways.

When sabotage destroys Jacob's work and false accusations drive him from the community, Rebecca must choose between the security of conformity and a love that challenges everything she thought she believed. Armed with nothing but her mother's hidden wisdom and her own newfound courage, she'll discover that sometimes the strongest faith grows from questioning, and the deepest traditions are found not in rigid rules but in the courage to love authentically.

But with enemies determined to destroy their future and a community divided by fear, Rebecca and Jacob must prove that innovation and tradition can strengthen rather than threaten each other—before it's too late.

In this sweeping Amish romance of faith, courage, and unexpected love, discover how two hearts can find harmony even when their worlds seem impossibly apart.

title: The Night a Rich Thug Saved Me 3
description:
“I gave my heart to Kloey, and I didn’t even know it. She has to be the one for me,” Kasino Billionaire.

In the third installment of this series, the drama-filled night finally turned into morning. Kloey and Kasino found themselves yet again in another sticky situation. They just couldn’t catch a break. All they wanted to do was explore their love and live happily ever after unconditionally. However, the universe had other plans for them.

Kloey found herself in a compromising position when she had to leave the hospital unexpectedly. She was visiting her father that had just been shot when her sister called. There was a strange man in her house. The call dropped as her sister pleaded for help. Kloey left the hospital on her way to her sister’s rescue. Afraid and alone, she left Kasino a text. Will Kasino get to Kloey and her sister in time? Or will they be at the mercy of a crazy man lurking inside?

Kasino had his share of drama as well. His older brother’s wife had been attacked at work. Of course, he came to his sister-in-law’s defense. However, he might have gone too far this time. There was a deceased man and a warrant out for his arrest. It would be in his best interest to say at home, but will he? Kloey needed him badly. Will he risk it all again to save her once more?

The Night A Rich Thug Save Me 3 is mind-blowing with plot twists throughout. This love story is one of a kind. Read it now!

title: Confessions of a Hustla’s Daughter 2
description:
Juleena doesn’t know who she can trust anymore. She is truly in a battle of her heart over family. Who does she choose, and what does she do? Her brother has always been her right hand, someone she could trust with her life? When that changes, who can she truly depend on?
 Sidney has always wanted love, and not the kind that Meech offered. When she finds out what her boyfriend has been up to, will she cut things off? Or will she turn a blind eye like she has done in the past? She’s falling hard for Reem, but are things too good to be true? Sidney has fallen for the wrong man in the past, so is she making the same mistake twice? When Sidney finds out that Reem has his own fair share of secrets, will that end up being a deal breaker for her?

title: Guilty Pleasures Of A Boss 2: A Billionaire Love Story
description:
To have an emotional connection with someone is to have a feeling of alignment and intimacy that goes beyond just physical attraction. It’s a connection that these characters will learn to dissect and accept even when they don’t understand their own feelings. 

Starla Knight has overcome many obstacles, but after suffering from one of the most brutal assaults of her life, she walks with pride in trying to keep it together and move into her new season as a businesswoman. No matter how deep into the light she tries to venture, the past always shows up to remind her of the darkness. After making a discovery about Prime and Black, she faces trying times once again being forced to wear her sleeves on her back and make unexpected decisions.

Dontez ‘Prime’ Rollins is a man of his word and what he says goes. His hardest battle is transitioning from a gangsta to a Boss. Feeling emotionally invested in Starla, he’s left blindsided when she disappears without a word. The longer his calls go unanswered, the longer he’s unable to see her face, and the longer he goes without knowing she’s in a good mental state, he feels entitled to find out the truth even if that means putting himself in a cat and mouse situation to do so. When it comes to Starla and some answers to life-or-death questions, he realizes a lot as he keeps it cutthroat with his words. Although a billionaire, that meant nothing to him when it came to what his heart believed in. For the first time in his life, Prime is learning to understand his own feelings.

Demarcus “Peanut’ Funchess has gotten himself in a sticky web with Shante, but no matter what, he stands ten toes down behind Starla and doesn’t mind threatening anybody that tries to come in between that. Upon learning some very hurtful information from Starla, his hot head ways continue to spazz out of control, but the only woman he can lean on to bring a sense of calmness is on her own journey to self-healing and reflecting while trying to fight the feelings of murder being on her mind. He feels the distance between him and Starla and it hurts him more than he expected. Never being the ones to hide anything from each other, that’s exactly what they both find each other doing, however, neither one of them wants to be the one to let go.

In this installment, you feel the raw emotions of every situation as it’s played out. Each character learns how to be vulnerable when it comes to themselves even through the demons of their every day lives. It’s okay to shed a tear, it’s okay to love beyond measures, and most importantly, it’s okay to put yourself first.

title: Hooked On A California Kingpin: A BBW Arranged Marriage
description: Meet Sovereign aka Queen, coldly calculated, and troubled. She is beautiful mixed with the street smarts to elevate her gang to the next level. Sovereign sacrificed so much for her and her little sister Empress aka Clapback at the age of thirteen. Her parents were murdered leaving Sovereign no choice but to step up to the plate and become a young adult. She roamed the streets and created a gang until the love of her life betrayed her leaving her in a bind with multiple disloyal men on her team. Blinded by love can truly be your downfall when thinking a person has your best interest when they truly don’t. They call Sovereign treacherous when really the people surrounding her are the ones that’s plotting. Her heart is on reserve, until she meets Malice aka Inferno. That butterfly feeling comes and then they clash hard. Inferno runs a syndicate in the states and reigns as a Kingpin in California. Sovereigns’ grandmother and Inferno’s father is trying to create a new alliance called the “Golden Triangle” in Mexico. The only way to build this strong foundation is marriage. How can two impulsive and powerful individuals come together under such a union? Toxic and selfish ways come out to play as drama unfolds at a fast pace. Before Sovereign realizes it, she’s hooked on a California Kingpin and stuck in an arranged marriage.

title: A Bounty On A Ruthless Thug's Heart
description:
Power Gibson lives up to his name. He’s a man with the ability to direct and influence others. Ever since the death of his mother, he’s been grinding to take care of his family. The Gibson’s are the true definition of getting it out the mud. With his longtime girlfriend, Tish by his side, and all the money one could want at their disposal, Power still longs for love from the one person who refuses to give it to him.

Tish Sumpter has been with Power for years, even through the days of him cheating and dogging her out. When an almost fatal accident nearly costs Tish her life, Power vows to do right by her. He was living up to his promise until he crosses paths with someone who has him willing to risk it all. When Tish’s skeleton’s spill from her closet, Power finds himself questioning if promises are enough to keep them together, or if it’s best for them to go their separate ways.

Renaissance Mitchell left a lavish lifestyle and the only love she’s ever known, in Texas after suffering a miscarriage. Miami has always brought Renaissance a sense of comfort, and she felt it was the perfect place to start over again. With a one track mind, she is determined to get back the one thing the world stole from her, but never did she imagine the stranger she met at work, yet couldn’t escape, would ultimately enter her life…permanently.

After being screwed over by the one person he trusted, Honor Gibson vows to never trust another woman. However, when he crosses paths with the beautiful Reminisce Mitchell, he’s willing to give love another shot. All is well until a secret he never meant to keep, reveals itself, putting everything they worked hard to build together, at risk.

Reminisce Mitchell is fresh out of a relationship with a man who has practically turned her into a woman, and fathers her child. Tired of fighting for a spot in Rome’s life, Reminisce packs up her and her child and leaves Rome in the middle of the night, promising to never look back. When the infamous Honor Gibson sweeps her off of her feet, she’s willing to be all in. That is until she finds herself in a position to have to fight for a spot in his life. Will Reminisce be strong enough to walk away, or is she in too deep already?

title: A Bounty On A Ruthless Thug's Heart 2
description:
Granting one’s wish is one of Fate’s saddest jokes and Renaissance will learn the hard way to be careful what you ask for. She’s dreamed of the day when she’ll be able to carry a child on her own, but will she feel the same way when she realizes that one night of pleasure will cost her the thing that she’s been hoping for forever? She realizes that everyone has secrets, including her.

What’s done in the dark will always come to the light and Power soon learns that the hard way. Power is trying to cope with the fact his longtime girlfriend has been cheating on him with a brother that he never knew he had. The only person that has the answers that he needs is the one person that wants nothing to do with him. He’s left trying to clean up a mess that he didn’t make but what will happen when all cards are revealed, and he’s left holding a royal flush?

Reminisce has her hands full with an Ex that can’t let go and a man that will never let her go. She’s backed into a corner and is stuck trying to figure out her next move. When Honor does the unthinkable and leaves her wondering is love really enough?

Heaven is tossed into the madness when she runs into Choppa, and he forces her to come out with him. She runs into someone that might recognize her from her past and reveal the secret that she’s been dreading since the day it happened. Will she be able to able to remain conspicuous or will her secrets follow her to a new city?

title: Guilty Pleasures Of A Boss 3: A Billionaire Love Story
description: They say you have to hit rock bottom to get to the top, and sometimes, you have to lose to win again. In Starla’s case, that’s exactly how life plays out for her. She’s grown right in front of our eyes as she learns to love herself while staying also staying true. She’s fought so hard to blossom and this time, she’s not allowing anyone to come in between that, not even her past. She wants nothing more than her happily ever after, but the battle between which man she thought could give it to her was the biggest, or at least she thought. Starla soon realizes that the one person who truly needed to make her happy was herself and the fairytale just might come after. Prime had come in a like a knight and shining armor while standing on everything he said he would do. When he took a bullet from his own brother to save the woman he loved, he thought his life was over, however, God saw fit to keep him here because his job wasn’t done. Every move he makes is calculated as he continues to build his empire while giving Starla the right amount of space to figure herself out with just a little guidance from him. Prime knew when it all came down to it, even his own transition would guide him where he needed to be while leaving the past behind him.Peanut just can’t seem to get it right to save his life no matter how much he tried to get it together, he found himself drowning in sticky situations that constantly left him and Starla at each other’s throats. Never in his life did he want to hurt the only girl he truly loved, but his biggest fear was coming to fruition right in front of his eyes as she taught him one of the biggest lessons of his life. Love is a beautiful thing, but sometimes it just simply isn’t enough.

title: A Bounty On A Ruthless Thug's Heart 3
description:
Ever since the loss of her first pregnancy, all Renaissance wanted was a baby of her own, regardless of the method it took. When she ends up pregnant again, all she worries about is going through another miscarriage. To comfort herself, Renaissance feels keeping her pregnancy a secret is the best route to go, including not telling the one person who helped her create the life she was carrying. When Power is shot trying to protect the woman who has his heart and their unborn child, Renaissance realizes it’s time to stop playing games and go after what she truly wants, but is it too late?
 
Reminisce is finally happy and living her best life with the family she loves and always dreamed of having. It doesn’t take long before she finds herself in a situation that will tie her to Honor forever. Honor finds himself in a compromising position, that leaves Remi leaning on an old friend to help her clean up Honor’s mess. However, with jealous and scorned exes in the shadows, and Honor being busted in compromising positions, is her love enough to keep their relationship and happiness afloat or is it better to leave it all where it is and start over?
 
Honor finds life coming at him from every angle, from dealing with his brother’s mess to an ex who refuses to leave him alone. When Myra returns in an effort to get her family back, Honor finds Reminisce caught in a crossfire, and Honor is left unsure of which way to turn. Will his love for Myra prove to be too much to deny, or will he finally let her go and move on with the one whom he finds comfort and peace in?
 
In this finale, the gloves are coming off. There are so many fires that need to be put out, however, when the smoke clears, who will be left standing?

title: Worth The Risk Of Loving A Boss: Janai & Kymeek
description:
Kymeek Towers is the second oldest of the Towers Brothers, and the most talked about out of the siblings. Everyone is trying to tie Kymeek down, but since he doesn’t believe in love, he wasn’t interested in settling down. That is until he meets Janai Jones, a beautiful woman that manages to captivate his heart. There’s something about her that awakens his heart and has him wanting her in the worse way.

After one drunken one-night stand, they both realize that there was some deep magnetic pull between them. Kymeek and Janai believe that what they share is the definition of love at first sight and was determined to give things a try. But the pressure of Kymeek’s agreement with his father leaves him in a complicated position and interrupts what he’s building with Janai.

Not wanting to miss out on true love, Kymeek decides that it might be time to put himself first and go exclusive with Janai. But when his father, Emmanuel Towers, threatens to come between them, Kymeek has to act fast. Will Janai and Kymeek get their chance at true love and being happy? Or will Emmanuel plans to destroy them work?

title: Insane 4 U
description:
We were introduced to the infamous Carmen Vasquez and Insane in the ‘Who do you luv’ series. By the time we got to watch the way these two interacted with each other in ‘Christmas Luvin’ last December, I think we were all excited to see what spark could form between the two of them.

 Carmen Vasquez was born and raised in Atlanta, Georgia. A real Georgia peach. With a Mexican father, and a black mother, she has such a spice to her, which forces people to either love or hate her. She grew up in wealth, but that didn’t stop her from always finding interest in those bad boys, who were from the other side. The other side is where she meets her baby father, Ramonte. This dynamic is so toxic and unhealthy, which is one of the biggest reasons that sent Carmen running to Miami, Fl for a new life to start with her daughter, Sofia. In Miami, is where Insane is, and honestly, there’s more drama there too.

Arquavious, better known as Insane is the most handsome, thugged out, trash talker, piece of addiction that you’ll ever meet. Many women love him, but none have ever been successful on getting that love back from him in return. He’s real particular on who he chooses to give his heart to, and he lacks trust, which is why he’s never loved, or been in love. That’s until he gets to officially meet Carmen and really learn who she is.

Two individuals that’ll quickly go insane for each other, if they can get the relationship to work. This book is filled with so many secrets, loyalty is tested, friends are switching up, but in the midst of this, a beautiful love story is in the works.

title: I Gave My Heart To A Houston Millionaire
description:
A True Love Story…

Persia is a pretty brown, bombshell beauty. She’s young, intelligent, classy, and appears to live the perfect life. After overcoming years of baby mama drama, side chicks, unnecessary drama, and financial issues from the love of her life, Major Persia is finally on her way down the aisle to marry him.

The very minute Persia and Major exchange vows and exit the church’s doors, an unpleasant surprise awaits them. This crushes Persia’s spirit in unimaginable ways. It also changes the course of her relationship with Major. All he’s ever fed her was lies, but will she be able to digest reality and move forward in their marriage?

Persia has put up with so much from Major that she loses herself. He’s broken her confidence and humiliated her more times than she can count, leaving her to wonder if she were ever good enough.

All that changes when a sexy, irresistible millionaire named Psalm enters the equation and shakes things up.

Psalm has gone from a street pharmacist to a high-paid herbalist. With his brilliance, charm, and natural bad-boy swag, he’s now branded a self-made millionaire. He travels the world healing men, women, and children, so when he runs into the heartbroken Persia, he knows exactly how to ease her pain.

Being the natural healer that he is, Psalm pulls Persia in and gives her everything she’s been craving and missing her whole life. By the time he is done rearranging her mind and putting her up on game, Major becomes a thing of the past.

However, Major, his bitter baby mamas, and side chicks are far from removed from the picture. Now that Persia is no longer a part of the circus, they must find ways to ruin her happiness. They’d spent so many years fighting over broke down Major that they can’t face the reality that Persia is good enough for Psalm, a millionaire.

Misery loves company, and just when Persia thinks she’ll live happily ever after with her king, she soon realizes that the drama is just getting started!

title: Worth The Risk Of Loving A Boss 2: Janai & Kymeek
description:
After Emmanuel drops a bomb on Kymeek, he tries to figure out how to accept the news and keep going on with life, but Emmanuel isn’t going to allow that to happen. Determined to be in control, Emmanuel crosses a line that forces Kymeek to take matters into his own hands. With all the chaos he’s causing, Emmanuel skeletons are starting to fall out of the closet. How will Kymeek handled finding out the man that raised him and he called father, wasn’t who he really thought he was?
 
All Janai ever wanted was peace, happiness, and love. She thought she’d finally find those things but apparently, she was wrong. After getting her heart broken by Kymeek, she was ready to shut down and cut him out, but for some reason she couldn’t. While trying to figure things out with Kymeek, life throws her some unexpected betrayal that she never saw coming. After being betrayed by two people you trusted and finding out everything around you is a lie, what’s a girl to do?

They say when life throws you lemons that you’re supposed to make lemonade, and that’s exactly what Kymeek and Janai are trying to do. Follow these two in another installment to figure out how the manage the crazy twist and turns that life throws their way.

title: Dangerously In Love With A Southside Menace
description:
In a world where good girls often fall for bad boys, Nicole defies expectations. While she appears as a smart and ambitious dancer on the right path, there's a hidden side to her life that threatens to drown her in darkness. With a hustler's spirit, she embraces a life focused on money and her career, until she unexpectedly crosses paths with Lucky.

Lucky, known as a menace to society with his no-tolerance attitude, has built a reputation as a cold-hearted and malicious individual. Respected and feared, he always gets what he wants. Despite their differences, Lucky finds himself drawn to Nicole after a chance encounter, and a deep bond forms between them.

Ignoring numerous warnings, Nicole remains steadfast in her feelings for Lucky. Possessive and protective, Lucky reciprocates her emotions. However, their intense love becomes a catalyst for a series of dramatic events, filled with betrayal and ultimately leading to tragic consequences.

title: Down South Thugs Need Love Too: Standalone
description:
Being a nurse, Brooklyn Jackson finds joy in taking care of others. She adamantly loves her position and has a love for nursing and her family. However, after being betrayed by the love of her life, the notion of falling in love again has become a severe after-effect that she fully despises, avoiding it at all costs. As a result, she has placed a chastity belt over her heart, vowing to never let anyone else in again. But will Brooklyn meet a man that is strong enough to break down her barriers and take over her heart by storm?

A very sought-after and prominent photographer, Brooklyn’s sister and best friend, Amina Jackson, is happily in love and is on the verge of her happily ever after. Regrettably, Amina quickly learns that there is a downside to love, reminding her that just like a cubic zirconia, everything that appears to be a real diamond isn’t. Picking up the pieces of their lives and starting fresh, Brooklyn and Amina head to Mississippi with a renewed mind and spirit. However, Mississippi just may be too much to handle, causing them to not be prepared for what’s in store for them. Can the Jackson sisters handle the pressure that lies ahead for them? Or will they fold and lose themselves in the process?

The move to Mississippi proves to be challenging for Brooklyn and Amina, especially after running into the dynamic duo of Raheem and Mackenzie. Lives are torn apart. Lies and a haunting revelation are discovered. A world wind of heartache ensues. Will Brooklyn and Amina be able to hold onto their bond and piece their lives back together? Or will their world forever be flipped upside down without any possible brighter side? Find out in this high-strung African American urban fiction standalone Down South Thugs Need Love Too.

title: Chosen by a Young Boss
description:
17 year old Aubrey Rodgers is beautiful, smart, loyal, and has a quiet demeanor, keeping to herself and not bothering anyone, but will get rowdy when she needs to. Graduating early and looking forward to college, Aubrey dreams of making it out of The Rows and becoming rich, especially since she is tired of living an impoverished lifestyle with her mom and sister. However, her best laid plans are ruined by a damaging situation, proving how strong and deep her loyalty runs while totally changing the trajectory of her life and future. Will Aubrey find a way to make it out of her circumstances and become rich like she dreamt about? Or will she end up becoming a real product of her environment?

18 year old Honest Bryant is handsome, intelligent, solid, and laid back. He doesn’t’ start anything but he definitely knows how to finish it. Knowing college is not the road for him, Honest is ready to step into the role that his father has been grooming him for—to become the head of the Bryant empire. However, that also includes dealing with his hot headed azz brother. But when a life changing event occurs in the Bryant family, disparaging revelations are discovered while unknown foes appear to be right underneath their noses. Will the Bryant family survive the heat that have descended upon them?

Family drama, jealousy, lies, and secrets surround Aubrey and Honest as love, trust, and loyalty fight to be let in. By catching the eye of and entertaining one of the young bosses in Chicago, Aubrey finds out just what it truly means to have a real one on her side. When life appears to keep handing her one clusterfuck after another, Honest displays how long and how far he will go to keep her safe, protected, and loved. Best-selling author Dedra B brings you Aubrey and Honest’s story in this new electrifying and heart-thumping African American urban hood story, Chosen By A Young Boss , a full length standalone.

title: Rose In Harlem: Harlem King's Princess
description: Before reading this book, read the -In Love With The King Of Harlem 1-5 -In Love With An East Coast Maniac 1-3 The King of Harlem’s princess is all grown up and ready to do everything her father said not to do. Living on her own proves many challenges, but has its rewards too; boys sleeping over. While Paris knows that Boo isn’t good for her, the thrill of doing the opposite of what her father says feels so much better. When Paris starts to realize that Boo may not be her happily ever after, will she leave him alone, or does she try to hold on praying it works out? Pinky, Paris’s best friend is a stripper, lives in public housing with her gamer boyfriend, who works part time. She brings the money in and he spends it on games. When Pinky has a gig to privately dance for Biz Giovanni, manager to Nice Giovanni, she jumps at the chance and drags Paris too. One lap dance turns into an entire rollercoaster. There’s one thing; Biz is engaged to be married. When he sees Paris stripping, he automatically assumes she’s a stripper, but she’s so beautiful. He never would assumed that she was a freshman student at Columbia university. Paris isn’t interested and turns his advances down every chance she could get. The fact that he’s the new star basketball player on the Brooklyn Nets doesn’t interest her at all. Nice Giovanni is the golden child, everyone wants him on their team, but he settled his roots on the court of his home team, Brooklyn. While Nice wants Paris, he knows she has a situation, but he’s not willing to take the back seat. What happens when he finds out that the pretty college student is the daughter of Harlem’s notorious gangsta?

title: In Love With The King Of Harlem 5 (McKnight Family)
description:
Wynner is excited about becoming a mother for the second time. With Prize taking up all her time and love, she has no time for negativity. That is until Olay pops back into her marriage, but with a threat that could tear her family apart. Knowing that Olay's mouth has ability to tear apart the McKnight empire, Wynner is left with only one choice; death. Is Wynner tough enough to roll her sleeves up and handle the situation? Or will she flake and depend on her brothers to handle her problems once again? With Olay popping back up into her life, it causes her to feel a certain way about her husband. Will this cause the couple to go backwards? Or is their marriage strong enough to get through this? 
Jah is left with the news that he could have a daughter by the woman who put him in the wheelchair. Determined to ignore the situation, he continues to keep Tweeti in the dark to avoid her stressing his baby out. What happens when a situation forces him to stop ignoring Zuri? Will this secret put a strain on his and Tweeti's relationship? Or are they solid enough to go through anything? When it's all said and done, will Jah be a father to two? During Rehab, Jah meets a new friend Sky. At first it starts off friendly, then the lines get blurry. Does Jah jeopardize everything he and Tweeti has? 
Lira decides to throw out the secret she's been keeping for years and didn't expect to nearly be killed. When Uzi finds out that his precious Paris may not be his, he loses his mind. Determined to find out the truth, he gets his daughter tested. Do the results prove what Lira has been hiding this entire time, or is Paris truly a McKnight? If that's not enough, he has to deal with Remi running the streets, coming in early in the morning and trying to be the Bonnie to his Clyde. Trying to get her to understand that the streets isn't something to play with, it falls on deaf ears. When Remi gets herself wrapped into something that could potentially kill both her and Tweeti, will Uzi run to save her? Or is he behind the whole thing? 
In the finale, the gang is back to answer some questions that were left unresolved. Will everyone get their happy ending, or will only one woman be in love with the king of Harlem?

title: Falling In Love With A Billionaire Savage 2: Finale
description:
The crew is back in part two of this highly invigorating series. After learning about her fiancé’s deceitful past and undisputable lies and secrets, Avian gains new footing and starts over with her life, including removing herself from underneath her mom’s calloused thumb. Ready to live her life and chase her dreams, Avian also has an opportunity for a second chance at love. Will it be more of the same? Or will she actually find love in all of the right places?

On the flipside, her twin sister Avery is transitioning into a role that she truly hasn’t portrayed before—a bonafide girlfriend. With her and Onyx venturing this new lane, they are rolling in couple’s bliss. That is until troubles brew in the form of a former ex. Will Onyx and Avery’s fairly new relationship be strong enough to withstand the obstacles facing them? Or will this unexpected drama cause Avery to rethink her girlfriend position and call it quits?

As for the guys, Ace is learning to jungle single parenthood and expanding his business while finding a resolution to deal with his backstabbing, former best friend. How will Ace deal with the traitor that has been hidden in his campus for years unbeknownst to him? On the other hand, Zoe believes his sheriff position has him secured at the top and that no one can touch him. Realizing that his conquest to the top is not as easy as he thought, he f*cks around and finds out exactly what it means by “What goes around, comes around.” When Zoe comes face to face with the consequences of his illicit actions, will he be able to handle the same sh*t that he so effortlessly dishes out?
 
In this much-anticipated finale of this African American urban fiction series, lives are thrown multiple curve balls. No one is unaffected. Some will live with concealed wounds. And others will deal with unconcealed scars. See how the gang removes the shackles from their lives and their feet in Falling In Love With A Billionaire Savage 2.

title: Crown Her King
description:
“I named you King cuz you’re royalty . The most important chess piece. The king can move in any direction. Nothing nor no one comes before you and just because you female doesn’t mean sh*t change. You are above a Queen; you are a King and don’t you ever forget that.”

At 15 years old, the world as King St. James knows it no longer exists, especially after her mom is killed and dad goes to prison. Going from a life of luxury to living in foster care with her younger twin sisters. While there, the St. James siblings connect with another 15 year old, Lola Perez, who becomes another sister to them. Fast forward three years later, King and Lola age out of the system and are on their own. Becoming good friends with the neighborhood drug pin, King observes a lot and learns even more, watching how moves are made. But when an ill-fated scheme places her in a life and death position, King chooses her life and let death falls where it lay.

When King and Lola encounter the Madden brothers, their world opens up in multiple ways, enriching their lives on another level. But when secrets are discovered, it could alter the relationships that they have built, jeopardizing the future that they have envisioned. Secrets have a way of destroying from the inside out. Will it cause King, Lola, and the Madden brothers a chance at real happiness?

Love and loyalty chain them together. An inseparable bond is created. A protector is developed. And a natural born hustler is awakened. When an unforeseen ploy provides her with the perfect opportunity, King ascends to her rightful position over her royal streets. In this alluring and compelling African American urban hood love story, see how King uses her name to her advantage as they Crown Her King , a full-length standalone.

title: Forbidden Love With A Miami Thug
description:
Everli “Evie”

Love. Yeah, that. It is supposed to encompass all things and endure all things. But, it doesn’t work like that. Especially when you’re dealing with a no good, conniving ninja like my fiancé, Big Tone. When his infidelity is brought to the light, it triggers me to finally wake up. But when he commits the unthinkable against me, all gloves are off and revenge is all I see.

Devonte “Deuce”

By day, everyone knows me as the business owner of Club Onyx. Only a select few know that I’m the Don in these Miami streets, exactly how I like it. But I hate it when ninjas play on my top, with my bread, and with my name. And that’s exactly what someone has done. Foolishly unleashing the illogical and lethal side of me. But trust me when I tell you that this ninja has just written his own name on his tombstone.

Evie and Deuce have a known enemy in common, but neither one of them is aware of it. However, when fate destines their paths to cross, more than vengeance is sparked. In book one of this African American urban fiction series, deception, disloyalty, envy, retaliation, and strong temptation is the name of the game. Find out what happens when you have to die in order to live in Keyy D.’s newest, Forbidden Love With A Miami Thug.

title: A Real One Snatched My Heart
description:
Imagine being 18 years old, marrying your heart on prom night, graduating high school, and preparing for the next stage of your life by entering the military. And then it all comes to a screeching halt by the illicit action of another but your loyalty prompts you to do the right thing. Well for Satin Collins, he don’t have to imagine this surreal scenario. It becomes a fact of life for him, altering his plans and life on many levels. Forcing him to make a gut-wrenching, critical, and necessary decision to prolong his life and freedom by disappearing.

Fast forward years later, Satin is a street entrepreneur and decides to get his life back by returning home to where it all started, looking forward to reuniting with those he left behind. Instead of the thrills and shrills he had dreamt about, his return opens up a can of worms and a happy reunion is a foregone conclusion. Satin not only uncovers some disturbing news but he is also faced with betrayal after betrayal. But in the midst of his chaos, he bumps into a beautiful silver lining, one that he wouldn’t mind getting to know better. With his foundation crumbling and creating bigger holes, will returning home be the best or worst decision of Satin’s life?

When life comes at him real fast, Satin Collins has to do what is best for him, learning to separate his trusted allies from the vile serpents slithering in his camp. In this African American engrossing and heart-healing urban hood romance, When A Real One Snatches My Heart , the be all to end all for Satin is not all bad and definitely has its perks, so see how it all comes to a head.

title: Falling In Love With A Billionaire Savage
description:
A recent parolee and well-known street legend, Ace Weslyn is looking forward to starting his life anew with his girl and his daughter. Having had enough of the streets and vowing to never return, he now works as a certified tattoo artist. Behind the scenes, Ace’s brother was ruthlessly murdered while he was locked up and he searches for the killer day in and day out. However, when the answer potentially lands him back in those same streets he is removed from, will he break his vow and avenge his brother’s murder? 
Twin sisters, Avian and Avery Towers, are like day and night. While Avian follows the rules, Avery certainly breaks them. And their love life is no different. Avian is engaged to her man of two years, Carter, and there impending nuptial is only a month away. However, Carter—who serves as the sheriff of Virginia Beach—is not all what he appears to be. When his secrets are fully exposed and cause total destruction, will it be the end of Avian and Carter? Or will they persevere through their adversity and grow stronger together?
Meanwhile, Avery works as bottle girl at the hot new lounge in town. She prefers sexuationships instead of relationships because she is committed to protecting her heart. Until Onyx Black makes a strong appearance in her life, threatening to change her status from single and complicated to taken and in a relationship. Will Onyx destroy the wall built around her heart and make himself at home? Will Avery open her mind and finally give her heart away?
In book one of this two-part African American urban fiction series, deceit, backstabbing, and abuse of power are on full display while love and lust make their appearances too. Find out how hard the boat rocks when you are Falling In Love With A Billionaire Savage.

title: In Love With The King Of Harlem
description:
Qua loves Wynner. Wynner loves Qua. Easy enough, right? But Wynner came with two brothers who couldn't stand Qua with their baby sister. Qua couldn't stand not having Wynner with him, even if he didn't have his life together. With faith, his word and love, he grabs his love's hand and marries her at the court house.

Flash forward five years, and all the promises that Qua has made Wynner he has come through on them. To stay true, secure the bag & be her ace through all her pain. With Wynner always being sick, everyone babies her and is always worried about her. As a wife, she supposed to nurture and cater to her husband, but always being sick, she feels less than a wife. When Qua's childhood friend comes to the city, she's sure to shake things up between the couple. Will they take their vows to heart? Or will Uzi be making his baby sister a widow?

Uzi is feared by everything with a beating heart in New York. He and his brother's name ring bells in the New York City streets.
