If you and the Mcknight brother's name are mentioned in the same breath, you know you won't live to speak about it. With no time for a woman, Uzi usually slides in women and dip after. But, when a smart talking bartender at his favorite strip club catches his eyes he chases her like a lion does an antelope.

Remi is so over men wasting her time & spitting game that she doesn't want to play. Working two jobs, she doesn't have time for games. When Uzi approaches her at work, both their words collide at full force. In a situationship, she continues to ignore Uzi until it becomes too much to handle. Will Uzi eventually shoot a arrow in her heart?

Girl, take it all off cause I know you extra, Future's words couldn't ring truer for Remi's younger sister, Tweeti. Being the heavier of the two, she's was always overlooked as a child. Until now, where all the boys that played her for being plus sized, are same men chasing her. Tweeti doesn't know what she wants to do with her life. One week she wants to save lives then the next she wants to take them. When Jahquel rolls into her life, she's taken back. Never being with a man in a wheel chair, she shuts him down. What happens when Jah eventually captures her heart?

Jahquel used to run the same streets his older brother now owns. A gun shot to the back stopped that, but it didn't stop his ruthless and rude demeanor. Being paralyzed limits some things, but when he runs into Tweeti, he feels like the sky is the limit. Tweeti couldn't be less interested than being just friends. Never being one to give up, he continues to pursue Tweeti. Will he eventually wear her down?

In New York where you gotta go hard, these kings need to reign with an iron fist, but will they do it with or without queens?

title: Taking a Chance on a Boss 2: Finale
description:
Betrayal is unlimited.
Lies are endless.
Trust is severely tested.
Lives are ended.
Love is solidified.

At the end of book one, ruckus ensued at the birthday party. In book two, the mayhem continues. Life for Chance, Con, Polo, and Lisa is forever changed. Some for the good and some for the worst.

In this much anticipated finale, the plot definitely thickens and the twists are even more twisted. Some burdens are lifted while others are heavily laden. In this highly drama-filled conclusion of this African American urban fiction finale, the road to love has its curves and hills to climb. However, it is definitely worth all of the aches when you are Taking A Chance On A Boss 2.

title: My Secret Hood Baby Daddy : Standalone
description:
You never know how love will come to you. You never know when love will strike you. You never know who love has for you. So when forbidden love comes for you, what will you do?
When you are the governor’s daughter, certain expectations are laid out and who not to associate with is one of them. However, the heart, body, and mind of Unix know what they want after encountering the illegal street racer, Chant. Meanwhile, Chant is fighting his own beef with his dad, who is the most notorious kingpin around. Everyone bows down to Big Chant but Chant refuses to.
When a surprising conception is created, Unix faces an unreasonable ultimatum from her dad. Will she bend to her father’s will or will she follow her heart? When Chant crosses his dad, he is given a choice to payback his restitution. Will the answer Chant chooses bring them closer together or keep them further apart? Get into this all-around family drama as Glitz takes you on a wild ride in My Secret Hood Baby Daddy, an African American urban fiction hood romance.

title: Loved by a H*e, Wifed Up by the Plug
description:
THE PRICE OF LOVING A H*E IS DEFINITELY NOT WORTH THE COST!!
Regrettably, this is a life lesson that Scotland “Scottie” Williams experiences in a harrowing way. At 23 years old, Scottie is focused on her son and completing her business management degree while trying to stop dealing with her no good baby daddy. However, it’s easier said than done. After experiencing so much turmoil for years with him, his other baby mamas, and other women, she’s grown tired of the back and forth, ready for a positive change in her life. While attending a night out with her sisters, Scottie’s eyes land on a very good looking man that infatuates her like never before, possibly being the very positive change that she needs. Will Scottie finally be able to walk away from her child’s father for good and move on with her life?
For 28 years old Harlem Knight, he is the epitome of every woman’s fantasies and potential nightmares. A well-known kingpin and a notorious womanizer, his love for women is never-ending but only Scottie holds his heart, vowing to make her his wife and asserting that letting go is not an option. However, when another woman catches his attention, he is quickly enraptured by her essence, putting a hold onto his claim. But when Scottie starts moving differently, will Harlem be able to take the same medicine that he so boldly issues out?
In this jaw-wrenching, page turning urban fiction African American standalone, your favorite author bae, Patrice Balark brings the heat and tales of dealing with a bonafide h*e. Travel the mischievous streets of Chicago with Scottie as she learns that loving a h*e is definitely not worth the cost in Love By A H*e, Wifed Up By the Plug.

title: Forbidden Love With A Miami Thug 2: Finale
description: At the end of book one, surprises at the meeting threw everyone for a loop. Shots rang out, leaving everyone wondering who caught a hot one. Just as life is getting back on track for Everlie, she ends up in more chaos than she ever thought was possible.In the blink of an eye, everything changes. The game is switched up. Lives are unbalanced. And worlds are flipped upside down as Evie, Deuce, and Big Tone struggle to comprehend their new realities. In the final installment of Forbidden Love With A Miami Thug, everything comes to a jaw-dropping conclusion. Who was shot? What happens next? All of the questions you needed answered from book one will be answered in this thrilling finale. Get ready to see how the story ends in this African-American urban fiction novel by Keyy D.

title: Confessions of a Hustla's Housekeeper 4 (Mathers Family)
description:
With Yves carrying not one, but two blessings she wants to be the mother that she couldn’t be for her late daughter. Coming home from rehab, there’s a lot of feelings that Yves can’t shake. Roddy is the love of her life, but why does everything in their relationship seem so hard? With their past, she wonders if they’ll be able to restore what they used to have. Or is it best to call it quits and focus on their kids?
 Roddy wants to make his relationship work with Yves. Even more since they’re expecting twins together. He wants to right all the wrongs while proving that he can and will always put Yves before anyone. In order to make his current relationship work, he knows that he has to fix past relationships. Roddy knows that communicating with Jia isn’t always the easiest, but he has to make it right in order to have a bright future with the love of his life. Can he make things right with Jia? Or will he end up erasing her from both he and Kingsley’s life?

title: Still On Chill With A Billionaire
description:
After Tish and Chill get engaged, life seems pretty calm until we fast forward to the weekend of their wedding. Tasha and Nick are still going strong, but they can't escape insecurities and old drama making their relationship toxic.

Krystal's life seems perfect for the moment until a reminder of her buried past shows up in the form of temptation. Dixon is a widow, but she is having a hard time proving that to the people who can make her rich.

Chill and Tish simply want to celebrate their union with the people closest to them, only everyone else’s drama may interfere with that.

In this On Chill With A Billionaire spinoff we dive into the lives of the people who still haven’t gotten their happy ending. Will it ever come, or will life only be beautiful for Chill and Tish?

title: Soul Ties With A Millionaire
description:
He’s a millionaire and a bad boy… He’s charming, attractive, and everything a woman could ever desire in a man.

Joshua Cooper, an enticing ex-street king turned boss has the world at his feet. Anything he wants, he gets. He’s about his business, so settling down is the furthest thing from his mind. However, when he crosses paths with the most beautiful woman he’s ever seen, he has a change of heart.

She’s a good girl who becomes his weakness…

Although she’s beautiful, sassy, and has her whole life ahead of her, Honor Garrison doesn’t live the life she feels she deserves. Struggling to make ends meet, Honor is put in a compromising position that could risk her reputation. With no job and a broken self-esteem, Honor must figure out how to pick herself back up. She now feels like all hope is lost until a millionaire comes along…

With pleasure comes pain…

Upon meeting, sparks fly between Joshua and Honor. They aren’t what the other is used to, but sometimes opposites attract. Once Joshua enters Honor’s life, she goes from rags to riches. He upgrades her life to a new level, turning her into a top-tier boss. Honor feels that Joshua is too good to be true, and maybe he is…

Unexpected drama often leads to broken bonds, but a soul tie with a millionaire can last forever…

title: Phantom's Emblazonment (Ares Infidels MC, #12)
description:
Months of getting messages and leads from a mysterious stranger over the internet have Phantom beyond curious. He isn’t ready to say the stranger is a friend. Nothing has led to them finding and eliminating the last two members of the criminal family his club and their friends at Time Served have been battling for three years.

He’s afraid to get his hopes up. He’s frustrated and the ongoing stress has him on edge and ready for action. Imagine his surprise when the mysterious Tam appears out of the blue, at the gate of the compound. Two questions are immediately answered. Tam is a woman. Tam is short for Tamysin.

Tamysin is a woman with a past that is closely tied to the Fairchilds family and her reasons for wanting them dead, especially Celeste, is more than legit. The pain she suffered because of them is horrible. Phantom and the Ares Infidels convince her to stay with them to pool their resources and finish this. They can’t remain hidden forever, can they?

As the weeks and months pass, Phantom and Tamysin grow closer and a whole new future is revealed, but it isn’t one without risk, problems, and frustrations. In the end, will they find and eliminate their last two enemies? And if they do, will Phantom let her be the one to take out Celeste in an excruciatingly painful way? Come see how one hacker emblazons herself on the heart, soul, and even the skin of another hacker. Tamysin is Phantom’s Emblazonment.

title: Cian's Complication (Covenant of Ascent: O'Sheerans #2)
description: Cian O’Sheeran was the second oldest O’Sheeran child. His family was the largest Irish mob family in the US. Well, technically, to the world, they were former mobsters gone straight. The world might speculate and say they still were mobsters, but no one outside the family and their closest people knew the truth. Afterall, it was hard to remove all traces of a hunter from their bloodline. With Cian’s cousin marrying, it only makes him ache to find someone special who he can love and start his own little family with. Despite what a lot of the uber rich do, which is arranging marriages for power and blood ties, he will only settle for a true love match. In his family, nothing less would be acceptable. Only when he meets his, he’s shocked to find she’s been around for years and he never knew it. She also happens to be the daughter of one of the men in the world who would love nothing more than to put him and his whole family in prison for the rest of their lives. Miranda is an ordinary woman living what she considers a boring life. It’s not what she wants. She hungers to find a new job and true happiness. She loves her overprotective father, but she’s an adult and it’s her life to live. When she meets one of the infamous O’Sheeran’s, she knows what the rumors say about him and his family. Her father has voiced his opinion many times. Only she can’t seem to resist. Cian isn’t the only man who wants her. As he works to court her and convince her that he wants more than a fling, he has to worry not only about her father’s hate, but that there are two men who want her for themselves, and they might be willing to do just about anything to have her. So it was time for this O’Sheeran to bring out all the stops to win his soulmate. He’ll fight anyone and everyone to do it. The only ones he doesn’t need to fight is his family. They know when one of their own has found their happily ever after. All he has to do is resolve Cian’s Complication.

title: Lake Shore Wandering (Redemption Shores #1)
description:
Is love worth the gamble? And if so, will memory-restored Bennett still feel the same?

Hazel is working on a plan to keep her peaceful, remote life. When Bennet shows up pretending to be something he’s not, she knows she’s running out of time. Luckily for her, he hit his head and can’t remember a thing. With sudden inspiration thanks to an eighties rom-com, she’s got a whole new plan.

Convince Bennett they’re married? Check. Convince Bennett he belongs in Elk Canyon with her? That’s another task altogether . . . one that just might end up gambling her heart.

REDEMPTION 

1. Lake Shore Wandering
2. Lake Shore Return (coming November 2023)
3. Lake Shore Splendor (coming December 2023)
4. Lake Shore Awakening (coming Febraury 2024)

title: Frontier Lawyer: Coltrane and Calvin Book 4
description: A continuation of the story of Calvin Morrow, who learns that clients can trick lawyers. It's a book about a young lawyer whose career takes many different turns, and in the end he once again has to save his own life and protect his family. The last of the Coltrane and Calvin Series.

title: My Boy Tom
description: A Civil War engineer heads west to build a new life after losing his wife and son. He's built a cattle ranch in Wyoming when a young boy asks the engineer to take him in. The engineer adopts the boy named Tom, and he grows up in the late 1870s and early 80s in Wyoming. Tom, age 16, meets a Scottish lass and falls in love, but the lass's father is vehemently opposed. This is the story of a love that was meant to be. Another story of the Old West from the pen of R.O. Lane.

title: The Gun Smith
description: Mack Smith had left his shop in Pueblo and was just an hour or so from reaching his brother’s ranch for his annual visit when he felt the bullet slam into his head, and when his eyes finally opened, he found himself flat on his back on the bottom of a ravine. What the hell had happened? He was only a gunsmith, not a gunfighter. Who would want him dead? When he discovered the reason for the mistaken assassination, it led to bigger changes in his life than he could ever have imagined, and the end to lots of other lives.

title: Bidding on a Second Chance
description:
His bid for a second chance this Christmas might lead to her most disastrous fall yet.

Police officer Graham Lockhart’s life is dangerous enough without accident-prone Piper Wells tripping around in it—at least that’s what she claimed when she declined his marriage proposal two years ago. But he can’t help but wonder if there is more to her refusal.

Piper always cared for Graham, but she is incapable of giving him the one thing he wants more than anything—family. All her orphaned self knows about that is how much it hurts to lose. She’s better off focusing on caring for her nephew and running her business. Secondhand furniture doesn’t break hearts.

When an injury sidelines Piper leading into the holidays, Graham steps up to help her keep her commitment to a Christmastime auction benefiting a local family. Can they overcome the hurdles between them, or will the past and their warring hopes and fears trip them up for good?

Visit Redemption Ridge, Colorado and enjoy the faith, friendships, and forever-afters of the Christmas in Redemption Ridge series of Christian romance.

This series is a spin-off continuation of the best-selling Heroes of Freedom Ridge Series with all new characters and traditions, but the same magic of community and romance readers love.

title: Watching Her (Blake Wilder #20)
description:
“Welcome home. We’re alone now, no one can hear you.”

Blake Wilder has captured many dangerous criminals over the years.
When a familiar case lands on her lap, she could have never imagined the horrors that would follow.

A serial killer with a chillingly familiar pattern resurfaces, and it will take all her wit and power to ensure that the culprit never sees the light of day again.
As the case and the body count mount, it becomes apparent that he’s not just a step ahead of Blake: he’s a shadow in the darkness, a relentless tormentor who’s watching her every move.

While the killer continues to elude and taunt Blake at every turn. It seems only a matter of time before she either captures the predator or becomes prey herself.

Think you’re alone? Think again…

title: Cold Crash (Ellie Kline #13)
description:
On a crash course with death.

Ellie Kline’s return to the world of crime investigation is heralded by two unexpected texts. The first bears unsettling news from her mother...a family friend has been found dead under mysterious circumstances. Was it an accident, suicide, or foul play?

Before Ellie can process this family tragedy, the second text arrives, jolting her back into professional mode. The Charleston Police Department, grappling with a case that could shake the city’s upper crust, lifts Ellie’s suspension but pairs her with a partner to investigate the case.

A lone ranger at heart, Ellie isn’t pleased.

But as a scion of a respected family, Ellie’s deep roots in Charleston’s elite circles make her the perfect choice to untangle the web surrounding one of their own’s tragic end. Embarking on a journey through the labyrinth of high society, Ellie’s search for the truth yields more questions than answers. Each interview leads to frustrating dead ends.

And more dead bodies.

With the line between ally and enemy blurring, Ellie’s quest for the truth turns into a race against a killer determined to keep the past buried.

A killer’s vendetta turns eerily personal in Cold Crash, the thirteenth book of Mary Stone’s best-selling Ellie Kline series, thrusting Ellie into a deadly game where skeletons don’t just lurk in closets—they lie in wait.

title: Aidan's Ardor (Covenant of Ascent: O'Sheerans, #3)
description:
As Aidan watches yet another one of his cousins find his soulmate, he can’t help but wonder if that will ever be him. Not that he’s hurting for companionship. When you’re an O’Sheeran there’s no shortage of women. Only they’re the ones who you don’t want to bring home to your family. Add to it that he manages the family’s nightclubs, Sirens, women are even more plentiful. Too bad he’s lost the taste for them.

It’s like any other night at Sirens. The only thing different is he’s about to meet their new bartender. One look at Karizma stops this rich playboy in his tracks. He’s instantly interested, only the next day he’s outraged and does and says something that looks like it’ll guarantee him that Karizma will never speak to him again.

He has to get her forgiveness if he’s to have any chance with the woman he’s sure is his soulmate. Only he finds out he’s not the only one with his eye on her. And she’s experienced heartache and adversity he can’t imagine. As they navigate the bumps along the way, more about the O’Sheerans, their past and their present is revealed. Danger is part of being in their kind of life. Will Karizma be able to handle it and Aidan’s Ardor?

title: Alex (Terk's Guardians #10)
description:
Born with the ability to see psychic abilities in others, Alex finds himself called to help out a mutual friend, someone with similar abilities to Alex’s. Plus this mutual friend is on a mission to save innocent children. No way Alex can say no to that.

Taryn is desperate to save two children—both with abilities—from a greedy family member. Taryn needs help, so she contacted Levi, looking to see if he had men to spare. Of course that took her to Terk, with a similar request. In Taryn’s world, anyone with similar talents who needs help gets it. Period. Finding out these children were being exploited by their uncle made it doubly hard.

But the uncle looking for an easy way to profit off these gifted children isn’t willing to step aside, … not without taking down everyone around him …

title: Wild Hero: A Coastal Caribbean Adventure (Tyson Wild Thriller Book 71)
description:
A missing veteran.

A secret past.

A brutal killing.
When a World War II veteran goes missing from an assisted living facility, Tyson and his Navy buddy, JD, are on the case. Did he wander off? Or has something more sinister happened?

Suffering from cognitive decline, the aging war hero could be in grave danger. The deputies pursue all avenues to ensure his safe return, but shocking details come to light. The veteran’s disappearance may be tied to a fateful event that happened over half a century ago.

To complicate matters, an undercover Secret Service agent is murdered. As part of a joint task force, the duo must navigate a treacherous path of greed, murder, and mayhem. To discover the truth, they may have to bend a few rules. And to bring down a wicked criminal, sacrifices will be made.

Jack puts his voice to the test, Tyson gets too close to the flame, and corruption hits close to home.

It’s greed, girls, and good times as the best friends solve the mysteries of the Florida paradise.

"If you like thrilling tropical adventures, you'll love Tyson Wild.”

Scroll up and grab your copy of Wild Hero today!

title: Wild Dynasty: A Coastal Caribbean Adventure (Tyson Wild Thriller Book 69)
description:
A terrible tragedy.

A cold-blooded murder.

An unthinkable betrayal.
When a body part turns up in the tiger cage at the zoo, Tyson and his Navy buddy, JD, must uncover the truth. Did a visitor get too close to the wildlife? Or is something far more heinous at play?

As the investigation unfolds, the deputies reveal a dangerous web of greed, jealousy, and deception. A shocking discovery leads to a despicable truth. One that vicious forces would rather remain hidden. The body count rises, and the duo finds themselves caught in the middle of a deadly feud.

To complicate matters, a billionaire’s dinner party takes a tragic turn when murder is on the menu. Trapped on a small island with a killer, the duo must sort through lies, grievances, and dark family secrets to unmask the murderer. If they’re not careful, this could be their last meal.

Tyson gets dangerous romantic opportunities, JD has a decision to make, and the band has big plans.

It’s murder, mayhem, and madness as the best friends attempt to serve justice and solve the mysteries of the Florida paradise.

"If you like thrilling tropical adventures, you'll love Tyson Wild.”

Scroll up and grab your copy of Wild Dynasty today!

title: Wild Rocket: A Coastal Caribbean Adventure (Tyson Wild Thriller Book 68)
description:
A suspicious death.

A wicked betrayal.

A shocking conspiracy.
Twenty minutes that will change their lives forever.

Disaster strikes when Tyson and his Navy Buddy, JD, are invited on an exclusive suborbital flight. Ushering in a bold new era in space tourism, the launch becomes a publicity nightmare when a rowdy passenger dies mid-flight.

Was this a tragic accident or the first murder in space?

Despite the uncertainties about jurisdiction, the deputies are determined to discover the truth when they hit the ground. As they peel back the layers, the duo finds no shortage of suspects.

Heinous allegations come to light, and the deputies tread on dangerous turf. Sinister forces will stop at nothing to keep this secret hidden, and the deputies may be the next target.

To complicate matters, a gossip columnist is brutally murdered in a posh neighborhood. Fear leads to panic as the socialites demand justice. But a rush to judgment could let a killer go free.

It’s whiskey, women, and wild adventures as the best friends solve the mysteries of the Florida paradise.

"If you like thrilling tropical adventures, you'll love Tyson Wild.”

Scroll up and grab your copy of Wild Rocket today!

title: Treasure in the Keys (Florida Keys Adventure #20)
description:
The prospect of hidden riches can bring out the best… and worst in its seekers. It can drive men mad. It can drive men to kill.

While visiting the hallowed battlefields of Normandy, former Navy SEAL Logan Dodge and his family make an extraordinary discovery. One left behind in the tattered pages of a young soldier’s journal—a cryptic entry by a Key West native, alluding to a clue to a legendary lost treasure that’d long ago faded to the realm of myth.

Excited to return home and embark upon a treasure hunt, the Dodge family arrive in Key West to discover that Logan’s best friend has been beaten nearly to the brink of death. His attacker? His fiancée’s ex-husband, a serial abuser, hot-tempered hedge fund manager who’s fallen into severe misfortune and needs money fast in order to save his skin.

Try as they may, Logan and his family can’t keep their search a secret. The scent of gold is in the air, and sharks are swirling. What begins as a fun summer undertaking quickly turns deadly as professional criminals descend upon the islands to claim the riches for themselves and silence anyone who stands in their way.

The twentieth installment in the bestselling action-adventure series is a pulse-pounding, scuba diving, guns-blazing, treasure hunting adventure in the Florida Keys. Logan will be pushed to his mental and physical limits. But fortune favors the bold.

title: Wild Execution: A Coastal Caribbean Adventure (Tyson Wild Thriller Book 62)
description:
A ruthless killing.A mysterious death.A wicked conspiracy.When a Big Pharma mogul is tortured and killed, Tyson and his Navy buddy, JD, delve into the mystery. Was this a matter of revenge, greed, or something more wicked?

With no shortage of enemies, Tyson and JD have plenty of suspects to choose from. But as they unravel the sordid details, a shocking discovery comes to light.

Did this mogul get what he deserved?

To complicate matters, a petty thief is found dead in a posh hotel room. The simple case turns deadly as the duo uncovers a terrible secret. Sinister forces will stop at nothing to keep the truth hidden, including killing two deputies.

This time, the duo may have bitten off more than they can chew.

Tyson meets a dangerous woman, an assassin is on the loose, and the deputies cross the wrong people.

It’s booze, bikinis, and bedlam as the best friends bring their brand of justice to the Florida paradise.

"If you like thrilling tropical adventures, you'll love Tyson Wild.”

Scroll up and grab your copy of Wild Execution today!>

title: Redeeming the Outlaw (First Families of Flat River #11)
description:
Out of a sense of duty, Esther Billings will marry the man her father selects for her. She prays he is a good man and loves God as much as she does. But when she’s kidnapped, the one man that can help her is the opposite of everything she has dreamed about. Can she step into the darkness to bring this man into the light?

Vowing never to repeat the sins of his father, Whit Hartman has spent a lifetime trying to make up for his own past. Even going undercover to bring an outlaw gang to justice. But when those same outlaws abduct a woman, Whit pretends they are married to keep her safe. Will she play along or put them both in danger? A bigger question is, can Whit keep her safe and do his job without losing his heart?

Read the exciting story of how Whit became a Hartman and the secrets he’s been hiding.

★★ Get lost in this heartwarming story with a touch of humor and faith. ★★

Flat River is a small town filled with the strong men and women that settled the wild west of the Nebraska Plains from 1860 to 1880. It is home to unique characters, strong heroines, swoony heroes, and stories that will stand the test of time. Readers of all ages can read all these wholesome stories filled with family values, romance, humor, and a sprinkle of faith.

title: Armed & Marvelous (Pink Pistol Sisterhood #8 )
description:
A terrible tragedy sends her home to heal. Will his unexpected love convince her to stay? After a devastating loss, wild game hunter Rexanna Brennan returns home to her family's ranch to heal. She never expects to learn her crazy aunt has left her a pink pistol with an even crazier legend. But more unsettling, a Hollywood cowboy has moved onto the ranch, stealing her family's hearts and maybe her legacy, too.

False accusations throw Roan Bertoletti into scandal and yank him out of his movie star life. His reputation shredded, he grasps at the second chance the Brennan family gives him. With his roots firmly planted, he's living his dream to be a cowboy again, and he has no plans to leave the ranch anytime soon.

But Rexanna's grief pulls at him. So does her insistence she can't stay. Can he convince the beautiful heiress to claim what has always been hers? Time is running out, and so are his options.

Except for the pink pistol . . .

title: Dear Mister Silver (Christmas Letters #2)
description:
He can’t create a miracle, but he can give the gift of loveWhen heirloom ornament maker Sam Silver receives Erika Esposito's heartfelt letter, he is deeply moved by her plea for a special ornament for her dying son, Joey. Despite having shut himself off from the world due to his own personal trauma, Sam feels compelled to step out of his shell to help Erika and Joey.

Erika, who has already experienced a profound loss with the unexpected death of her husband, is desperate to bring some joy into Joey's life as he battles cancer. She reaches out to Sam, unaware that her plea will bring not only hope but also the possibility of finding love again.

Rich in Christmas spirit, Dear Mister Silver offers a tender and heartwarming holiday romance. Sam's journey as Ornament Guy, crafting heirloom ornaments as a way to rebuild his life, takes on a whole new meaning as he pours his heart into creating a special ornament for Joey. Through his efforts, Sam not only brings joy to a little boy but also discovers the wonder of opening his heart to love.

Filled with warmth and touching moments, this story reminds readers of the magic that shimmers in acts of kindness, and how love and hope can be the greatest gifts of the holiday season.

title: The Cowboy's Best Friend's Sister (Sweet Water Ranch #4)
description:
*Previously titled Cowboys Don't Have a Fake Marriage with Their Best Friend's Sister*

She’s his best friend’s little sister.

He’s never noticed her. Not like that.

He needs to marry to inherit his money, so he’s hired a woman to be his fake bride. Only he’s too sick to get married.

Now he’s confined in his small house with his fake fiancée-to-be and his best friend’s little sister. The ladies don’t seem to get along.

And one of them isn’t what he thought.

Should he follow the plan, or follow his heart?

title: Challenging the Chef
description:
When an interloper arrives in his kitchen, will romance start to simmer?

Chef Owen Thorpe left behind his celebrity status when he moved to Summer Creek. The quaint town and country atmosphere allow him to seek solace in his recipes. His peace and quiet is threatened when he’s coerced into being part of a big auction package that includes the winner spending a week cooking with him in his restaurant. The last thing he wants is some chef wannabe in his way. However, the real danger he faces is losing his heart when the winner turns out to be a beautiful woman who knows her way around a kitchen.

Burdened by the weight of her demanding career as a school psychologist, Tawni Young turns to cooking and gardening to escape from the never-ending stress of her work. When her aunt gifts her an auction package that includes cooking lessons in the small town of Summer Creek, Tawni realizes the chef she’ll be working with is none other than a celebrity she had a huge crush on during her college years. From the moment the two of them meet, an undeniable attraction sizzles while wits collide.

As they embark on a tantalizing journey of culinary delights, will Tawni and Owen discover the most important ingredient is love? 

In this heartwarming and deliciously wholesome tale, Challenging the Chef takes readers on a savory adventure filled with sweet romance.

title: The Cowboy's Bargain Bride (Sweet Water Ranch, #8)
description:
Can love bloom between a woman who was forced to sell herself and the man who bought her to get her ranch?

*Previously titled Cowboys Don't Buy Their Bride at Auction*

Roxane Peterson is up for auction. Well, her and her ranch. She knew it would be too much to hope for that the man who bought her would be more interested in her than in the property, and money, that came with her. But she’s been down this road before – a marriage that isn’t perfect. Her only concern now is protecting her son and making sure she keeps her independence.

Boone Stryker is disillusioned and restless. Seeing a ranch, and a woman, up for auction challenges his soul and gives him a reason to live again. He risks everything he owns to win the ranch. But in order to win the lady’s heart, he could lose so much more.

Trigger Warning: This book contains sensitive content, not graphic, for anyone who has lost a child. It also contains a "fade to black" scene between an unmarried couple, necessary for the plot.

Books in the Sweet Water Ranch series:

1. The Cowboy's Best Friend
2. The Cowboy's Secret Baby
3. The Cowboy's Beauty
4. The Cowboy's Best Friend's Sister
5. The Cowboy's Convenient Marriage
6. The Cowboy's Fairy Tale
7. The Cowboy's Secret Romance
8. The Cowboy's Bargain Bride
9. The Cowboy's Enemy
10. The Cowboy's Mistletoe Christmas
11. The Cowboy's Marriage Mistake

title: FREE YOURSELF FROM THE GRIP OF ALCOHOL ADDICTION: 10 Simple Steps to Achieve Sobriety, Enhance Mental and Physical Wellbeing, Strengthen Relationships and Overcome Self Doubt
description:
I didn't know how much alcohol affected my life until I saw my life change drastically when I stopped drinking. It's a tricky slope and a downward spiral that can get out of control in the blink of an eye. You may not even think you are addicted to alcohol. 

If these resonate with you, you've come to the right place. Turn the tables now and propel yourself toward a healthier, happier, and addiction-free life.

Introducing an evidence-based approach that can facilitate your journey and set you on the path toward a life of genuine sobriety and mental and physical While this path may seem challenging, the truth is that everyone possesses the strength to overcome this challenge—you're no exception. You've probably been let down by ineffective and unrealistic promises before, but it's essential to realize that this journey is a marathon, not a sprint. Lasting change requires understanding, patience, and consistency - precisely what this book offers.
If you're ready to begin a new life and embark on a rewarding journey to lasting sobriety, scroll up and hit the "Add to Cart" button now! It's time to reclaim the life you truly deserve.

title: Ten Kisses: A Romance (Camp Eden Book 3)
description:
Molly had a casual kissing agreement with Salem. She had never done anything like that before, but Salem was a gorgeous specimen of a man who wasn’t looking for a relationship, so she settled for the occasional meaningless kiss.

There was never any promise of a future with him. They simply shared a casual kiss every now and then when they found themselves alone. She was positive she could continue that relationship with him and not develop any feelings.

She was so very wrong.

title: In The Market For Love: A Wholesome Small Town Romance (Hearts of the West Book 1)
description:
He’s never opened his heart to anyone. She wears her emotions on her sleeve. When romance blooms, will they realize love is what they both need?Ransom Kressley possesses the gift of gab, striking good looks, and a blistering disdain for his family’s Idaho ranch where he resides with his father and identical twin brother. His genuine passion is football, but a knee injury shattered his dreams of an NFL career. After years of channeling his frustration and anger toward those who care about him most, Ransom resolves to change. He accepts a job in Portland as a promotions manager for an arena football team and eagerly steps into his new life. As he makes a fresh start, his past continues to plague him, interfering with his chance to get to know the woman who lingers in his thoughts.

Despite her sunny smile and tender spirit, Kelly Truman isn’t in the market for love or even a relationship when she agrees to have lunch with her best friend’s soon-to-be brother-in-law. Familiar only with Ransom Kressley’s notorious reputation, Kelly is determined to keep her guard up around him. However, Ransom proves to be nothing like she expected. Soon, she realizes she cherishes time spent with the man, but fears trusting him with her heart.

When their friendship evolves into something more, will Ransom’s charm and silver tongue split them apart or bind them together?

A sweet romance full of warmth and humor, In the Market for Love is a story of hope, forgiveness, and redemption.

title: Lethal Lines (Eden Mercer K-9 Mystery Thriller #3)
description:
For fans of gripping thrillers and intense police procedurals comes a chilling tale that will keep you on the edge of your seat.Eden Mercer, a determined young officer in Nightfall, Oregon, is making strides to overcome her traumatic past in a fundamentalist cult. With her loyal K-9 partner, Shadow, at her side, she's ready to tackle any challenge.

When a local journalist goes missing after attending a writers' conference, Eden is thrust into a twisted web of deceit and danger. The journalist had been investigating rumors of crimes committed by the conference organizers. As Eden delves deeper, she uncovers disturbing connections between the missing woman and the literary world, leading her down a path darker than she could have imagined.

The case takes a sinister turn when Eden discovers a pattern of secrets and lies spanning years. Each revelation brings her closer to a horrifying truth hidden in a remote cabin. As the stakes escalate and the clues point back to Eden’s own haunted past, she realizes that solving this case means confronting her deepest fears. Failure could mean more lives lost and the continuation of a violent cycle that hits too close to home.

With time running out, Eden must navigate a labyrinth of deception, literary intrigue, and lethal obsession to save the latest victim and stop a killer.

Dive into "Lethal Lines" and lose yourself in a pulse-pounding story that will leave you questioning the power of words.

title: Cops and Clobbers in Deadwood (Deadwood, #14)
description:
Violet Parker has big troubles these days—the ticking kind. To duck the Grim Reaper, she needs to get her hands on eighty-plus rare, mystical clocks locked up tight by a thick-headed detective.

The solution? Hijack the truckload of ticking time bombs out from under Johnny Law’s nose.

But no caper ever goes according to plan. What starts out as a game of clocks and robbers twists and turns into a chaos of cops and clobbers.

Will Violet beat the detective in time? Or will she spend Valentine’s Day behind bars?

title: Unwed and Amish
description:
Shunned by family. Betrayed by love. Now, she faces the hardest road alone.

Leaving her Amish life behind, she embraced the city, the lights, and a love that promised her the world. But promises break. Now, abandoned and carrying a child, she has nowhere to go but home—only home isn’t the refuge she hoped for.

Shunned by her family and left to fend for herself, Emma must find a way forward, even as doubt and fear threaten to pull her under. Alone in a world she no longer belongs to, she faces choices she never imagined.

Then Oliver Fischer steps back into her life.

Once the boy she thought she’d marry, now a man with burdens of his own, Oliver has every reason to keep his distance. But fate—and secrets from the past—have other plans.

As Emma struggles to rebuild her life, will she cling to the pain of what was lost—or open her heart to the possibility of redemption?

A poignant tale of love, sacrifice, and second chances, Unwed and Amish is an unforgettable journey of faith and resilience. A clean and wholesome Amish romance from Mary Lantz.

title: One Chill Millionaire 4: Lyle
description:
When Tiffany receives a note saying that her most kept secret is out, she wonders who could possibly know about her affair with Lyle? Meanwhile, Lyle is juggling the expansion of his business while on the relentless pursuit of the woman he can't live without. Brees and Quest are both juggling new relationships, while wrestling with the demons of the past determined to ruin their new lives. Will the cycle of drama end with Tiffany and Lyle, or will their secret affair start a domino effect of even more drama to come in the near future.

One Chill Millionaire 4: Lyle

title: The Virgin BBW and a Self Made Millionaire (A Virgin BBW and a Self Made Millionaire Book 1)
description:
Who would've ever thought Serenity Huxley would make it to graduation day?

Raised in the projects by an aunt who ain’t never let her forget she wasn’t wanted, and a mama branded crazy and tossed away like trash, Serenity’s life has been one long fight for peace. Thick, smart, and guarded with a heart full of bruises, she just wanted to walk that stage, collect her diploma, and disappear into something better.

But peace don’t come easy in the hood.

Not with a secret relationship with Bryson—the local baseball celebrity with wandering eyes and a cheating heart. 'Cause with friends like Jaliyah who needs enemies. And with unpredictable drama poppin’ off at any given time, there’s no time to relax.

Serenity’s world starts unraveling fast—and just when it feels like she can’t take any more, she crashes into Zayden Banks. Literally… He’s quiet. Dangerous. A self-made millionaire with a felony past and a heart wrapped in scars. He sees something in Serenity she forgot existed… Her worth. But love can be a battlefield that neither wants to fight.

As secrets explode, betrayals cut deep, and blood spills in the streets, Serenity discovers that her entire life is built on lies. From her aunt’s twisted control to her mother’s dirty secrets… and a shocking revelation that changes everything. Now, someone from her past is coming to collect. And the final scene is pure war, but will Serenity come out unscathed?

title: Whisper in the Dark (Familiar Kitten Mysteries #33; Mysteries of Meri)
description:
No. Just no... Not another one. - Meri
Full blurb coming soon!

title: Signed SEAL'd and Delivered (SEAL #3)
description:
Navy SEAL Mike Saunders and his canine sidekick return in the third and final installment of the SEAL series. When a cartel kingpin seeks revenge it’s their team leader, Chief TJ Lines, who’s forced to overcome heartbreak and save the loyal hound Axe from a fate worse than death. 
 
Signed SEAL’d and Delivered is light-hearted action meets romance with a touch of subterfuge. It is dedicated to the Military Working Dogs who have served, loyal and steadfast, alongside their handlers in the world’s deadliest conflict zones. A percentage of the sale of this book will be donated to a foundation that trains dogs to help servicemen and women who suffer from post-traumatic stress disorder. 
 
Jack Silkstone's background includes a career in military intelligence and special operations, working alongside some of the world's most elite units. It’s this unique background that has allowed him to create both the SEAL and PRIMAL series.

title: Mischief and Merlot (Familiar Kitten Mysteries #31; Mysteries of Meri)
description:
Kinsley Wilson has enough on her a donut shop to run, two daughters to raise, and magical powers she can barely control. (The exploding toaster incident was THREE WEEKS ago, thank you very much.)

Plus, she's got Meri... a black cat familiar whose sarcasm could curdle milk, and Bonkers, an orange furball who considers reorganizing the pantry by "chromatic aromatic system" to be his sacred duty. Between Meri's cutting commentary and Bonkers' catastrophic enthusiasm, Kinsley's magical household barely needs actual spells to create chaos.

So when her mother drags her to a wine tasting at Elderwood Family Vineyard, Kinsley is just hoping to enjoy some fermented grape juice without accidentally levitating the glassware.

Instead, she gets murder.

When a notoriously harsh wine critic is found dead in the barrel room, Kinsley's empathic abilities sense something beyond ordinary malice at play. The vineyard itself seems to pulse with secrets. It's got archaic magical lineages, mysterious soil, and a hidden project someone would kill to protect.

Now Kinsley must work alongside her sheriff husband to solve the case before the killer uncorks another deadly vintage. And she's got to do it all while keeping Bonkers from declaring himself "OFFICIAL DETECTIVE FAMILIAR" and Meri from solving the case through the sheer power of withering disdain.

Some wines improve with age. Some secrets ferment into murder. Some familiars should never be left unsupervised.

title: Burke (The Haven #2)
description:
Welcome to an exciting new series by USA Today Bestselling Author Dale Mayer. The Haven is a sanctuary for both animals and humans in need. Step into Timber's world, a beloved character from the popular K9 Files series, where cherished animals receive the care they deserve, and friends find a helping hand.

This series blends romance, suspense, and has a deep focus on character development. Follow these men as they stand at the crossroads of a new life, using their time at The Haven to discover their paths and the companions who will join them.

title: Love's Promise (Amish Seeds of Faith Book 3)
description:
Her quiet life was a fortress against heartache. His was a prison of grief. But some walls are meant to be broken.

Four years after her brave testimony against Aaron Miller left her feeling isolated, Mary Yoder has built a safe, quiet life of service. She expects nothing more. Across the district, widower Isaac Hostetter battles his own private demons, rebuilding a farm neglected by grief and haunted by the tragic buggy accident that took his wife—an accident he blames himself for.

When a visiting English historian asks for their help in uncovering a secret that binds their founding families, Mary and Isaac are thrown together. In the dusty pages of old records, they discover a history of forbidden love and painful sacrifice that echoes their own unspoken fears. As they work side-by-side, an undeniable connection forms between two lonely souls who understand each other's pain without a word.

But just as a fragile hope begins to bloom, the ghost of Isaac's past rises to threaten their future. He is a man who believes love leads only to loss, and he will protect Mary from that pain, even if it means breaking her heart. Can Mary find the courage to show a broken man he is worthy of forgiveness? And can Isaac learn that the greatest promise isn't to a memory, but to the second chance at love standing right in front of him?

From author Emma Maas comes the next heartwarming Amish Romance in the beloved Seeds of Faith series. Love's Promise is a touching story of second chances and the quiet courage it takes to heal a broken heart. Continue the journey today!

title: Healing Hearts (Amish Seeds of Faith Book 4)
description:
Some wounds are invisible. And those are the hardest to heal.

In the final book of the Amish Seeds of Faith series, a community's survival and a man's broken spirit both depend on one woman's faith in the healing power of shared courage.

Sarah Lapp has come into her own as her community's trusted healer, but her skills are put to the ultimate test when Daniel Beiler returns from the English world. He is not the boy who left, but a man haunted by the suffering he witnessed in a veterans' hospital, his spirit wounded in ways no herbal tonic can mend.

As Sarah is drawn to Daniel’s quiet pain, a new crisis threatens to fracture their community. A legal loophole gives English developers a claim on an ancestral farm, bringing the threat of worldly courts and lawyers to their peaceful way of life . The elders preach a return to strict tradition, seeing Daniel's trauma as a dangerous English contamination . Their judgment causes Daniel to push Sarah away, determined to protect her from his own brokenness.

Now, Sarah must prove what she knows in her healer's the deepest wounds are not a source of shame, but a source of strength. She believes the very experiences that shattered Daniel are what have given him the unique wisdom to heal their divided community. Can she help him see the purpose in his pain before he retreats into darkness for good? And can a man who believes his past makes him a threat find the courage to become the very leader his people need?

Don't miss Healing Hearts, the sweeping and emotional finale to the beloved Amish Seeds of Faith series.

title: The Invisible People: The Past, Present, and Maybe No Future of Christians in the Middle East
authors: HRH Prince Gharios El Chemor of Ghassan Al-Numan VIII

title: Shame Wears My Name
description:
Some stories begin in silence. Not peace , but the kind of silence that hides in corners and teaches people to stop asking questions.

Shame Wears My Name
 is a slow-burning psychological novel set in the fragile spaces of childhood and memory , a haunting meditation on what we carry, what we conceal, and how we learn to perform just to survive.

What begins as the quiet tale of a withdrawn boy soon morphs into something far more 

A portrait of homes where words are withheld,

Rooms that remember,

And a child’s search for meaning in a world that forgot to ask.

This is not a book about loud traumas.
It’s about the ones that never had a name.
The ones that pass down silently ,
through glances, gestures, absences.

🖤 A boy who reads to feel seen
🖤 A house too full of warmth that arrives too quickly
🖤 A silence that doesn’t vanish , it mutates
🖤 A self that watches, performs, learns

This novel is not loud.
It waits.
And once you step inside, it doesn’t let go.

title: Work Smart, Win Big!: From Overwhelmed - In Control - Thriving
description:
Work Smart, Win Big! is your step-by-step system to break free from
 burnout, align your focus, and make consistent progress — without
 working harder.
 Whether you’re a student finding your path, a professional stuck in the
 grind, or a manager eyeing the next level, this playbook gives you the
 tools to move forward with purpose.
 You’ll learn how 
 ✔ Define your personal North Star
 ✔ Turn goals into daily momentum
 ✔ Master focus, realign weekly, and adapt with confidence
 This isn’t a textbook. It’s a practical system for real-life impact — no fluff,
 no filler, and no wasted time. Just clear strategies that actually work.

title: Loneliness: A Matter of Choice: How Our Choices Make Us Lonely
description:
Today, nearly one in three adults around the globe admits to feeling profoundly lonely. It’s not just a passing emotion—it’s now becoming a public health concern. ‘ A Matter of Choice’ explores the truth behind the growing epidemic of loneliness. It asks a simple yet uncomfortable In a world more connected than ever, where messages travel in seconds and social platforms claim to bring us together, why do so many of us still feel so alone? 

We often blame technology for stealing away real human connection. But that’s only part of the story. Loneliness is also the result of choices we make, both as individuals and as a society. It is not a problem with a quick fix, nor does it have a one-size-fits-all solution. But by making intentional choices, we can shape a future where loneliness isn’t the default setting.

title: Divine Encounters
description: Wonder captured my eyes. Colors so bright and beautiful appeared out of nowhere. Walking toward me with arms extended, was the most loving, kindest man I had ever seen. With a sparkle in His eyes and a broad smile on His lips, He invited me to come for a walk with Him. Immediately I followed, leaving those gathered around me. Donna Rigney’s exceptionally vivid and unforgettable book showcases her unique relationship with Jesus through a host of heavenly experiences. At the tender age of seven, her divine encounters with Jesus later lead her into a perceptive spiritual relationship, propelling her to fulfill her passion for Christ. Jesus guides her into the depths of hell and the peaks of heaven through intensely detailed visions. Donna’s exceptionally vivid portrayals of the excruciating screams of tormented sinners and the moving testimonials of spiritually pure heavenly inhabitants create an unforgettable read. “Yes, you have walked the corridors of heaven, the trenches of hell and saw the glories and riches I have prepared for those who love and serve Me, along with the horrors and cruelty the enemy has stored up for those who serve him. Spiteful and filled with malice are the benefits the evil one has prepared as a reward for his followers. If My children knew the truth, very few would freely choose to follow Satan, or embrace his sinful ways.”Donna Rigney’s memorable spiritual journey balances visions of heaven and hell with compelling messages of faith and forgiveness. Donna eloquently expresses the words of Jesus, giving you the tools to forgive and overcome your most painful of wounds. Your faith will be broadened as you pray for peace and place your pains in the palms of Jesus; you will overcome temptation as you recall valuable biblical references and timeless biblical prophecies. You will overcome being chained by sin, temptation, anger, wrath, fear, bitterness and spiritual emptiness; you will win the battle against Satan’s influence.

title: Cowboy Rescuing Me (Coming Home to North Dakota, #6)
description:
Could the matchmakers be wrong?

Sadie Powers has crushed on her brother’s best friend for years, but when the Piece Makers, Sweet Water’s own quilting and matchmaking group, ask her to help them match him up with the new single mom in town, she just wants the man she’s loved for years to be happy, even if that’s with someone else.

When rancher and livestock auction owner, Colman Baldwin is asked to giving riding lessons to the son of the new single mom in town, he doesn’t hesitate to make time in his schedule to help out. That’s what small towns are for. He doesn’t realize he’s being set up. Maybe that’s why he’s falling for the wrong woman.

Soon, everyone in Sweet Water has a finger in the pie and everyone is holding their breath to see if the Piece Makers will have another successful match, of if a dark horse will ride in and steal the potential groom away.

Visit Sweet Water, North Dakota where faith, fun and loads of laughter and sweet romance brim over in every story.

Books in the Coming Home to North Dakota Series:

Cowboy Walking Away
Cowboy Coming Home
Cowboy Stealing My Heart
Cowboy Finding Love
Cowboy Dreaming Alone
Cowboy Rescuing Me
Cowboy Dancing All Night
Cowboy Falling Hard
Cowboy Looking at Me
Cowboy Wanting Everything
Cowboy Whispering My Name
Cowboy Marrying the Lady

title: Makai (Berkeley Bred Book 3)
description:
Go tell that nigga you fucking the boss now. 

A menace
, I was, the duration of my life. Unsure of what was next, who was next, or where I was headed next. The only for-sure shit in my world was my paper and my people. The ice around my heart was still intact, never being penetrated or as much as tapped.

Amazed
, I was, the day I encountered you. The perfect analogy for your government, you were cold, Mommas. The impression you left on me heated me to the core, thawing the ice around that red vessel, awakening it from hibernation.

A man on a mission
, I became the minute I decided that it was you I wanted to myself, promising to never share you with anyone else. The way you came into my world and brought all your beauty with you gave me little room for error. You made me want to be better. You made me want to be the nigga that woke up each day just to love you, again. You made me want to choose you over and over and over. And, I did.

A mess
, I was discovering the world that we created with one another had been infiltrated. Discovering I was no longer invincible and you were touchable flipped a switch so deep in my dome that I didn’t think it was reachable. In the midst of it all, a tear formed, disrupting our bond. Mommas, I’ll spend the rest of my days repairing it –but only after the threat has been neutralized.

title: Backlash (Nate Reigns #2)
description:
When the law breaks the law, the consequences can be deadly!!!

Detective Nate Reigns and Federal Prosecutor Attorney, Skylar Burrell find themselves in a conundrum. Nate discovers the murder of his friend, prosecutor Alex Burnette, is connected to something larger than a simple murder. With Skylar’s help, he discovers a connection to the deaths of several prosecutors from other jurisdictions.

Nate and Skylar uncover proof that an organization, P.I.E, is responsible for a variety of deaths. P.I.E.’s evil agenda has national implications. They must be stopped; however, the P.I.E organization is more powerful than anticipated. The organization have infiltrated the police department, the Commonwealth Attorney’s office, and the local judicial system. To make matters worse, Nate discovers, their reach extends to the United States Congress.
It is up to Nate to expose and prove their evil intent. But the question is...to who?

Not knowing who to trust, Nate and his small circle of associates try to determine who is friend and who is foe , while fighting to stop the P.I.E. organization from pushing their agenda forward. The riveting response from top-ranking political figures has Nate and his associates, running from their lives. With no public support from the top brass in the police department, Nate, alone has to deal with the Backlash .

title: Rugger: The Huntress (The Grey List Book 3)
description:
I do not want flowers …

I do not want cards…

I do not want sweet nothings…

I do not want companionship…

I want pistols…

I want rifles…

I want silencers…

And, I want targets…

Preferably human, contracted, and with skeletons falling out of their closets. My thirst for blood began as a young girl. Dollhouses and little toy families didn’t appeal to me. It was 
my father’s arsenal
. The sound of gunfire. The cold steel of a barrel. And, the idea that one shot could end life as quickly as it had begun. 

My father had cursed me before I left the womb. Ruger–after his favorite gun, he’d tried naming me. But, my mother had other plans. He foresaw a future for me drawn with gunpowder, interchangeable like custom grips, self-sufficient like automatics, and lethal like switches. 

I’d given my heart and soul to the soil before I stepped off the porch and conquered my first kill. I didn’t need them and wouldn’t return for them as long as I was above ground. They were in the graveyard, where everything went to decompose after their death… never to be seen again.

Until him.

Winning the heart of a heartless girl was deemed an impossible task. But, unbeknownst to me, Psalms ‘Sonnie’ Santoro was willing to 
visit the depths of the soil
 to retrieve that particular piece of me that I’d left to rot.

He was boundless.

He was relentless.

He was brutal.

He was cold.

A hunter by nature.

And I was, in fact, being hunted.

title: 7 Decrees for 7 Days
description: As easy as it is to set a seed in the ground, it is that easy to decree God’s truth into the spirit. This little book offers seven Scripture-based daily decrees that represent seven areas of your Devotion to God, Wisdom, Blessing, Favor, Protection, Health, and Financial Provision. There are new decrees for each of these areas every day. Decree these “7 decrees,” in bold faith and focus; it will take you less than two minutes. Anyone can invest that amount of time and because it is so easy and demands so little, you can make these decrees a number of times throughout your day. Every time you make a decree you are planting more seed and every seed grants you a harvest. Very little effort gives you the most amazing results and keeps you focused on the Lord and your position as His child each day.

title: The Soul of Korean Architecture
description:
In this book, the reader is taken on a journey through centuries of tradition, innovation, and cultural significance. From the ancient hanok houses to the modern skyscrapers that now dot the skyline, the impact of Korean architecture on society and culture is undeniable. Drawing on influences from Confucianism, Buddhism, and Chinese architecture, this book delves deep into the roots of Korean design principles and techniques. 
 
With a keen eye on the future, the discussion extends to the preservation and restoration efforts of Korean architectural treasures, as well as the evolving trends and innovations shaping the landscape of modern Korean architecture. Through the expertly crafted narrative, readers are invited to explore the rich cultural and symbolic meanings embedded in every architectural detail, from the use of color and materials to the intricate motifs and decorations that adorn Korean structures. 
 
As we reflect on the profound significance of Korean architecture, this book serves as a vital resource for those seeking a deeper understanding of the past, present, and future of this timeless art form. A must-read for architecture enthusiasts, cultural scholars, and anyone interested in the transformative power of design.

title: الحدود و الانضباط عند الأطفال
description:
إن أعظم هدية يمكن أن نقدمها لأطفالنا في عالم يسوده الفوضى و عدم اليقين، هي القوة العقلية، يمكن لهذا الكتاب أن يكون دليلاً للآباء، و يساعدهم على التغلب على تحديات تربية أطفال مرنين و منضبطين و أذكياء عاطفياً.
في صفحاته، نصائح حول القيادة بالقدوة، و تعزيز التواصل المفتوح، و وضع حدود واضحة، سوف تتعلم كيفية تطوير مهارات حل المشكلات، و تشجيع الاستقلال، و الامتنان، فيما يؤكد الكتاب أيضاً على تأثير الصحة البدنية على الثبات العقلي و أهمية الدعم الثابت.
و مع ظهور التحديات و الانتكاسات، سيقدم هذا الكتاب استراتيجيات و رؤى خاصة بالعمر للتنقل في العصر الرقمي، و دروساً و نصائح عملية، تعزز قدرتك على تشكيل حياة طفلك.

انطلق في هذه الرحلة و اكتشف قوة غرس القوة العقلية في أطفالك، لتزودهم بالأدوات اللازمة للتغلب على تحديات الحياة، و بناء اتصالات ذات معنى، و في نهاية المطاف، العثور على طريقهم الحقيقي.

title: الذكاء الاصطناعي والمعلومات المضللة
description:
في العصر الرقمي، تنتشر المعلومات الخاطئة والمضللة بمعدل ينذر بالخطر عبر وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي والمنصات عبر الإنترنت. ومع تقدم الذكاء الاصطناعي والنماذج التوليدية، أصبح لدى الجهات الفاعلة السيئة الآن أدوات جديدة قوية للخداع والتلاعب على نطاق غير مسبوق.

يبحث هذا الكتاب في كيفية قيام الذكاء الاصطناعي بإنشاء محتوى مضلل وتغذية انتشار الأخبار المزيفة و من من خلال التحليل المتعمق ودراسات الحالة، يوضح حجم وتعقيد المعلومات الخاطئة الناتجة عن الذكاء الاصطناعي أثناء استكشاف تقنيات مثل التزييف العميق.

يقيم الكتاب الجهود المستمرة لاكتشاف المعلومات الخاطئة الناتجة عن الذكاء الاصطناعي والتخفيف منها، و يقدم تقييماً النماذج التحليلية للتحقق من الحقائق وتحليل المصدر، إلى جانب طرق التحقق الأخرى.

يسلط هذا العمل الضوء على التهديدات التي تشكلها المعلومات الخاطئة المضخمة بواسطة الذكاء الاصطناعي مع تقديم حلول لبناء تكنولوجيا عامة أفضل استنارةً وأكثر عرضةً للمساءلة. قراءة أساسية لأي شخص مهتم بدور التكنولوجيا في تشكيل واقعنا المشترك.

title: دمشق تاريخ معطر بالياسمين
description:
منذ فجر الحضارة، تجمعت البشرية في المدن، لكن مدينةً واحدةً وقفت متحديةً مسيرة الزمن نفسه، لقد ظلت دمشق لآلاف السنين، شعلةً تنتقل من أيدي الغزاة و الأباطرة إلى العصر الحديث.

لماذا لا تزال هذه العاصمة القديمة مشتعلةً بهذه السطوع بينما تقبع مدنٌ قديمةٌ أخرى مدفونةً تحت طبقات الزمن؟ ما الذي حافظ على شعلتها خلال صعود و سقوط الإمبراطوريات؟ الجواب يكمن في مكاناتها الجغرافية و في الروح الإنسانية التي لا تقهر.

 تعكس هذه القصة النضالات التي صاغها أسلافنا من أجل البناء و الإيمان و الصمود، إنها رحلةٌ عبر تاريخ البشرية، للكشف عن الحقائق الأبدية المنسوجة في روح أقدم العواصم الباقية على وجه الأرض.

 يحاول هذا الكتاب استكشاف تاريخ دمشق، لكنه ليس القصة الكاملة، فالقصة لم تنته بعد.

title: Seven Hindrances to Healing
description: This minibook discusses seven principal hindrances that keep people from receiving healing.

title: Rover (Tracking Jane, #2)
description:
Jane and her dogs are home, but the war followed them here...

A suicide bombing in Denver International airport returns Jane McMurtry to the sort of tracking she’d left back in Afghanistan and Iraq – the kind that comes with large explosions, torn body parts, and few answers. The war has come home, or maybe it’s always lurked here, inside her mind and soul.

Partnering again with Dan Murphy, now a member of a Federal task force, Jane will continue to grapple with how to make sense of her life and how to move on beyond her physical and psychological wounds. A small airport bomb-sniffing dog, Rover, will come alongside her to become an unlikely partner to find a terrorist network before they hit their ultimate target and diffuse the anguish that roils within her.

title: Sean (Hope City, #2)
description:
Arson Detective Sean McBride was entrenched in the ongoing investigation of a serial arsonist.

Harper Walsh, an insurance company fire investigator, was doing the same thing.

When she landed at his feet, breaking her wrist, he had more on his mind than just finding the elusive fire-starter. Picking her out of the ashes was easy. Needing to work with her…not so much.

Finding a woman who understood the demands of his job quickly had their partnership grow into love. He even introduced her to his large, crazy, but loveable family. But the arsonist was not as hidden as they suspected, and Harper gets too close to danger before Sean has a chance to smoke him out.

Will Sean be able to save Harper before the arsonist goes up in flames, taking her with him?

Scenes and language similar to what you would find in an R-rated movie. 18+ readers only.

Hope City... one city... countless stories.

title: Cozy Witch Mysteries: Special Edition (Wisteria Witches #1-8)
description:
Fall in love with the Riddle family, a trio of witches with their own unique talents.

A small town with big secrets. A neighbor who bites. Plus a house with a mind of its own. Welcome to Wisteria. If you love un-put-downable mysteries with gripping twists, enchanting characters, and a big dose of humor, download this fantastic bundle today and see what the excitement is all about.

title: Final Fury (Federal Bureau of Magic, #14)
description:
Welcome to Chipping Cheddar where supernaturals are hidden in plain sight.

I foolishly believed this day would never come, that life in charming Chipping Cheddar would always be pleasant and somewhat predictable—but all good things must come to an end.

And it seems the dormant portal is no exception.

Find out how it ends for Agent Eden Fury and her loved ones in Final Fury, the 14th and final book in the Federal Bureau of Magic series.

title: Mint Condition (The Bloomin' Psychic, #6)
description:
Once upon a time, Mia Thorne loved birthdays. Then she turned forty and the urge to celebrate ceased. Now that she’s reinvented herself in Newberry, she thinks it might be time to dust off the candles again. Unfortunately, a dead body and a stolen coin disrupt her festive plans.

Can Mia solve the case in time to celebrate another trip around the sun or will her efforts be eclipsed by a killer?

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Tor & Eshe Yoruba
description:
Prince Tor Yoruba comes from a wealthy family in Nigeria, but he’s determined to secure his own wealth as a real estate developer. His greatest achievement for his family was building The Galleria in Winter Crest with the Crest family’s approval, of course. His many achievements doesn’t keep his family out of his personal life, however. Everything goes left when whispers of him with another woman float around Winter Crest and spread like wildfire. Are the rumors true? Would Tor really step out on his best friend of five years turned wife for a random from The Cove?

Eshe Yoruba is not only ambitious and beautiful, but her real estate company has brought her more than she could ever imagine—her husband, Tor. They not only complement one another, but they’re in sync. Not only in life, but in business as well. Tor doesn’t play when it comes to Eshe, but her curiosity may just get the best of her for Christmas when she notices she has feelings for someone else.

Will the Yoruba’s marriage survive Christmas or is new love on the horizon for both? This is one book you don’t want to judge by the cover because everything is not what it seems.

Welcome to The Galleria of Winter Crest!

title: The One Who Promised Forever (Second Chance Fire Station #3)
description:
Can they find a new spark in the ashes of a broken marriage?

I knew we had our issues–what couple doesn’t? But, I thought we were happy.
I thought he was happy.

I stay at home, caring for our three kids under eight years old while he is a firefighter in town. By the time he gets home, I'm drained physically and emotionally. Not that it matters, we barely talk anymore.

Despite telling myself it was normal for this phase of life, Nathan packed his bag and walked out three weeks ago. Sure, he’s still paying the bills and spending time with the kids. He even lives five minutes away. But our marriage? He says he can’t do it anymore.

When we said our vows nine years ago, I never imagined a future like this.

Do I believe God can redeem our marriage? Honestly, I’m not sure right now. I'm still praying He does. I might be hurting, but I still want my happy ending. Nathan was The One Who Promised Forever, and the man I married always kept his promises.

The One Who Promised Forever is a romance of forgiveness, relationship growth, and the everyday hardship of life together. There is no infidelity in the story.

Visit Second Chance Fire Station and discover the small town stories of faith, friendships, and forever happy endings that Tara Grace Ericson is known for.

title: Warm Waves at the Beach House (Diamond Beach, #6)
description:
Feel Good Beachy Women's Fiction

All she wanted was one last summer at the beach house...

When the unthinkable happens and Claire Thompson’s husband dies suddenly, she’s left wondering how to go on. Being a wife and mother is all she’s ever known. Grieving and lost, she decides to take her family for one last trip to their beach house before she’s forced to put it up for sale. The house is filled with happy memories, and it seems like a great way to remember Bryan.

But as she soon finds out, Bryan was harboring some complicated secrets. The kind that will change the lives of Claire and her daughter. And those secrets come to light while Claire is at the beach house, shattering her memories and making her realize she never really knew her husband.

How does she move forward with these new revelations? How will her daughter cope? What will become of them now that they know Bryan wasn’t the man they thought he was?

Claire can only pray things work out for them during their last summer at the beach house.

title: The Florist on Amelia Island (Seven Sisters Book 4)
description: A feel-good family drama full of twists, turns, and true love.The scent of flowers and change is in the air for the Wingate sisters. With her husband gone for weeks at a stretch, Rose’s unwavering enthusiasm is tested, forcing her to remove her famous rose-colored glasses and face a family crisis. While Susannah plans an anniversary surprise for Rex, Chloe finds the courage to try one more career path, with help coming from the one constant in her life, her precious furbaby, Lady Bug.Raina's life is in a state of constant change, too, as she cruises into her third trimester. She finds closure and comfort in her new beachfront home, but there’s one big complication…a roommate who isn’t at all the man she thought he was.When the clouds roll over Amelia Island, the Wingate women learn over and over again that the bond between seven sisters is as strong as steel, as gentle as an ocean breeze, and as lasting as their family legacy.The Seven Sisters SeriesAll born to the same father by two different mothers, the seven Wingate sisters are each unique and unforgettable—from the wedding dressmaker who’s never married...to the fixer facing impossible problems...down to the youngest trying to avoid the biggest mistake of her life. But they all share inner strength, abiding love, a few quirky traits, and the ability to support each other through every challenge. This family is founded on love and laughter and a sisterhood unlike any other.The Seven Sisters series, set on Florida’s gorgeous and historic Amelia Island, will consist of seven books with recurring characters, continuing stories, heartbreaking and hopeful moments, later-in-life romance, a touch of mystery, and lots of happy tears.All of the books will be available in digital, paperback, and audio formats.The Beach House on Amelia Island (book 1)The Café on Amelia Island (book 2)The Bookstore on Amelia Island (book 3)The Florist on Amelia Island (book 4)The Chocolate Shop on Amelia Island (book 5)The Dressmaker on Amelia Island (book 6)The Inn on Amelia Island (book 7)

title: Blue Skies at the Beach House: Feel Good Beachy Women's Fiction (Diamond Beach, #5))
description:
All she wanted was one last summer at the beach house...

When the unthinkable happens and Claire Thompson’s husband dies suddenly, she’s left wondering how to go on. Being a wife and mother is all she’s ever known. Grieving and lost, she decides to take her family for one last trip to their beach house before she’s forced to put it up for sale. The house is filled with happy memories, and it seems like a great way to remember Bryan.

But as she soon finds out, Bryan was harboring some complicated secrets. The kind that will change the lives of Claire and her daughter. And those secrets come to light while Claire is at the beach house, shattering her memories and making her realize she never really knew her husband.

How does she move forward with these new revelations? How will her daughter cope? What will become of them now that they know Bryan wasn’t the man they thought he was?

Claire can only pray things work out for them during their last summer at the beach house.

title: The Healing of a Caregiver: The Road to Acceptance and Recovery From the Loss of a Loved One
description: Recovering from the loss of a loved one, especially if you were the caregiver, is a roller coaster of emotions, physical challenges, and loneliness.In September 2011, Patrick received the devastating news from a neurosurgeon that his wife had been diagnosed with Stage IV brain cancer and this heart-wrenching revelation shook his world to its core. Faced with the daunting task of caring for his wife and lacking guidance, he embarked on a journey to become a caregiver, learning the ropes along the way.Understanding the things that will lead to your healing and recovery is crucial to your emotional healing. Included in this book are actionable steps to help in the process. Patrick lived the life of a caregiver for over six years and has compiled what he learned into his books to help others on a similar journey. What he has learned will assist you and your family to comprehend the complex issues associated with grief and recovery.Patricks’s books are meant to be a voice of reason for this challenging road, offering lessons and fellowship with others in the same boat. In this book, he delves into the critical importance of caregivers prioritizing their well-being, offering invaluable insights on maintaining balance and emotional resilience.These books are not just handbooks. They are a lifeline for people forced to be caregivers and show them how to deal with the challenges and emotional intricacies in a caregiving environment. Caregivers, your well-being matters. Patrick Palmer shares a wealth of wisdom on how to prioritize self-care while navigating the challenging terrain of grief. Remember, you can't pour from an empty cup. When caring for a loved one, it’s important to take care of our mental health too and not operate with a traumatic brain. In the pages of Patrick Palmer's book, the message that "self-care is not selfish" resonates deeply.Emotional "The Healing of a Caregiver" is not just a book; it's a compassionate guide to the intricate process of recovery after loss. Patrick Palmer's heartfelt story will touch your soul, reminding you that healing is possible, even in the face of profound sorrow. Dive into the profound journey of recovery and self-discovery for caregivers who've lost their loved ones.Healing of a Let's embark on a transformative journey towards acceptance after loss. Patrick Palmer's invaluable insights serve as a guiding light, offering hope and solace to those who are grieving. Grief is a deeply personal journey, and there's no right or wrong way to navigate it. Patrick Palmer's book encourages you to embrace your unique path to healing, reminding you that it's okay to grieve on your own terms and at your own pace.Caring for aging Caring for aging parents can be emotionally overwhelming. In "The Healing of a Caregiver," Patrick Palmer offers compassionate guidance, helping you navigate this delicate period with understanding and resilience. Whether you're a seasoned caregiver or new to this role, this book equips you with the knowledge and tools you need to provide the best care possible.Motivational & "The Healing of a Caregiver" by Patrick Palmer is a testament to the human spirit's resilience. This book illustrates that even in the face of profound loss, there's an opportunity to rediscover life's beauty and meaning and embark on the path to new beginnings. Patrick Palmer shares his inspiring journey of discovering new passions and interests after the loss of his loved one.

title: Seaside Cowboy's Marriage of Convenience (Seaside Cowboys #3)
description:
A lonely reclusive heiress, a friendly veterinarian, an act of desperation… Can people so different fill the empty parts of each other’s lives? 

Poor rich girl Kennedy Crawford still blames herself for her cousin disappearing when they were children. When her loving uncle who practically raised her wants to see her married in his lifetime, she turns to Austin Lawrence, the trustworthy, reliable, town veterinarian with a golden retriever personality (and a brand new puppy to match), offering a fake engagement. But a long-hidden secret between their parents’ could tear them apart. Austin’s had a crush on the sad, reclusive heiress for years, but the difference in their social status stopped him from approaching her. He’s not one to pretend, but how can he refuse to help her now? What will happen to their growing feelings for each other when a new clue that Kennedy’s cousin might still be alive takes Austin and Kennedy on a dangerous journey neither one of them expected?
