Welcome to Port Sunshine, a small coastal town where a family of cowboy brothers discover the treasures of love and uncover the mysteries of their pasts!

title: Otis: Diary of a Baby Zombie Pigman, Complete Edition (Baby Zombie Pigman #1-3)
description:
Otis is justly famous as the baby zombie pigman who assisted Baby Zeke in his amazing adventures and battles with Herobrine.

But, do you know about his early days? About the tragedies that befell him?

Read this complete collection of diaries written by Otis to learn how he spawned, lost his friends to tragedy, wandered alone, and then received the training that allowed him to become the dominant force he is today!

This book is another epic adventure from the mind of Dr. Block, author of the popular Baby Zeke and Diary of a Surfer Villager unofficial Minecraft books for kids .

******

This book is NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: Wild Moon: A Coastal Caribbean Adventure (Tyson Wild Thriller Book 67)
description:
A mysterious death.

An outlandish conspiracy.

A fatal coverup.
When a former astronaut is killed after making outrageous claims, conspiracy theories swirl. Was this an accident? Or are there more sinister forces at play?

Tyson and his Navy buddy, JD, launch into the investigation. The rabbit hole gets deeper and deeper, and each step grows more treacherous. Deadly forces strike as they struggle to uncover the shocking and unbelievable truth.

To complicate matters, the duo’s attempt to bring down a mob boss sparks chaos and controversy. An ensuing turf war ups the body count, and the deputies find themselves in hot water.

Tyson’s romantic escapades put him in a daunting position, the band has gotten into a dire situation, and the duo may have sealed their fate.

It’s conspiracies, crime, and calamity as the best friends solve the mysteries of the Florida paradise and beyond.

"If you like thrilling tropical adventures, you'll love Tyson Wild.”

Scroll up and grab your copy of Wild Moon today!

title: العقل الفارغ
description:
كتاب "العقل الفارغ" يستكشف مفهوم الفراغ في العقل البشري كأداة قوية لاكتشاف الذات والإبداع والنمو الشخصي. يناقش كيف أنه في عالمنا السريع المليء بالتحفيز المستمر والانشغالات، اعتناق لحظات الفراغ والهدوء يمكن أن يؤدي إلى فهم أعمق للذات والعالم. يؤكد الكتاب على أهمية التخلي عن توقعات المجتمع، ومواجهة المخاوف والعواقب، والاستفادة من الإبداع الداخلي عن طريق إتاحة المساحة للفراغ. يشير إلى أنه من خلال...

كتاب "العقل الفارغ" يستكشف مفهوم الفراغ في العقل البشري كأداة قوية لاكتشاف الذات والإبداع والنمو الشخصي. يناقش كيف أنه في عالمنا السريع المليء بالتحفيز المستمر والانشغالات، اعتناق لحظات الفراغ والهدوء يمكن أن يؤدي إلى فهم أعمق للذات والعالم. يؤكد الكتاب على أهمية التخلي عن توقعات المجتمع، ومواجهة المخاوف والعواقب، والاستفادة من الإبداع الداخلي عن طريق إتاحة المساحة للفراغ. يشير إلى أنه من خلال اعتناق الفراغ، يمكن للأفراد تعزيز الروابط العميقة مع الآخرين، وإعادة الشحن، والتغلب على القيود، وإيجاد السلام الداخلي. بشكل عام، يشجع الكتاب القراء على عدم اعتبار الفراغ حالة سلبية، ولكن كمصدر إلهام وممر لاكتشاف الإمكانات الحقيقية للفرد.

title: Daredevil's Engulfment (Tenillo Guardians AIMC, #17)
description:
Daredevil’s luck in finding a lady keeps hitting roadblocks. He’s tried and been beaten out by his own club brothers. Maybe it was time to give up. It’s when you least expect it that things happen, and Daredevil discovers this when a new allied club comes for another visit. Only this time, they bring women with them. Riding on the back of one of the Devil’s Regulators’ bikes is a woman who makes him sit up and pay attention. Too bad she’s already taken. Or so Daredevil assumes.

Shain is happy with her life. She has a great family, aka the Devil’s Regulators, and a job she loves. When her cousin asks her to come meet their new friends, she’s all for a long ride. What she doesn’t plan for is meeting a biker who makes her yearn for hot, steamy nights and a whole lot of naughty things. Too bad he’s a biker. She knows what most of them are like and looking for something permanent, isn’t it.

When she returns home, Daredevil can’t stop thinking of her and vice versa. When Shain runs into difficulties and dreams of Daredevil, she sees Tenillo as the perfect place to go. Shain has been wanting space to grow away from her overprotective cousin and his club. Only going to Tenillo puts her within the grasp of another overprotective alpha male. However, this one is willing to bend, and they burn for each other. It may be worth it.

Their passion is a different fire than what Shain usually fights as a firefighter. Her strong personality, dangerous job, and her ability to push boundaries with Daredevil make her the perfect woman for him. Shain thinks he’s the perfect man for her. But as the Infidels have found out time and time again, nothing is simple or easy in Tenillo.

Come take a ride with Daredevil and see how this biker is engulfed. It’s like flames burning out of control. His lady is caught in the same inferno. This is one fire they don’t want to escape.

title: Ezra: Kosher Nostra Book Four (Covenant of Ascent: Kosher Nostra 4)
description:
Trigger Please note this book contains some content which may be triggering to those sensitive to cancer and on page memories of infant death. You may contact the author for more information.

Dottie
It's been my sisters and I against the world since before we entered it together 35 years ago. Fraternal quadruplets, my sisters are statuesque, beautiful, and healthy, while I'm short, overweight, and the only carrier of the breast cancer gene. Growing up in the Florida mafia, we took our troubling childhood and used it as the driving force behind Goldman Girls Realty and a life as far removed from our sperm donor as possible.
Now, if only our love lives could be as successful.
After a disastrous date that leaves me frustrated with men and unsatisfied in every sense of the word, I run into a man who changes my entire life during the course of a very pleasurable elevator ride. Am I ready for everything that comes with a man of the Kosher Nostra when I swore I would never be with anyone associated with the mafia? I can fight my own battles, whether the enemy lives within my body or sends his minions to North Carolina to drag me back kicking and screaming, but Ezra, his family, and their friends from New York make it clear they might not be on the right side of the law, but they are on the right side of those they love.
We stand proud, the Goldman Girls and the army of the Kosher Nostra.
Come and get us...we dare you.

Author's Ezra is the fourth book in the Covenant of Ascent; Kosher Nostra series. It includes coarse language, sexual content, crude humor, sarcasm, and the TW listed above. This is not a standalone. Series must be read in order to understand continuing story line, even though each book focuses on a seperate couple with a gauranteed HEA or HFN.

title: Blood Money (Sam Pope #13)
description:
FIGHT FOR JUSTICE...

On one fateful night in London, two police officers are killed at the exact same time on different parts of the city. With the entire Metropolitan Police Service and the press doing everything they can to find the killers, Sam Pope decides to look where no one else will and soon finds himself fighting for the justice of the fallen officers, and for his life.

title: Name Maker (Sam Pope #9)
description:
HELL HATH NO FURY...

Five million alive. Three million dead. That is the contract put on Sam Pope's head by the vengeful Dana Kovalenko, the sister of crime boss, Andrei Kovalenko, who Sam killed three years ago.

A contract that has attracted the most dangerous hitmen in the world.

Living off the grid and figuring out his next move, Sam has no idea that an array of dangerous professionals are hunting for him, all of them ready to do whatever it takes to claim the bounty. With danger around any and every corner, Sam soon discovers that he is facing his biggest fight for survival yet.

With only one way to cancel the contract and walk away alive, Sam has to do what he does best. Fight back.

title: The Boy with Video Game Powers
description:
Kids who love video games will love this exciting new series that brings video games to life in the real world! Perfect for ages 8-12.

12-year-old Milo Garrett may not be the biggest, strongest, or most popular kid in school, but in the gaming world, he’s an absolute legend. After using his elite skills to acquire an ultra-rare magical ring in his favorite fantasy adventure video game, Milo wakes up to find a real ring on his finger—and it gives him extraordinary abilities from the game in real life!

Now, Milo can see “stats” floating over people’s heads, use magical spells and weapons, and even level up. But Milo learns his new powers come with a catch—evil creatures from the game are spawning into the real world, and Milo is the only one who can stop them.

To succeed, Milo will have to defeat powerful enemies, acquire amazing new items, and boost his wavering confidence. But as he’s about to discover, being a hero in the real world is a lot harder than being one in a video game. Especially since he has a limited number of Health Points—and when they run out there are no extra lives.

Kids 8-12, reluctant readers, and adults will love joining Milo on his quest to level up from gamer to real-life hero. With non-stop action and laugh-out-loud humor, this fun new series from bestselling author R.L. Ullman unlocks an incredible reward—it gets kids to put down their screens and pick up a book!

title: Beyond The Stars (The 8th Wonder Book 2)
description:
Qamar has always been the baby of the family, the one everyone looks out for, but that hasn't made his life any easier. With dreams of becoming a professional soccer player, he's a college student struggling with imposter syndrome and the weight of his family's expectations. If it were up to him, he'd skip college altogether and dive straight into the pros, but the pressure to succeed academically and athletically is relentless. He’s made some questionable decisions along the way but his family still holds him to higher standards never letting him forget the oath of To The Moon.

In another universe is Siasia, the oldest of two, with a ten-year-old stepsister she's practically raised herself. Her mother is married to a man whose abusive nature and gambling addiction cast a dark shadow over their lives. Siasia dreams of becoming a renowned photographer, but for now, she dances at a club and takes on photography gigs to make ends meet and to provide for her sister.

When Qamar and Siasia's paths cross, they find solace in each other's company. Despite their vastly different backgrounds, they share a common struggle and a burning desire to achieve their dreams. As they grow closer, they begin to expose their deepest fears and vulnerabilities, discovering strength in their connection.

Qamar gets frustrated with his pursuit of taking his family to the top. They’ve already been there, planted a flag there so his journey doesn’t feel as fulfilling. That is until Siasia reminds him that the universe doesn’t end at the moon, it journeys beyond the stars.

Together, Qamar and Siasia navigate the challenges of their lives, leaning on each other for support and inspiration. "Beyond The Stars" is a heartfelt tale of love, resilience, and the pursuit of dreams against all odds.Beyond The Stars- a young adult contemporary romance with a sports theme and centered around black characters

title: Prophecy (The Herobrine Story #2)
description:
In this second volume of Herobrine's recently-discovered diary, you will learn even more about how he came to be. You will watch as he gains new powers. You will read his accounts of death and destruction. But, most importantly, you will learn the Prophecy of the Glitch!

 This book might give you nightmares!

*******

This book is NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: A Feast to Remember (Thanksgiving Special): AMF Holiday Special Series (The Accidental Minecraft Family: Holiday Specials)
description:
"Now let us in so we can pillage this village!"

The Accidental Minecraft Family has a huge problem...and it isn't the pillagers at their gates or the giant, mutant chicken in their pen. It's Thanksgiving has arrived and Mom isn't prepared!

Join your favorite (accidental) Minecraft family as they celebrate all they are thankful for.

title: Diary of Steve the Noob 16 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book) (Diary of Steve the Noob Collection)
description: 24,500 words with 47 pictures... Ah, at last, it is done! About time, huh? Sorry this one took so long, but as you can see by the word count and picture count, I got a good excuse. :D Hmm... where did we leave off? It was something important... hmm... Ah! That's right! The enemy army is on the horizon! Read this book today to find out what happens next! This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2024 Mojang / Notch / Microsoft

title: A Mystery Across Time (Diary of a Roblox Detective #3)
description:
Mysteries seem to follow Sophia everywhere she goes!When Sophia attends the city carnival, time begins to repeat itself over and over again. Can Sophia fix time before it's too late? Join Sophia and her friends (and Billy!) as they solve 
A Mystery Across Time
!

Who is this book for?The 
Diary of a Roblox Detective
 series is perfect for kids ages 8-12 who are independent readers. Earlier readers can also enjoy the book with the help of a parent, and older reluctant readers will certainly enjoy the book if they play Roblox.

This is an UNOFFICIAL ROBLOX BOOK.

title: Ghost of Blockview Middle (Diary of a Roblox Detective #1)
description:
Mysteries seem to follow Sophia everywhere she goes!When Sophia starts at a new school, she learns a ghost has been terrorizing teachers and students. But...ghosts aren't real, right? Join Sophia and her new friends as they solve the mystery of the 
Ghost of Blockview Middle
!

Who is this book for?The 
Diary of a Roblox Detective
 series is perfect for kids ages 8-12 who are independent readers. Earlier readers can also enjoy the book with the help of a parent, and older reluctant readers will certainly enjoy the book if they play Roblox.

This is an UNOFFICIAL ROBLOX BOOK.

title: The Great Trophy Theft (Diary of a Roblox Detective #2)
description:
Mysteries seem to follow Sophia everywhere she goes!When the talent show trophy goes missing, it's up to Sophia and her friends to find it before the show is canceled. Can they find it in time? Join Sophia and her new friends as they solve the mystery of The Great Trophy Theft!

Who is this book for?The Diary of a Roblox Detective series is perfect for kids ages 8-12 who are independent readers. Earlier readers can also enjoy the book with the help of a parent, and older reluctant readers will certainly enjoy the book if they play Roblox.

This is an UNOFFICIAL ROBLOX BOOK.

title: Scary Roblox Stories Vol 5
description:
Are you looking to get spooked?This book contains 3 terrifying Roblox stories that will chill your bones. The stories included OutsiderThe VoiceTransfixedWho is this book for?This book is for children 8-12 years old who are old enough to read the Goosebumps series.

This is an UNOFFICIAL ROBLOX BOOK.

title: The Amish Christmas Orphan
description:
In the heart of winter, a quiet widow, a grieving roofer, and a runaway girl with a troubled past must find a way to heal—or risk losing the love they never expected to find. 

Widowed and cautious, Dorothy Fischer has built a life of solitude on her farm, her heart still bound by the memory of her late husband. But when she find a girl who calls herself Lily hiding in her barn, Dorothy is drawn into a life that suddenly feels much too big to face alone. She offers the girl shelter, but with every passing day, the weight of their shared grief becomes harder to ignore.

Caleb Yoder arrives to repair Dorothy's roof, and his quiet strength and kindness begin to break through the walls she’s built around herself. But as sparks fly between them, Dorothy finds herself torn—can she trust Caleb with her heart, or is she too broken to love again?

And as she helps the runaway begin to trust, Dorothy must also confront the fear of losing the family she never thought she could have. Together, they must navigate the shadows of their pasts and find a way to move forward—or risk losing everything they’ve started to build. In this moving and heartfelt romance, three people learn that healing is a journey, and sometimes the love you least expect is the one that saves you. A clean and wholesome Amish story from Mary Lantz

title: Valentine's Poison : An addictive cozy mystery (Jim and Ginger Cozy Mysteries Book 5)
description:
A former librarian turned detective. A clever orange cat. A mass poisoning on Valentine's Day in a charming seaside town full of secrets.

When a Valentine's Day celebration at a local bakery ends with one dead and others poisoned, all evidence points to the bakery owner who hosted the festive event. But Jim Butterfield and his feline partner Ginger find the case isn't as simple as it appears. As they investigate, they discover fake receipts, missing security footage, and a mysterious figure following their every move.

With each passing hour bringing more troubling discoveries, Jim and Ginger must race against time to uncover what really happened. But in Oceanview Cove, where everyone has something to hide, the truth might be more bitter than sweet.

Can our detective duo expose who really poisoned the Valentine's Day treats before another victim falls to someone's deadly recipe?

The perfect cozy mystery for readers who A retired librarian stumbling into sleuthing (sometimes literally)A sarcastic cat who thinks he's Sherlock Holmes (but acts like a teen)Mystery with a generous helping of humorHeart-warming moments and small town charmQuirky characters that will feel like old friends

title: Palm Trees and Protests (Dune House Cozy Mystery, #28)
description:
A clean cozy mystery with endearing friendships!

The future of Dune House is on the line when a new development is approved in the small beachside town. The residents are up in arms and Suzie and Mary are right in the middle of the protests.

Then things become a whole lot more complicated when someone who supports the project is murdered. Suzie and Mary put on their sleuthing hats to get to the truth. But the stakes become even higher when an out-of-town detective is brought in to lead the case. Not only is he determined to nab the killer, but Suzie is a prime suspect.

It’s a race against time to dig through a mountain of clues and suspects and get to the truth before the detective puts the wrong person behind bars.

Join Suzie, Mary, and Pilot for a heartwarming, fun, fast-paced, cozy mystery by USA Today and Wall Street Journal Bestselling Author Cindy Bell that will keep you guessing until the end.

title: Time Will Tell (Cottage on Gooseberry Bay #12)
description: Ainsley is hired to help solve a cold case after her client buys the contents of a storage garage during the annual auction and finds a hidden clue to a long cold mystery.

title: Dreams and Schemes (A Hope Herring Mystery Book 14)
description:
This is book 14 in the Hope Herring paranormal cozy mystery series by USA Today Bestselling Author J A Whiting and Nell McCarthy.

It is fall in Castle Park, NC and Hope Herring’s teenaged daughter Cori has a singing opportunity so big it would be hard to refuse. If it works out, it would mean huge changes for Hope and Cori’s lives.

When their resident ghost Max drops a slight hint that it soon might be time for him to move on, Hope’s heart fills with dread knowing how much she would miss him.

Cori’s voice coach takes a fall and ends up on the hospital, and when Hope and her daughter go to visit the woman, it ends up sucking Hope into a new murder mystery involving a doctor, a nurse, a psychologist, and an accountant. Will she and Detective Robinson find the clues they need to bring someone to justice or will the killer get away with murder?

title: Riddle in the Review (The Inn at Holiday Bay, #22)
description:
A heartwarming cozy mystery series about losing everything, taking a chance, and starting again.

After suffering a personal tragedy Abby Sullivan buys a huge old seaside mansion she has never even seen, packs up her life in San Francisco, and moves to Holiday Bay Maine, where she is adopted, quite against her will, by a huge Maine Coon Cat named Rufus, a drifter with her own tragic past named Georgia, and a giant dog with an inferiority complex named Ramos. What Abby thought she needed was alone time to heal. What she ended up with was, an inn she never knew she wanted, a cat she couldn't seem to convince to leave, and a new family she'd never be able to live without.

In book 22 in the series, someone is going around town vandalizing merchants who have received a negative review on the new social media site everyone is talking about. Initially it seems like a mere annoyance, but things begin to escalate, and everyone begins to fear that the trend will lead to a death if someone can't figure out a way to bring the vandals to justice.

Meanwhile, Vaness Blackstone from Firehouse Books is heading out of town and leaves her spunky Aunt Lou in charge. When the bookstore becomes the most recent victim of the Holiday Bay Prankster, Lou joins Abby and Georgia in their quest to track the troublemaker down.

title: Clue in the Carriage House (The Inn at Holiday Bay, #23)
description:
A heartwarming cozy mystery series about losing everything, taking a chance, and starting again.

After suffering a personal tragedy Abby Sullivan buys a huge old seaside mansion she has never even seen, packs up her life in San Francisco, and moves to Holiday Bay Maine, where she is adopted, quite against her will, by a huge Maine Coon Cat named Rufus, a drifter with her own tragic past named Georgia, and a giant dog with an inferiority complex named Ramos. What Abby thought she needed was alone time to heal. What she ended up with was, an inn she never knew she wanted, a cat she couldn't seem to convince to leave, and a new family she'd never be able to live without.

In book 23 in the series, Lonnie helps Jeremy convert the carriage house into a home as important life changes loom on the horizon. Meanwhile, Velma works with Lou on a solution to her own situation, and a whole new group of guests, each with their own life situation to figure out, check in at the inn.

title: Winter Festival (Ozarks Cozy Mystery Series)
description:
"Winter Festival" is a captivating tale that weaves together the strands of loss, love, and a lingering mystery. Della, the protagonist, is haunted by the memory of her late husband, Seth, which leads to a surreal encounter with him in the form of a ghost in a dream, and it appears to her as if he never left. He warns her of impending danger and insists she keep Bryce, a close FBI friend of his, nearby—a request that tangles the past with the present.

As Della navigates the complexities of her emotions and the mystery surrounding Seth's message, she finds herself at the center of another troubling puzzle—the death of Clint Rogers, the chairman of the Winter Festival, a huge event in Clover, the small Ozark town where Della lives. Clint, known for his dislike of guns, is found dead in what initially appears to be a suicide. However, as Della delves deeper into the facts surrounding his death, the truth becomes murkier. Was Clint's death really self-inflicted, or is there a more sinister force at play in the seemingly tranquil town of Clover?

Balancing her personal grief and the growing sense of unease, Della becomes an unwitting detective, piecing together clues that lead her through a labyrinth of relationships, secrets, and hidden motives. From conversations with Clint's grieving family to interactions with his ex-wife and contentious Winter Festival committee members, Della uncovers a tapestry of small-town intrigue and resentments.

"Winter Festival" is more than a simple whodunit. It's a story of how the past holds onto us, how the unseen threads of our connections shape our present, and how sometimes, the most significant mysteries are the ones that reside within the human heart.

title: Forever Lasting (Forever Bluegrass #23)
description:
Cassidy Davies is used to being seen as the youngest in the huge Davies family. She’d grown up with too many overprotective brothers and cousins to count. So, she learned how to be invisible. That is, after she learned from her family how to be a spy, how to be an elite soldier, and how to bat her eyes and smile while taking a person down.

Now a government asset, Cassidy gathers information for the government or is a lone assassin. Whatever the government needs, she delivers. But this case is personal. She’s been called to help an old friend stave off a coup. Only this time, she may need some help. She just doesn’t know who it is that keeps showing up exactly when she needs it or how to find him when things go sideways. He’s always just a shadow in the night, but she’s beginning to feel as if he might be more than that.

He’s always in the shadows. No one can know his involvement with government missions or the fact that he has one Cassidy Davies. He first saw her when they both went to rescue the same person, yet she doesn’t even know he’s always got her back or that he even exists since she’s never seen him. She has no idea he’s the one who clears the way for her escapes, when she needs it. But when Cassidy’s life is in danger, it’s time for him to step from the shadows to save the woman he loves.

title: Louise Penny: Audible Sessions: FREE Exclusive Interview
description:
Louise Penny visits the Audible Studios to discuss her latest novel Glass, the latest in the Inspector Gamache series.

She talks about the setting, the importance of her characters and storyline over the murder itself, and much more. The previous in the series A Great Reckoning debuted at number one in both the US and Canada on the hardcover list, the ebooks and audio lists - making it the top book in North America.

title: The Twins: Kosher Nostra Book Five (Covenant of Ascent: Kosher Nostra 5)
description:
PLEASE NOTE THIS BOOK CONTAINS TWO SEPARATE COUPLES. THE EXTENDED EPILOGUE (4 CHAPTERS) IS ABOUT A SIDE COUPLE AND IS FOR FUN AND HAS NO BEARING ON THE SERIES OR OVERALL STORY ARC. PLEASE READ IT AS SUCH FOR A FEW LAUGHS.

Tevye

My life with the Kosher Nostra is chaos...but it's a chaos that I thrive in. Money, violence, women, and sarcasm. About a year and a half ago, the consequences of my lifestyle caught up with me, dropping a sickly 5 month old baby boy on my doorstep. His mother is gone, and I'm left trying to navigate a world filled with doctor's appointments, constant monitoring, and stress. I have a son, but I'm not meant to be a father. My twin sister and I are not like other people. We are detached, cold, calculating. We make the difficult decisions that the softer members of our family cannot. And I've lived that way for almost 30 years, but my father's disappointment and my mother's constant nagging drive me to a support group for help.
And it changes my life irrevocably and completely.
Dammit, I hate it when my mom is right.

Tovah

My twin Tevye has always operated under the assumption that he and I do not feel. We don't emote. Our souls are black and our hearts are made of ice. I know differently. Always have. But I ain't telling him...he'll figure it out on his own, the schmuck.
In the meantime, I'm living life on my terms, not a single regret...until I purposefully put myself in the line of fire and get a nifty new hole in my upper chest as a result. While I'm out cold, my secrets come to light.
And it changes my life irrevocably and completely.
Dammit, it turns out I do have one regret...not coming clean earlier.

Author's Note: The Twins is the fifth book in the Covenant of Ascent; Kosher Nostra series and features two couples. It includes coarse language, sexual content, crude humor, sarcasm, an abuse survivors account, and a child with a chronic illness This is not a standalone. Series must be read in order to understand continuing story line, even though each book focuses on a separate couple with a guaranteed HEA or HFN.

title: MIND WAVES
The Heart of A Child : How Reconnecting with Innocence Can Heal, Empower and Transform
description:
‘’The Heart of a Child’’
 is a transformative self-help book that invites readers to rediscover the emotional wisdom they were born with. Blending psychological insight, practical frameworks, and soulful clarity, Obinna guides adults back to the qualities they once embodied curiosity, vulnerability, joy, and resilience.
This is not a book about becoming childish. It’s about becoming whole.
The Hook
In a world that rewards performance, control, and emotional suppression, ''
The Heart of a Child''
 offers a radical live with openness, courage, and clarity. Through twelve deeply structured chapters and a resonant conclusion, readers learn how emotional discipline without losing softnessDesign lives that work not just look goodReframe failure, ask for help, and forgive freelyLive with presence, simplicity, and an open heartEach chapter blends strategic insight with emotional depth making the book both practical and poetic.
Target AudienceAdults seeking emotional clarity and personal growthReaders of Brené Brown, Jay Shetty, and Nedra Glover TawwabTherapists, coaches, educators, and parentsBook clubs and spiritual communitiesAnyone feeling emotionally stuck, disconnected, or overwhelmedMarket Positioning

''The Heart of a Child''
 sits at the intersection of emotional intelligence, personal development, and soulful living. It fresh voice in the self-help genre—warm, structured, and deeply humanA layered framework that blends psychology, storytelling, and reflectionA timeless message with universal appeal

title: How To Keep Your Healing
description: Believers can learn to combat symptoms that reoccur after they\x27ve received healing.

title: Berserk, Vol. 17
description: Warrior supreme Guts, the Black Swordsman, has seen better days — and more popular — in the kingdom of Midland, a land he once defended as captain of the Band of the Hawk. But the Hawks were betrayed and slaughtered, and now the hyolier-than-thou Holy Iron Chain Knights have captured Guts and plan to whip some repentance into him — literally. But Guts isn’t so easily held at bay, at when he manages to escape with the Holy Knights’ leader, Farnese, as his hostage, the demons that are drawn to Guts’ Brand of Sacrifice are all too willing to show her the teeming darkness in her own soul!

title: Angels: The Angel Art of Michael Van Vlymen
description:
The Inspiring Angel Art of Michael Van Vlymen.

Angel art - This small (8.5 x 8.5) coffee table picture book contains over 40 pieces of original artwork on angels.Created to convey a more accurate presentation of God's angels, this book will not only inspire you but also makes a great gift for any occasion.

"I created these original pieces of angel art because when I needed to find images of angels for presentations, I found precious few that I could actually use. My knowledge of angels and thier demeanor and appearance compelled me to create images that carried a sense of God's presence and glory. Angels are kind yet powerful, they are faithful and fearless, they are noble and self-sacrificing, they are often overwhelming in their presence yet have a compassion and grace about them. They reflect the attributes of God. They carry His glory as they are always in His presence. It was my desire to create a representation of angels that appeared like that description. I hope that these works inspire you to think about the fact that God's angels are always with us" - Michael

title: Heart Track (Tracking Jane #6)
description:
The hardest track will go through her heart...  
Jane returns home to Wyoming, the home of her childhood, to discover her brother has become embroiled in an apparent plot to attach land to a nearby Native American reservation. Or so it seems. Soon, Jane and her dogs will join an investigation involving a bizarre web of domestic terrorism, serial murders, and greed. Along the way Jane will examine her Native American heritage, and will grapple with what–if anything–she can do to help an oppressed and disenchanted people.

title: Howl Like the Wind: Coyote Run Mystery Book 3
description:
The exciting new Coyote Run K-9 Mystery from award-winning author Marta Acosta!
A murder in a crowd…with no witnesses.

An intruder on her ranch…and only the dogs know the identity.

Old faces and old cases return with shocking demands.

A fierce Thanksgiving day storm sends Maddie “Mad Girl” Whitney and the Midnight Runners K-9 Search and Rescue team racing to Deadman’s Mountain. They find the victim…

But that’s only the start of a season of high crimes and mystery.

Each new crisis leads Maddie and her partner Sheriff Oliver Desjardins back to Deadman’s, the rumored haunt of the Coyote Run Creeper. Soon, Maddie begins wondering if there’s any truth to the legend of a madman living on the mountain.

Will ghosts from the past keep Maddie from finding her way through a devastating winter into the New Year?

Get the thrilling new Coyote Run K-9 mystery now!

Praise for the Coyote Run 

★★★★★ “WOW! Well written. Wonderful character development, both human & canine... Every town should be so lucky to have a Maddie.”

★★★★★ "Such a great story! Fully developed characters and world that pulled me in...didn't want it to end. Loved, loved, loved Maddie with all her issues."

★★★★★ “An OUTSTANDING story. This story has all the marks of a cozy mystery, but with the added benefit of a character who is so different from the standard main character as to create a new genre.”

★★★★★ “This writer and her characters are originals! This story is rich in layers such I have rarely witnessed.”

★★★★★ “WOW, I was absolutely enthralled with this book. I could not put it down until the end.”

title: South of Denver
description: After leaving his job as sheriff of Boulder, Sam Brown decides to visit his sister and her family on their ranch south of Denver, but discovers them all gone. He searches to find them, and what he discovers becomes his mission.

title: Amish Violet (Amish Love Blooms #5)
description: Nancy is delighted when her sister Nerida asks for help in finding a husband for her oldest daughter, Violet. With Nancy's excellent record she's certain she'll find a man for Violet in no time at all. What will Nancy do when the usually quiet Violet proves difficult?

title: Blackwater Ranch: Complete Series (Blackwater Ranch #1-6)
description:
Get ready to meet the Harding brothers of Blackwater Ranch. They're tough as nails, but they fall hard for the strong women who wrangle their hearts. Through heartbreaks, reunions, and celebrations, the Hardings will fight for love and the future of the ranch.

Remembering the Cowboy
She thinks it’s a new beginning, but he knows it shouldn’t have ever ended. When threats are carried out, who will be left hurting at Blackwater Ranch?
A friends to more amnesia romance.

Charmed by the Cowboy
He’ll hate her when he finds out why she left before, but when the time comes to say good-bye, her heart might be too attached to leave.
A sweet second chance romance.

Mistaking the Cowboy
Haley was so excited to meet the man she’d been chatting with online that she greeted him with a kiss only to find out she’d planted a big wet one on his brother instead!
A witty mistaken identity romance.

Protected by the Cowboy
When Laney’s past catches up to her, Micah won’t stop until he brings her home.
A suspenseful protector romance.

Keeping the Cowboy
When the opportunity of a lifetime leaves Jade with a decision to make, will she choose to follow the dreams of her past or to make this man and his son her future?
A sweet single dad romance.

Redeeming the Cowboy
Will helping Felicity pick up the pieces of her life give them both the new beginning they need or destroy everything they have left?
A gripping redemption romance.

title: Conn Jackson
description: This was supposed to be a journey to find his dream of starting his own spread. As he left the Bar L just northwest of Cheyenne and rode south into Colorado, Conn already knew where he wanted to build his ranch and had enough money to buy the land and get it started. It was just a hundred mile ride through open country. What could possibly go wrong?

title: Scent of Fear (Scent #1)
description: For Haley Richardson, fear does have a smell. So do hate and happiness. A head injury as a child gave Haley an extraordinary sense of smell. Her gift allows Haley and her German shepherd, Jax, to be one of the most successful search and rescue teams in the Midwest. Her gift is also a curse as she detects people’s feelings. For her sanity, she’s reclusive until each time she’s called on to find the lost. When girls begin disappearing with tragic results in her hometown, Haley teams with the county’s new sheriff, Dane Campbell, to find the killer. Haley is drawn to the outgoing sheriff, whose daughter is emotionally damaged. After a lifetime of feeling like an outsider, though, Haley is reluctant to get involved with the child, whose melancholy threatens to overwhelm Haley. As the murders test Haley’s gift and skills, she learns that sometimes a search and rescue can be about the heart, and the heart can lead the way home.

title: Omen's Entrapment (Ares Infidels MC, #4)
description:
Omen’s life has never been an easy one. Growing up basically fatherless in the bayou, he knows all about hardship. When he’s old enough, he heads off to the military. He has a mom and sisters to take care of.

Only things don’t turn out as planned and he loses his family. Now, he’s out of the military and looking for his place in the world. There’s nothing to tie him to the bayou, but there are things he finds to tie him to Texas.

His friend and prior Marine buddy, Executioner, convinces him to give the Ares Infidels MC a try. He’s never imagined being in an MC. When he arrives, he finds not only does he seem to fit, but there’s even more reason to stick around. Executioner’s mother-in-law, Jackie, immediately captivates him.

Jackie has raised her three kids essentially alone. She knows hardship and she doesn’t need a man. One deadbeat husband who left her years ago is enough. Only she can’t seem to shake this attraction she has to the younger man who is her son-in-law’s friend.

She feels like she’s being ridiculous. What could he see in a woman almost ten years his senior with kids and hardships? Find out how Omen works his bayou magic and gets the woman of his dreams. He’s out to prove he’s nothing but serious. He’s hooked and never wants to be free of Omen’s Entrapment.

title: A Love to Heal Her Heart (5 Amish Brothers #1)
description:
Can Jeremiah keep the farm and family together while keeping the promise he made to their father?

Jeremiah Phillips is heartbroken by the loss of his father, Henry. He’s barely moving through the motions. All he can think about is how he'll take care of his brothers, all of his brothers, and keep the farm afloat now that his father has passed. He is shocked to learn another in the community has perished on the same day.

Ester Harley has spent years by her Aunt Rhoda’s side learning all about quilting. It’s horrible to realize she’ll be doing all the quilting alone from now on. Ester is angry when she discovers that Rhoda’s memory is being overshadowed by the Phillips, why would they do that?

Ester barges into Jeremiah’s life spitting fire and brimstone, but all he can see is her beauty. He has a plan to bring life to his farm and wants Ester’s help. Can Ester overcome her anger and see the opportunity in front of her?

Will Gott lead Ester and Jeremiah into each other's hearts?

Find out in Bestselling Romance Author Sarah Miller’s inspirational new series.

title: Sweet Tea Witch Mysteries Books 1-10
description:
Ten full length-novels!
2000 pages of reading.
Start this delightful series full of Southern charm and sass!

title: Potato Fireball: An Unofficial Minecraft Comic (The Legend of Dave the Villager)
description:
A hilarious graphic novel set in the world of Minecraft!Carl from the Legend of Dave the Villager series has made a comic! Join Carl the Hero and his nerdy friends Dave, Porkins, Robo-Steve, Alex, and Spidroth the Camel as they set off on an amazing adventure.

This comic is Carl's retelling of his adventure with Dave - but because Carl's made most of the details up, there are only very minor spoilers for the Legend of Dave the Villager book series.

Parental In this comic, there are some deaths, but it's all done in a very stupid, cartoony way. There's also a character whose face turns into a butt, but you don't see the butt. Because of these reasons, I've put the minimum age recommendation as eight years old (with the Dave the Villager books, it's normally seven years old).

 This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book.

title: Antecedents' Legacy (Antecedents' Legacy #1)
description:
Zander Greaves grew up in Compton, California— violence, pain, and strife were his life for his first eighteen years. His personality was forged by his childhood, and he was determined to find a way to make his past work for him.

As soon as he could, Zander decided to find work as a military contractor. The company he’d badgered for a job eventually hired him, earning him the nickname “Badger.” While most people dropped out of the lifestyle after a few years, Zander had found a place that felt right to him.

A decade in, he’d even found a couple of friends who stayed on with him. One was Devin Smith, the heavy weapons specialist for the squad and a proud Texan. Another was Selda Engel, their tech specialist. She’d slowly transitioned from a friend to a friend-with-benefits, but even that had started to become more.

On rotation again, Zander made a vow to ask Selda to recognize their relationship as more than just a casual hookup, planning to do so as soon as they were back off schedule. The universe, however, was about to remind him of a crucial lesson and old adage: “Life is what happens when you’re busy making plans.” Sent out into the desert on what looked like a wild-goose chase, they were about to head back when everything changed.

Shifted by quantum entanglement from Earth to an alien planet, Zander and his squad would have to adapt— and quickly— if they wanted to live. As they tried to understand what was happening, the stark truth of their new reality thrust itself on the shaken Humans. Giant machines of war were attacking an equally humongous bug.

And, quite unfortunately, the giant bug had a lot of little friends. The ensuing firefight ended with Zander left as the sole Human survivor. Out of his dimension and wounded, he had to face an entirely new universe, and the Antecedents' Legacy would soon become the primary focus of his life.

title: A Billionaire Savage Got Me Twisted: Standalone
description:
Vayda has had her life planned out for herself since she was a young girl. But all it took was one careless night for everything to change. Now, trying to navigate her life as a single mother, her only concern is her son, and still reaching her goal of becoming a school teacher. Just when Vayda thought she had it all figured out, a fender bender turns everything she knows upside down.

Brighton “Gotti” Hart is a self-made billionaire who has the world in his hands. Whatever he wants he gets, women included. That is until he runs into Vayda Ballard for what he thinks is the first time. They come into each other’s lives like a wrecking ball, slowly teaching each other that there’s more to life than what the originally knew.

An unintentional romance forms, but when secrets from the past threaten their future, the couple is forced apart.

Yazmin Nova is Vayda’s best friend and diary. On the outside looking in Yazmin has it all. But in reality, she feels empty. That is until a past fling by the name of Travis “Hunter” Hart reappears and refuses to let Yazmin slip through his fingers again. All Yaz ever wanted was someone to protect her and show her it was safe to live, and Hunter did just that. Yazmin quickly learns there’s no end that Hunter would go for her love and happiness. Even if the end is her own family.

title: An Unbreakable Bond With A Thug: A Ghetto Hood Tale
description:
LuLu’s main focus is raising her daughter Armani, working a simple job, and holding on to her independency with or without a man by her side because the only man that she truly wanted had a hold on her that not even her baby's father could grip.

Tip lived a fast life; sometimes faster than he could handle himself. Being forced to hop out there at a young age, the streets were all he knew and it most definitely wasn't no love in them. With a handsome face, mean swag, and street credibility, Tip didn't have time for love; not even from the woman he considered one of his best friends.

When LuLu and Tip find themselves constantly in compromising situations it forces Tip to acknowledge the fact that he wasn't so sure how to love nor receive affection from anyone as he constantly pulls himself away from accepting the challenges of emotional attachment. With the streets on his mind and her friends in her ear, LuLu finds herself playing with fire when she allows Mal to slide into the open hole in her heart.

Tip expected her to wait for him and trust his every move, only how could she trust him when she was still coughing up water from the last time he let her drown? One thing was for certain and two things were for sure. Tip had LuLu twisted but would he soon realize that he was too?

Dealing with not only their drama, they both often find themselves twisted into the web of lies from the crazy lives of their closest friends as well. Find out what happens in this ghetto hood tale as these young couples try to piece together the pieces of their broken puzzles.

title: Seaside Cowboy's Forget-Me-Not (Seaside Cowboys Book 8)
description:
What she doesn’t remember puts them in danger. What she does remember might, too…

Free-spirited Pat Gray treads water more carefully now, instead of jumping in headfirst like before. A near-death experience and the resulting amnesia can do that to a person. But she knows she can’t stay with the same guy for long, even with a trustworthy and charming cowboy like Harris. Especially when her secrets can pull them apart. And when someone is stalking and threatening her…

Harris Lawrence has been smitten with Pat for a while, but holding onto his chances with the elusive newcomer would be like holding onto the ocean breeze. So he’ll protect her while guarding his heart. And he’ll remember her forever.

Or however long they can stay alive.

Welcome to Port Sunshine, a small coastal town where a family of cowboy brothers discover the treasures of love and uncover the mysteries of their pasts!
Book 1: Seaside Cowboy's Second Chance
Book 2: Seaside Cowboy's Best Friend
Book 3: Seaside Cowboy's Marriage of Convenience
Book 4: Seaside Cowboy's Fairy Tale
Book 5: Seaside Cowboy's Assistant
Book 6: Seaside Cowboy's Love at First Sight
Book 7: Seaside Cowboy's Christmas Wish
Book 8: Seaside Cowboy's Forget-Me-Not
Book 9: Seaside Cowboy's Treasure

title: The Brakeman
description:
When Drew Campbell turned sixteen and had to leave St. Thomas Home for Boys, he knew he wasn’t fully prepared to face the world on his own. But he thought his years as a blacksmith’s apprentice would give him a start.

But after failing to find work at any of the town’s smithies, Drew traveled to Brainerd and found work in the Northern Pacific’s maintenance yard as a common laborer.

He was eighteen when he met pretty Anne McDuff and wanted to prove himself to her father. So, he volunteered for the well-paying job as a brakeman. The reason for the high salary was because it was one of the most dangerous occupations in the country. So, only those brave enough or stupid enough to believe they’d last long took the job. Or those who were smitten like Drew.

Drew was lucky enough to survive almost two years as a brakeman but not lucky enough to marry the girl who’d driven him to risk his life each day.

His run of good fortune ended on a cold, rainy day in April of 1884 as his freight train raced across the rugged terrain of Montana Territory.

title: Sweet Afternoons (Blueberry Beach, #6)
description:
Willen Hawkins wusste genau, was sie mit ihrem unerwarteten Erbe machen das Indigo Inn in Blueberry Beach renovieren. 

Schließlich sind mehr als achtzehn Jahre vergangen, seit sie ihren Abschluss an der Blueberry Beach High gemacht und die Stadt verlassen hatte. Das Leben, das sie sich aufgebaut hat, ist weitaus einsamer als das Leben, das sie sich als Teenager vorgestellt hatte. Aber wenn sie sich neu erfinden und anfangen will, das Leben aufzubauen, das sie sich wünscht, muss sie aufhören zu warten, bis alles perfekt ist, und jetzt beginnen. 

Drake Jensen möchte verschwinden.

Dass er in den letzten fünf Jahren zum sexiesten Mann der Welt gewählt wurde, in acht der zehn erfolgreichsten Filme des letzten Jahrzehnts die Hauptrolle spielte und der begehrteste Hauptdarsteller Hollywoods war, hat seine Frau nicht davon abgehalten, mit dem Kindermädchen durchzubrennen, seine Kinder mitzunehmen und alles zu zerstören, was er aufzubauen geglaubt hatte. Sich in einem neu eröffneten Inn zu verstecken, von dem noch niemand gehört hat, und einen Job als Arbeiter anzunehmen, sollte seine Identität geheim halten. Er bleibt nicht. Aber er hatte nicht damit gerechnet, dass die Stadt so unterstützend sein würde, noch dass er sich in eine Frau verlieben würde, die entschlossen ist, ihn zu ihrem Feind zu machen.

title: Tender Mercies (Blueberry Beach, #8)
description:
Kann jemand über fünfzig noch seinen Seelenverwandten finden?

Bev wurde eine erfolgreiche Geschäftsfrau, die ihre eigene Linie von Spandex-Unterwäsche für Frauen mit Übergröße entwarf und ein Vermögen anhäufte, als das Unternehmen zu einem internationalen Konzern im Milliardenwert heranwuchs.
Wenn sie nicht mit fünfzehn ihr Baby verloren und sich von ihrem Freund getrennt hätte, wäre nichts von ihrem finanziellen Erfolg jemals passiert.

Sie bereut es eigentlich nicht, Blueberry Beach verlassen zu haben und erfolgreich geworden zu sein. Solange sie Bill aus dem Weg geht, dem älteren Mann, den sie als Teenager geliebt hatte und der der Vater ihres Babys war.

Bill war nie ehrgeizig gewesen und gab sich damit zufrieden, in Blueberry Beach zu bleiben und den Surfshop zu führen, immer auf der Suche nach Wegen, seinen Mitunternehmern zu helfen und Weisheiten weiterzugeben, die er in über fünf Jahrzehnten Leben gesammelt hatte.

Er war schockiert gewesen, als er vor Jahren Bevs Alter erfuhr, aber er glaubte immer noch, dass sie seine Seelenverwandte war. Leider starb, als ihr Baby starb, auch ihre Liebe zu ihm, und sie hatte ihn heftig abserviert.

Er hatte geheiratet, Kinder bekommen, sich scheiden lassen und sich gefragt, ob es so etwas wie einen Seelenverwandten wirklich gibt.

Dann wird ein lang gehütetes Geheimnis einer der Säulen der Stadt offengelegt und betrifft Bill und Bev direkt, zerstört alles, woran sie zu glauben dachten.

Könnten sie möglicherweise ihre Seelenverwandten – und eine Familie – in der Asche ihres Lebens finden?

Rezensenten 

★★★★★ »Es brachte mich zum Weinen vor Kummer und Freude!« - J Young
★★★★★ 
»Oh, Jessie Gussman hat, wie ich glaube, eines der zärtlichsten Bücher aller Zeiten geschrieben! Ich konnte es buchstäblich nicht aus der Hand legen!!« - Lana

★★★★★ »ICH LIEBTE DIESE GESCHICHTE!« - MaryEllen
★★★★★ 
»Ein sehr zum Nachdenken anregendes Buch, bringt dich dazu, auf dein Leben zurückzublicken und über den Rest nachzudenken, der dir noch bleibt. Ich habe viel über meine Beziehung zu Menschen und zu Gott nachgedacht. Definitiv empfehlenswert!« - Sharon

★★★★★ »Jessie hat eine Art mit Worten, die dich noch lange nach dem Lesen über ihre Geschichten nachdenken lässt.« - Nati

title: A Code to Kill (Blake Wilder #19)
description:
Most of us have a code we live by.
Some live their life altruistically, while others live by a more sinister code.
A code that only their victims know. A code to kill…

Fresh from a grueling joint operation with Spenser Song, FBI agent Blake Wilder continues to find herself being stalked and hunted down by an unknown culprit. The worst part is that they may be after her loved ones as well.

Still unable to identify her stalker, Blake meets up with Kit at a coffee shop.
There Kit gives Blake crucial intel about an arms dealer, with advanced weaponry.
A dealer that’s on a bloodthirsty path, a path that claimed the life of someone close to Kit. As Blake and her team investigate the case, they uncover a web of aliases, and a cryptic code name with a string of deaths connecting to it.

Dirty bombs, advanced weaponry, and a trail of silent victims.
Who is this elusive arms dealer? As Blake races against time to unmask the truth.
The only thing that is certain is this weapons dealer is on a path of bloodshed.
And killing is not just a choice, it’s the only code they live by…

title: Heretic Spellblade 6
description:
As the world plunges into chaos, Nathan knows that he has only one shot to save it. He barely fended off the demonic Messenger Artemis, but now Trafaumh faces an invasion from without and open rebellion from within. If it falls, all of Doumahr goes with it.

But saving a country comes with hard decisions. He's turned a blind eye to Trafaumh's atrocities in the past. With the Inquisition on the verge of collapse, Nathan can remove some of the worst people from power. The cost may be paid in the lives of innocents, however. The Inquisition are as efficient at slaying demons as they are brutal, and he may need their power.

He's not the only person trying to claim Trafaumh. Nathan's former homeland of Falmir has finally forced a confrontation with rest of the world. They will not turn back.

Nathan has been preparing for this. This is his ultimate test since turning back the pages of history.

title: The Haunted Shipwreck (A Lin Coffin Mystery Book 18)
description:
This is book 18 in the Lin Coffin paranormal cozy mystery series by USA TODAY Bestselling Author J.A. Whiting.

Lin Coffin has been able to see ghosts since she was a little girl and living on the island of Nantucket provides plenty of opportunities to interact with spirits. Lin and her husband Jeff are riding bikes on the paths around Nantucket when they decide to stop for a break at one of the island beaches and they notice something that wasn’t there before. The remains of an old shipwreck has been uncovered by erosion from a recent storm and an archeologist for the Massachusetts Board of Underwater Archeological Resources is there to study the wreck. While looking at the parts of the ship that have been uncovered, Lin starts to feel dizzy and has to sit down in the sand. For several seconds, images of a sailing ship flash in her mind, and she knows that soon a ghost connected to the shipwreck will need her help. The next day she is drawn into a new ghost story. What does the spirit want? What happened to the ship? What is its story? Will Lin be able to solve the puzzle of the haunted shipwreck or will she and the people she loves sink under the weight of the mystery?

This story has some mild paranormal elements.

title: Seasons of Love: Inspirational Amish Romance Complete Series (Heart warming complete Amish Romance series)
description:
*** An Amazon #1 best-selling Amish Romance ***
The Seasons of Love complete series is now available in a box set !
(Only $0.99 for a limited time and free on KU)

Dive into the heart of the Amish countryside with the complete boxed set of the Seasons of Love series, where the Mast siblings' journey toward love and self-discovery unfolds through the changing seasons.
Amid the simplicity and challenges of Amish life, they face the complexities of growing up, the intricacies of family bonds, and the pursuit of heartfelt desires.
From Virtue's rebellious rumspringa and Celia's quest for freedom, to Charity's struggle between duty and desire, Hope's courageous step towards independence, Philip and Joanna's slow-burning love, and Grace's journey towards finding a new family, each story weaves a rich tapestry of love, self-discovery, and the unshakeable strength of family ties.
Experience the warmth of spring's promise, the heat of summer longing, the turbulence of an Indian summer, the bounty of the harvest, the chill of winter whispers, and the renewal of blossoming into family! Each sibling's story is a standalone read, yet together, they create a compelling saga of life's seasons in the Amish community.
Will Virtue choose freedom or community? Can Celia find love on her terms? Will Charity follow her heart? Can Hope defy expectations? Will Joanna's love kindle a fire in Philip's heart? And will Grace find a new beginning in the embrace of the Amish family?

Embark on this unforgettable journey through the Seasons of Love. Allow the Mast siblings to guide you through their lives of faith, love, and the beauty of finding oneself in the embrace of family and community. This complete series boxed set promises to captivate and inspire, leaving you with a renewed sense of what it means to truly love and be loved.

Don't miss the chance to own all six heartwarming tales. Let the Seasons of Love series sweep you away to a world where love blossoms in the most unexpected places. Grab your copy today and let the Mast siblings lead you through the seasons of their lives—each one a testament to the enduring power of love and family.

What readers are saying about the Seasons of Love 

Book 1: Spring of Virtue
★★★★★ Excellently written and a page turner. I loved the entire book. I didn’t want to put it down. The characters came to life as I read the story.
★★★★★ A Very Desirable Story. Grace Lewis did a wonderful job of writing this book. The characters had interesting personalities, the story line was different, and the outcome was endearing. I definitely recommend this book.

Book 2: Summer of Longing
★★★★★ An Endearing Story, for sure! I loved the main characters from the very beginning. I loved the way the story unfolded right before your eyes. Definitely a book to be recommended. The author wrote a truly lovely and welcoming story. Thank you.
★★★★★ Great read. Just downloaded today and read it already. Hard to put down once you start reading. It takes off right where the first book ends. Can’t wait to start the next book.

Book 3: Indian Summer Turmoil
★★★★★ A sweet story full of surprises. A wonderful cast of characters and a heart stirring story line.

title: I Loved You First: A Romance (Camp Eden Book 2)
description:
Lev Hayes was wrecked.

For a while, everything was going his way. It seemed as if his life couldn’t get any better. Then he learned his fiancé cheated on him, and he was completely blindsided by it.

In an instant, he lost all trust in women and swore them off forever. He knew he would never be in a relationship again. So the last person he expected to meet was his soulmate.

title: Deadly Divination (Familiar Kitten Mysteries #29)
description:
When retired witch Brighton Skeenbauer attends a lecture debunking Coventry's "superstitions," she doesn't expect the presenter to end up dead - especially not arranged in an ancient ritual pattern that only a real witch would recognize. Too bad Brighton's the only real witch left in town (unless you count her wisecracking familiar Meri, which she usually doesn't).

Between investigating the murder, protecting genuine magical artifacts masquerading as "historical curios," and helping her daughter pack up for her new modern dream home, Brighton's got her hands full. And that's not counting a suspicious academic who keeps turning up with his camera at the worst possible times.

At least her granddaughter Hekate still chats with a family ghost. Too bad nobody believes her - except Brighton, who probably should stop encouraging this sort of thing. But what's a witch to do when murder and magic collide in a town that's forgotten its own history?

DEADLY DIVINATION is a cozy paranormal mystery featuring a sassy familiar, a haunted house with attitude, and a witch who really just wanted to enjoy her retirement. (or does she?)

title: Shorty Thompson and Jubal Stone: U.S. Marshals: Bloody Hunt At Red Rock: A Western Adventure (A Jubal Stone: U.S. Marshal Western Book 34)
description:
A brand new Western adventure from Paul L. Thompson and Casey Nash!

It had been over two years since Jubal Stone and Shorty Thompson had shared trail together. When Stone takes Thompson up on an invite to an elk hunt in New Mexico, neither man knows the fate that awaits him.

Coming back to camp from a bone-chilling fall morning hunt, the marshals quickly realize their harvested elk has been stolen, along with their riding horses and pack horses. From the signs left behind, Shorty quickly determines it is Indians who did the dirty deed. When the two lawmen follow the horse tracks back to the Indian camp, they see a half dozen hogans and smoke coming out of the top of all of them. Shorty slowly looks back at his compadre and says, “Navajo, Jubal.”

But that’s not all these lawmen see. What have they happened upon? Will this elk hunt be the respite these marshals were looking for or just the opposite?

Come along with these frontier lawmen and find out. It’s guaranteed to be an adventure you’ll not soon forget.

title: Shorty Thompson and Jubal Stone: Whoever Took 'Em Will Pay: A Western Adventure (A Jubal Stone: U.S. Marshal Western Book 36)
description:
A brand new Western adventure from Paul L. Thompson and Casey Nash!

When Marshal Shorty Thompson’s ranch in New Mexico is raided and his best friend, Buffalo Blackburn, and his son, James, are taken, Thompson sends word to Jubal Stone for help. Together, these marshals will once again put their skills to work to track down the guilty.

Soon, however, these frontier lawmen will realize their worst fears. They are tracking Comancheros. Will they find Buffalo and his son before they are sent to Mexico to be sold into slavery?

Grab your copy today!

title: Poems From My Heart
description: It?s never too late to follow your passion. Miriam Kam Weisbrod?s resolute desire to publish her poems developed later in life. Now at the tender age of 95, after writing over 200 poems, her wish has come true. Miriam began writing thirty years ago after her husband died. Writing kept her busy and helped her deal with the loneliness and uncertainty of being widowed after forty years of marriage. The secret to her long life, she says, is having a passion for something and a positive ?Many opportunities are waiting for you / And only you can make them come true.? Miriam beckons us to look at the world the way she sees it, full of beauty and wonder. She shares her love for life with us, in her ?Old Man Time, you tricked us / But still, we?re glad you picked us.? Miriam?s poems help us realize how lucky we are to be given this miracle of life and the gift of living it surrounded by the beauty of nature. ?To write, you have to be a bit of a dreamer.? This book opens the door to that dream.

title: Peaceful Waters
description: Fen McCallin is devastated by the loss of her friend and lover, Donovan, to suicide. His spectre haunts her as she works through the stages of grief. Friends would like to help her, but she knows she must do this alone. Deciding to sail a route to the Baja she and Donovan had always wanted to do but never found the time, Fen emerges on a physical journey during the day and an emotionally insightful journey of love at night. This journey makes her strong in body, mind, and spirit and leads her back into life ready to love.

title: The Betrayal: A Lifetime of Regrets
description:
Camila and Nic seemed to have it all—a loving marriage, two beautiful children, a cozy home, and a promising future. But beneath the surface, their perfect life was beginning to crack. Feeling neglected and unfulfilled, Camila embarks on a secret affair that threatens to unravel their world. As the truth comes to light, Nic is blindsided by the betrayal, left grappling with the disintegration of the life he once knew.

From the bustling streets of New York City to the quiet suburbs of Virginia, Camila struggles to adapt to suburban life. An absent mother and a wife without a domestic bone in her body, she is often lost in her own desires. Nic, consumed by his demanding job, fails to notice the growing chasm between them.

Yearning for emotional connection, Camila finds solace in the arms of another man. Her affair, initially a clandestine escape, spirals out of control, leading to a devastating revelation that shatters their family. Nic, blindsided by the betrayal, must confront the painful reality of his crumbling marriage while their two children struggle to understand the upheaval in their once-stable home.

As the story unfolds, readers are taken on an emotional rollercoaster through the perspectives of both Camila and Nic. Camila’s path is one of self-discovery and redemption as she grapples with guilt and strives to make amends. Nic embarks on his own journey of healing, navigating the complexities of forgiveness and the need to provide stability for their children.

The A Lifetime of Regrets delves deep into themes of infidelity, family dynamics, and personal growth. It explores the ripple effects of betrayal on an entire family, painting a vivid and poignant picture of love, loss, and the enduring human spirit. Ultimately, it is a story about the power of forgiveness and the challenging path to healing

title: Pete's Magic Teeth
description: Pete's Magic Teeth was written when the author's daughter, Shannon, was just eight years old. This book is both useful and delightful for kids and parents alike.

title: Gifts to Share: Volume 1
description: GIFTS TO SHARE A FASCINATING COLLECTION OF RHYMED VERSES CREATED IN A SONNET FORMAT PROVIDING MYRIAD INSIGHTS AND OBSERVATIONS OF LIFE EXPERIENCES. EACH OF THE 75 ENTRIES IS DESIGNED TO STIR THOUGHTS AND EMOTIONS WHILE SHARING A BIT OF WISDOM ALONG THE WAY.

title: The Attenuating Puritan
description:
Embark on a contemplative journey with our altruistic hero, a reflection of purity in words and deeds, yet occasionally marked by ancestral toxins. With unwavering conviction, he dances under the world's weight, marching into the unknown, his steps marked by hope and staunch faith. 

 Bound by a noble quest to restore the splendor of Eden, his every gesture is a sacrifice, a stride towards the pristine and divine. Amidst adversities, he stands a fortified pilgrim, mastering the shackles of mind and body, emerging as a triumphant victor, a mirror to us all daring to confront our reflections. 

 He is the champion of tainted sacraments, a crusader against the clutches of heavy metal and forever chemicals, hinting that our destinies might be cradled in such hands. As we tread the path of love eternal, each step taken is righteous, a gentle move towards the boundless cosmos that binds us in love. 

 In The Attenuating Puritan, every breath taken is a whisper of attenuation, every quenched thirst a sigh of grace, and every bounty received a step closer to the celestial, encapsulating a tale of hope, resilience, and the ceaseless quest for the divine amidst the terrestrial.

title: Life After Death: Heaven and Hell Are Real Places
description:
Choose you this day whom you will serve (Joshua 24:15). Every day, we are making that choice, whether we realize it or not, to live a life that reflects God or a life that reflects Satan. Whichever way we choose to live our life, at the end of that life comes death, then the judgment (Hebrews 9:27). You can believe this or not. The Word of God is faithful and true, and anyone's disbelief of the Scriptures cannot change it or make it become untrue. It only concludes one of two things: if you are right, then you did not waste any time; but if you are wrong, then the wrath of God lieth at your door, and hell will be your final "nonresting" place.

He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him. (John 3:36)

I pose the question to you: Where do you think you will go after you die? There is a place called heaven, and there is a place called hell, and you have the choice now to decide which place you will reside for all eternity.

I hope believers who read this book will become even further assured, through the Scriptures, that they will see their loved ones again in heaven; and those who do not believe will receive the clarity they need to know that there is life after death, and the decision for where they spend eternity is their choice.

title: Mission Baby Tooth Mysterious Quest: Book 3
description: The adventures continue as the tooth fairies are on a mission to find a lost baby tooth. They have decided to take their dog along who helps in more ways than one. This mysterious quest will take you on a journey that has a heartfelt message and lesson in knowing the right thing to do.

title: Dangerous Journey: Book One
description:
Dangerous Journey is a story of two friends who set out on an adventure to race their vintage Corvette in the Moscow to Beijing Road Race and end up as the means for al-Qaeda to make nuclear bombs to destroy ten famous American landmarks and to kill millions of Americans.

When nuclear scientists Dr. Chance Taylor and Dr. Charles Brown need a break from their work on America's atomic weapon systems, they soon find themselves with the type of demanding work they were trying to get away from.

title: Traitors in Treblinka
description:
Embark on a gripping journey through the annals of history in 
"Traitors in Treblinka"
, a poignant and deeply personal narrative that unveils the harrowing confrontations with horror within a society once considered among the pinnacles of civilization. Delving into individual experiences, the novel unveils the tragic degradation of values and decency that precipitated the collapse of a once-thriving Germany.

As you navigate the pages, brace yourself for an emotional roller coaster, where each chapter unveils a new layer of Nazi brutality that seems unimaginable. The stories woven throughout are not fictional tales but poignant accounts extracted from survivors, witnesses, and those who experienced the atrocities firsthand in cities, towns, and villages within the conquered Nazi territories.

The magnitude of our collective loss remains immeasurable. How many brilliant minds-composers, scientists, leaders, and inventors-succumbed to the insidious grasp of the crematoriums? The tragedy persists an unending echo of the past. "Traitors in Treblinka" serves as a compelling snapshot of history, meticulously crafted to provide contemporary readers with a visceral understanding of the horror, deprivation, and revulsion that defined the Holocaust. Immerse yourself in this illuminating narrative, and bear witness to a chilling chapter in human history that should never be forgotten.

title: As the Crow Dies (Moonlit Monsters) (Misty Hollow #8)
description:
Charlie:

Things in Misty Hollow are bad.

So bad, in fact, that we’ve left the Hollow to seek shelter from Swamp Thing in the freezing cold of the Faerie land of Winter.

Now, you might wonder why we’re seeking refuge in Winter, which is currently ruled by the evil would-be queen, Janara, and you’d be right to ask.

Unfortunately, Fox Aspen, otherwise known as Prince Reynard of the Autumn Court, was nearly fatally wounded by Swamp Thing. In his weakened state, the only portal he could open was to Winter.

So, here we are.

If I hoped being in Faerie would somehow help Fox heal, that’s simply wishful thinking. The truth is, Fox’s condition is worsening before my eyes. As someone who works on healing others, I feel utterly helpless because I can’t seem to do anything to help him.

Not only that, but I’m painfully aware that my feelings for him run deeper than I realized. That’s a difficult reality to face—not only because I don’t know if Fox will survive, but also because I’m breaking the heart of another man—my best friend, Thorn.

But matters of the heart will have to wait, because soon we find ourselves prisoners of the enemy in an enemy land, and Fox is our only hope for escape to the safety of Haven Hollow.

I can only hope we make it.

title: Donut Kill the Messenger (Familiar Kitten Mysteries #34; Mysteries of Meri)
description:
Kinsley Wilson is about to get herself into a whole lot of trouble. Join Kinsley, Meri, and their motley group of friends for another zany adventure.

Full blurb coming soon!

title: Son of Prophecy
description:
A Realm of Mystical Kingdom once ruled by light has fallen into darkness. An ancient crystal, the heart of balance, is shattered, and with it, the kingdom crumbles. Chaos spreads. Hope fades. Yet whispers of a prophecy remain—of one who will rise to restore what was lost.

Fourteen-year-old Devin Reelms finds his life altered when his destiny is revealed to restore the fallen realm. Thrown from the life he knew, he is forced into the unknown. Among exiles, he finds refuge. They see what he cannot—a power buried deep within him. A destiny he cannot escape.

The search begins. A relic must be reclaimed before it is lost forever. Led by a clue to the forest, where a cursed being awaits, bound by unfinished magic, he speaks an ancient language, and the spell shatters. A guardian awakens! But the shadows grow bolder!

Returning home, he finds only devastation. Trust turns to fear. Loyalty becomes accusation. Shackles bind where once there was safety. But fate does not forget.

Upon release, he seeks his lost allies, only to find them vanished. Seeking answers, he lands up at a mystical garden - where he meets mystical beings and finds hope. There was sign of light ! but the war is closer than ever. He has no choice but to fight. Captured. Dragged into darkness. Brought before the enemy. Now, one choice Become the darkness, or stand against it.

There is no turning back!

title: The Convergence: Restoration (The Convergence Series, #2)
description:
When reality fractures, love becomes the ultimate weapon.

Engineer Samantha Reed's perfectly ordered world explodes the night golden light erupts from her hands. Across the city, artist Connor Blake watches impossible shadows flow from his sculptures, defying every law of physics. Neither understands that these abilities mark them as living echoes of souls who died 150 years ago—souls who sacrificed themselves to save reality itself.

Now reality is breaking again.
Cosmic forces write aurora patterns across daylight skies. Reality storms tear through populated sectors. And the zealous Williams organization deploys weapons designed to destroy souls so completely that no form of existence—not even reincarnation—would survive.

But Samantha and Connor are more than just targets.
They're the key to completing a restoration that was interrupted a century and a half ago. As shared dreams and inexplicable compulsions draw them together, they discover their connection transcends this lifetime—and that their growing love might be the only force powerful enough to heal wounds carved into the fabric of existence itself.

The hunt is closing in. Reality won't wait. And some bonds are stronger than death.
Margaret Carter, guardian of forbidden historical knowledge, races to reach them before the Williams assassins strike. Emergency coordinator Nina Reyes struggles to protect civilians as magical disasters escalate beyond all containment. And deep in classified archives, evidence emerges that everything the magical authorities believe about unified consciousness—and the couple who wields it—is catastrophically wrong.

In this breathtaking sequel to The Broken Magic, two souls separated by lifetimes must choose between individual survival and cosmic salvation. Their victory heals the broken reality around them, letting them become guides for a restored world while keeping both their love and their lives..

Perfect for readers who loved The Ten Thousand Doors of January, The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue, and The Priory of the Orange Tree.

⭐ Enemies-to-lovers across family bloodlines
⭐ Reincarnated soulmates with preserved memories
⭐ Contemporary fantasy with hidden magical history
⭐ Engineer meets artist in a love story that could heal the universe
⭐ Complex worldbuilding with philosophical depth
Some missions transcend individual authority. Some love transcends time itself.

title: Almost Forever: A love or bond that felt eternal, perfect, and meant to last forever, but didn't
description: Avyukt once believed life could be figured out with ambition and effort. But adulthood isn’t that simple. As he juggles career aspirations, complicated relationship, and the ghosts of choices he didn’t know he was making, he’s forced to confront a truth many of us avoid. What if the life you built is not the one you truly wanted? Almost Forever is a raw, heartfelt journey through the lives of those who fall, get up, and still keep wondering, what if? A story where love, regret, and resilience collide in the most unexpected ways.

title: The Continuing Journey of Faith by an Ordinary Bloke
From Heartbreak to Hope: Requestors on the Frontlines of Organ Donation
authors: Robert E. L. Lucas|Barnes and Noble Publishers
description:
"A powerful journey through loss, compassion, and the life-saving gift of donation."

From Heartbreak to Hope opens the door to the rarely seen world of organ donation requestors. These quiet professionals courageously walk into life's most tragic moments and ask grieving families to consider a final act of generosity. These conversations, born of heartbreak, create second chances for the thousands waiting on the national transplant list.

Through moving real-life stories, raw insights, and proven practices that increase organ donation, this book illuminates the emotional complexity, ethical challenges, and profound humanity at the heart of one of medicine's most sacred conversations.

An unflinching yet deeply hopeful exploration of human connection, From Heartbreak to Hope honors both the families who say yes and the requestors who guide them, revealing how skilled conversations can transform grief into life-saving gifts.

title: Reapers & Reading (A Library Witch Mystery Book 16)
description:
Rory and her magical family are deep in preparing for the holiday celebrations, but the local Grim Reaper throws a spanner—or scythe—in the works when the town of Ivory Beach is chosen to host the Reapers’ annual summit. Not only is the town swarming with angels of death instead of Santa’s elves, but the situation gets even less cheery when a Reaper apprentice is found to have been murdered.
