Now Rory and Xavier must unmask a killer among a group of people who reap the souls of the dead for a living - not to mention capture someone without a physical body to put behind bars. As the threat of the Reaper Council hangs over the town like a scythe, they have no choice but to race against the clock to unveil the culprit before the year’s end.

And if the head Reapers *do* show up in town, will their relationship survive the fallout?

title: The Palace of the Four Winds: Book One of the Horde-Blood Series
description:
Four clans bound by treaty.

One city on the brink of war.

And a warrior who was never meant to survive peace.

When Rian of the Horde rides into Deyorra, he is a living reminder of old enemies and fragile alliances. Sent to the Palace of the Four Winds as a symbol of unity, he quickly learns the truth—peace is only another battlefield.

In the courts of power, daggers hide behind silk and smiles, and in the north, Lady Morgana of the Morvath stirs the embers of rebellion. Her champion, Fender, fights like something no longer human.

As dark forces rise and the bonds between the clans begin to break, Rian must choose where his loyalty lies—before the storm he was sent to prevent consumes them all.

The age of peace is ending.

And the shadow is only beginning.

A 90-minute epic for fans of Brandon Sanderson and Rebecca ancient rivalries, forbidden loyalties, and the warrior who might end them all.

title: Nari Sakthi- A Rabbit hole Phenomenon: It cannot be given to you, and it cannot be earned. it can only be realized
Three Big Words
description: This important minibook discusses the vital difference between Old Testament atonement and New Testament remission and forgiveness.

title: Blueprint For Building Strong Faith
description: This powerful minibook presents a five-part "blueprint" to help believers receive whatever they need from God.

title: Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 30 (Diary of a Surfer Villager #30)
description: The EPIC conclusion to Season Two is here!In Book 29, Jimmy nearly destroyed Ciaran in the Nether, but Ciaran slipped through his grasp and managed to become stronger than ever.Jimmy's squad is shrinking. The Ender King's army is a shadow of its former glory. Is it even possible for them to succeed against the evil plans of Ciaran?And, no matter what happens with Ciaran, the creators of Jimmy and Claire will be revealed! If you can take the excitement, read Surfer Villager 30 now!*********This book is NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 29
description:
The Accidental Minecraft Family has fought tooth and nail against armies and enemies to have finally arrived at a stronghold. Now they must explore its mysterious halls to find the end portal room. But are they really ready to jump through into the end?

Everything they've faced so far has made them stronger and more capable of handling whatever Minecraft can throw at them, but then again, none of them have ever fought an ender dragon before.

What will the ender people they've heard so many stories about really be like? Have they gotten strong enough to fight an ender dragon? Will Mom even let them steal it's egg?

title: Diary of Steve the Noob 34
description:
29,500 words with 20 pictures. 
 
Steve returns home after the gruesome battle with the spiders. 
 
Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. 
Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2018 Mojang / Notch / Microsoft

title: Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 8 (Diary of a Surfer Villager #8)
description: Jimmy must save his parents and find Herobrine before it is too late!After his confrontation with the mysterious bat outside his kitchen window, Jimmy is determined to find out who is behind everything.There are so many mysteries swirling has Mr. Blaze gone?What was the deal with the zombies and the spider herd?Why were Herobrine's diaries stolen?And, of course, what is up with the Rainbow Creeper?Grab your copy of Surfer Villager 8 to find out the answers.***Please note that this book is NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 26
description:
The Accidental Minecraft Family have faced the toughest challenges imaginable—multiple armies, red-eyed mutant mobs, insane evokers, power hungry maniacs and managed to survive them all. But with their village in ruins, they now must face their biggest challenge a legendary creature feared by all in the Overworld.

Will the inevitable battle prove too strong?

title: Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 2 (Diary of a Surfer Villager #2)
description: Book 2: Dream Realized!Jimmy Slade and Emma have created an awesome surf park and are earning huge piles of emeralds. What could go wrong?Biff the bully is jealous and acting like a meany, but when his cousins Claire, the fashionista, and Clayton, the athletic nerd, arrive, will he be on his best behavior or ...?Don't miss Book 2 in the ongoing Surfer Villager series.*****************************************************Be sure to read all my other unofficial Minecraft books for kids. Just head over to my Amazon author page for a complete listing.Please The Surfer Villager series is inspired by Minecraft and is NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 21
description:
The Accidental Family finally—FINALLY!—meets Baba Yaga.

So many stories in the Codex and hints from the outside world have pointed right here, right to her as their way out of Minecraft. Does she have the power to send her home? And more importantly, will she?

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 24
description:
The Accidental Minecraft Family is one step closer to their goal of getting back home. They have all the pieces needed to summon the wither, and are only waiting for netherite armor before they fight it.

Of course, those plans go out the window when their greatest enemy yet shows up on their doorstep. Ortho has clearly gotten stronger, but at least he has a beacon with him.

Will The Accidental Minecraft Family be able to defend the village, defeat Ortho, and get the beacon?

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 20
description:
After the major battle with Bonaparte, and seeing the villagers truly are prepared to live on their own, the Accidental Minecraft Family feel it is finally time to leave the game and get back to the real world.

A final day of exploring unveils even more of the strange mysteries of the world.

Will they stay to solve them? Or will they go through the portal to Baba Yaga's realm and finally escape Minecraft?

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 17
description: The Accidental Minecraft Family finally gets to explore the nether! The need for potion materials spurs them on, but they still must solve the mystery of the duplicate castle.Meanwhile, their newfound nether friends are begging for help to clear out their home from the bullying Piglin Brutes that have taken over.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 27
description:
Ortho is gone.

The wither is dead.

There's only one beacon left to get before they return to Baba Yaga so she can send them home.

But first, they have to help restore the Kingdom Village--now known as Witherton--back to its original glory. They'll say their final (well, final final final) goodbyes, and it's off to an ocean monument.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 19
description: The Accidental Minecraft Family is sad to leave the newly established kingdom village and all their friends, but the quest to find Baba Yaga must continue if they have any hope of ever getting back home.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 8
description: The Accidental Minecraft Family continues their search for a witch, in hopes one can help them get out of the game and back into the real world.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 18
description: Aggressive Piglin Tribes. Invading Armies. Treasure!With pressure mounting the nether and fear of Ortho's return, The Accidental Minecraft Family and friends rush to finish the defenses on their village while they prepare for war below. Will their forces be torn between the overworld and the nether as two battles threaten to rage?

title: Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 17 (Diary of a Surfer Villager #17)
description: Can the squad rescue Emma and destroy Entity 303's missing pieces?Jimmy and Claire have finally put an end to the blending, but at great cost. Claire is now a part of the Rainbow Creeper and Emma was sent to Baby Zeke's dimension and enslaved by a witch.Jimmy and his squad must succeed in rescuing Emma and finding the two remaining pieces of Entity 303 before he can become return to his powerful, evil self. Once again, Jimmy is called on to use all of his powers -- known and unknown -- to save his friends and all of Minecraft.Is it possible Jimmy's heroism has been depleted? Are his days of dominance over? But, more importantly, will he go surfing in this book? You'll never know unless you read Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 17, so grab your copy now!**************************This book is NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 15
description: The Accidental Minecraft Family pauses their quest to get home to help their friends.

title: Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 21 (Diary of a Surfer Villager #21)
description: Season Two begins!As Book 21 of the Surfer Villager series opens, several years have passed since the events of Book 20 and the world of Minecraft is finally recovering from the evils of Entity 303 and Lamashtu.The world is calm and stable. War is a distant memory. Commerce and art flourish. Jimmy and his friends are living their best lives, surfing and hustling emeralds.But, all of that is about to change ... and not for the better!*********************************************NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 25
description:
The Accidental Minecraft Family has faced an army before, but nothing like this.

Ortho is back, and it looks like he’s collected every pillager in the world! Plus a powerful Omega Beacon he is using to enhance his forces. But that's not even the worst part. He and his pillagers have learned to mine and craft, taking away the family's biggest advantage.

How will The Accidental Minecraft save the village from such an overwhelming foe?

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 33 : Search and Rescue: NinJack Attack!
description:
After their successful journey in and FINALLY out of Minecraft, The Accidental Minecraft Family has officially been recruited to help lost outsiders within the game.

With their pet cat, Bruce Lee the Scar-Faced Ninja Attack Kitty from Japan finally safe at home after being rescued from the game, they get their second mission and first official an young outsider named Kai who's trapped in a modded ninja seed.

Despite the seriousness of the situation, Jack has never been more excited. Two of his all-time favorite things Minecraft and real ninjas!

Epic ninja battles, a mysterious tournament across an unfamiliar seed, and a forest full of strange and magical fox creatures all threaten to keep Jack from completing his mission. Can the ninja boy and his cat save Kai or will the other (dare we say real?) ninjas defeat them?

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 22
description:
The Accidental Minecraft Family has finally figured out exactly what they need to get home. They've started collecting the Omega beacons and are headed back to the Kingdom village to look for clues to find the others.

But nothing ever goes as planned.

They stumble across an abandoned village and a strange, red-eyed golem. Will he be friend or foe?

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 28
description:
There is only one thing left for The Accidental Minecraft Family to find before Baba Yaga can send them home. And they'll have to go to The End to get it.

With an idea of where a strong hold is, it's time to go dungeon diving to build a portal to a place that even Jack and Kate have never been.

Will The Accidental Minecraft Family survive in The End long enough to find the last item?

title: Hatchamob: Book 4
description:
The king is gone. The districts are rebuilding. The capital is flourishing.

Meet up with all your favorite characters—Ellie, Ridge, Panda, Copper, Neptune, Hawke, Scorch, Alice, Jamal...EVERYONE! Will Alice and Jamal find success as new royalty? Will Hawke and Scorch tie the knot? Will Ellie and Ridge adventure off to find out what really happened to Ridge's mom? Follow their stories to see where the peaceful era will bring them.

Can the good times truly last?-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The best-selling authors of The Accidental Minecraft Family series, bring you another unofficial Minecraft adventure, that combines the world you know and love, with a new twist—the collecting and battling of Pokémon-style animal companions called hatchamobs, complete with arena battles and crest winnings.Hatchamob was written for fans of Minecraft and Pokémon alike, ages 8-14. It is great for 3rd, 4th, 5th, or 6th graders and beyond! This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights.Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2022 Mojang / Microsoft

title: Dave the Villager 11: An Unofficial Minecraft Book (The Legend of Dave the Villager)
description:
A 13,000 word story. 
 
Where did the time-travel pearl take Dave? What’s going on with Steve? Will Dave be able to save Carl? 
 
A new phase of Dave’s adventure begins! 
 
Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. 
 
Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2019 Mojang / Microsoft

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Ya Darn Cat
description:
The most requested book in The Accidental Minecraft Family Universe. The story that started it all!

Dad, Mom, Kate, Jack, and their family cat, Bruce Lee the Scar-Faced Ninja Attack Kitty from Japan (Who Smells like Poop) woke up one day, stuck in Minecraft. They didn't know how they got there, and they didn't know how they'd get out.

So just how exactly did they end up in Minecraft? Only one person knows, and well, he isn't exactly a person.

The only thing he's saying, is "meow."

title: Dave the Villager 5: An Unofficial Minecraft Book (The Legend of Dave the Villager)
description: An 18,000 word adventure! After weeks at sea, Dave and his friends finally make it back to the mainland. But things have changed since they’ve been zombie pigmen have invaded, and the villagers have been enslaved. Can Dave save them? This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009 - 2018 Mojang / Notch / Microsoft

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 6
description: "You really ARE respawners!" In order to keep their friends safe, The Accidental Minecraft Family can't just ignore the nearby enemy. They decide to enter the pillager outpost, and are met with an unexpected surprise.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 32: Search & Rescue: First Mission
description:
Finally! The Accidental Minecraft Family is home! Well...most of them.

Bruce Lee The Scar-Faced Ninja Attack Kitty from Japan (Who Smells Like Poop) was not in the living room with the rest of his family. His crazy kitty antics had gotten him in all kinds of trouble before, but this could be his stickiest situation yet.

He was still stuck in Minecraft!

As the rest of the family watched him on their TV, chasing chickens no less, with looks of surprise, shock, and maybe a tad bit of annoyance on their faces, Dad answered the door. Could the visitor from the secret organization hold the key to saving Bruce?

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________

The best selling series, The Accidental Minecraft Family, begins a brand new offshoot! Your favorite Minecraft family stars in this action-packed, Minecraft adventure! Now that they're out of Minecraft, the family is given an opportunity to help other outsiders trapped in the game. While still a part of the original main series, these books go in a fun, new direction.

If you're a new reader to the series, you can start here! Or feel free to go all the way back to book 1 to follow the family as they live and learn in their first in-game Minecraft experience. This set going forward is a slightly higher reading level but still packed full of the same crazy kitty, goofy Dad jokes, and Minecraft action you love!

title: Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 1 (Diary of a Surfer Villager #1)
description: Want your kids to read more books? Give them books they WANT to read.Does your young reader prefer playing video games to reading? Do you want to get your child away from screens for a while? The Minecraft-inspired Diary of a Surfer Villager series is the perfect solution.Build Readers with Exciting Books—Written About What Your Kids Already Minecraft!The Diary of a Surfer Villager is the epic tale of a visionary, 12-year-old Minecraft villager, Jimmy Slade, whose only dream in life is to become a surfer—even though there are no waves in the Overworld. With hard work, perseverance, and the help of his best friend, Emma, he is able to realize his dream.But soon, dark and mysterious forces begin to reveal themselves, and an epic adventure begins! Can Jimmy figure out how to defeat the enemy forces before it is too late? Can his old friends and new allies ensure their survival, and ... the survival of all Minecraft?Read the Diary of a Surfer Villager to find out!!!***Please This book is NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 4 (Diary of a Surfer Villager #4)
description: What will happen in Capitol City? After Jimmy's vision of Entity 303, anything could happen. Jimmy joins Biff, Claire, and Biff's parents on a journey to Capitol City. Along the way, he will encounter strange rabbits, delicious watermelon, and the rainbow creeper! What does it all mean? Is Claire a good egg? Is Clayton not as suspected, or worse? Is it possible to stuff one's face? Read book 4 of the ongoing Surfer Villager series to find out the life-changing answers to these questions!!! ********************************************* Be sure to read all my other Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 1 Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 2: Into the Mine Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 3: Rescue Mission Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 4: Mysterious Objects Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 5: Pursuit of Herobrine Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 6: No Rest Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 7: Herobrine’s Minion Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 8: End Times Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 9: Apocalypse The Complete Baby Books 1-9 (also available in audiobook) Baby Diary of a Chicken Jockey, Book 10: Return of the Warrior Diary of a Baby Zombie Pigman, Book 1 Diary of a Baby Zombie Pigman, Book 2: Konichi Juan Diary of a Baby Zombie Pigman, Book 3: Training Creeptastic (also available in audiobook) Diary of a Werewolf Steve (also available in audiobook) Minecraft Halloween Tales Diary of Origins Diary of Prophecy Diary of Apotheosis Diary of a Minecraft Bat (also available in audiobook) Diary of a Spider Chicken, Books 1-3 Diary of a Surfer Villager, Books 1-10, an ongoing series A Notchmas An unofficial Minecraft holiday story inspired by Charles Dickens’ A Christmas Carol (also available in audiobook) ********************************************************* Amazon  Computers Computer Games Computer Entertainment Internet Programming Computer Software Children’s Adventure Books Children's Sword & Sorcery Fantasy Books Children's Action & Adventure Literature Children's Computer Games Children's Video & Electronic Game Books Children's Nonfiction Computer Books Children’s Humorous Literature Media Tie-In ________________________________ minecraft diary, minecraft books, minecraft novels, minecraft gifts for kids, books about surfing, surfing fiction, surfing stories, surfing biography

title: Diary of a Surfer Villager, Book 3 (Diary of a Surfer Villager #3)
description: Book 3: What now?The red-eyed squid has closed down Jimmy and Emma's surf park, and Jimmy's dream of surfing for a living seems dead. Emma remains positive. Jimmy seeks an explanation and some one, or some thing, to blame.Questions that need to be Will they be able to re-open the surf park?Could an Evoker be behind the bizarre squid attack?Where has Clayton gone?Find out the answers to these and many more questions in Book 3 of the Diary of a Surfer Villager.***NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.***

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 2: (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: “Baaaaarrrbeeecuuuuueee!!!” The adventure continues! The family, and of course, Bruce Lee the Scar-Faced Ninja Attack Kitty From Japan (Who Smells Like Poop) get deeper into Minecraft, learning more about the game as they go. They’re finally starting to feel somewhat comfortable, but what happens when Dad fishes up an old book that tells a very strange and very scary history of the game? More crafting, mining, monsters, and crazy kitty antics galore! *** The Accidental Minecraft Family books were written for kids age 7+ who love to laugh and love Minecraft! These easy to read Minecraft books are great for kids ages 5-7, 6-8, 8-10, and 9-12! This Minecraft series is for 2nd grade, 3rd grade, 4th grade, and beyond. As such, they are clean and age appropriate, with plenty of family values, sibling rivalry, and fart jokes to keep kids entertained! They are great Minecraft kids books for ages 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 +, and even parents like them! There are plenty of dad jokes to go around! If you’ve been having problems finding books for 8 year old girls or boys, or Minecraft kids books for ages 9, 10, or older, these Accidental Minecraft Family books are great to keep them laughing and motivated to read, and even to learn to enjoy reading. This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2020 Mojang / Microsoft

title: Hatchamob: Book 2: An Unofficial Minecraft Book
description:
Ellie and her new friend Ridge stumbled across the king's horrible secret. Or rather, the secret stumbled across them, in the form of a raging behemoth that almost destroyed their village.

They now know the entire kingdom is in danger, and Ellie takes it upon herself to warn the villages. No easy task while being hunted by the king's best the infamous bounty hunters called the Redstones. Known for their expert hatachamob handling skills and devious system of spies.

Discovering the secrets of the strange glowing cube her father left and freeing her parents from the king’s hold will have to wait. Ellie, Ridge, and their hatchamobs have an entire kingdom to warn.

Will they be able to outwit and evade the Redstones long enough to keep the villages safe from the king's madness? Will the secrets of the Power element finally be revealed? Will they ever find enough food to keep Ridge happy?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The best-selling authors of The Accidental Minecraft Family series, bring you another unofficial Minecraft adventure, that combines the world you know and love, with a new twist—the collecting and battling of Pokémon-style animal companions called hatchamobs, complete with arena battles and crest winnings.

Hatchamob was written for fans of Minecraft and Pokémon alike, ages 8-14. It is great for 3rd, 4th, 5th, or 6th graders and beyond!

 This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights.
Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2022 Mojang / Microsoft

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 9
description: The Accidental Minecraft Family is sent on a quest to gather some rare items!

title: Diary of Nate The Minecraft Ninja: (An Unofficial Minecraft Book) (Diary of Nate The Minecraft Ninja (Unofficial Minecraft Diary and Action Series) Book 1)
description:
Summer vacations are when kids go to theme parks or sunny beaches. For Nate Noonan, summer vacation was when he was recruited into a secret Ninja Order called The Ender Ninjas. With school starting up again, Nate must balance his duties as a ninja with his responsibilities as a student. But things get complicated when his best friend Katie adopts a chicken and he receives his first mission to stop a group of illagers!

A brand-new series by bestselling Minecraft author Write Blocked, Diary of Nate the Minecraft Ninja is a hilarious action comedy that's entertaining for kids and parents alike.

Perfect for reluctant readers and fans of Minecraft! Kids love Write Blocked's Diary of Nate the Minecraft Ninja series and can't get enough of his books. If your kid is struggling to get into reading, these family friendly books have been converting reluctant readers into voracious readers. These books are filled with tons of Minecraft references, hilarious jokes, and fast-paced action! These books are prefect for kids age 6 and above. Teachers call these books incredible at getting kids to find their love of reading!

Want your kids to take a break from playing video games and watching YouTube, this is the book for you! These are books kids put down video games to read!

NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG. Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2022 Mojang / Microsoft

title: Diary of Steve the Noob 40 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book) (Diary of Steve the Noob Collection)
description: 25,500 words with 22 pictures. Off to an adventure in the mines! This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2019 Mojang / Notch / Microsoft

title: The Legend of Dave the Villager 2: An Unofficial Minecraft Book
description: A 24,000 word story. Dave’s adventure continues! Dave and his friends have escaped the Nether, but now they’re stuck in an endless snow biome with the person Dave hates most in the whole world... Steve! And if that wasn’t bad enough, the evil Herobrine is hunting for Dave, and he’s not going to stop until he finds him! This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights. Minecraft ®/TM & © 2009-2018 Mojang / Notch / Microsoft

title: Peanut Butter & Pickle Sandwich (Sammy Bird)
description:
Sammy has plans of making a most delicious snack…a peanut butter and pickle sandwich! He sets out to gather all the ingredients but will Sammy be successful in finding everything he needs? Read the book to find out!

About the Sammy Bird Series
This is a picture book series about a quirky bird named Sammy and his amusing misadventures. Sammy is a little red bird with a BIG personality. The books in this series are light-hearted and engaging. They are interactive stories where Sammy engages in fun and silly conversations with the reader. There are over 100 books in the series and counting!

From the Author
I like to think of myself as a storyteller who brings families together through the medium of picture books. Whether it is between a parent or child or a grandparent and child. These stories are intended to be light-hearted and funny and most importantly the stories engage young readers to be a part of the story itself. My hope is that these books will help build upon a child's love for reading and allow families to laugh and enjoy spending time together. As a reader, you can look forward to many more adventures with this silly and fun-loving red bird! -V. Moua

About the children's Peanut Butter & Pickle Sandwich
This is a read aloud kids book. The target age range audience is appropriate for pre k preschool and young children who are at the following stages of I can read level 1, I can read level 2, I can read level 3 and I can read level 4. This is a book that any child will love, especially at bedtime. It is suitable for parents to read to their children. Also, grandparents will enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren. This series is part of the short bedtime stories for kids. Read this children's book FREE as part of your PRIME or Kindle Unlimited membership!

title: Soul Decrees
description: The book you hold in your hands is small but mighty. The principles within these pages changed my life. I believe with all my heart they will change yours, too. I offer this book with my fervent prayer that it will bring healing to your soul and enable you to begin living in daily victory. Inside, you’ll find scriptures you can read and decree daily and those scriptures will bring massive, supernatural might and miracles into your life. You will release an inflowing of healing power into your body and soul and you will begin to experience restoration of relationships, supernatural health, financial prosperity and victory in every area of your life. From my own experience, I can tell you that the authority of God’s Word will establish your victory and bring healing to every issue you face. I wrote this to give you powerful decrees that, when spoken, will establish healing in your body, your marriage, your family, your business and every part of your existence!

title: Blood Track (Tracking Jane #5)
description: A Woman and her two dogs track down the troublesome past they have avoided. Jane McMurtry and Joe Brenner trained together and fought side by side during her first tour in Iraq. Now Joe has gone into hiding after allegedly murdering his wife and children. Like Jane, he suffers from PTSD. Like Jane he lost two legs in an IED explosion. Like her, he has benefited from specialized prosthetics. And because of the common past he and Jane share, it will fall on Jane to find him and bring him back into the fold. For Jane this will come at a heavy cost. To help him, she will have to face the demons the two of them share and the feelings she once had for him.

title: The Valley, Fire on the Mountain, Book 2
description: In this thought-provoking prophetic allegory written in the genre of The Final Quest, author Rick Joyner takes you on a journey of learning how to defeat the enemy, both within and without. Trek through the Valley of the Shadow of Death with a band of bold Christians as they discover strategies to overcome enemy strongholds, defeat death, and set the captives free. Along the way, you’ll experience the joys of close fellowship while gleaning wisdom from Elijah, Enoch, and a very special dinner host—the Lord Himself.

title: Fort Selden
description: After twenty years of fighting; first the rebels and then the Apaches, Jonas was tired of it all and decided to return to his unfinished cabin to find the solace and peace that he craved. Yet once he’d returned the place to a livable condition, he realized that life wasn’t just about existing. He missed the camaraderie of the soldiers and he really wasn’t cut out for the life of a hermit. So, Jonas decided to return to his duties as an army scout at Fort Selden. The cabin would still be waiting for him when he was ready. But by the time he reached the fort, he discovered that in the brief time he’d been gone, there had been changes, and some of them would almost make him regret his decision to leave his cabin.

title: Gus
description: When aging cowboy Gus Matthews gets fired from Rocking-C ranch for laying out the mean-spirited, know-nothing foreman, he heads north for Oklahoma, where he finds work with the Aronsons, an elderly couple whose ranch has seen better days. What should be easy work for kindly employers quickly turns sour when Gus discovers that the neighboring Slash-M ranch have been rustling the Aronsons’ cattle. Even worse, Gus becomes the corrupt sheriff’s main suspect in a string of violent crimes plaguing the county. Gus finds an unlikely ally in beautiful Libby, but she has her own reasons for wanting to take down the Slash-M, and the Aronsons’ seductive daughter Sara has secrets that could get Gus killed if he lets himself get too close…

title: Upon A Legacy Sworn: Book I - The Years of Bone and Ash
authors: Drew Dobson|Robert Lee Beers|Brian England|Terry Sparks|Donna Brawley|Suzanne Driggs
description:
History was written with our blood. What then of our dreams?

– Our Legacy, by Dael ap Owain

And Earth wept.

Some claim a legacy, once sworn and attested, shall last as long as memory binds it to the living. Others hold, the need for the living is moot. A legacy thus sworn binds the very soul to its course. Binds it into eternity if necessary.

Amidst the ashes and ruin of invasion, with his world crushed beneath the iron heel of the Krîll legions, Earth's last druid swears an oath to lead humanity's salvation.

And so is born the age of Dael's Legacy.

A desperate remnant of humanity holds fast. High amongst the windswept crags of Cymru (Wales), where once the druids worshiped their gods, they prepare to leave earth and all they know. They follow the last druid across the maelstrom divide of space and time to the heart of their destruction, to Krîl-lôc.

It is the year 462 anno Domini and the Roman Empire lies in bloody ruin beneath the Krîll legions’ steel. Indeed across the whole of Terra, verdant mother to mankind, the earth cries for her dead. Hope lies in ashes. And yet . . .

Dael ap mystic, warrior, sorcerer and seer, raised by druids, trained by Myrddin, and barely returned alive from the mystery-shrouded Cloud Kingdoms beyond the Eastern horizon. Now in command of eldritch powers long lost to the Western World, he will match himself against Drägorîsh, High Shaman to the Krîll Empire. Here he begins his fight to undo the horror unleashed across Terra, and mankind’s very existence rests in the balance of Dael’s gambit.

Bound within a prophesy’s doom, this is a tale of two ages, the pledge that spans them, and of two worlds woven tightly into a legacy’s tapestry. A legacy wrought in love and desperate hope, in sacrifice and courage against the ruin of despair.

title: The Arctic Chase: A Chase Fulton Novel (Chase Fulton Novels Book 22)
description:
In the desolate, foreboding world of the Arctic Circle, American covert operative Chase Fulton and his team of elite fighters must wage war against an enemy that cannot be beaten as they face the wilds of the frozen North on a desperate mission to rescue the crew of a doomed Russian icebreaker that may be lost to the timeless, crushing Polar Icecap.

In the world of international espionage, nothing is what it appears to be, and Chase must learn this deadly lesson time after time as he battles not only the unrelenting environment but also the unseen forces behind what may prove to be the final battle he will ever live to fight.

Hold on to your frozen seat as the unthinkable tragedy that calls the team to the Arctic proves to be only the tip of the treacherous iceberg. Unimaginable global consequences, terror of unrivaled magnitude, and diabolical forces bent on unleashing ultimate hell on Earth force Chase and his team to dive deep inside themselves and claim the burning fortitude to drive their swords into the hearts of the enemy before they can deliver their crushing blow against the core of humanity.

Feel the determination, taste the depravity, and experience the thunderous power of the ageless battle of ultimate freedom and security against the forces of global demise.

title: Pursuit in the Keys (Florida Keys Adventure #18)
description:
Time goes by, but the brotherhood never dies.

Admiral James Harrington spent forty years commanding and training elite special forces operatives. A war hero and revered leader, he was a father figure to thousands of elite warriors. Then, less than two months after retiring, he disappeared. Vanished without a trace.

Armed with only a cryptic lead, former Navy SEAL Logan Dodge teams up with brothers in arms from his past to search for their lost leader. Logan and his band of lethal friends embark on a hunt that takes them across South Florida. But if they want to find the revered Admiral, they’ll have to face off against a well-armed, organized, and ruthless gang of outlaws.

Severely outnumbered and on their enemies’ home turf, the group of former SEALs will stop at nothing to accomplish their mission. But can they save the war hero before he ends up in a body bag?

Chalk full of motorcycle chases, brutal fistfights, and swamp and jungle shootouts, plus the usual brew of scuba diving and boating exploits, Pursuit in the Keys is Logan’s most action-packed adventure yet. It’s mano a mano. Winner takes all. Do or die in this explosive installment in the bestselling Florida Keys Adventure Series.

title: Menace in the Keys (Florida Keys Adventure #17)
description:
A mysterious group of modern-day pirates has descended upon the Florida Keys…

Like buccaneers of old, the violent outlaws strike fast, hard, and without mercy. Stealing and pillaging whatever they can. But unlike bygone swashbucklers, the cunning criminals utilize advanced modern technology and bribes to fuel their vast, intricate, well-oiled operation.

When an attack strikes close to home and results in the death of a local, former Navy SEAL Logan Dodge can no longer turn a blind eye to the mayhem. Going on the offensive, Logan finds himself pitted against the deadly array of lowlifes who threaten not just his family and friends, but the fate of the entire island chain.

Evil is rampant, and Logan Dodge is on the hunt in this action-packed, high-octane, explosive adventure in the Florida Keys. Regardless of who comes out on top, one thing’s certain: life in the Conch Republic will never be the same.

title: Patient Zero (Coastal Fury #33)
description:
It should have been a relaxing day of R & R for Ethan Marston, but when he finds a drowning woman while out boating near Tybee Island, relaxation is out the window. And it all gets worse when, after rescuing the woman, she suffers from violent outbursts before dying of her mystery ailment. When Ethan reports the death, he discovers that this woman isn't the only afflicted person, and each one is testing positive for rabies. Things get curiouser when Ethan is called in for a new MBLIS case in Cancun, where an almost identical scenario is playing out.

Now, it's up to Marston and Holm to uncover the terrible truth behind the mysterious illness, as well as the connection between Tybee Island and Cancun, before they find more dead bodies in their wake.

title: The Expanding World (Diary of a Super Girl #4)
description: The funny and entertaining story of Lia Strong, in Diary of a Super Girl, continues on with another hilarious adventure. Lia is never sure what's in store for her but finds that normal challenges, such as school elections and the wrath of her classmate, Wendi, can be just as tough as fighting giant robots and super enhanced beings. However. with her usual positive attitude and the help of her friends, Lia manages to battle on and face up to anything that crosses her path. You are sure to enjoy this fabulous sequel. It is another great diary book for girls 9 - 12, and in fact, girls of all ages will love this series!.

title: Out of this World (Diary of a Super Girl #5)
description: In book 5 of the Diary of a Super Girl series, Super Teen, Lia Strong makes a very unusual new friend and her life becomes even more eventful than ever. However, sometimes first impressions can be deceiving and Lia is forced to learn the hard way when it comes to making the right decision. This latest addition is filled with even more humor and will keep you laughing from start to finish. It is another fabulous and very funny book for girls of all ages.

title: The Cowboy's Secret Baby (Sweet Water Ranch, #2)
description:
His first Sunday back in the church of his childhood, he gets selected as a volunteer to co-chair the Harvest Fest committee with the girl he could never forget.

Waitress and single mother Louise Olson wouldn’t have missed church to stay home with her sick daughter if she knew the congregation was going to volunteer her to head up the town’s Harvest Festival. Truth be told, she didn’t mind, and would have enjoyed it.

The problem was Sweet Water’s superstar hockey golden boy was back in town, and he had been named her co-chair. That even wouldn’t be a problem except he didn’t know he was a father – of her daughter.

Hockey forward Ty Hanson grew up on a ranch in Sweet Water, North Dakota, but once he left for college he never went home. He wouldn’t be there now except for the off-season injury his agent wanted kept secret so it didn’t affect his marketability, so he was to hang out in Sweet Water, North Dakota until the season started.

When Ty and Louise are forced to work together, Louise is compelled to tell Ty the secret she’s kept from everyone. The attraction between them still burns strong, but Louise was on the verge of getting married and years of neglect and betrayal lie between her and her accidental summer fling.

Will Ty pick up his cowboy hat and come back home? Can he convince Louise that he’ll stay this time?

title: Rampage's Enchantment (Ares Infidels MC, #6)
description:
Rampage can’t get over those few short weeks in Tennessee. He went to help out his club to end a human trafficking ring. In the process, he meets a woman who takes his breath away and makes him think about the future. However, she has issues of her own to deal with. Ones she isn’t fully willing to share. Before he can get her trust and find out what those are, she betrays his brother’s woman and, in his mind, him. He’s determined to find her in order to make her pay. He hardens his heart and returns to Tenillo with vengeance on his mind. Only no one seems able to find her. His desire to make her pay smolders.

Ember knows that she betrayed someone she was starting to think of as a friend and she hates that she did. She hates the fact that the man she has come to know, the one man who has ever attracted her, now hates her. She runs. She has too much to lose. She can’t let the danger get too close. Maybe if she had spoken up, things might have been different. However, that’s what she’s come to expect in life. She will never be truly happy.

However, her luck runs out and she has to turn to the ones she betrayed for help. Will they help or tell her she’s on her own? The hate she sees in Rampage’s eyes makes her sick. Rampage isn’t willing to hear what she has to say. However, her agony and terror causes the Infidels to question what they really know. Terrible things are revealed. Hearts are opened wide. New beginnings are on the horizon, but only if they can remove the threat before the threat finds and takes her.

Rampage and his club will do everything in their power to make sure he never loses Rampage’s Enchantment.

title: Smoke and Ashes (Emily Slate #3)
description:
When FBI Agent Emily Slate discovers a series of fires are being used to cover up the murder of firefighters, she’ll need all her skills as an investigator to flush out the killer.

A string of arson cases brings Emily to the historic city of Charleston right as she’s in the middle of trying to find the woman who killed her husband. Her personal investigation will have to wait, however, because the local community is on edge, having already lost two firefighters in these tragedies.

But before she can get very far, more blazes erupt throughout the city, causing a panic within the ranks. In each one, the victim is burned alive, from both the inside and out. And at each scene, a strange symbol remains in the rubble, leaving Emily to believe they’re working with a sick and twisted individual who has their sights set on something even bigger.

With the number of fires increasing by the day, and a city in panic, Emily must race against the clock to uncover the killer before they burn the entire city down with their rage.

title: Battleflight (Lone Wolf Squadron, #2)
description:
Misfit Pilots, Missing Colonists, and Murderous Mercenaries

The frontier is beginning to feel like home for the ragtag team who came together to fight the good fight and found a family in the process. Commander Beau Ward must take the fight to the pirates to rescue the rest of the colonists.

To succeed, he needs a bigger team.

The Admiral assigns the men Beau needs, but the newcomers are, unsurprisingly, misfits with a secret of their own that could compromise the entire mission.

Meanwhile, Katy has a different kind of miracle to pull off. One that draws attention from all the wrong places…

With increasing danger on every front, can Beau pull the squadron together in time to win the battle and bring the colonists home?

Lone Wolf Squadron might have won the initial battle, but they still could lose the war.

title: A Love so Bright (5 Amish Brothers #2)
description:
Secrets build walls between the members of the Phillips family. Will love and forgiveness be enough to break them down and bring the family back together?

Abraham Phillips is keeping a secret from his friends and family. He’s hiding his older brother Colin who has returned from the Englisch world. But his secret is preventing him from building a life with the woman he’s falling for.

Leah Chandler is like family to Ester Phillips. Together they have a thriving quilting business. She feels fulfilled when it comes to working but feels something is missing. She thought that the missing piece was Abraham but since Ester and Jeremiah’s wedding, he’s been keeping his distance.

Leah is almost ready to give up on Abraham when his affection gives her a bit of hope. Leah knows that Abraham is keeping something from everyone. She’s determined to find out what it is.

What will happen when Leah discovers Abraham is keeping his brother Colin a secret?

Will she share the secret and if she does will that tear Abraham away from her forever?

Find out if love prevails in A Love So Bright

title: Talon's Enamorment (Ares Infidels MC, #10)
description:
A chance meeting months ago set up a desire within Talon. A second meeting only increased that desire. He hadn’t been thinking too much about settling down until meeting Lorelei. Sure, his club brothers were dropping left and right into marital bliss, but he hadn’t thought he’d be lucky enough to have what they had. Meeting Lorelei and her young son, Zavier, had changed that. He began to hope and dream.

Only after the second meeting, when an angry man confronted Lorelei in a parking lot, Talon hadn’t seen or heard from her in months. He’d given her a way to contact him and she hadn’t done it. Thinking she wanted nothing to do with him, he tried to forget her and move on.

One day, a quick message from his club president changed all that. Lorelei and Zavier were back. He wasn’t going to let her get away this time. As he started to get to know her and her son, he found out Zavier’s father was causing issues. He was insisting on having his son no matter what he had to do. Talon was determined to prevent that from ever happening. This was on top of the club’s continued efforts to clean up Tenillo and find out if the other Fairchilds family members were involved in the illegal world in Tenillo.

Lorelei had been left to raise her son alone. His father wanted nothing to do with them initially, and neither did her adoptive family. She struggled, but she was making it. Her determination to meet her son’s needs was her number one priority. She hadn’t wanted a man in her life, but she couldn’t forget about the sexy, breathtaking biker she’d met twice.

Upon meeting him for a third time, she came to realize quickly that he was set on making her his, and he’d do whatever it took to make it happen, even take on her evil ex. More surprises and secrets were revealed about Tenillo. The club had to get more blood on their hands. Talon would stop at nothing to ensure his new family and the one he planned to grow with Lorelei were protected, no matter the cost.

When the chips stopped falling, one thing was obvious to all who met them. Talon’s enamorment with Lorelei would never fade or die. He was in love for the rest of his life, just like she was.

title: Just a Cowboy's Best Friend (Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch North Dakota #2)
description:
When Teagan Lepley is asked to cat-sit by a kindly lady in town, she wasn't expecting the neighbor to be so "friendly." So she asks her best friend to hang out with her so she can honestly say she's busy. What she wasn't expecting was the entire town to think that there is - finally - something more going on between her and her best friend. Something more than the great friendship they've always had.

Deuce Zimmerman is happy to hang out with Teagan. There's never been anyone else whose company he's enjoyed more. But when she disappears, he panics, and it's possible he might, for the first time, be tempted to cross the bonds of friendship into something more.

Will one housesitting assignment bring these two best friends together? Or will it ruin their friendship forever?

Reviews for Just a Cowboy's Best 

★★★★★ “Pretty sure this is the most I've laughed while reading!!” - Sandy

★★★★★ 
“Reasons I enjoyed this Whimsical Inspirational Witty Unpredictable Romantic Easy-to-read Happily Ever After Wonderful characters Page-turner Original Realistic Entertaining” - Janna

★★★★★ “Another humorous romance, filled with advice for living like Jesus in the good and the bad times.” - Jeannette

★★★★★ 
“I would definitely recommend reading this book. I didn't want to put it down, but thought I better get some sleep or I would be very sleepy at work!” - Terry

★★★★★ “Another great book by Jessie Gussman. I find it incredibly relaxing to read her stories. And I love this story of friends to more. Perfect for those who love reading Christian romance fiction.” - Linda

Books in the Flyboys of Sweet Briar Ranch in North Dakota 
Just a Cowboy's Convenient MarriageJust a Cowboy's Best FriendJust a Cowboy's EnemyJust a Cowboy's Midnight BrideJust a Cowboy's Love StoryJust a Cowboy's Secret BabyJust a Cowboy's Shotgun WeddingJust a Cowboy's Princess

title: When the Rivers Swell (When the Rivers Swell #1)
description:
Fans of dual perspective books will love this Christian historical fiction novel about the Hebrew Exodus from Egypt.

RIVERS OF BLOOD. HORDES OF FROGS. THE WRATH OF GOD ON EARTH.

Hannah has lived her life as a farmer’s daughter in Ancient Egypt, taught by her Hebrew parents to fear the Egyptians. She soon finds herself mixed up with a dangerous group of rebels fighting to free her people from slavery.

Meanwhile, Anipe’s wealthy, Egyptian family has just moved to Pi-Ramesses, unaware of the growing upheaval. Things go from bad to worse when a mysterious man named Moses arrives from the desert and calls down a series of deadly plagues.

After the girls meet, they must decide if their budding and unlikely friendship will end in disaster or be their salvation.

title: The Brothers of Duncan Ranch Complete Series + Bonus Story
description:
Four swoony cowboy brothers, four strong women, four couples who may - or may not - fall in love. And add in a cousin who has a huge crush on a rodeo star best friend with some insta-love action at Christmas and you have sweet romance overload.

One grumpy brother needs help to plan a party he doesn't want to be involved with. So he brings in a high class party planner from the city to handle it all. Sparks fly when she uses her sunny disposition to try to win him over to her big ideas.

Another brother unexpectedly runs into his high school sweetheart soon after she returns to town after years away. She's still mad at him for cheating on her when she was miles away in college. He doesn't understand why she doesn't want to be friends again. To say she's insulted would be an understatement.

Yet another cowboy brother is boss to the ranch hands. The lone woman in his crew works harder than any of the men. Life hasn't been kind to her, and neither is her boss. Against his will, he starts to admire the woman but he'd rather take a bullet than let her know. Once he realizes what was right in front of him, he may have ruined the best thing that's ever happened to him before he gets a chance to let her know.

And finally, the youngest brother comes home after years in school becoming a veterinarian. When he meets the woman his family is raving about, he can't warm up to her. He overheard her say something nasty about one of his brothers and he can't get past it. She knows he hates her and when she tries to find out why, he walks away. There seems to be no way these two will ever get along.

But that's not all... A cousin who's all grown up now comes to town for Christmas and comes face to face with the rodeo star she's idolized for years. She embarrassed herself on the dance floor and is sure her chance with her crush is destined to remain a wish. But an ugly sweater competition might pave the way for a fresh start. There's always a little magic at Christmas!

It all happens on a ranch in Big Sky Country. A ranch nestled in the valley with an amazing mountain view. Who wouldn't fall in love in a place like this?

Books in this collection 

A Party Planner for the Cowboy
A Second Chance for the Cowboy
A Rare Beauty for the Cowboy
An Open Heart for the Cowboy
The Bonus - A Christmas Kiss for the Cowboy

title: Amber Alert (Coastal Fury, #32)
description:
When a school bus full of American children goes missing in the Dominican Republic, the tragedy causes a tremendous stir. Add the suspicions of one of Ethan's old flames that this is the work of a local drug cartel looking to gain leverage on the United States, and that's all that's needed for Marston, Holm, and MBLIS Miami to get involved.

But things get complicated fast, especially when there are hints that a far more twisted hand is behind the disappearance. Is this terrible kidnapping merely the work of base criminals or just the preamble to a far more sinister crime? Either way, if Ethan can't unravel the tangled clues in time, it won't just be his life on the line, but the lives of dozens of innocent kids.

title: The Cafe on Amelia Island (Seven Sisters Book 2)
description:
A hearwarming sisters saga full of hope, humor, and heart...

Tori Wingate knows that spending the entire summer on Amelia Island running the family-owned Riverfront Café means she’s falling right into the arms of a new man for a brief romance. But the more she realizes that all she wants to do is sail into the sunset with the handsome doctor…the more life proves it has other plans.

Her sister Raina is not only looking at the end of a marriage and the start of a life she never imagined, she’s charged with recouping money that has disappeared from the Wingate Properties accounts. And while widowed Grace struggles with the challenge of being a single parent to a unique child, patriarch Rex Wingate faces his own trials on the road to recovery.

When the clouds roll over the café on Amelia Island, the Wingate women learn over and over again that the bond between seven sisters is as strong as steel, as gentle as an ocean breeze, and as lasting as their family legacy.

The Seven Sisters Series

The Wingate women are unique and unforgettable...but they all share inner strength, abiding love, a few quirky traits, and the ability to support each other through every challenge. This family is founded on love and laughter and a sisterhood unlike any other.

When their father suffers a stroke, all seven adult daughters instantly come together to support their mother, run the family business, and lean on each other as they always have. But as they gather at their parents' beach house on Amelia Island, the sisters soon learn that some are struggling in life and love, and picking up the pieces of the businesses along Wingate Way isn’t going to be easy.

The Seven Sisters series will consist of seven books with recurring characters, continuing stories, heartbreaking and hopeful moments, later-in-life romance, a touch of mystery, and lots of happy tears.

All of the books will be available in digital, paperback, and audio formats, launching in Spring, 2023.

The Beach House on Amelia Island (book 1)
The Café on Amelia Island (book 2)
The Bookstore on Amelia Island (book 3)
The Florist on Amelia Island (book 4)
The Chocolate Shop on Amelia Island (book 5)
The Dressmaker on Amelia Island (book 6)
The Inn on Amelia Island (book 7)

title: Deadly Connection (Cooper Harrington Detective #2)
description:
GOLD MEDAL WINNER of the 2017 Global E-Book Awards in Mystery. 
 
Coop's case takes an unexpected twist when he discovers the dead body of his latest client. 
 
A newcomer to Nashville with a troublesome problem requests an emergency meeting with private detective Cooper “Coop” Harrington. When she fails to keep her appointment, Coop and Annabelle, his faithful friend and assistant, become worried and go in search of their new client. Their hopes for a quiet Sunday are dashed when they discover her dead body. 
 
Coop and Annabelle find themselves immersed in the investigation, uncovering tenuous links to a handful of suspects. With the help of his loyal golden retriever, Gus, and meddling but well-meaning Aunt Camille, Coop works to untangle the web of connections to expose the motive and identity of the killer before anyone else is murdered.

title: Searching for Khloe (Eagle Point Search & Rescue #7)
genres: Romance|Romantic Suspense|Military Fiction|Suspense|Military Romance|Contemporary|Small Town Romance
description:
She thought secrets would tear them apart; instead, they brought them together.

Khloe Moore has secrets. She came to Fallport, Virginia, under false pretenses, only intending to stay for a short while. Over a year later, she’s found the town has everything she’s ever wanted, including friends, a supportive community, and a boss she kinda wants to smack—sometimes with her lips, sometimes with her hand. But when Raiden’s beloved dog is in serious medical danger, all of Khloe’s secrets come spilling out when she risks her privacy to save him. 

Since leaving the Coast Guard, Raiden Walker has lived a quiet life as the town librarian. But he has secrets of his own. Horrors from his last mission in the military. Torments he endured as a kid. What he does in his basement every Friday night… It’s easier to keep his head down and avoid tight connections, even with the men he spends time with on the Eagle Point Search and Rescue team. His four-legged search partner is his best friend. And when his bloodhound’s life is in peril, the last person he expects to save him is Raid’s equally standoffish library employee.

Khloe and Raiden never thought they’d find the one thing they’d always longed for in each other—a loving partner. They’d sniped at one other for so long, once they stopped trying to hide their true selves, they were blindsided by their connection.

Settling into their newfound relationship is exciting…but hardly smooth sailing. Both have skeletons in their closets that aren’t content to stay put. On top of that, a member of their community is doing his best to discredit them both. They’ll have to fight to build a life together in the small town they consider home. And it will take each and every one of their friends—people only too happy to accept them exactly as they are—to ensure they get their happy ending.

** Searching for Khloe is the seventh and final book in the Eagle Point Search & Rescue Series. Each book is a stand-alone, with no cliffhanger endings.

***Bad things happened to our hero in the past, and even worse, to his loyal canine coworker, so please be aware before reading. Justifiably, something equally horrible happens to his enemy. Which might technically require a warning, but…we think you'll agree that anyone who harms animals deserves to suffer.

title: Wild Hex (Tyson Wild Thriller, #59)
description:
A sinister murder.
A deadly obsession.
An unbreakable curse. It gets weird this Halloween. When a paranormal investigator dies under mysterious circumstances in a supposedly haunted mansion, Tyson and his Navy buddy, JD, delve into the supernatural. But there has to be a logical explanation for this impossible murder. The deputies plunge into the unknown and discover a web of intrigue and deceit. They uncover a horrible truth, and malevolent forces will do anything to keep this terrible secret hidden. To complicate matters, the owner of an occult book store is murdered and a coveted grimoire stolen. To unmask a killer, the deputies must risk everything. Is their investigation hexed? Their beliefs will be challenged, and one of them may not make it out alive. The search for Dizzy’s guitar continues, JD overindulges and pays the price, and Teagan has a decision to make. It’s ghosts, ghouls, and gorgeous beauties this Halloween as the deputies bring their brand of justice to the Florida paradise. "If you like thrilling tropical adventures, you'll love Tyson Wild.” Scroll up and grab your copy of Wild Hex today!

title: Dark Mask (Charli Cross #8)
description:
Hey little kid, want some candy?

Still on bereavement leave and dreading her upcoming birthday—a byproduct of the kidnapping and murder of her best friend in high school—Detective Charli Cross doesn’t feel much like celebrating. She’d much prefer being called in to investigate a reported homicide at a neighborhood playground. Until she realizes the young woman murdered was the nanny of the four-year-old son of a wealthy business mogul and a federal judge.

And the boy is missing.

Believing the motive to be about money or a past or future case, Charli and the rest of the Savannah Police Department anticipate a ransom demand. But none is forthcoming.
When another murder and possible kidnapping occurs, with no similarities to the first victims, Charli fears they’re missing a critical piece of the puzzle. And without it, more children may be in harm’s way.

As Halloween closes in, Charli grapples with solving an ever-growing number of homicides and kidnappings in the present...and deciphering the cryptic yet horrifying messages from a kidnapper from the past who’s haunted her for over a decade.

Malevolent and nerve-wracking, Dark Mask is the eighth book in the Charli Cross series from best-selling author Mary Stone—guaranteed to make you: realize the scariest masks are those that hide evil/wonder, and fear, what’s hiding behind the masks we all wear/realize that sometimes a mask hides the devil in disguise/ realize we all hide behind masks. Some are just more sinister than others.

title: Killer Deal (Stella Knox #11)
description:
The price of gold has never been higher.

FBI Special Agents Stella Knox and Hagen Yates are closer than ever to tracking down the one criminal they want to bring to justice more than any other—Joel Ramirez, the dirty FBI agent who ordered the deaths of their fathers. But one horrifying case has bled into the next since Stella moved to Nashville’s Violent Crimes Unit. This time, it’s a shooting in broad daylight near a jewelry store. An apparent robbery.

Except the victim, a two-bit gold trader, is tied to a corruption case in Miami. And the killer didn’t take anything. Not the bag of gold jewelry on the victim. Not the twenty thousand dollars cash in his pocket. And nothing from the jewelry store.

It doesn’t make sense.

When another gold dealer connected with a real estate development in Miami turns up dead, Stella and Hagen take their investigation to Florida. Stolen gold, high-stakes investments, and a shocking connection that hits a little too close to home for Stella intertwine in a web of murder and deceit. Can Stella untangle it before the killer strikes again?

Killer Deal, the eleventh book in the pulse-pounding Stella Knox FBI series by bestselling author Mary Stone and Stacy O’Hare, will make you realize all that glitters isn’t gold.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Major & Molly
description:
He’s an injured firefighter. She’s a physical therapist. He’s in his forties. She’s in her twenties. Two paths that wouldn’t ordinarily intersect cross and sparks fly. Winter Crest is known to be a magical winter wonderland where love could be waiting right around the next corner. Major Holiday and Molly Nicholas just might turn that corner at the same time.

Welcome to Winter Crest Wonderland–where anything is possible.

title: Rags Digs Up the Past: A Klepto Cat Mystery
description: Fasten your seatbelt for an exciting ride with Rags. Rags uncovers items from the long-forgotten past and reveals what could be a wrongly solved crime. This is a story of intrigue and long-held secrets. Leave it to Rags to Rags to expose the facts and lead the charge to deciphering them. In the end the truth comes to the surface, but it takes Rags to identify the culprits. In this story, Rags also saves a friend from terrorist threats, he rescues a playful trickster and his cat, and he reveals the identity of an animal poacher.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Eira & Asanti
description:
After her boyfriend breaks up with her, Asanti decides to take a break from her hectic schedule and go on a holiday vacation. She finds herself in Winter Crest, a charming town full of love and happiness. Asanti intends to spend her time in town exploring and creating new designs for her clothing line. However, fate has other plans for her when an accident occurs, forcing her to change those plans.

Eira, a man who has been hurt in the past, has decided to go back to the player he once was. He's had it with women who can't be faithful, and he's determined to protect himself from being hurt again. When Asanti and Eira cross paths, they attempt to resist the magnetic pull they feel towards each other; but sometimes, the universe has other plans.

title: Brick City Projects Anthology: Volume 5
authors: K. Renee Presents|Shanel|Trinidy|Iisha Monet|Lisa Austin|K. Renee
description:
Busted elevators, broken gates, crack vials, and dusty Section 8 apartments is what you’ll find when you step into the Brick City Projects. There’s a hustle ensuing on each floor because no matter the circumstances, there is always money to be made. If you don’t know this building and these streets, you might wanna watch yaself because the Brick City Boys are always lurking, the boosters be boosting, and the trick jawns be tricking.

You never know what you’ll get when you enter the projects, but it’s for sure going to be an experience you’ll never forget. Welcome to the Trenches – Brick City, Pennsylvania.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Nicholas & Angel
description:
The bottom of the bottle is where Nicholas often found himself. He needed the alcohol to numb the pain he knew he would never escape. His past life would forever haunt him – worse than the ghosts of Christmas past. Nicholas couldn’t remember the last time he was sober during the Christmas holiday, and he had no plans of starting now. That was until his closest friend called him for a favor. Things will change for Nicholas in an instant, but he has to decide if it would change him for the better or for worse.

Angel was tired of life beating her down, and she couldn’t keep relying on her brother to fix her mistakes. Yet, once again, she found herself needing a helping hand, and her brother swooped in to save the day. Only, he couldn’t physically be there to protect her, so he sent someone he trusted; someone she disliked. Now, Angel has to rely on another person to keep her and her two boys safe from more disasters during the holiday season.

Two hearts – both broken for different reasons are forced together. Can they heal one another, or will their resentment towards life have them barreling further into the darkness? The holidays can normally work its magic, but there are some things even the season of giving can’t fix.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Charlise & Christopher
description:
Charlise Anderson, a single mother in Winter Crest, Pennsylvania, has given up on love after a painful breakup. That is, until she crosses paths with the charming and newly single, Dr. Christopher Neal, who's also dealing with his own heartache.

As they navigate the challenges of single parenthood and past hurts, they find themselves irresistibly drawn to each other. Instead of shying away from their feelings, they bravely embrace the possibility of a new love.

'Second Chances in Winter Crest' is a poignant tale of resilience, love, and the unexpected paths that lead us home.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Promise & Hendrix
description:
Winter Crest was the last place Promise wanted to spend her Christmas. Being labeled as the rebel child, spending her not-so-favorite holiday with her parents is unavoidable since Promise is the Maid of Honor to her sister, Truth. After an eventful day, she accidentally slips and the man that catches her, could be the man that is everything Promise never knew she needed. However, with every good man, bad sure does come along with it. Between Promise’s overbearing parents and an ex lurking in the background, will she be able to protect her good or sadly lose it to the bad?

Hendrix wasn’t the typical hood nigga that everyone was used to. He was street smart and book smart. With his business partner deciding to step down, Hendrix is busy around Winter Crest, preparing for everything on top of opening up a new business in order to honor his mom. He knew he would have his hands full with everything work-related, but never expected a woman of Promise's caliber to fall into his arms, literally. Will Hendrix hold on to his Promise or will he allow naysayers to ruin the best thing that ever happened to him?

Join Promise and Hendrix this Christmas while they navigate through the good and the bad, discovering all the holiday cheer that Winter Crest has to offer.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Kandice & Emmanuel
description:
The Wilsons are back and visiting Winter Crest for the holiday.

Emmanuel is a single father Kandice was dating. Everything seemed too good to be true, so she cut things off before their relationship got too deep.

Jada and Damien were rooting for Kandice and her happy ever after, so they worked some magic to make Kandice’s dream come true with a family trip to reunite the couple.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Ozzie & Nycole
description: Winter Crest was home but through all the family drama and a relationship full of turmoil, it didn’t feeling promising for the holidays. Nycole Barns really hated Christmas until Ozzie Grant stepped foot into her life showing her what it meant when people said Christmas was the most wonderful time of the year. Ozzie was so different from her ex. Jump into this amazing novella to see if Nycole can get the loving she deserves.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Enya & Oisan
description: Enya, a struggling mother during the holidays, encounters an old friend, Oisan, who unexpectedly brightens her challenging circumstances. As a widower raising his daughter, Oisan finds solace in the holiday spirit when Enya enters his life. Together, will they embrace the warmth of Winter Crest and find a new way to celebrate the season?

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Kerri & Sleigh
description:
Sleigh was a successful barber in the city of Winter Crest. He also had the perfect life with his girlfriend, Ameka, and daughter, Adore. That was until Sleigh got caught up in unnecessary chaos days before Christmas that had nothing to do with him. Sleigh spent years in jail and lost everything he worked hard for but was grateful he didn't lose the love of his life, Ameka, and his daughter.

When Sleigh was released from jail, he was hit with shocking news. It took everything in him not to lose his mind and end up back in prison for the rest of his life. Will Sleigh overcome what life throws at him, or will he spend the rest of his Christmases and New Years in jail?

Meet Kerri Clause. Kerri was among the top-paid surgeons at Winter Crest General Hospital. Kerri was innovative, beautiful, and successful. She was deeply in love with a man, Nolan Brown, who captured her heart from the day she met him. Kerri wanted nothing more than to spend the rest of her life with him.

After two years of dating, Kerri started to complain about problems in their relationship, and Kerri began to think Nolan was having an affair. Nolan ensured Kerri that there was no one else. That's when shit hit the fan. Kerri was caught up in A Thin Line Between Love and Hate situation which almost made her lose everything, including her life. Will Kerri let Nolan convince her to stay with him, or will Kerri leave Nolan for good?

title: Journey's Aim (Journey Russo FBI Mystery #3)
description:
Ready, aim, die.

Barely twenty-four hours after tracking down a brutal serial killer, Special Agent Journey Russo is thrust into a different kind of hunt. This time, the stakes are much higher. Because the prey are innocents.

And all too human.

In less than two weeks, two families are found murdered in their homes, each victim fatally pierced by arrows. A mysterious feather left on each body serves as a haunting calling card, pointing to a new, sinister serial killer—one eerily reminiscent of the tragedy that decimated Journey's family.

As Journey and her partner track down leads on the distinctive murder weapon, a horrifying reality takes shape. Several types of arrowheads at the scene indicate four potential killers working together. Hunting together. Playing games with the victims that they're guaranteed to lose.

When a third victim is found, his heart pierced with an arrow, the hunt is on. But can Journey and Lucas narrow down the suspects and stop the vicious marksmen before they find their next target? Or will they get caught in the killers' crosshairs?

Journey's Aim, book three of the Journey Russo series by bestselling author Mary Stone, delivers a heart-pounding twist on the pursuit of justice, making 'dead aim' a terrifying reality.

title: Torpedo's Entrancement (Tenillo Guardians AIMC, #15)
description:
Torpedo never imagined when he joined the Ares Infidels that his life would turn out the way it did. He has a close club family, and he really enjoys his life. 
 Occasionally, he wonders what it would be like to have a woman of his own like so many of his club brothers do, but he knows nothing in life is guaranteed. He’s making the most of what he has and enjoying the fun along the way.

That’s until a beautiful woman, Londyn, comes to the club one night asking for help. Now, the club usually helps without a protest if the need is real, except this time, the president’s comments make her walk away without telling them why she came. As the club and, more specifically, Torpedo try to earn Londyn’s trust and learn her secret, they find themselves in a familiar situation, although not a good one.

Torpedo finds he’s determined to make Londyn see they’re perfect for each other, only Torpedo isn’t the only man in her life. When not one but two men turn up in vying for her attention, he’s ready to fight for her even more, and he’ll do whatever it takes. Her history with one of them drives his desire to get rid of them and leads him to make a mistake that almost ends them. As problems are revealed, two people’s history is shared, and desire turns to love. And the club and Londyn are placed in a dangerous situation.

Londyn is used to danger and has no problem facing it. 
 If what she suspects is true, there is a need to rid Tenillo of another evil criminal element. And she’s prepared and capable of getting her hands just as dirty as the club. Torpedo finds he has been entranced by Londyn, and he’ll have to compromise to keep her, but she and the life they can have are more than worth it.

title: Together For Christmas (The Amish Quilting Circle Book 4)
description:
The Quilting Circle ladies have their hands full this Christmastime. If they’re to overcome misunderstandings and bring their latest couple together they’ll have to get creative.

Amanda Kuhn loves her job at the nursery. Now happily married, her sister Martha, is trying to get Amanda to join the quilting circle so they can help her find love. However, Amanda has only just gotten over her foolish crush on Jacob. She’s reluctant to even consider another man at this time.

Dominic Blade has recently returned to Faith’s Creek following his Rumspringa. He’s happy to be home and ready to do his part. His younger brother Jonah is beginning nursery school and begs Dominic to take him on his first day. It doesn’t take long for Dominic to become smitten with one of Jonah’s nursery teachers. He’s devastated when he learns she’s with another man, Jacob Frey.

Amanda is attracted to one of her student’s fathers. Unfortunately, the handsome and kind man is already married. As Christmas approaches it’s time to prepare for the annual pageant. Amanda will finally have to attend the quilting circle when they offer to help with the costumes. 

Can the ladies of the quilting circle bring Amanda and Dominic together in time for the holiday or will they continue to let misunderstandings stand in the way of their happiness?

title: Wild Luck: A Coastal Caribbean Adventure (Tyson Wild Thriller Book 70)
description:
A suspicious death.

A terrible secret.

A brutal truth.
When the winner of the largest jackpot in Florida history dies under mysterious circumstances, Tyson and his Navy buddy, JD, dive into the case.

With no shortage of suspects, the deputies must peel back the layers of betrayal, deceit, and greed as they search for the killer and the missing lotto ticket.

Someone will get rich or die trying.
