title: The Legend of Dave the Villager Books 36–40: An unofficial Minecraft series (Dave the Villager Collections Book 8)
description:
Dave and his friends reach the edge of the world!Dave, Carl, Porkins, Alex and Spidroth are getting near to the End Portal, but first, they'll have to make their way through the mysterious Bedrock City.

This bundle contains The Legend of Dave the Villager books 36–40.

 NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: Hatchamob: Book 11
description:
Uh oh. The cat is out of the bag. Rather, the fox is out of the bag.

How will Pordeaux react to finding out Copper is a legendary hatchamob?

Things might get a little crazy.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Witherton Wonderland (Christmas Special): AMF Holiday Special Series (The Accidental Minecraft Family: Holiday Specials)
description:
It's Christmastime for the Smith family. The only problem is... all of their extended family is busy this year!

Dad can't have the family sad for Christmas, so he comes up with a great 

Going back to Witherton, to spend Christmas with their friends from their very first Minecraft adventure.

title: The Accidental Minecraft Family: Book 41: Search & Rescue: Space Wars 3
description:
If it wasn't obvious to The Accidental Minecraft Family before, it's obvious now—this isn't a simple rescue mission. They thought they'd pop into space, float around a bit, and bring home the missing divers.

Now the entire fate of the Space Wars mod universe relies on them.

People are losing friends, family, homes. The bioroids seem unstoppable. The situation feels hopeless.

But The Accidental Minecraft Family refuses to let tyranny win. When the goings get tough, get tougher.

title: Hatchamob: Book 18
description:
Ellie, Ridge, and Linden found the portal to the elemental plane of Earth. And there's nothing to do but go through and face whatever is on the other side of this mysterious new realm no one has ever visited.

With a slew of new species and a rock hard (haha!) enemy, will the Earth Plane prove too much for our heroes?

title: Transience: A Noble Dark One Book, Part 3 (Diary of a Surfer Villager Book 44)
description:
Ooserkeph's adventures continue....

(Final cover and description coming soon...)

Please This is an UNOFFICIAL MINECRAFT BOOK. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: Maximus (Guardian Security Shadow World #15)
description:
Whatever it takes. As long as it takes.
 
In the shimmering, elite world of Sochi, Russia, where art mingles with power and secrets lie hidden beneath layers of paint, Guardian’s assassin, Maximus embarks on a dangerous mission to dismantle the criminal empire of the ruthless oligarch, Abrasha Molchalin. But when Maximus meets Elena Ivanova, Molchalin’s art curator, the lines between duty and desire blur.
 
Elena, with her keen eye for beauty, finds in Maximus an unexpected confidant and an enigma. As they navigate a shifting landscape of trust and betrayal, their romance blossoms, showing them the colorful possibilities that wait beyond the shadows facing them.
 
Set against the backdrop of Russia's picturesque but perilous Riviera, Maximus, and Elena are pulled deeper into a game of deception and death. Together, they risk everything to bring down Molchalin and escape with their love intact.
 
Enter the elite world where every brushstroke tells a deadly story, every gaze masks a secret, and every heart has a price.

title: Wreckless Love (On Us)
description:
Rushon “Wreck” Porter, the second oldest of the Porters has found love in all the wrong places until he meets Gia. One night of partying turned into a two-year love affair that had just as many ups as downs. Wreck didn’t think this sweet college girl would even know pain until he got to know her.

Gia Miles never saw love coming until she ran smack dab into the mean mugging, tatted-up, guarded, Wreck. The type of love he gave was all she ever wanted--but the pain...the pain that came with it only added to her turmoil.

title: A Sacred Thug Affair 2
description:
Sacred finds herself struggling to juggle, continuing to protect Lorenz’s heart, piecing together her own heart, and trying to keep her job. When the unthinkable occurs, a life is ruined and Sacred is struck trying to make difficult decisions while avoiding hurting others. Will she be able to come out on the winning end, or will it all prove to be too much for such a sacred heart?

Lorenz is being haunted by his past demons that have reappeared. With being betrayed first by his Glams, and then by Sacred; two women who vowed to always love him, he’s feeling more lost than he ever has before and it throws him off his game. When secrets from treacherous acts are revealed, and threaten to alter his future, Lorenz finds himself wondering how he will get through. That’s when the last person he ever could have imagined becomes the person he needs the most.

Rico thought he had it all covered when it came to balancing a double life, but as the saying goes, what’s done in the dark will always come to light. When the truth is revealed, Rico is stuck asking himself will love be enough?

Annika thought she found the one. Unfortunately, he ends up hurting her just like the rest of the men in her life. Annika begins to believe that girls like her will never find happily ever after like the girls in the movies. She decides it's time to face her traumas head on and put her dreams of finding true love on hold.

Trauma is plaguing the crew, and they are all struggling to get through. They all learn that they cannot begin to heal if they continue to run from themselves. Take a ride with everyone as they try and heal without hurting anyone else in the process, and see who is left standing when all the smoke clears.

title: I Left A Lame N*gga For A Millionaire Boss
description: When Natori Hill married her husband, Jabari, it was the happiest time of her life. For ten years she devoted her life to being the perfect wife; she even gave up her dreams to be by Jabari’s side. However, on the night of their sixth wedding anniversary, Natori finds out that all her efforts to be perfect were in vain. Not knowing how to handle Jabari’s deception, she finds herself in the arms of the wealthy Idir MacAlister. What was supposed to be a night of passionate revenge, quickly turns into a whirlwind affair. Natori has fallen in love with another man for the first time in her life; a multi-millionaire who doesn’t plan on letting her go without a fight. Jabari is a firm believer in til death do us part and will not surrender his wife so easily. However, Natori is determined to escape the monster she married or die trying.

title: Purranormal Activity: Mysteries of Meri (Familiar Kitten Mysteries Book 32)
description:
When renovations at Coventry's historic Thornewood Hotel disturb more than just dust, Kinsley Wilson finds herself with a truly spectral mystery on her paws. A mischievous ghost cat is haunting the town, leaving magical mayhem in its wake, and only Bonkers, the lovably chaotic orange familiar, can understand its meows from beyond the veil.

As if phantom felines weren't trouble enough, Sheriff Thorn's department is now required to wear body cameras that somehow capture paranormal activity, threatening to expose Coventry's magical secrets to state officials. Meanwhile, the mysterious Professor Winters arrives with suspiciously specific interest in the hotel's history.

With magical disturbances escalating throughout town, Kinsley, Meri, and the rest of the Skeenbauer clan must solve the mystery of the spectral cat, locate a centuries-old grimoire, and keep Coventry's magical nature hidden... all while ensuring Bonkers doesn't let his newfound ghost-whispering abilities go to his already inflated head!

title: The Black Belt in Leadership: 20 Tested Lessons from the Dojo to the Boardroom
description:
Unlock the mindset, mastery, and mental edge of a true leader through real stories, proven tools, and lived experience.

In The Black Belt in Leadership, world champion martial artist and two-time multinational CEO Aslak de Silva, who has held leadership and board roles across multiple companies, shares twenty powerful lessons forged in the dojo and tested in the boardroom.

This is not just theory. Drawing from real-life examples, personal stories, and decades of hands-on experience, Aslak offers a practical and inspiring guide to help you sharpen focus, elevate emotional intelligence, and lead with calm confidence, even in the most high-stakes environments.

Inside this transformational guide, you'll learn how 

Cultivate a fighter's mindset to stay composed under pressureIntegrate daily practices that build long-term leadership strengthUse "gentle strength" to manage emotions and influence with empathyApply the Black Belt Framework to lead teams and yourself with clarityDevelop unshakable resilience through stillness and self-awarenessPerfect for rising professionals and seasoned executives alike, this book is your blueprint for leading with clarity, grace, and unstoppable momentum. It is grounded in real leadership experience, not just theory.

Step into the dojo and pick up your copy of 
The Black Belt in Leadership
, the ultimate guide to leading with power, presence, and principle.

title: The Strategic Shift: Turning Leadership Experience Into Executive-Level Thinking
description:
In today’s fast-paced and ever-evolving world, strong leadership is no longer enough. Organizations are hungry for strategic leaders who see beyond the horizon, think in systems, and create sustainable value. In The Strategic Shift, Brent Gifford draws from over 30 years of experience in senior and executive IT leadership roles to show you how to make that leap.

This book breaks down the difference between everyday leadership and strategic leadership, offering a practical roadmap through eight transformational principles. From mastering systems thinking to building influence, making decisions under uncertainty, and executing without micromanagement, The Strategic Shift provides the clarity and tools leaders need to stand out, step up, and steer organizations toward the future.

Whether you're a seasoned manager or an emerging leader, this book equips you 

Proven frameworks

Practical assessments

Vision-building templates

Insightful case studies

A 90-day strategic leadership plan

Take the next step in your career. Become the strategic leader your organization needs.

title: Learnertia: Mastering Personal and Professional Resilience in the Age of Disruption (The Conscience of Tomorrow Trilogy: Awareness, Responsibility, and Moral Leadership in Future Societies.)
authors: Dr. Michael McClanahan DBA|Michael T. McClanahan

title: Magnetic Force: Allured by a Billionaire
description:
Marlee Stokes had a difficult childhood. After her parent’s murder-suicide, she and her little brother were left in the care of their aunt. An aunt who did not care about their well-being. When tragedy strikes, the two siblings are forced to flee the only home they knew.

Hunter Benjamin marched to the beat of his own drum. When his father explains the stipulations of Hunter taking over the family’s billion-dollar company, he is unsure how he will comply with his father’s demands.

When he lays eyes on the beautiful, yet rough around the edges, Marlee, it is something about her that makes him gravitate toward the beauty. She has nothing, and he has everything, yet that makes no difference to him.

Hunter makes Marlee an offer that is too good to be true, but with her brother in mind, she makes a decision that could possibly change their lives forever.

title: Bought By A Rich Brooklyn Hitta
description:
After the tragic death of her parents when she was 17, Icelynn’s life went from bliss to agony when she ends up in a position she never applied for—paying off someone else’s debt by becoming a slave by marriage. Eight years later and after years of abuse and turmoil, she is ready to end it all in order to save herself from the pain. However, her unexpected savior comes in the form of a brusque, unstable, sanctioned hitta, offering her life like she has never known. Will Icelynn look her gift horse in the mouth and take it? Or after leaving one control freak, will she decide to be independent and just live her life on her own terms?

One of the premiere architects in New York at 30 years old, Heat in an entrepreneur with multiple businesses under his belt. After suffering a crushing betrayal, Heat is more concerned with busting a nut instead of finding love. When a high-paying job comes across the main business’ table, his heart and his head battle when his eyes lands on the unsuspecting target. Will Heat carry out the mission that has been placed before him? Or will he listen to his gut and go after his heart?

No one wants to be sold to another. No one wants to live in hell on earth. So what if being bought by a rich hitta is better than your current situation? Icelynn finds herself answering this exact question. Since most of her young adult life has been dwelled in so much misery, when her new living arrangements are confirmed, will Icelynn continue to endure a hellish life? Or will she finally get a slice of heaven and live freely? See how the answers unfold in 
book one
 of this African American urban fiction narrative.

title: Brick City Projects Anthology: Volume 1
authors: K. Renee Presents|Shay Davis|Kiara Neufville|Sherri Marie|Quisha Dynae|Natisha Raynor
description:
Busted elevators, broken gates, crack vials, and dusty Section 8 apartments is what you’ll find when you step into the Brick City Projects. There’s a hustle ensuing on each floor because no matter the circumstances, there is always money to be made. If you don’t know this building and these streets, you might wanna watch yaself because the Brick City Boys are always lurking, the boosters be boosting, and the trick jawns be tricking.

You never know what you’ll get when you enter the projects, but it’s for sure going to be an experience you’ll never forget. Welcome to the Trenches – Brick City, Pennsylvania.

This anthology features stories from Shay Davis, Kiara Neufville, Sherri Marie, Quisha Dynae, and Natisha Raynor.

title: Angelica (The Burkes #1)
description:
Angela Reynolds always knew she was adopted, raised with the story that her birth family didn't care about her. Though her adoptive home wasn’t great, she believed it was better than her past—until a single photograph shatters the lies she’s lived with for years and reveals a truth that changes everything.

Jude Kessler has devoted his life to protecting the Burke family, a duty inherited from his late father. When Duncan Burke tasks him with meeting Angela, a woman claiming to be his long-lost daughter, Jude doesn’t hesitate. But their first encounter sparks feelings he never expected—feelings complicated by their age difference and her connection to his employer.

As Angela grapples with her newfound identity and Jude wrestles with his heart, their growing bond challenges everything they thought they knew. Can Jude trust God’s plan for love when it defies logic? Will Angela’s faith in their connection prove strong enough to overcome the obstacles between them?

Angelica
 is book 1 in The Burke Family trilogy.If you enjoy heartwarming Christian fiction with a focus on love, faith, and family, be sure to check out these other series and books by Kimberly Rae 

The Burke FamilyThe Halversons - 10 book seriesNew Hope Falls - 10 book seriesWe 3 Kings - A Christmas TrilogyThe Callaghans & McFaddens - 10 book seriesFostered by Love - 4 book seriesBlackThorpe Security - 6 book seriesThe McKinleys - 3 book seriesHome to Collingsworth - 7 book seriesThose Karlsson Boys - 3 book seriesOther Christian romance books by Kimberly Rae 

Faith, Hope & LoveMarrying Kate

title: Matchmaking the Cowboy
description:
What’s a little covert matchmaking between friends?

Lucy Aveline’s ex has a knack for making her feel small and helpless. She’d avoid him entirely, but he still owns a piece of her heart in the form of the pets he purchased for her but kept for himself. She visits Rosie and Jasmine when she can, vows to avoid another controlling boyfriend by staying single, and focuses on her large animal veterinary practice. Or that’s the plan until some longtime family friends attempt to set her up with former rodeo star Hollis Price. Lucy convinces them to drop the plot only when she promises to find Hollis a good match herself.

Hollis is more concerned with surviving his first Christmas after losing his dad than with finding love. Dad’s champion horse is aging, and rumors started by an unhappy client threaten the horse training business Hollis inherited from his father. When the kind and talented Lucy offers friendship, he accepts simply to add cheer to the season.

It’s not long before his interest in Lucy deepens, but so do problems at his ranch. Saving his father’s legacy begins to look as impossible as earning Lucy’s trust. Especially when her ex continues to use her love of animals against her and she won’t stop pushing her single friends at Hollis long enough to notice she’s the one he’s falling for.

Return to Redemption Ridge, Colorado and enjoy the faith, friendships, and forever-afters in this Christian Christmas Romance.

Matchmaking the Cowboy is book 9 in the Christmas in Redemption Ridge series, but each of the books can be read on their own.

title: Jeb (Lighthouse Security Investigations West Coast Book 9)
description:
When you find the second chance you didn’t know you needed…

Jeb went to the island to find out who had been hacking into his LSIWC programs.
What he discovered wasn’t what he expected. It was so much more.

His childhood past comes back, both to haunt him and give him what he thought was closure. But instead, it gave him a chance for a future he never dreamed could be his. 

Skylar needed help. What arrived was more than she could have hoped for. A chance to forget the past and focus forward on the man she thought she could never have.

Lighthouse Security Investigations
The security and investigation company is filled with handpicked men and women from the SEALs, Rangers, Special Forces, Deltas, and Air Force Special Ops. All trained in CIA Special Operations, the Keepers were the best of the best and ready to take on any mission.

title: Holding Out for a Hero (Baytown Heroes, #9)
description:
Misunderstanding. Miscommunication. Misconception.

Brad hoped the night of fun with the beautiful baker would turn into something more. Too bad she came with drama he didn’t have time for.

Bess wanted to break her streak of bad decisions when it came to men. Too bad the handsome detective was a jerk like the rest of them.

But for Brad and Bess, it would take time… and a crime… to bring them back together. And now they had a chance to put all their misses behind them and discover that the hero they were both holding out for was each other.

A Baytown Boys sub-series.
The Virginia Marine Police and the North Heron Sheriff’s Department - Keeping the county and waterways of the Eastern Shore of Virginia safe, follow along as they find love. Small town romantic suspense.

title: Taken By A Seven Figure Rich Hitta’ 2
description:
Taken By A 7 Figure Rich Hitta 2Some betrayals break you. Some awaken you.

Ryce thought she had it all. A husband. A home. The kind of love that looked good from the outside. But illusions don’t last forever. When Desmond’s mask slips, revealing the monster beneath, she’s left with a choice—stay and lose herself, or walk away with nothing but her pride.

Leaving is the hardest thing she’s ever done. Starting over feels impossible. But then there’s Sahil.

What begins as a shoulder to lean on turns into late-night conversations, stolen glances, and a tension she can’t ignore. His touch is different. His presence is a reminder of everything Desmond never was. And when one man’s betrayal pushes her into the arms of another, Ryce finally remembers what love is supposed to feel like.

But stepping into Sahil’s world? It comes with its own set of consequences.

Reagan’s world shatters with one truth—Sergio is her son’s father.

She spent years mourning a love she thought was lost, only to realize the past was never what she believed. Now, she’s forced to co-parent with a man who refuses to meet her halfway. The weight of it all is suffocating, and the only person she can turn to is her sister.

But in the wreckage of heartbreak, Reagan stumbles upon something unexpected—new love. A love that feels different. A love that just might make all the pain she’s endured worth it.

Heartbreak. Betrayal. Second chances. Redemption.

If you love African American romance, second chances, cheating husbands and boyfriends, heartbreak, healing, and finding love in unexpected places, then Taken By A 7 Figure Rich Hitta 2 by LaKeisha is the unputdownable love story you didn’t know you needed.

title: O and Em: A BBW Hood Billionaire Romance (The Virgin BBW Surrogate Book 5)
description:
Blood don’t lie… But in Emmy’s world, the truth has always been twisted.

Just when peace starts to feel possible, a knock at Peach’s door cracks the world wide open. Her missing daughter is found. Yet… a buried secret explodes into the kind of truth that flips a whole family’s legacy upside down.

O’ is doing everything to protect Emmy, Ocean, and the life they’re building, but the streets ain’t letting go easy. Not when a faceless enemy called The Shadow keeps playing puppet master behind the scenes.

As Wesson digs deeper, what he unearths changes everything they thought they knew, including a shocking reveal that leaves everyone speechless.

Meanwhile, Tan’s heart is battling between silence and survival. Now, she’s guarded as ever, as she watches the man she still loves prepare to risk everything for a sister she can't stand.

When a secret lair, a cold dungeon, and a desperate search for Mischa collide… all hell breaks loose. But even after the rescue mission unfolds, one haunting truth remains… Mischa’s story is far from over, and the final play hasn’t even begun.

Because just when O’ thinks it’s over..
.
The Shadow walks right into his life—suited, smiling, and slicker than ever. And this time… He’s wearing a familiar face... and holding all the cards.

This is O’ & Em — where love is power, and every secret has a price.

title: Stealing The Heart Of The Nanny 2
description: In the second installment of the Stealing the Heart of The Nanny series, the Alexander brothers will be tested like never before. Stox is dealing with the aftermath of cheating on Beautiful. Storm must deal with the error of his ways after forcing Yari’s hand. Stetson and Spring can’t decide if they want to give love a try or keep things strictly professional between them. Things really get tense with the families and decisions must be made that will possibly break ties, forever. Come take a ride with Glitz as she takes you on a ride that will have you clutching your pearls.

title: A Virgin BBW and an Unhinged Hood Millionaire 3
description:
In the explosive third installment, the fallout from Kiersten’s brutal assault ripples through the city like aftershocks, testing loyalties, igniting revenge, and pushing every character to their breaking point.

Kiersten, once a quiet storm, rises with purpose. Healing from trauma, she moves through the world with new clarity and fire. As her bond with Sire deepens, so does her hunger for closure and when justice through the system fails, she takes matters into her own hands. Her journey from victim to executioner reaches a harrowing, powerful climax as she delivers vengeance to the man who nearly took her Johnathan.

Meanwhile, Saint is done playing defense. With his sister’s blood on his conscience and betrayal surrounding him, he wages silent war in the streets and finds unexpected peace in Jream, the woman who’s always had his back. Their connection turns intimate in a night that redefines love and loyalty, but peace comes at a price.

Melody, spirals into obsession after being cast aside. Fueled by heartbreak, jealousy, and delusion, she becomes her own kind of storm, one that ends in irreversible tragedy. Her final act shakes the crew to its core and leaves blood on more than just her hands.

As the body count rises and truths are laid bare, Part Three is where pain transforms into power, love becomes lethal, and every score is settled with blood.

title: Calling Her Home (Three Rivers Romance™ #5)
description: He’s a seriously handsome grumpy cowboy who’s already set in his ways despite his age. She’s his best friend’s little sister. JJ Walker knows he can’t break that boundary, but Ruby Reynolds doesn’t seem to get what the problem is. Can they navigate new ground and traverse toward happily-ever-after without ruining their other relationships?Return to Three Rivers in this small-town saga romance where the legacy of the past meets the promise of the future. Revisit beloved characters and fall in love with a new generation in the Second Generation in Three Rivers Romance series!

title: Marrying the Billboard Cowboy
genres: Contemporary|Christian Romance|Marriage Of Convenience|Christmas|Christian Fiction|Clean Romance|Christian
description:
Grumpy cowboy seeks bride. Applications now open.

Zeke Reynolds is technically a cowboy, but he’d much rather be a chef. When you’re born into the Reynolds family, the Colorado ranching dynasty, you don’t have any other option than to fall in line. At least, until you’re married and inherit your portion of the ranch. A problem Zeke’s brother takes into his own hands, secretly paying for a billboard in Denver emblazoned with Zeke’s photo.

Kaitlyn McCallum is out of options, which is the only reason she even considered this ridiculous idea. What kind of man puts out a billboard to find a wife? And dares to describe himself as grumpy? It’s not like he’d choose her anyway. A single mom without a penny to her name can't be what he’s looking for.

When applications to be Zeke’s bride start flooding the ranch’s mailbox, his first instinct is to tie his little brother to the weather vane. But then, he reads one letter he can’t get out of his mind.

Wanting to help and to inherit his freedom, Zeke resigns himself to marriage to a stranger. As for romance? It's out of the question. But when Kaitlyn and her son show up at Redemption Ridge, keeping his heart from getting tangled up is harder than he imagined.

Return to Redemption Ridge, Colorado and enjoy the faith, friendships, and forever-afters in this Christian Christmas Romance. Marrying the Billboard Cowboy is book 7 in the Christmas in Redemption Ridge series, but each of the books can be read on their own.

title: Some Cowboys Fall for Hidden Stars (Keagans of Copper Creek Book 8)
description:
She’s a country music star who didn’t plan on staying in Copper Creek… or finding love with a reclusive cowboy. He makes it a point to trust no one. Will their romance survive when he finds out who she really is?

Emma Hart, a famous country music star, has spent years in the spotlight, but all she craves now is peace. Using her real name, Emily Hartford, she escapes to the small town of Copper Creek, hoping to hide from the world and find herself again.

Caleb Keagan, a quiet and guarded rancher, has no interest in the outside world—until Emily enters his life. He’s drawn to her vibrant spirit, even though he senses she’s hiding something. Despite his doubts, Caleb can’t help but care for the beautiful stranger who’s stirring up emotions he’s long tried to bury.

As Emily and Caleb grow closer, old wounds start to heal, but Emma’s secret identity threatens to break their fragile bond. She’s afraid that revealing who she really is will drive Caleb away forever.

Caleb’s trust has been broken before, and Emma knows that honesty is the only way forward. Can she find the courage to tell him the truth before it’s too late, or will her past destroy the love she’s found in Copper Creek?

Find out in Some Cowboys Fall for Hidden Stars.

title: Wrong Side of Dead at Forty (Return of the King)
description:
A lycan attack. A cunning enemy. A startling revelation.

When we are attacked by the lycan king’s forces, our adversaries are shocked by Rene’s power. But the lycan king has a newfound strength of his own, and he uses it to outmaneuver our toughest warriors.

After being poisoned, I find myself in the hands of our enemy, and linked to someone I despise.

Can I undo the dark magic used against me, or have I unwittingly aided in Rene’s destruction?

Find out what prowls the shadows of Black Blossom County by reading Wrong Side of Dead at Forty, the new Paranormal Women’s Fiction series readers are comparing to Shannon Mayer, K.F. Breene, and Victoria Dannan.

One click to start this Magical Midlife undead adventure now!

title: COMMUNICATION SKILLS FOR COUPLES MADE SIMPLE: 7-STEP WORKBOOK TO BUILD TRUST, RESOLVE CONFLICTS, MASTER ACTIVE LISTENING, AND CREATE A FULFILLING RELATIONSHIP IN JUST 10 MINUTES A DAY
description:
Transform your relationship in just 10 minutes a day, cultivating trust and empathy without lengthy therapy sessions!Do you find yourself caught in a cycle of misunderstandings with your partner? Are you yearning to express your emotions more effectively without triggering conflict? Do you wish for a deeper emotional connection that brings you closer to your partner?
If you said "yes" to any of these questions, don't worry—you're not alone.
Many couples face the same challenges, feeling unheard or invalidated and struggling to navigate their fears of vulnerability and emotional distance. These barriers often stem from differing communication styles and external stressors that test the resilience of even the strongest relationships.
But imagine a relationship where every conversation brings you closer, understanding flows effortlessly, and conflicts dissolve before they escalate. With the proper guidance, it's within your reach.
Welcome to a step-by-step journey toward thriving communication and enduring love.

Here's just a fraction of what you'll unlock with this 7-step The 7-step formula to transform your relationship with just 10 minutes of intentional effort each day.Essential tools to cultivate genuine empathy and emotional intelligence in your relationshipThe secret to active listening techniques that leave both partners feeling understood and validated.SOS strategies for de-escalating arguments before they spiral out of control.Crucial tips for building and repairing trust, even after past betrayals. How to identify and communicate your love languages, strengthening your emotional bond.Why cultivating trust and intimacy is simpler than you think with the right practices.Real-life examples that illustrate effective resolution of common issues faced by couples.Focus on personal growth, enhancing your relationship as you improve yourself.Methods to involve a disinterested partner, offering a balanced and fair approach to improvement....and so much more!
You may wonder, "Will this work if only one of us reads it?" Absolutely. This workbook benefits individuals and couples, ensuring profound improvements even when one partner leads the way.
If previous attempts at solutions fell short due to generalized advice or rigid exercises, this book offers real-world tools, actionable insights, and a personalized touch to nurture a harmonious connection.

If you're ready to transform your communication skills and deepen your connection, scroll up and click the "Add to Cart" button now!

title: Jaxon (The Haven #3)
description:
Welcome to an exciting new series by USA Today Bestselling Author Dale Mayer. The Haven is a sanctuary for both animals and humans in need. Step into Timber's world, a beloved character from the popular K9 Files series, where cherished animals receive the care they deserve, and friends find a helping hand.

This series blends romance, suspense, and has a deep focus on character development. Follow these men as they stand at the crossroads of a new life, using their time at The Haven to discover their paths and the companions who will join them.

title: Soldier's Christmas Comeback: Trinity Falls Sweet Romance - Home for Christmas - Book 2
description:
This lonely veteran is searching for a sign. But the single mom he’s falling for is determined to make her own destiny.

Axel Williams walked away from a military career and returned to his hometown with a secret fortune and plans to help out his family. He doesn’t have to work anymore, but a man needs a purpose. His search for some sign of what to do next lands him a volunteer job teaching flag football at the local elementary school just before the holidays.

Single mom Eden Wilder made a big mistake the last time she followed her heart. But since then, she’s learned to stop seeing signs everywhere. Now she focuses on living a sensible life with her eight-year-old son, Jack, and her amazing new job teaching fifth grade in beautiful, small town Trinity Falls.

When the town’s favorite former tight end starts teaching flag football during gym class, Eden manages to mostly ignore his rugged good looks, even though none of the other teachers can seem to stop whispering about the big hunk and how cute he is with the kids. But then Axel takes an interest in a starstruck Jack and offers to spend extra time with him, and suddenly Eden can’t say no.

From throwing a football around outside, to attending town holiday activities, to dreaming up a project that just might bring a smile to a lot of kids’ faces, the three of them start sharing more and more time together.

But when Axel realizes what the universe is trying to tell him, will he be able to convince Eden that a dependable man can make her life better? Axel Williams isn’t the type of guy to give up easily, but it just might take a winter storm and a Christmas miracle to warm Eden up to the idea that it’s okay to fall in love again, and make little Jack’s Christmas wish come true.

Trinity Falls Sweet Romance is all about finding family – one clean & wholesome romance at a time. The Trinity Falls Sweet Home for Christmas series celebrates a group of men coming home to a small Pennsylvania town at Christmastime, and finding love and meaning in the season.

title: Shadows of past: Story of love, Friendship and Reckoning: Love story
description: Summary of the StoryThe story follows Prashant Gunjan, a dynamic and fearless young man whose journey through Haldia Institute of Technology is filled with adventure, friendships, conflicts, and self-discovery. From his arrival as a confident topper and branch opener to becoming Mr. Fresher, his college life is marked by intelligence, charm, and a knack for handling any situation.Rivalries and BrotherhoodDuring his college years, he witnesses a deep divide between Bihari and Bengali students, leading to intense confrontations. When a fight breaks out over a girl from the Mechanical Department, Prashant steps in with his martial arts skills, wielding his nunchaku and facing an overwhelming number of opponents. In the end, he leads both groups to a truce, vowing to end the divide.Friendship and LoyaltyHis friendship with Anish Gause, Deepak Gupta, Ravi Shanker Prasad, and Nirmalya forms the heart of his college experience. Whether it’s enjoying parties at Digha Beach, standing up for his friends, or getting into trouble for their sake, Prashant proves his loyalty time and again.Love, Heartbreak, and ControversiesPrashant's interactions with various girls in college, including Anumitra and Sutapa Das, bring moments of joy, misunderstanding, and heartbreak. He gains respect among girls, with some even believing that being close to him would help them become a beauty queen. However, love remains complicated, leading to emotional turmoil.Daring and Reckless ActsIn a drunken challenge, Prashant and his friends decide to storm the girls' hostel, forcing a girl to confess her love for Anish Gause. This reckless adventure escalates as they disarm a security guard with a rifle, creating a dramatic and intense situation.Flirting with Professors and SeniorsWith his charm and intellect, Prashant becomes popular even among senior girls and professors. His interactions are playful yet challenging, as he impresses them with his wit and confidence.The Fall and RedemptionDespite his fearless personality, multiple heartbreaks, conflicts, and betrayals push Prashant into depression. Seeking peace, he turns to meditation and Raj Yoga at Brahma Kumaris Ashram in Mount Abu, where he embarks on a journey of self-healing and transformation.Rising from the AshesThrough all his adventures, struggles, and realizations, Prashant emerges stronger, understanding the true value of friendship, love, and self-respect. His story is one of bravery, chaos, passion, and self-discovery, leaving behind a legacy that echoes in the halls of his college.In the end, Prashant Gunjan looks back, not with regret, but with gratitude—for every experience, good or bad, shaped him into the man he is today.

title: Witch's Wrath (The Nomad Witch Book 8)
description:
Time is running out for Scarlett Prynne and Runeclaw to save the captives of the Luminous Veil. 

Despite their efforts to disrupt the Veil’s plans, they’re still marching toward their ultimate goal. Whatever that is. It obviously involves the mind control collars, but creating an army of menial servants seems less than ambitious. And if there’s one thing that Camus and the Veil have in plenty, it’s dark ambition.

Amber is using her infomancy to try to track down leads, Snow is working on figuring out the collars’ magic, and Maddox is forever upgrading and repairing Dusk Runner so Scarlett can take the motorcycle back into battle. Are they all just waiting for the other shoe to drop?

They have one lead, but the sand is ticking out on that particular hourglass. The tracer they’d placed on Kingston Trane will expire soon, and it only leads to the location of the next Veil atrocity.

However, Scarlett has always been good at getting into trouble. It’s her own dangerous kind of GPS. This time, the trouble will be the biggest yet, culminating in a final fight that she’d better be sure she’ll win.

What she doesn’t know is going to try to kill her. Camus has been preparing for years to deal with such a challenge. 

Can Scarlett and Runeclaw survive? Can they even prevail? As options dwindle, it seems less and less likely.

But a wise person never bets against a witch, her cat, and her crew.

For action, magic, snarky banter, martial arts, mystical creatures, and a dash of mystery, join Scarlett and Runeclaw on their next adventure.

title: Familiar Brew (Familiar Kitten Mysteries #30)
description:
Something magical is brewing in Coventry...

Kinsley Wilson thought she had her life perfectly arranged. She has a new house, thriving businesses, and a loving family. But when her mother's cat Meri suddenly starts talking to her, Kinsley realizes her orderly world is about to be turned upside down.

As forgotten memories and dormant powers begin to awaken, Kinsley finds herself drawn back to her family's ancestral home, Hangman's House, where the walls seem to whisper secrets and the rooms remember her magic better than she does.

But there's no time to adjust to her newfound abilities when tragedy strikes Brew Station, the witch-themed coffee shop next door to Kinsley's donut bakery, Craft Donuts. During a special tasting event, a prominent coffee supplier is found dead, and Kinsley's friend Viv becomes the prime suspect.

With her reawakening magical senses detecting something not quite right about the death, Kinsley must navigate her resurging powers, two talking familiars with attitude problems, and her daughters' own emerging abilities—all while trying to solve a murder before the real killer strikes again.

In Coventry, even the most carefully brewed plans can boil over with unexpected consequences...

This book is dumb. - Meri

title: Fairy Wars (Blue Moon Investigations: Boston #6)
description:
Chloe Mayfield has found herself in some tight spots before, but a full-on war? That’s new territory for her. 

Branded a terrorist and enemy of the United Fairy Commonwealth, she’s under fire from every direction, and there is no shortage of people eager to take advantage of the chaos, including a murderer who stalks the streets of Boston, killing in the name of Blue Moon.

It’s up to Chloe to restore order to her city, and if she can’t do it soon, then she’ll have no choice but to offer up her unconditional surrender. But how can you negotiate a cease fire with a nation that doesn’t actually exist?

title: The Boy with Video Game Powers: Book 2, Rescue Mode
description:
Book 2 in the action-packed The Boy with Video Game Powers series!

Whether he likes it or not, Milo Garrett wears the Glitch Ring, a magical item that gives him video game powers in real life! With these incredible abilities, Milo must stand as the Champion, a brave hero tasked with stopping evil forces who are spawning into the real world from an alternate reality called the Gameverse.

Milo is just getting used to fighting bad guys from the Gameverse, but he’s never met an ally before. That is, until now! When a mini-dragon spawns in Empire City looking for the Champion’s help, Milo is swept into a quest he never saw coming.

Milo must rescue a princess who’s being held captive in the Gameverse. To free her, he needs to find a magic gem that will transport her to his world. However, dark forces from the Gameverse don’t want the princess to escape, and they’ll do whatever it takes to stop him. Milo is determined to succeed, but as he’s about to learn, this princess is no damsel in distress—and rescuing her might be the biggest mistake he ever made.

Kids 8-12, reluctant readers, and adults will love joining Milo on his quest to level up from gamer to real-life hero. With non-stop action and laugh-out-loud humor, this highly relatable, easy-to-read series unlocks an incredible reward—it gets kids reading!

Order your copy to start the adventure today! Free on Kindle Unlimited.

title: Spellcaster Creek Witch Mysteries Complete: Books 1-10
description:
Life can take a wicked turn in the blink of an eye!

In a single fateful day, Sage Rivers loses her job, deadbeat boyfriend, and her apartment.

Talk about a run of bad luck.

Sage's life is turned upside down however, when a sassy little calico cat informs her that she's a witch and has inherited a bookshop in Spellcaster Creek.

There's just one tiny hitch—Sage learns that she is a book witch, and since her magic awakes she sees a spirit every time she touches a book. It's a bit much, and when a local businessman strolls in and offers a generous sum for the shop, Sage considers leaving her newfound magic life behind.

Sage's plans hit a snag however when she soon stumbles over a dead body, becoming one of the prime suspects in the case.

With no other choice Sage finds herself thrust into a spellbinding mystery, working with an arrogant and cocky local guardian named Hunter. She just has to dodge danger, unravel secrets, and win the trust of her new town before she becomes the next victim of the mystery murderer.

Can she conquer her fears and embrace a new life of magic before she becomes the latest victim?

Discover the thrilling truth in this whimsical paranormal cozy mystery!

10 books. One complete series. Over 1,300 pages. All in one boxset!

title: Berserk, Vol. 37
description: Guts the Black Swordsman has again donned the accursed Berserker armor, and he’ll need all its unholy power to battle the titanic Sea God — from the inside! As the creature takes on an army of beautiful merrow, Guts plunges deep within the God to find its sole vulnerability and pierce its living heart. But even if he can manage this impossible task deep within the leviathan, how will Guts get back out?

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Fluff & Wynter
description: Welcome to The Cove Projects, a neighborhood in Winter Crest. From prostitutes, drug dealers, and baby mama drama. It goes down in the Cove. This Merry Christmas is not so Merry with Fluff and Wynter. Take a sleigh ride with this couple as they show you how to overcome every snowball that is thrown their way.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Xyon & Layla
description: Christmas always has a way of bringing you exactly what and who you need. For Xyon and Layla, this Christmas is no different. Spending their entire lives with each other, never have they thought that what they were missing was right in front of their faces. For Layla, she has always adored the traditions and everything the holiday brought, hoping to keep the memories of her grandmother alive. Xyon was the complete opposite; wanting to forget what he was raised around, only partaking in the festivities for the sake of his best friend and daughter. Witness the Christmas magic as these two discover things about themselves that they didn't want to face before.

title: Plan B Drama & Baby Mama's 2: An African American Romance
description:
Get ready for a wild ride in the heart of the hood with "Plan B Drama & Baby Mama's" Part 2. Shayne's life is more chaotic than ever. Her toxic ex, Elim, is playing dirty, using his family's clout to control her and her kids. It's like she's caught in a never-ending storm, trying to protect her little ones from his manipulative games.

Shayne's heart is a battleground – torn between fear and a fierce love for her children. She's fighting hard, but with Elim spinning lies, it feels like the whole world's against her. And let's not forget about Wylde and Wood. These brothers are still shook, trying to piece together how their lives got flipped upside down so fast. With Shayne out of the picture, they're feeling a void they didn't even know they had.

The streets are buzzing with Elim's version of the story, painting Shayne as the bad guy. But Shayne's got a fire in her that no one's ready for. The question is, can she turn the tables on Elim and break free from his grip? Will Wylde step up and be the rock Shayne needs, even though he's got his own demons to fight? And what's Elim's endgame – is he really trying to win Shayne back, or is this all just part of his power play?

Dive into "Plan B Drama & Baby Mama' Part 2" for a raw, gripping tale of love, betrayal, and survival in the hood. It's a story that'll hit you in the feels, with enough drama to keep you hooked till the very end. This ain't just another hood romance – it's a journey through the messy, complicated, but ultimately real world of love and loyalty on the streets.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Tucker & Jade
description:
What do you do when your family flakes on you two days before Christmas? Do you stay home alone to celebrate the holiday, or do you pack your things and head up the mountain to enjoy Christmas with a group of friends?

It sounds like fun, except for the fact that your ex will be there...the same ex that you haven't seen in six months, and that still has your heart on lock down.

For Jade, she would do anything to continue avoiding Tucker, but love has a way of bringing people back together, even if they don't know that's what they want or need.

Will these two be able to get over the hurt and anger from their breakup, or has their chance at happiness passed them by?

title: Return Of The Queen (The Kurtherian Endgame #8)
description:
Whether they are ready or not, the people are about to find out what the Queen’s promise is worth.

When Bethany Anne stepped down as Empress, she swore to return if the Federation was ever in danger from outside evil.

That time has come.

Bethany Anne’s refusal to be restricted by the impossible has made her plan to protect the Federation a reality, and the return of the Superdreadnought Reynolds brings a long-awaited reunion and an opportunity.

Pulling together old friends and family members from all over the Federation and…beyond, Bethany Anne is ready to leave the Interdiction to build a military whose numbers can rival the Ookens.

But is her plan impossible enough to succeed?

title: If All Else Fails (The Kurtherian Endgame - Out Of Time #2)
description:
Just how much trouble CAN two teenagers get into, anyway?Their parents will find out.

Alexis’ and Gabriel's childhood ends in violence, but what else would you expect from Bethany Anne’s children?

Zenith station offers the lessons. Conquering the curriculum may be easy. Being true to yourself? 

Not so much.

Now the twins must risk it all to save the innocent.

A great philosopher once said, "With great power comes great responsibility."

The twins reply? "Nobody needed that battlestation, right?"Go up and click Buy Now or Read for Free and jump back into the action!

 This book contains a bit of cursing. Perhaps humorous cursing, but cursing, nevertheless. If this offends you, we don't suggest reading this book.

title: Songs of Home (River Falls #2)
description:
Can God turn the worst day of her life into the best thing that has ever happened to her?

In the wake of a very public—and very scandalous—breakup, country music star Lydia St. Peter finds herself in need of a place of refuge. She doesn’t know why she thinks she’ll find it with the family she never knew she had in River Falls, Tennessee, but at least the small town will offer her the privacy she so desperately craves.

She never expects it to offer more—in the form of her new landlord, Liam, and his troubled teenage daughter.

When single dad Liam returns to his hometown of River Falls, it’s with the intention of taking care of his mother and protecting his daughter. He knows his own happiest years are behind him. They died with his wife.

What he doesn’t see coming is the instant connection with the new tenant staying in his mother’s carriage house.

As Lydia feels the pull of family and Liam allows himself to open to the possibility of love again, a new relationship starts to blossom. But when Lydia is presented with an opportunity that could rocket her to household-name status, she has to decide whether she’s willing to give up everything she’s gained in River Falls to chase her dreams—or if her heart has finally found its home.

*A shorter, novella version of this story was previously published as Heart's Home in the limited edition Love's Treasure Collection.*

title: A Billionaire's Weakness
description:
If it is one thing Constance Hawkins is good at, it’s working hard. Her dad was in a car accident that paralyzed his legs, and her sister Charley is in her sophomore year of college. With her mother not in the picture, Constance started working to help her family at a young age. Now, at twenty-six years old, she has a good job working at a bank. Until her awful boss, Sandy, decides to let Constance go because of cutbacks.
With her own personal responsibilities and her family’s, it wasn’t the best time to be without a job, but it was out of her hands. While on the hunt, a woman named Madelyn approaches Constance about possibly working at Yoshida Enterprise. A gigantic corporation that owns just about everything in Michigan and beyond. Constance is intrigued but she has no idea that a simple yes will turn her life in all different directions.
Lee Yoshida is the future CEO mogul of Yoshida Enterprise. It’s his birth right as the eldest son, he was raised to embody their family business. His parent’s harsh and tuff love exterior has mad Lee into the stern, cold-hearted and closed off man that he is today. The world was in the palm of his hands, and it rotated the way he seemed fit.
There was nothing too far from his reach, if he wanted it then it was his. Until he met Constance, the one person that didn’t bow down to him because of who he was.
Charley Hawkins is Constance’s twenty-year-old sister. Her spirit is as bright as her love for dance. A dance major in college, Charley is living her best life with great friends and a good a good-looking boyfriend named Joshua.
From the outside, she has it all but truthfully Charley wants her dancing career to pay off big time so she can help her family. Also, things with her boyfriend Joshua are sort of foggy. There are two women who are threatening their relationship. Joshua’s mother and his ex-girlfriend Amelia.
Jackie Yoshida is mouthwatering, he’s twenty and a talented painter. Jackie speaks his mind and marches to the beat of his own drum. No matter who has a problem with his decisions including his controlling parents. They think being an artist is a waste of time, Jackie is supposed to be working at Yoshida Enterprise.
All Jackie wants is to have his art grace the walls of the best museums and gallerias. He wants these things by working hard, not because of his last name. Unknown to him, he was about to meet his next muse when he came across Charley. Immediately, Jackie finds himself wanting her. But with her having a boyfriend and Jackie having Sanjay, a girl who has his parents’ approval. Getting Charley won’t be so easy.
How desperate will Jackie’s parents get in control of his life? How will that affect his art and his new feelings for Charley? Can Charley remain faithful to her boyfriend Joshua or is Jackie too hard to resist?
With Lee’s pride and Constance not caring if she crushes it. How will the two of them coexist working together? Which one of them will realize all the tension is an underline with desire and lust? Family obligations, secrets, cheating, pride and betrayal is just the start to the first installment to this three-part series.

title: The Fourth Wife: A Polyamorous Love Story
description:
Meet Champion Denali. A wealthy entrepreneur who just so happens to practice Polygamy. He has been blessed to be married to three beautiful women.

Charisma, JaKarri, and Brittany all possess different qualities that fulfill Champ in every way. In return for their love and their loyalty they provide him with. He provides them a life fit for the Queens they are.

Just when Champ thinks all he needs is three women in his life. A chance encounter brings him into the world of the beautiful and successful Chevy Caprice Cooper.

Champion comes into her life when she needs him the most and he saves the day like the Superman he is.

Never in her life has she encountered a man that makes her feel the way he does. Unexpectedly, Chevy will find herself down a rabbit hole that is Champion Denali. She never envisioned herself being in love with a man who practices Polygamy but she is. Get locked in with this urban romance to find out if she will succumb to the pressure of societies norms, or will she proudly become THE FOURTH WIFE.

title: Mystic Tides (Isle of Enchantment Mystery Book 2)
description:
*****A crossover from An Enchanted Waters Mystery Series!*****

When a prominent cruise ship docks at Coconut Bay, the charming town is abuzz with excitement. But the excitement quickly turns to fear when Elena Torres, an investigative journalist known for her environmental efforts, is found dead during an onshore excursion. Detective Iona Vale and her enigmatic partner Kai Marinos are called to investigate, unraveling a tangled web of secrets and lies.

As Iona and Kai delve deeper into the case, they uncover four suspects, each with their own motives and a rival philanthropist with a grudge, a personal assistant with everything to lose, a disgraced marine biologist seeking revenge, and an old friend with a hidden vendetta. As the list of suspects grows, so does the tension between Iona and Kai, their unresolved past and lingering feelings adding a complicated layer to their partnership.

With the clock ticking and the stakes higher than ever, they must rely on each other more than ever before. But as they get closer to the truth, they realize that the danger is far from over. Can they uncover the murderer before it's too late, or will Coconut Bay's secrets drown them both?

title: Sleigh Bell Dreams (Mistletoe Meadows Sweet Christmas Romance, #1)
description:
Dr. Terry McBride is thrilled to come back to her hometown of Mistletoe Meadows to take over the practice of the town's retiring physician. Unfortunately the tight housing market has her sharing a duplex with quiet and mysterious Judd Landis. Terry is unsure about the situation, since they'll share a kitchen and bathroom, but Judd turns out to be the perfect roommate, except it's obvious he's hiding something. Maybe a lot of things.

Judd wants to do the good doctor a favor, and give her a place to stay, because he knows she giving up the opportunity for a more lucrative career to come back to her hometown, but he has carefully cultivated a cover to hide the Secret Saint things he's been doing in town and he doesn't need the noesy doctor blowing his cover, no matter how kind and compassionate - and attractive - she is.

When Terry is tasked with posting on the town's social media page about the actions and possible identity of the Secret Saint, Judd is in danger of being found out. But, as they work together through the Christmas parade and a hot chocolate contest as well as helping needy members of their community, the attraction between them is undeniable. Will they see that they can do more for the community - and each other - if they pair up permanently?

Here's what reviewer's are saying about Sleigh Bell 

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "Jessie Gussman has brought us another marvelous inspirational and faith filled book." - Avid Reader

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 
"This is a wonderful story!" - Beach Girl

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "This is a sweet, wholesome, Christmas story with a great message about how we view others and the way to treat our relationships as Christians!" - K.M. Nice

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 
"I enjoyed curling up with this book and getting to know the town, the people, our heroine’s family, and more. A great start to a new series." - Michaela

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "It will be hard to wait for new books to this series." - BobbieMcC

Books is the Mistletoe Meadows 

Sleigh Bell DreamsIcicle DreamsSugarplum DreamsChristmas DreamsHolly Jolly DreamsCandy Cane DreamsMistletoe DreamsSilent Night DreamsCandlelight Dreams

title: A Virgin BBW and a Self Made Millionaire 2
description:
Serenity Huxley thought graduating meant freedom. Instead, it came with more lies, more secrets—and a target on her back. Still untouched, still guarding what little peace she has left, Serenity is caught in the crosshairs of a legacy she never asked for. Cursed bloodlines. Hidden betrayals. A life that was sold off before she even knew how to fight for it.

Enter Zayden Banks. Quiet. Ruthless. Paid. A self-made millionaire with scars he doesn’t speak on and a code he never breaks. He doesn’t just protect Serenity—he claims her. Fully. Fiercely. But falling for Zayden means stepping into his world, where love is loyalty, and loyalty can cost blood.

When her luxury escape becomes a locked-down trap and her own family turns against her, Serenity learns the hard peace isn’t promised. Safety isn’t free. And sometimes, survival looks a lot like war.

A Virgin BBW and A Self-Made Millionaire
 is a sharp, seductive ride through betrayal, blood ties, and the kind of love that pulls no punches. Serenity’s fighting for her life—and this time, she’s not fighting alone.

title: A Winter Crest Christmas: Kandi & Khayne
description:
Christmas time in Winter Crest, PA is usually a magical time of year. However, for Kandi Daniels, returning home did nothing but force her to start the gruesome process of healing from a failed marriage and the hurt and pain it left behind. Her idea of picking up the pieces led her right into the arms of Khayne Sanders. To many people, Khayne played many roles, but to those who loved and knew him best, he was a fierce protector who stopped at nothing to make his loved ones happy.

The moment he laid eyes on Kandi, he knew she would be trouble that he should avoid at all costs. The thing is, Khayne didn’t make it to where he was in life by running from trouble… And he didn’t plan on starting any time soon. Despite Kandi’s objections, Khayne is determined to prove to the voluptuous beauty that together, they can bring the magic back to the holidays for her and make this a Winter Crest Christmas to remember.

title: Hallow Haven Witch Mysteries Complete: Books 1-15
description:
Sadie Alden got on a plane with no intention of looking back. She sold up her cafes back home and took up an opportunity that looked too good to be true. A beachside café on a remote island where no one knows her name, doesn’t that sound like heaven? Well… things are never simple.

News of her arrival seemed to travel fast across the island of Hallow Haven, but the locals know things about Sadie that she hasn’t told anyone, things that even she doesn’t know.

She’s barely started a tour of the place before she is dragged into a cellar to dodge the incoming storm. Her new friend Kate insists that Sadie accompany her on a damage check around the island. First stop; the cemetery. It seems that there is one extra grave and it has been uncovered by the rain.

This is the beginning of a whole new chapter for Sadie, she is about to learn things about herself that have been hidden all her life. It turns out she has relatives out here, and they are all witches too.

Hallow Haven is a place filled with ancient feuds, magic, and secrecy. Sadie was brought here by fate and only she can bring peace to the islands surrounding her. Who can she turn to for help? The hot Sheriff who is trying to keep his distance, the local hiking expert who appears when Sadie is in danger, or the ghost in her kitchen? Life’s a beach.

15 books. One complete series. Over 1,800 pages. All in one boxset!

title: A Section 8 Chick & A Philly Millionaire 3
description:
They say the strongest women has to go through the deepest pain, especially trying to come out the project and overcome heartache and disloyalty. For me, that fire is life itself, blazing around me, threatening to consume everything I've ever loved. Every passing day marks a test of my resolve, with my kids watching me battle the blaze of adversity that’s my constant shadow.

The man I love and yearn for, the one who used to be my rock—has he given up on us? I find myself haunted by the thought of him with another women, each imagined whisper and caress like a razor slicing through my heart. The rumors are a relentless storm, each word a drop of salt on my open wounds. Is he out there, sharing the smiles that were once mine, whispering in her ear with his deep voice. 'I love you' to another?

My friends, the ones I counted on, seem to look at me with eyes that mirror back my fears, adding to the torrent of doubt. The world doesn't stop for my pain; it keeps turning, each day a reminder of the fragility of my hopes and dreams.
As I struggle to stand tall for my children, to show them what resilience looks like, I'm torn by the war waging inside me—a war between giving up and pushing forward, between succumbing to despair and rising to fight another day.

With every reason to throw in the towel, I keep asking myself, 'What if he has strayed? What will I do?' But it's when I look into my children’s eyes that I find the courage to face whatever truth awaits. They are my why, my reason to never stop seeking the truth... and maybe, just maybe, my own slice of happiness.

In the end, only one question echoes through my Will I emerge from this battle with my heart whole, or will I find the strength to forge a new path if my worst fears are confirmed? Find out in this raw and gripping African American tale of love, betrayal, and second chance romance.

title: A Winter Crest Wonderland: Prophet & Toya
description:
Prophet and Toya are two individuals brought together by a one-night stand. Prophet, deeply in love with Toya, is eager to commit and build a stable family unit. However, Toya's reservations stem from his tumultuous relationship with his other baby mama, known for her habit of creating drama. Can Prophet convince Toya to take a chance with him?

Meanwhile, Kinsley is going through a painful divorce due to her husband's infidelity. Unexpectedly, she reconnects with her ex, Eli, during the holiday season. In a shocking turn of events, Kinsley learns that the paternity of her daughter is not what she presumed. As she grapples with this newfound truth, Kinsley is torn between the temptation of rekindling her relationship with Eli and her fear of opening herself up to further heartbreak. Can Christmas bring them the gift of forgiveness and healing.

As the holiday spirit fills the air, these intertwined stories weave together, demonstrating the transformative power of forgiveness and love.

title: Basic Witch (The Nomad Witch #6)
description:
Scarlett Prynne, Runeclaw, The Spell Riders, and the Witches on Wheels beat down the Chrome Ghosts and disrupted the Luminous Veil’s plans once again.

The Veil didn’t like that. Not one murderous bit. And if Scarlett shows up in their sights again, they won’t hold back.

And, of course, Scarlett being who she is, she’s looking for an opportunity to do just that.

The Veil’s mind control collars are a looming threat, and Scarlett and her allies are doing their best to get the dirt on them.

Step one is breaking into the mansion of the one Bald Baddie they’ve identified. What’s a little breaking and entering for a good cause, right?

One clue will lead to the next, and each of them will lead Scarlett and her allies into greater danger.

Behind the scenes, Camus pushes forward day by day on his plan to use the collars to give the Veil unprecedented power in the country, and eventually, the world.

Only one troublesome witch and ferocious feline stand in their way. Fortunately, they have the Witches, the Riders, and the Federal Agents of Magic at their backs.

But will it be enough to prevent more kidnappings? More collarings? And the achievement of the Veil’s goals?

Only one way to find out.

For action, magic, snarky banter, martial arts, mystical creatures, and a dash of mystery, join Scarlett and Runeclaw on their next adventure.

title: No One Has More Love Than This...: Why We Remember
description: The book is an eyewitness account of the ordinary soldier’s experience fighting a determined enemy in a hostile environment far from home while being dishonored and disrespected back home. This was a war none of these brave young men wished to fight, but they learned to love and rely on each other in a way known only to the combat veteran. No one could have imagined these seemingly boyish kids could be motivated to the heights of courage and valor for no other reason than to come to the aid of a comrade in need.

title: Tempted by Danger (The Danger Family, #1)
description:
Rule #1
‘No Fraternizing’
That was the main rule you had to follow if you wanted to stay employed at Danger Inc.

For four years, Dymon Danger never worried about breaking that rule until the day his new assistant, Quinci Everly, walked in his office.

Withstanding Dymon’s tactics to make her quit, he realizes that neither Quinci nor his intrusive thoughts were going anywhere anytime soon.

title: Indebted (The Immortal Doc Holliday, #15)
description:
Coming Soon

Read and Listen to THE HOUSE OF GRAVES Five Book Series
Book 1: THREE LITTLE GRAVES & THE BIG BAD WOLF
Book 2: OVER THE RIVER & THROUGH THE WOODS

RUTHIE & THE TROUBLE WITH BEING TEN

title: Lawfully Ours: Sweet Western Historical Romance (Brides of Cedar Falls Book 9)
description:
Love and the law collide in this sweetly suspenseful historical romance.

U.S. Marshal Jack Holiday is on a special mission to track down and apprehend a notorious cattle rustler from his Robin Hood-style crime spree. More legend than man, Billy Bob Flint steals from the rich to fatten the barnyards of the poor.

Unbeknownst to the rest of the world, the rogue’s sister is living under the assumed name of Cat Southerland, serving as the beloved companion to an aging citizen in Cedar Falls. When Jack rides into town, brandishing an arrest warrant for her brother, she realizes the new life she’s built for herself may soon come crumbling down around her ears. Torn between old loyalties and her unexpected attraction to the tough but honest federal marshal, Cat struggles to keep her ties to Billy Bob a secret.

Originally part of the Lawkeepers Series, Lawfully Ours has been fully revised and expanded to be part of the Brides of Cedar Falls Series — uplifting romance full of faith, hope, love, and cowboys!

title: The Kaashi: An Immortal Land In The Universe
Artificial Intelligence for Structural Health Monitoring: Smart Solutions for Safer Infrastructure
Berserk, Vol. 24
description:
Desperate to find a sanctuary where his lover, Casca, will be safe from the demons drawn to her Brand of Sacrifice, Guts the Black Swordsman pushes his motley band of followers onward towards fairy Puck’s homeland, Elfhelm. With new allies who make their home in a mystically guarded woodland paradise, Guts’ goal seems within reach, but danger lurks in the shadows of even the most dazzling utopias, and even fairy witchery may not protect the wondrous kingdom from an army of marauding, murderous trolls!

Created by Kentaro Miura, Berserk is a runaway manga locomotive, a crashing colossus of teeth-rattling action, spine-chilling horror, and taboo-breaking humor that fires the boilers of its devoted devotees and burns the rest. Ashes to ashes!

title: A Love Bred From the Block
description: Zodiac Goings is a charismatic hustler with layers beyond what he allows anyone to see. Raised by sisters who’d do anything to see him win; he doesn’t let his shortcomings define him. Fear doesn’t exist in his vocabulary... except when it involves Reason. Reason Atkins is in love. She knows Zodiac is the bad boy that parents warn girls like her about, but she doesn’t care. She sees the potential. Reason loves Zodi in a way that can push him into greatness... or out of her life if he can’t withstand the pressure. Every young love has five stages of growth. This is theirs.

title: Alone in Miami at 3AM II
description:
In the next chapter of "Alone In Miami At 3 AM" by J. Dominique, the heat is on.

Zuri and Shai turned a one-night stand into something real, complete with a surprise baby. But their love story is far from a fairy tale. Forget figuring out the baby daddy drama – Zuri's ex is causing chaos, and now there's a wild idea that her sister might share the same baby daddy! Can their love survive this mess, or will their exes ruin it all?

Sevyn is finally ready to take the plunge with Zaakir, risking it all for love. But as the stakes get higher and Sevyn's life hangs in the balance, she wonders if the price is too steep. Loyalty is everything, and she hopes Zaakir is as committed as she is. However, as Zaakir digs deeper, he discovers secrets about Sevyn that could make or break them.

Each couple is navigating drama that could shatter what they've built. Find out if their love can endure the chaos in this captivating sequel. If you're a fan of second chance romance, dealing with cheating exes, and encountering Alpha millionaire men, this African American Romance is a must-read!

title: Doting on His Best Friend
description:
Can two best friends overcome their age gap and the past to become something more?

Phoebe Cordle moved to Redemption Ridge after experiencing loss and was grateful to find a ranching town where she could start her own equine therapy practice. She also found a confidante in a handsome and generous man nine years her junior who's captured the attention of all the single ladies in their community—including her own. However, after zero signs of interest on Milo’s part for the past six years, she’s given up hope and decides to help him find love instead.

Milo Gibson wants nothing more than to give Phoebe a taste of romance. He’s been biding his time though, patiently waiting as she grieved, and trying to be the most supportive friend possible. Whether it’s being her movie buddy or catching cockroaches in her apartment, he’s always ready to come to Phoebe’s rescue. But when she starts playing matchmaker for him, he knows it’s time to save himself before she sets him up on another blind date, and finally come clean about how much she means to him.

When Phoebe is forced out of her home and into Milo’s for an indefinite amount of time, the two friends find themselves in the midst of unexpected chemistry and challenges. Will they take this opportunity to navigate their relationship out of the friend zone for good?

Return to Redemption Ridge, Colorado and enjoy the faith, friendships, and forever-afters in this Christian Christmas Romance.

Doting on His Best Friend is book 11 in the Christmas in Redemption Ridge series, but each of the books can be read on their own.

title: What Dies Beneath (Witch on the Rocks, #9)
description:
Hali Waverly is in a good place in her life. She’s feeling better after surgery. Her boyfriend Gray Hunter is moving his office closer to her tiki bar so they can work on their paranormal cases together. Everything is coming up rum-flavored.
Unfortunately for Hali, things are about to blow up again.
A jeweler’s conference should be easy—they have at least one a month after all—but when a magical tsunami hits at the same time the vault is emptied, trouble becomes the name of the game.
There are a number of suspects—a shiver of shark shifters walking naked out of the water the night before doesn’t help matters—but it seems the culprit might have ties to Hali’s grandmother’s coven.
Once upon a time, Hali’s familiar Wayne worked for a witch…and then a warlock. Things didn’t go well with either of them. When it seems one of those individuals is involved—and posing a threat to the entire beach—things explode.
Hali has never been fond of Wayne but she needs him for this particular mission. More importantly, he needs her. That means things are about to get ugly.
Magic is about to take over St. Pete Beach. Who will be left standing…or swimming?

title: Langiappe & Lost Legends (Twisted Sisters Midlife Maelstrom, #13; Midlife Mysteries & Magic, #52)
description: The Twisted Sisters return for a little something extra in their search for lost legends.

title: Motions and Murder (Witches of Keyhole Lake, #19)
description: When a new judge shows up in town showing all signs that he's as crooked as a dog's hind leg, nobody's particularly surprised when he turns up dead. The problem is that Rory, a close friend of the family, is accused of doing it, and the evidence is hard to dispute - even Hunter isn't convinced he's innocent. That leaves it up to Noelle, Raeanne, and Lavonne to find who killed the judge before Rory stands before another in a murder trial.

title: Picking Up the Pieces (Baytown Boys #5)
description:
Baytown Boys 
Military duty called them away to war zones, but after tours overseas, the group of friends found their way back home as men, seeking the peaceful little seaside town. Now, the band of brothers, together once more, work to provide a place for less fortunate veterans to call home. 
 
Lance Greene. Former military. Current artist…and recluse. Moving to Baytown was a chance to get away and forget. Forget his family’s expectations, forget the friends he lost on his last mission, and try to forget the nightmares that follow him. Staying away from people worked, until he met her. She was bright, happy, and everything he did not want. 
 
Jade Lyons. Elementary teacher. Sea glass collector. New to Baytown, she embraced all the small town had to offer, loving the little town, her friends, her students, and her new habit of early morning walks on the beach to find sea glass. Until she met him. He was overbearing, rude, and everything she wanted to avoid. 
 
But sea glass works magic and when Jade discovers a body, Lance steps up, vowing to protect her. 
 
Can picking up the pieces bring two souls together? 
 
**The language and sexual scenes in the book are similar to what you would see in an R rated movie, therefore the book is for 18+ readers.**

title: Some Cowboys are Off-Limits (Keagans of Copper Creek #1)
description:
Falling for her best friend’s brother is forbidden territory. He doesn’t even like her, but when tensions rise, beneath it all simmers an attraction neither can deny.

Elijah Keagan had one unbreakable rule growing up: don’t date his sister’s best friend. So he never acted on his secret crush. Besides, Elijah has every reason to mistrust Scarlett. She was a big part of his sister’s path to self-destruction and she isn’t to be trusted.

Scarlett left Copper Creek in a blaze of dreams and never looked back. After the death of her mother, she’s back in Copper Creek and determined to stay. It’s time to settle down, find a husband and start a family.

Problem is, no one believes her.

When Scarlett’s dad hurts his hand and can’t work on their farm, Elijah volunteers to help them. That way, he can keep a close eye on Scarlett. It’ll be hard work, but Scarlett will leave soon anyway, right?

Elijah vows to keep Scarlett away from his sister and to not believe her lies this time. But what will he do when that lingering crush starts turning into something stronger?

title: Flexin' On My Ex, Loving A Boss
description:
De’arra Kingston finds herself at a breaking point in her long-term relationship with Izzy after stepping up to cover the relationship's slack. Unexpectedly, Izzy offers her as collateral to settle a $100,000 debt. Now, she must spend three weeks with a complete stranger, but what if this man turns out to be a charming, irresistibly good-looking guy with a substantial bank balance?

Assad Lattimore is a money-focused man who's been burned by women, including his ex-girlfriend's public rejection of his proposal. With a thriving record label and his protégé brother, Trevin, by his side, Assad is financially successful but missing one key element in his life – a woman.

Paige Kingston escapes an abusive relationship and discovers what a good man is when she meets Trevin Lattimore. Auditioning for a movie produced by the Lattimore brothers, she lands the lead role alongside Trevin, leading to a sizzling connection. Even Trevin's obsessive ex couldn't extinguish the sparks flying between them.

Discover the twists and turns in "Flexin’ On My Ex, Loving A Boss" as these characters navigate complex relationships and find unexpected love.

title: Mystic Sweets (Isle of Enchantment Mystery Book 3)
description:
Mystic sweets and deadly treats...

Coconut Bay is gearing up for The Keys's renowned Best Breakfast competition, and Aunt Phee is ready to prove her culinary prowess. The air is filled with the scent of fresh pastries and fierce rivalries, but the competition takes a deadly turn when one of the judges is found murdered in the midst of the sugar and spice.

Detective Iona Vale and her partner, Kai Marinos, are called in to investigate, and the stakes have never been higher. As the list of suspects grows, they discover that every contestant has something to hide, and the sweet facade of the competition masks a bitter truth.

From a pastry chef with a secret past to a rival baker desperate for a win, each suspect is kneaded into the mystery with their motives and grudges. As Iona and Kai unfold the layers of the case, they find themselves drawn deeper into a world of deception, ambition, and deadly secrets.

But the pressure isn’t just on the contestants. Iona and Kai’s partnership is tested as they face the possibility that Aunt Phee might be the next target.
